41a3(1): rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par tha rad pa ni 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon gsum du byang chub kyi pyod pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'azug sna spobs pa'i rgyas
41a4(1): mtshan gyi rnam par tha dad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa/  la sangs rgyas stond cing rmyi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi brag sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi skye
41a5(1): kyog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i myig gi rnam par tha rad pa ni dka' ra ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rin po che'i nang 'bebs pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro ba mang po shin tu dri ma byed
41a6(1): rnam par tha rad pa ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su sbyin par byed shing snying po byang chub phun gsum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha 'phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug bud kyi rnam par bar
41a7(1): pa'i sems par thams cad gyi dbang po bzhin du chos kyi tshul babA mo dras pa ston pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha rin po che'i rgyadan kyi chang rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par 'dad pa mi dga' ba yang das
41a8(1): bar myong ba la lams pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu dag pa spos kyi myig gyi rnam par la rang pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dbu legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byind kyi rlabs shes bya'o// 
41a9(1): snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshogs kyi srin gyi rnam par 'ad pa ni snying po byang chub rnam pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyad ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha pad mo'i gang snang po'i 'od kyi rnam par ba/ 
41b1(1): pa ni byang chub kyi shing yongs su zhi las phyogs sa rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par btud pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna tshogs
41b2(1): yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya'o// de nas snying po byang chub kyi dge ba dri ma myed pa'i rgyan kyis rgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams
41b3(1): cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// skal pa mang po mtha' dang / dpung byed par/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci ltar sngon spyad dran/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing sbubs
41b4(1): na de phyir de'i bsod nams mkha'i tshad/ zhing rnams mtha' yas ched myed 'dra myed par/ kyi pad gtong kha'i sgo ngas sngon btang bas/ mitha cwo'i 'od kyi lha de ni// bde bshegs drang zhing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 
41b5(1): bde gshegs sprug pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa/ zhing rnams de dag shed rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu/ 'gro ba sangs rgyas rmi lam zhi stod cing / sIr gyi sgra dbyangs lha de rab tu dga'/ mthal yas rnal
41b6(1): dka' ba rab spyad de/ dang pa'i rgyan gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ te rgya mtsho na spyan yang yongs su sngod gtang ste/ de ya me/ tog byig gi lha dga'o// yom tan rid ben 'od 'gro mtha' yas
41b7(1): dzin gro ba kun tu snying po byang chub ras/ rab tu babye ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis/ 'od 'phro 'byed pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga' dang sems cad rnams kyi spyod pa rgya margya // de la rgyal
41b8(1): 'chos kyi ram yang 'thems/ ji ltar mos par zhes nus rnam par gsel/ des gtsug phud 'phyang ba dga' ba thoT+Ta/ rgya kyi char 'bems kyis gzungs na de ni sems kyi skad cig gcig gis cad myed
41b9(1): 'o// chos don dbyings kyi bye brag ma thalayas pa/ rgya ma tsho mas yang dag rig pas 'jug/ zhing rnams rjod du myed pa khams cad tu/ 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs brjod pas/ de phyir so
41b10(1): ka na sangs rgyas zhing kun grags/ de ni rjes su spos myig lha yang dran mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs / byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus stanang / rdo rje sna tshogs sprin gyi lha de ni byang chub shing
42a1(1): gyi phyag rgya'i rnam par tha rang ba ni dga' ba yangs pa rin po che'i char gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro bad ma sdang ba'i 'od gzer gyi 'od kyi rnam par ba rang pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od gzer gyi kha dog
42a2(1): bad pa'i dra ba'i thams cad du stodad pas dka' bar byed pa zhes dbya'o// gang gis 'gro mye tog gtsug phud kyi dpal gyi dri ma skyed ba'i rnam par thand pa ni sems kyi skad cig thams cad la de bzhin
42a3(1): gshegs pa'i khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyings du ngargyan 'byung ba/ zhes bya'o// rgang kyis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'irnam par tha rang pa ni gom pa 'dor ba thams cad tu sems can mtha'
42a4(1): sa pa 'bral pa'i rgyad ces bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rin cem dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam pas tha dad ba ni skad cig gcigang gis bed 'i dra ba sna tshogs 'phrul pa byed cing ga rin po che'i cham pa dang
42a5(1): dbyangs dang sdang pa kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan ba'i rnam yam tha dad pa mi dga' ba'i shugs dang nyams bde ba rgya mtsho mthalams pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// nang gis / 
42a6(1): ngacan san rang gyi 'od kyin pa lan b.rad pa'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khom thams cad du spos kyi 'dod sprin du ldang ba zhes bya'o// gang gis 'gro ba pa yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par 'a ba ni bad la'i gasreg
42a7(1): du 'dzin 'a tshab kyi TIg+sa nga sa nga skyed pa 'is spyo// nags / khyon byin pa las pa sa kyi gas la sa pa A la
42a8(1): zhes bya'o/ dang gis 'gros tog ra pa'i myin 'khor gyi pa da pa ni sems pan thams cad pa dge ba'i sgo la brgya mangs yang dag par 'phru ba 'byung ba zhe khyo da da gis 'gro che / 
42b1(1): gA grul pasas napa na rgya pa gshegs pazhi pa/ snang ba'in das su rgyas yod na
42b2(1): sa pa 'i gan phrul pa byi ba rab tu ston/ me tog gtsug phrang la/ des des mthong ngo // phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnamasas lus pa thams cang su tu gshegs shis ban
42b3(1): sems can mapa' yas yongs su sbyin par mdzad/ shin tu mdzes mas dga' bar de mthong ngo // sems can med kyi nga yus ba kun 'bros pas/  re lo'i rgyu mim chos kyi glings kya
42b4(1): 'gengs pa rin cen dri myed 'od kyang rab tu gtong / rkang 'tshwadapal gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs ke ba'i khyod yul mtha' mas te/ 'khor du rgyal 'chos kyi cha
42b5(1): yang 'bebs bde gshegs de'i 'khor na dgar gnas shing / dga' sgra dbyangs kyi rnam thar de mthong ngo // sangs rgyasadabyangs ni mkhan mnyam pa ste/ dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan
42b6(1): kun dang ldan 'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul haM/ tsan dan shing gi 'od ni de la nyan/ sU rtse kun nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul dang dus gsu gshegs pa'i rgyal ba mtshan gyi rnams
42b7(1): sngags thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te/ de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngongo// de bzhin gshegs sku bsam gyis myi khyab ste gom pa gom par yon tan rgya mtsho ston / de dag sems can ji ltar
42b8(1): mos pas mthong rdul gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo // 'jig rten 'gon po rnam 'phrul rnam mad kyis/ phyogs bcur sems can yang dag bskal pa mdzad / me tog 'khor mang rkang pas gro
43a1(1): pa'i sgra/ mthong zhing dga' las sangs pa rab tu thor/ de la lus kyings su gtogs pa'i k+Sha khrel dang dge bas smras pa'i tshad kyi rnam pa pa'ang ba ni re bzhi gshegs pa ra
43a2(1): sngor gyi spom lam rjes su dran pa sa rnam par stod pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od gzer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par 'ad pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bu rtsed bar sangs rgya
43a3(1): kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha smras 'dul ba brgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam par thard pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'phrul ba'i sems can thams cad la brjod ci/ 
43a4(1): yi sadag la skul bas dka' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi rka nyis su gtogs pa'i lha shA rgyan bzang po me tog/ gtsug gi rnam par tha rang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu nas ka'i maman/ 
43a5(1): nyid kyi byi nad kyi rlabs kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes// bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal gyi rnam par tha rad pa ni sangs rgyas thams pa gyi/ 
43a6(1): spel 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par stonang pa'i 'dra zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thadad pa ni sems can thams cad
43a7(1): ngas na / sa sa pa'i sgra so byed 'i skyesas sa pa yod kyi ni mam
43a8(1): rar rab pa thog pa zhes bya'o gyims sa gtogs pa'i ga 'o na ras songs 'i dpag sa yangs da pas phyig sems pa 'a pa ni 'jig rten gyi sa byas sa kyig
43b1(1): rgya gyi sas sa sa mas pa sa ma pa sa ma/ ro'i tshig su pa dugames rgya za gi pa da kyi
43b2(1): rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la spros// sku gzugs cu mnga' mtshan nyid kyi mangs ste/ dgro ba kun 'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang / me tog gtsug gis ji bzhin nyid du mthong / 'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam kyi
43b3(1): kyi khyab ste/ sems can de dag red pa ci bzhin du/ sa la bzhugs drang ba zhengs dang gshegs par mthong / de yab spyod las 'byung ba li skas mthong ngo // rgyal ba'i mtshams kyi mchems rnams lams
43b4(1): cad nas dri zhim 'od phro sgron ma'i srin kye bas/ 'gro ba kun gyi/ nyon mongs zhi bur 'gyur// dri byed spos kyi srin gyis de/ mthong // sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i bsrubs su byung // 
43b5(1): nyod 'ongs rmongs shing sdug bsnga la gzi rang ba'i rnams/ mgul bar mdzad cing nyon mongs thams cad bcil// snang ba'i 'breng ba 'chang bas 'di mthong ngo // 'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang
43b6(1): shin tu dkod// rang 'byung 'jig rten don mdzad skyes pa ni/ 'jig rten kun gyi dbul ba rnam par sel// khrel yod dpas kyi 'od snang de skad smra/  sems can nyon mongs sgribs pas nyon mongs shing
43b7(1): bdad kyi lam gyis dkrugs te 'phyan pa'i rnams// de dag rgyal ba'i rnam tha rad lam stond to// srung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs kyi rnam par 'phrul la ltos
43b8(1): sangs rgyas 'asrin kyis sa kyi chos kyi dbyings mdad cing / 'jig rten dbang po gnas sems can 'dus pa kun tshwa'i myog ni dpal gyi 'aspyod yul po// de pa lag ra do rje sathulatsho la dog pa za ba kyi
44a1(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsu las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sems tshogs kyi rgyan 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// la\u0f89\u0fa4 rdo rje mi rab kyi can 'od kyi nan pas rang ba ni rnam par 'bras ba rgya
44a2(1): chen po snyand pas yon mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul pa zhes byin/ phrag rdo rdo rje rna ba dag sprin gyi dbyings kyi rnam par tha rad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas
44a3(1): tshad myed pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu med ba'i rnam par tha rad pa ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'bras pa ston cing / 
44a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi byi nad kyi rlabs kyis yang dag par skul pazhes bya'o// lag ma rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du'ong ba'i rnam par tha rad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings
44a5(1): rab tu phye ba thams cad ma lus pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes su bya'o// lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni shing gi na sna thams cad 'dren pa'i brgyad yid du 'ong ba
44a6(1): rgyad pa zhes bya'o// lag ma rdo rje seng ge 'od rgyal po'i rnam pam tha rad yang mi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o// phas bag
44a7(1): rdo rje 'od khro stug po rabal gyi myig gi rnam par ya rang pa ni sems can ma tshungs pa d+hung la lus 'jigs 'jigs ltar rab tu ston cing kun tu rnam par lbu ba zhes bya'o// lan dwa rdo rje na rin cen
44a8(1): drang bar ma'o 'od kyi rnam par tha rad pa 'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgyam thams cad kyimi rgyun pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi tsher mngon 'am 'a'adas pa zhes bya'o// de nas lag mdo rje
44a9(1): 'thus chem 'dzin pa nga po kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'grus lan 'ardo rje'i nyabong gyi dkyim kham song ga mams rnams rnam pa bkas ba / 'i tshe tshigs ba pa 'di dag
44b1(1): chos rgyas chos kyis bdes pa'inacham nyid de rnam par ltos// yod tanam sa la yas su cu gzugs kyi/ 'jig rten pas nam pam da/  'an gi
44b2(1): dbyig su khyang byas shing // 'gro kun pa ma nga gas / byi bang bu mi shin tu gan/ ngas rgyas gzung gi dkyil la ro/  shems sa thams canon// 
44b3(1): kyi khamams pa thams cad rab tu ga 'ashes/ 'jig rted dbang po kunan gnas na// rus pa rab tu bzhugs pas snang // de dag thams cad 'khor rnamasas// dren pa na rnarnamapan
44b4(1): dzang // rgya mtsho chob kyi rdo bskul pas gzhan dang gzhar gyi tshul dag gis// thams cad chos kyi bye brag don// rgyal ba zang med rab tu ston// rgya chom sa pa' byed rgyas dgargya
44b5(1): rnams rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'od gzer rab 'dres pas// kun da kyis 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas
44b6(1): bsod nams rgya chen nam mkha' bzhin// kun gyis 'dren pa rab tu mthong // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ma dres pa thos// cad zhing du ston pa mdzad// 'gro la sangs rgyas mngon gsu
44b7(1): du/ byang chub snying por rnam par mdzes// 'od gzer sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// 'od 'pho srin ni kun tu snang / chos dbyings kun tu khyab byas shing / sangs rgyas spyod yul rab
44b8(1): ston // dum dang zo/ bam po lnga pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ni rnam par tha dad pa'i chus rgya mtsho bsam gyis kyi khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngam gyu sa nasam kyi
44b9(1): son tam rgyal cho la 'thun pa ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'di mams cad yongs su dag pas bya ba dang / 'bra ba 'dus pa sam mthug par mngon par 'asgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnas par ba nga ba dang / de bzhi
44b10(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyinang pas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtshos
45a1(1): rang / zhing bams par bya rang mo phyi thams kyis kyi khyab pa'i 'ams ston pa'i byin kyi nangs shes bya ba'i rnam lam pa sa pa dang rgyas gi nang tum pa thams pa kyi thums sa byung chu sasam 'i
45a2(1): 'phrul pa mtha' dang dpur myed pa yang dag par stod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'a rang ba dang / dus gsu du skal pa skan cig gcig tu ston pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par tha rang / 
45a3(1): rangag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul bas da tshun tu 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par tha rad ra bu dang ga pa'adi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung byed pa rang lus kyi
45a4(1): spru 'ang pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin kyi rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad
45a5(1): mkhyen dbu nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par tha rad pa dag zhe// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnam par bar du pa'i rgya mtsho bsam gyis kyi 'byas pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
45a6(1): son can rgya chos ldag cing sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'thor rgya mtsho yod pa mams cad sa rnam par smras nas/ de tshigs ca pa 'dod ga pa zhing rnams rgyas pas dri byed rnam par 'jam pa mardzas/ 
45a7(1): sa rtsa bzhim son tam cad kyang byed/  sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lus 'o dri byed pa/ d+hes brnam sas chom mA cham la'i gag pa di ltan rgyab pa gdang sa 'jugs snang 'de bzhin dus sus pa skyes kun ma / 
45a8(1): kyang ba gan sa gshegs pa 'byed/ zhing nas la u 'barab tu spyong/ gapa'i chub sa 'jugs ma gyung // byar la rus pas byung chub semasapas sa pa sa kyis kyi pa rgyas me / 
45a9(1): kyi jigs rba/  ci lam ldanan /  kyi sa gyu /  du nga la kya la
45b1(1): khams car rnam par spyo/ rgyas grums kun la thal dang dpung byed pa'i/ nas 'phrul sangs pa rang 'byung gis yo/ ldan dam rus pa'i byang chub spyod pa na du 'i ba'i ku kyang byang ma da
45b2(1): sangs rgyas zhal la ji snyed yod pa'i rnams / skad cig yang cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston// der ni sems can 'byung zhing 'jig pa gsang sun// 'jig rten gtso'i ye shes pas pa mas sa / byam
45b3(1): ya mapa yas so grangs pas/ rgyal mas khams cad sangs rgyas s+yA kA k+She/ khasas pan da yangasangs rgyas mazul dbyung byed/ mthas par gams sang rgyas mags dathong byed// rgyas thas / 
45b4(1): kyis shes 'ang sla ba myin sangs rgyas mkha' 'dra rnam ldar bye tog ste/ chos nyid myi gnas chos kyi sprin dag gis sprul pas spyod che kun tu rgyas mdzad cing // shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'chang rgya bstan// 
45b5(1): sangs rgyas gsung de rab tu brjod pas na/ chos gnas thams cad ma/ lus brjod pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad re re'i sgo dganas//  sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug pa de la byang
45b6(1): chub sems dpa' dge ba dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par tha ra pa ni phyogs kyi dbyings thabs du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kI dkyis 'khor du
45b7(1): 'gro ba'i rgyar byed pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'od mchog kun tu smon pa'i rnam par thard pa ni sems can cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshad myed pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na
45b8(1): grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa ma yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni bza' shing gi rab mya drang dang bral ba de na yod do// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa thegs pa kun ma/ 
45b9(1): smad du myed pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i 'byings su 'dug pa/ khang gamyigs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ 
46a1(1): khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas spang du myed pa de ni ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya 'tsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya chos brgya'i rdul gind tu bra la snyed las
46a2(1): byung ba'og sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dam pa'i rgya mtsho/ 
46a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul phra ba snyed rjes su 'dod pa'o// khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas slad du myed pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa dang dag thams cad kyang ga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
46a4(1): gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho bcu'i rdug shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa ye shes sgyu ma'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par sgrubs pa ye shes smra
46a5(1): a rgya mtshog 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi na tu phra ba snyed/ kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dam pa thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shind tu phra ba snyed kyi bso
46a6(1): dmas dang / se zhes kyi tshogs sangs su rdzus pa gang ji snyed pa de mas cad kyis sems can de dag gi sa su leg me radapa mangs bar byab pag gag rgyas phyir dbangs rtsegs pa gan
46a7(1): smad du myed pa de la kun nas smad du myed pa zhes bya zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te // de'i phyir khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas smad du myed pa
46a8(1): de la kun nas sang+ga du myed pa zhes bya'o// de dag la rdzogs pa khang pa rtsegs pa kun nas smad du myed pa/ de ni yon tan tshad myed pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na yon tan gang dzi/ 
46a9(1): snyeng song ba de snyed kyi yon tan ni bza' ging gi ra ba kun nas sa du byed pa de na yod do// de lta bu'i pho brang khang pa legs pa kun nas smad du myed pa de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i srud dang ldan 'a'i
46a10(1): seng ge'i khri ba rgya mchog 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho brgya'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang sa songs pa dang da snyen phyung ba
46b1(1): bya chub sems dpa'i 'khod kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khags rgya mtsho/ brji rgyas gnad tu zag snyed kyis kun nas man cin/ 'anas pa dang ma 'ab pa dang / da lta byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi la tshad kyi nam/ 
46b2(1): rgya mchog 'jis nyid kyi khabs rgya mtsho brgya'i rdul gidang tu bral snyed kyis kun nus paskon tes 'das pa dang ma 'angos pa da skang byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khod kyi rnas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ba ro brgya'i
46b3(1): rdul ginas tu phra ba snyed kyis/ spod cing de bzhin du sgra dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / nas mkha' snyid dang / phyi 'am ci rang sgro lce chen po dang / phyi dang bri ba yin pa das pa dang / 
46b4(1): ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bsko da cing bzhugs so// rnam par dpyod do// byang chub
46b5(1): sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas myi dang phyi ma yin/  bu'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag las / byang chub sems dpa'
46b6(1): de dag re re zhing yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / tem 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor nus pa tha dad brgyang/ mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdus shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
46b7(1): 'khor dang ldan pa// rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyan thos
46b8(1): sgo ba blo shes pa ston cing / chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis myi khyab pas yongs su smyinang pa dang / rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kum tu 'bas pa seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par
46b9(1): tha rad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' dpal kyi 'od zer kun tu 'od bro'i rnam par ba rang pa ri du
46b10(1): 'brus kyi lus kyis rnam par 'byor pa don yod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyas kyi rnam lamatha rang pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
47a1(1): yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i daspyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thard pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings
47a2(1): rnam par spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin cen kun tu rgyal mchud gyi na se/ m+b+ha nI 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i 'apyod pa mtha' 'gro bshi
47a3(1): chu 'byung ba zhes bya'i/ byang chub sems dpa rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jab dbyangs kyi rnam par bdod pa ni sangs rgyas sems cad kyi snyen bkur zhing mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod
47a4(1): gyi zad dri byed kun tu gzi rjid kyi rnam par thar dra ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis byind kyi rlabs rgya chen po 'byung la zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpal mtshan gyi 'od gzer kun tu rnam par tha rang ba ni de
47a5(1): bzhin gshegs pa spu myed pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po dge bo dri ma byed pa'i gzi rjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas sa
47a6(1): rgyas kyi mthus byang sems dpa'i rnam kham pa dang pa rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par smras nasas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pang 'di dag gas so// mi snyeng gang ngan phyogs rnams kun kyi zhing byab
47a7(1): pas de lung skang cig dgongs pas spangs pa 'gro bar kun tu zhi ba byed pa'i gsung / sangs rgyas chos kyi 'tshar lo rgya chem zhi/ gzhang cig dgongs las chos dbyis kung pa ste/ sam mas khyod yul dbyings rnabs rgya pa na
47a8(1): 'gro ba kun lab snying po byang chub tu/ byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad/ bskalang ba brgya phrag stod rnams tshad byed rtsa/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad spyod kyang de/ gnam mkha' 'dra bar byas nas rab kyi
47a9(1): zhing // sangs rgyas zhing 'di sdong tshe rab tu sbyangs// mtha' dang dpung byed bskal par la la yis// skyo ba myed par rgyal ba'i yul bsams kyang / sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs la mtha' dpung byed/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskam
47a10(1): ba kun tu dgengs rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos// phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa/ rgyal bsu 'dir ni kun kyang rab tu bsten/ skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang/ skam pa brgya
47b1(1): stong tshad byed pa dag tu// rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par dka'// tshul rnams kun sor sangs rgyas chags pa myed// 'gro ba 'di ni rgya chen po mtha' yas mdzes/ sngon che'i bskal par rgyal pas 'gro kun
47b2(1): bajug sangs rgyas rgya 'tsho rgya chen snyen bkur bas// de bas 'jig rten gtsol phyogs dbyings rnams// kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung // phyogs rnams bkang ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba dag/ rdul gyi sbubs su tshad myed
47b3(1): zhing yang ston ka/ de dag yul gyi zad mtha' yas pa'i// skal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad// sngon tshe'i skal bar rgyal bas 'gro don baspyad thugs rje rgya mtsho tshad myer rab bskyed cing // 'gro ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba'i
47b4(1): 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs// sangs rgyas mtshan myed sku myed rdul dang bral// de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste// 'gro ba kun na mtha' yas gzugs su snang // 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal
47b5(1): kun 'i mdzad/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzer brgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam khan tha rad ya ni pha rol tu phyin yA dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamakha' yang dag par
47b6(1): zung ba zhes bya'o// cug chub sems dpa' smin kyi ro mchod byed 'od kyi snying po yin ma lam 'dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bsdus dacang kyi sems dang cig ma chos kyi dbyis kyi rgyas kyis kyis bachogs
47b7(1): par bas pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin che'abyung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug bud kyi rnam las pa da bani skal na la lasam gyis kyi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon gsum
47b8(1): yon tan drim myed pas yongs su dag pa sgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpal rgya chen 'od/ 'bas blo gros dbang gyi rnam par tha rang pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu 'og pa shwa wa nang ma shes
47b9(1): kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyad ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang ma rnam par gnon pa 'od/ gzer gtsug phud kyi rnam par tha dad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang tha myi dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po
47b10(1): dang mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rna par tha dad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub pan bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byind kyis rlob cing rnam par
48a1(1): chub sems rab lnga thos kyi 'od khro shinang tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyas mtshan gyi rnam par 'ad pa ni/ sangs rgyas da ltar 'byung ba thams cad kyi phog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa shes pa'i dkyil thamags bdag ra
48a2(1): sgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpas rnam par Ang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par tha dad pa ni/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi spom lam rgya mtsho' thams cad kyi dbyings la tu gnas par spyod pa
48a3(1): zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzer brgya mtsho 'od ce na dpal gyi zla las sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs
48a4(1): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// pa rol su phyin pa rgya mtsho dmatha' yas dang / sa'i 'akyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang yongasadasu rgyas tshad byed sems cad rnam par 'dul ba'i tshe shes sa
48a5(1): rgyas zhing angs rnams kyang rnam par byangs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas sems can khamasaspyir 'dul mdzad pa/ skad cig dgongs pas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ 
48a6(1): mtha' yas 'gro mnyan khas ma mchim par gsung skal pa rgya che myi zad mu myed par// rgyas pa 'gro la mngon gsum kun na bzhugs// mgon pos sngon chad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du// rgyal bas spyod yus rnam rab tu stan// 
48a7(1): chos rgyal de dag ji lta rnam 'grus pa/ phyogs rnams rgya mtsho ma lus kun na snang // snying po byang chub kun ma rgyal ba dag/ 'khor gyis bskon cing chos rnams gsung ba snang // 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad chib #
48a8(1): 'jig nyid dag sa mya kun mdes/  ba pa'in kyis kyi ma pa sa/  mas pa nam sa/ de sa'i da pa ma khyod bum byed de/ rgya pa
48a9(1): gsal chos kyi sku/ ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad myed de/ phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char yang 'bebs// chos rje thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag// bde gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' sa te// 
48b1(1): rgya ches 'tho ba mtha' dpung byed bkang zhing / brgyab pa stobs sa 'jug pa rab tu sos// sangs rgyas 'od kyis mas dbyings pa bgang zhig gsangs rgyas rtsod pa thabs par rdzogs pa yang / 
48b2(1): sa sngon tshe ji lta ba rnam 'dabyings pa/ de bzhin ye shes sa rnams rgyal yas bstan// phyogs rnams kun tu rag byung rnam par mdzes// smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus ston pa ji ltar snor tshe rgyal bas yod// 
48b3(1): sbyangs pa/ rgyal ba'i 'od gzer dra ba kun sgrogs// sangs rgyas yul ni phyogs su zad pa myed// dpung dang myir gzhal myed mtha' yas dbyings// phyogs dbyings kun tu chags khyer rnyes las ma// sangs
48b4(1): rgyas zhing rnams kun gis tu mdzes// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri dang pad ma'i ze ba'i dri thams cad kyi ngos dang nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ros dang / 'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad dang / be tog gi ze ba/ 
48b5(1): rarje dri thams cad rang ga stegs bu'i ros thams cad dang / rta labs/ Na zad kyi sgo thams cad dang / nor bu'i gzugs kyi 'os thams cad dang nyig kyad rin po che 'od khro la'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od gzer spong pa'i rnaM
48b6(1): thams cad dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mngapo 'thon par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
48b7(1): blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyis 'khor gtsug pur dang / 
48b8(1): byung dru thems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyims rab tu gdod pa'i thugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' so tan rin po megams kyis kyi sgrub pa megs rgyabatsho dab pa dang / byang chum sems das kyig 'bya 'a sa
48b9(1): tshogs kyi gtsug bung dang / byang chub sems dpa' ram lakha'i tshul pang pa sna tshogs kyi gtsug bung dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gi 'od bro gzi 'arjid dkyil 'khor kyi 'od dang / byung chub sems dpa kun tu chom
48b10(1): kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang da byang chub sems dpa' sprim yid du 'ong ba dri ma byed pa'i zla ba dang pa de dag la sogs byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing nga rnalang gi ning du zab snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnas pa 'artsom/ 
49a1(1): rab tu 'gyed cing 'di ltar nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad ni rab tu sbyin// spos kyi sprin thams cad ni shin tu 'gyed/ rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil khor gyi sprin thams cad ni 'byin pa/ yul mtha' sa
49a2(1): pa'i spos kun tu 'gro ba'i sprin ni rnam par 'byed cing nor bu nyi ma'i snying po 'i 'khor lo na 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi srin ni rab tu gtong sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong bI sprid ni rab tu spyod/ rin po che 'od chos
49a3(1): dog mtha' yas pa'i smon pa'i srin gyis ni rab tu snang bar byed/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing kyi yal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni rnam par spyod/ rin po che'i 'od dri ma myed pa zad pa myi shes pa'i rgyal po'i char ni
49a4(1): rab tu 'bebs rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i phrin gi char mi rab tu 'bebs shing de lta bu'i dag sra thogs pa la byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi ling
49a5(1): gi rdub shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu 'bebs dA byed cing lhags par gyur te// bcom ldan 'das pas lan brgya// stong du mar g.yas phyogs su rlom la byas te 'khor kyi dkyis 'chor
49a6(1): rgya che 'od pa thams nad du mchod pa'i phrin rgyud byi chang pa'i cha mdzad pa gnas gapa nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su nyam te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon tu bltas nas seng gi'i khri rin po che sna tshogs tu ma'i ba
49a7(1): tha'i snying po can mdo bar srul te/ skyis po krung bcas nas 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang spyod yus rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so// sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba ras
49a8(1): thob pa rnams po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyod yul chags pa byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams so// so so yang dag lar rig pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho sa 'dugs pa rnams so// rnam par tha rang pa bsam kyis kyi ltas
49a9(1): pa'i spang ba rab tu thob pa rams so// sgo gung nas de bzhi gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so gzugs kyi sgo rgya mtsho lams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so// dus / 
49a10(1): ma pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sanas kyaganas so// dga'i ba'i grags rgya chen po rab tu thob pa rnams so// bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor bu byed pa yongs su dag pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mam
49b1(1): rab pa rgyu nga sas rgyas bams cad bzod pa mngon par sgrub pa rnan than pa gnag de nas byang rnam sems pas rgya mas sa thos ma ma rlo ba'i gags pa gas
49b2(1): rgyas mthod kyi dkyis 'khod rgyal tsho thams cad la rnam par smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bca pa dran smras so// sangs rgyas rnam pa bdas rgyas mnyas nyid 'byed// nas byed ste mam du d+he/ 
49b3(1): phyogs rnams 'ang kun rab tu snang byas nas// 'byam zas 'khor na 'grugs pa nam yar mdzes// bde gsheg pa rang 'byung laba' dpung sbed de/ thams cad phyogs kyi dbyings su rgyas par/ ga bang zu rkyen po hU~M
49b4(1): gyis mchod paskor cing // shing gi rgyag po kun gyi drung na gzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// skang cigA sems la myi za som gzugs/ rnam par gzhang dang gzham dag thos pas
49b5(1): mthong ga de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so// skal pa brgya mtshor sngan chad sud pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa rgya mtshod 'dir/ sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can sbyin byas pa// de
49b6(1): dag rgyal ba de'i chos 'dzin to// yongs dag dri byed 'khor rnams/ 'khod pa dag/ thams cad sangs rgyas lta zhing rnam par gad/ pad ma'i snying po pad ma'i gdang bzhugs pa// tshogs kyi nangar
49b7(1): rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/ gang la bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khririn cen nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro zhing // spos phro sprin rnam mtha' yas rab du 'byung / snying po du ma'i me tog 'phreng sbyangs
49b8(1): ba'o// rin cen 'od mo'i srin ni rtag tu 'byed/ 'od gzer sgron ma'i rgya chen rab tu 'bar/ rta babs sna tshogs rgyan kyis rgyan// thub pa de bzhugs mngon par rab tu mdzes/ spu dbyangs yid du 'ong
49b9(1): rab tu 'gyed/ rin cen mtshon du sna tshog pad ma l+yang / nor bu'i rgyal pos skam khu pa kun nas rgyan// sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par shin tu mdzes8/ phyogs phur sprul pa'i dra ba rag bkyel zhing
49b10(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lab sna yang sgrogs/ gzug nyen bzhin du zhing rnams kun na snang // thub pa de 'dra'i seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sna dbyangs kun tu
50a1(1): sdog pas sangs rgyas kyi mgrus mtshad kya dkyis 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par smras te// de'i tshetshigs su b.rams 'di dag smras pa// 'di ni 'dre gshegs sang sa rgyas gyi rnas
50a2(1): te/ byang chub myod pa ldan chad 'askyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mchod pa'i mchod la tu ma dag/ rgyal ba'i gdang las de dag thams cad snang // spos 'od snang ba'i nor bu'i rgyal lo can/ me tog snying po'i zeng ge
50a3(1): 'i gdad gyi khor/ rnams thams cad rnyan gyur da pa dang / 'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun kyang snang // skad cig skad cig rgyan gyis kha dog kun// rnam du mar sangs rgyas gdan las snang / 
50a4(1): sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang / 'khod cing sangs rgyasatshad byed gdan la lha// tsa rin chen lnga ldi pad ma ma dbatags la// bye zhing byang chub sems dpa' yang po rnams/ 
50a5(1): sgra dbyangs yid tu 'ong ba rab 'byind cing / sangs rgyas ga ma bzhugs la ston pa byed/ sangs rgyas gsod de nams tshad myed na/ mkha' bzhin// 'di dag rgya kun desas rab tu phyung // sa rnams
50a6(1): ro re'i rgyang rnams gang yong pa// 'gro ba kun gyis rnams gang yo so// 'gro ba kud kyis de dag pas ma myi nus// byi phyed mtshabs kyi rdo rje sna tshogs mtha' yas pa/ 'khor yangs rnab dag shin tu banya' ba ste/ @#
50a7(1): nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram// byang chub shing gi sa'i 'khor kun ts+tsha ra/ sa phyogs kapan rgyal ba gdan yod pa// / kha dog mtha' yas rgya cher sna tshogs te/ me tog mngon gtor/ rin rnam par bkram// gser
50a8(1): chom mdzes pas de mi rag tu brgyad// sa'i lA mo de dag rab dga' zhing // skad cig sems kyi myi thabs yang s+thA // kun kyang rgyal pa'i zhal du mngon la zhing / kha dog thams cad rgya kyi srin gtong ngo // 
50a9(1): rid cen sgron ma mang po gsas par 'bar// spos mang dri tA ma mang po rtag tu 'byung // dus dang tshod kyi rnam sa mang lo ston cing lha rnams kun kyang / sangs rgyas mchod pa byed// phyogs btsun
50a10(1): zhing nas ji snyed pa/ de dag sa rgyan phun gsuM tshogs yod pa// de dag sa dkyil 'di na snad// sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa myed las 'byung / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nom bu rin po che sna rtsod/ 
50b1(1): bya sa kya dkyi [] kyis/ sa masas kyi kyis 'du snod pa smra na sus u[] la ba di / 'a gra
50b2(1): rin ce mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtong // sangs rgyas 'od kyis srin kyang rab tu snang // sa rnams kun rgyan shing kyi dam pa'i drung // kun nas nor bu rgyal pos rgyan byas las// bsod nams 'o
50b3(1): dbyangs kyi 'brug smra 'byung / sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshal yang rab tu rjod/ nin rkyen mang po smon ma'i char 'bab cing // rin cen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes// sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug spro shin tu dz+nyAn
50b4(1): sa'i lha rnams sa yang 'ad pa dag smon// rin chen 'od za smon ta nam srung / 'od gzer smin ni sa las rab tu byung / nor bu dru ba sris su kun nas bkram/ rin cen sna tshogs rigs kyis yan lag ban tsar+tha
50b5(1): sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos// ci ring cen mang za mtshon bzangs rgyad tu bkye 'gro ba dag la/ chos kyi rgyam tsho// ni spron// de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong / bsus
50b6(1): phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub shing gi// phud gsum tshogs pa dag/ sa'i dkyil khon 'di na sna pa ste// de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod// sangs rgyas gdan las chos rnams
50b7(1): rgya mtsho'i// chos spro bde bar gshegs pas gang gsungs pa// sems can kun gyi bsam pa pa ci bzhin du/ sa 'khom rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung // dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung bas na// 
50b8(1): de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro lnga dgengs// srog chags rnams kyi nyon mdos zhi bar byed/ sa 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun gsum gang dag dang / dri myed sa ni gang dag gis
50b9(1): mdzes gyurang ba'i/ phun gsum tshogs pa'i rgyad rnams re re zhing / skas pa bye ba dag tu'ang brjod myi nus/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis sangs/ 
51a1(1): chos kyi al myed khang na mdzes// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon gsum du// sangs rgyas 'gro gtso nas myed 'ang na spya // rin cen kun gyis snying po mat+yA rgyam/ rgyan rnams kun gyis de dza'i
51a2(1): mdzes shing 'bar// sangs rgyas po brang 'od ni bsam myi khyab// de na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas rab tu mdzes// kau brgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun sko rta babs sprin kyang bres/ stegs bu
51a3(1): phred pa kun nas brgyan tu bkod// gsen gyi dril bu'i srin kyang rnam par rgyus// mye tog b+hA re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos/ rin cen ra shing sdod dang gyi bla re bres/ nor bu thams cad sgo nas phreng 'bral/ 
51a4(1): de sa ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu mdzes/ spos dri rgyal mtshan rin ben 'dra/ pa ste// khyod smon pa'i shin gyis kun tu gsog// rgyad dam/ sna tshogs kun ras shin tu zhes// der sangs rgyan rab tu na
51a5(1): ba bzhugs pa / phyogs rnams kun skod srul pa'i srin kyi rnams de dbyangs kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing / 'byam klas phyogs kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba// sangs rgyas po brang 'di na de dag dran/ 
51a6(1): me tog shing dang rin cen spungs sel la/ 'phags par 'byor rnams kun tu mngon par mdzes // de la dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang / gzugs rnyad gyur par de dag rab tu snang / phyogs rnams kun tu rin cen
51a7(1): 'ang 'akye ba/ de dag sna tshogs 'dzes par rnam par 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu ska kung gadzes par rgyad// ta khabs mda' yab sna tshogs mang pos brgyan// de la dri myed 'od gzer kun snang ba'i// sangs rgya
51a8(1): pho brang rnab pa mal yas te/ gnas myed khang mar thams cad de la snang / de dag kun na'ang rgyag pa bzhugs shing mdzes// phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa/ rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun bzhugs kyang/ 
51a9(1): mtha' myed dpyang myed mu 'ang de bzhin myed// rang 'byung sangs rgyas pho brang de na bzhugs// de nas byang / chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis byi khyab pa/ ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bal
51b1(1): las kyi kyis la sa rgyam cha yad pa de das pa ca 'a rnas mtshas yar pa 'ad/ 
51b2(1): byangs rgyas du zlas thon lam yang ga 'gyug// rkang sa kyang chu dri byed ram par mdzes// bras nyin thams par kya ras yang da /  shi 'acwos rgyas pos ku sa sbyar// rdo byes rlos su
51b3(1): thig gshing sdod ma pa 'i chen kun sas byas// de de bye ma'i no bu 'khor lo drung // sgyu rnams thams cad nyin cen rgyad kyis rkye/ e gathun pa'i stod skar bun ram 'khyis// snying po byang rgya den rgyam pa rje/ 
51b4(1): yal gdog pa kun nas mngon pa ste/ 'khor snum mjam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags// me tog 'bras bu rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyed// snying po byang chub rgya che bsam myi khyab// 'od rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par mdzes// 
51b5(1): drims byed pa'i 'od papar bad rtsigs sas ni nonas yid kyin dab 'bebs/ stong po byang chus spod 'am sangs las 'byung bye tim rdo dang nin mer kyi zad do// mu cig do ga phyon pa dang byonas nas kun du/ tu
51b6(1): brgyus bye ma nor kyi gnas kyi srin 'byed de// snying po byang chub phyogs/ rnams kun tu 'byir/ bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos/ pad ma'i dra ba nor bu dri myed pa / rim cen 'od gzer dkyis na
51b7(1): kun mam tho// dris bu'i dra ba srin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin/ phyogs bcu'i nong bza pa gzugs rnams grang yod pa// 'byam klas zhing gi ma lus thams cad dag/ byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang / de drung sangs rgyas dri
51b8(1): byed rnam par mdzes// sa la ga kun nas rin cen gyi zad nor// byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang rtag 'byu zhing // bsod nams brgya chen dkyil 'khor char 'bab skye// phyogs btsur rgyas pa bachod byir de dag 'dod/ 
51b9(1): de bzhin gshegs pa sngan chad cir byung na dang // byang chub spyod las 'byung ba 'di dag ltos// yal ga kun nas rin cen nor myi zad // sangs rgyas yul kun bsam gyis myi khyab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' myig rgya bar/ 
51b10(1): ma sna tshogs kyi phyag phud kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam lam lus nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras sto dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul pa/ 
52a1(1): pa khyad bda'im// shing gi rgyal po de phyir phyogs su ma dzes// pad ma 'phrul la sdug cing gser mdog 'dra// rgyal ba'i sIn swA rtag pa tu 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus chu bya zhing // sems
52a2(1): rnams kyi nyon mongs gzung ba sel// rgyas pa'i 'khor mi tshad myed d+ha ste/ phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la// gzugs sarnyanasnang zhing dri byed 'od mchon 'byed/ byang chub gang gi rnam 'bras brji / 
52a3(1): ltos/ spon lam sma dang dbyangs kyi mar mye rnams// rin cen/ sna tshogs yal gsum la 'bar// srid pa rgya mtsho kun sngan chad/ 6/ rgyal ba'i dpyod pa ci ltar byung ba stom// byang chub lha rnams
52a4(1): tid kyi rdul snyed de/ de dag thams cad zhing po byang chub gnas/ rtsa thub pa'i byang chub shing sa skad cig cing // rnam yar gzhan dang gzhan de/ de dag stod// rang bya byung pa thams cad dmyod pa'i tshe/ gan can de/ 
52a5(1): bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa// de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi sbyor bcas pa/ thams cad rin cen sgo nas rab tu snang / phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa/ de dag thams cad 'di las sgra gyur ste/ 
52a6(1): de dag cis 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba 'ang / snying po byang chub 'di las kun rjod do// byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun na// bsam gyi khyab rgyan gyi sprin can dag/ mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyad can thams cad kyang / 
52a7(1): sngan de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su spyad pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gi 'od gzi rjid dkyil khor gyi 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi a bus 'khor gyi dkyil// yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i
52a8(1): che tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// srid pa'i brgya mtshor byang chub 'apyod mdzad de// mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su spon dag cing / gnas dang gnas kyin stoms rnams thugs su chud pa'i// bde gshegs spobs ni/ 
52b1(1): nam par dag pa bzod// skal ba kun su rgya tsho las spangs te/ mnyam zhing chos bgosas ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i rnams sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhidi phyogs bkang zhing // 'grams rgya mtsho bzhin ras kyi rjo/ 
52b2(1): sna tshogs thabs kyis 'byas klas stobs spyod che// bskal la snga mam 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin// yongs su sprid byas de bas 'khor kun kyang / sems can dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs sa 'jug/ 'dzin rte na gyi chos
52b3(1): sna tshogs dang / bsgom ba ci bzhin spyod pa rnams spyod pa// de dag ci bzhim rgyas bu chos spyod te// rang 'byu mas pa mkhyed pa'i rje ba ston to// phyogs rnams sa sras zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / byam klas sems can byams dang / chom
52b4(1): kyi dbyings da gnas pa Sha'i khab su mnyam nyid mkhyed kyi shog/ rang byung su zer khams ma khye nga spobs kyang ston// bde gshegs ye ges rgya chen kun tu 'gro// skad cig cig shes dus gsu ba lus shed sa/ zlogs dang / 
52b5(1): zhing rab skams 'gro la bkang zhing/ sems can kun la la spobs 'artan mngon pa sanang / bsdus gtas rnam par stobs pa mtha' dpung byed pa byed de 'drin rgya mtsho'i chus mi 'gro 'u du snyed thams pa rgyal ba'i drus
52b6(1): du/ sem pa mas 'a'i nas kyi sa/ sa rgyas seMsas na kyis pa byed/  ma sa
52b7(1): de bzhing soni dkyang rgyas pas nes su nang thobs pang // zung du'i byed pa nam mkhas mnyam pa te/ des 'i tshob dbyis pa sumam gcigs ya su kyis mas bye gas sa
52b8(1): brnye las bshes de nas sran 'a 'jig rte can gyi spyong 'angachi snyed dang / rmo ba'i bag chags pag nyams sus yang // phabs sgo ba mam nyam 'ongs sadad cing // rgyas pa badzin rten yang bas su das byung / nas
52b9(1): chu tsha chos kyi myos kyi byas kyang thaMn sa mas rgyas kyi ma tham pa'i rgyam che yod pa bams cad sa rab lamags pa ra gas pa yang pa di sa rgyas kyi
52b10(1): tho sa su cu/ mas rgyas grong dang rtsog pagyim pa ste// pha rom byin pa rgya chen songs pa dang tha/ byang chun yo pa rgyan da las/ 'arlo ba nams sa zugs rje 'i tshu cing/  chur bying pa
53a1(1): kyang bstan/ de phyir thub pa'i sku mi mchid kyis rgyas// 'gro ba kun gyis lwa zhing dga' ba ste/ skas pa rgya mtsho ma mo mthas yas stod// tshul khrims pa'os byi pa yongs sus pas na de byir na
53a2(1): phyogs su dri myed cing / gshin da tu 'phags par 'jig rnyed sdug sA la gses nam log mnyam pa nyid la dang skyed de// sngan chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor nam dbyangs pas// 'tsho dang mtshus mnyam son kun ston te/ de bas byon/ 
53a3(1): su 'od rnams shin du 'phro// bskal pa rgya mtsho'i mang por sngon 'aspyod che// 'gro ba rnams kyi sgrib pa thibs po gsal// de phyir / phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun kyad bkang ste/ shing rab drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// bsam gtan an
53a4(1): lag rgya mtsho spyod pa'i tshe// skal da pa yangs par rgyal ra spyod// de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal myed dga' bskyed// nyon mongs dri ma sgribs pa kun kyang sel dang / sangs rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon pyad cing // shwe rA thar phyid na rgyal bas sdod
53a5(1): bskangs te/ ga 'gro ba'i gti zhug mun pa yongs su gsal/ de las/ rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba kun mnyam thabs na/ thams kyis// yang dag 'byung zhing 'gro ba rnam spangs pas/ byog sa/ 
53a6(1): rnams sung nga kun la mngod par bzhugs / phyi ma'i smras par 'grob ma sa/ blor las pa ros phyin paras zu // gnas pa brgyam mi gnasas rgya che zhing // khyi ma'i mas pa tshulas sprir mnyas pas/ da
53a7(1): khas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes// rgyas pas chos kud stobs kyi mthar byin pa/ skal pa gzhal yas mang por// yosas su sbyangs/ de phyir rang 'byung ba stobs kyi pha ro lad byin / phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun med phyir 'phags// 
53a8(1): thams cad ma khyed nyid nab mkha' mtshung ba mnya' ba'i/ ye shes kun kyi sgonas sngon srungs pas// de phyir chags byed ye shes la rlos phyid/ phyogs bcu ku na rgyas la mngon par mdzes/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' srim yi
53a9(1): chu 'ong dri la byed pa'i thams sangs rgyas kyi 'dus/ 'thor rgya mtsho yod pa sems cad la rnam sam ldas nas rlos te rigasas bcad pa 'di dag sa so// sangs rgyas rdzu gaphrul thus ni phyogs rnams kyi// 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi
53a10(1): ra nyan pang rdzag sa rnamasasangs pa'i ji ltar sdod skyed pa// de ba'in kun kya ye shes no nas rmod/ dang gamis mi dga' ba'i grags kyi yul pa bye pa dbyings sun gyi bde gshegs rnams mtho / 
53b1(1): gsas byed ga ye mar ni byed yongs phungs pa na kyi sa byis sas yang migs rab tu byu / thams cad chos su byed pa gnyis te// banas pa rgyal tsho la pon num spyod cing // rgyus pa rgyad bye chu spyod nas sa
53b2(1): 'gro ba tshad myed dri phyed sbyangs pas 'byung // bsod nams dkyis 'khor 'od ni sa gsum ste/ snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lhag mthong brtam/ kang tu de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas/ chos kyi srin ni rgya chen rab tu thos// thod gro rgya mtsho
53b3(1): ldam pa gzhas byed ma// macu'i lakhor 'ong snying na snying je ste// 'di rnams kun tu sI ba dang mnyam pa'i lus / 'gro lam nyon mongs kun mas nas bsrungs lalo// dka' rgyal snying po mnyam dbyings matan nyid de/ shing dang
53b4(1): kun tu 'gro shing ni la gnol// sangs rgyas chos kun nas rab tu skyes de skang rnam dag ji bzhin rgyal bas stan// shes rab rgya mtsho yang sa pa'i srim la gyod// 'byam klas chos kyi thar thug rdza ma cud// 'di rnams mu
53b5(1): mngon gsum nam mkha' 'dra/ de 'byung byang chub shing cen 'di la mas// chos dbyings mkha' dang mnyam la'i lus can te/ 'gro ba kun dge sa nga khro ba kun snang byed/ 'byam klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag/ ring
53b6(1): zung song mchog de ni rgyal bas stan/ thams cad chos dang smon lam/ spyod mar dang / zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings dang / mnyam rtogasapas// bskal pa kun tu 'gro mchog myi g.yo'o ste/ gzhas byed sa ro'i
53b7(1): srin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste/ dus rnam su dashengs rab ma la'i rang ba'i 'dro// sangs rgyas yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu/ rgyas pa'i byid kyis nyid las rab ca ma// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par nazo pa na
53b8(1): zug myed pa'i 'od gzer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa du lam 'khor rnams gnas pa ni/ dad pa shA tshogs yongs su dag ma/ 
53b9(1): ni segs / rgyang dang yus rnams kun sa rab tu zhugs// de dag yangs rgyal ye shes 'dug par 'gyur// phan mun sngon lam rnam dag kyis yul teg da pa ma las bya ba sa du byas// de bzhidi gsheg 'inas 'phru
53b10(1): cad kyang / ga'ang dang gzhan gyi sgom sa rgya mthong / bde gshegs ras kyi skul bzhugs pa dag / sa las rgyas pananan tshu nyid la/ ku tu 'dragams byed chags pa'i malal la sa chas kyi rang mas nyid nga/ 
54a1(1): sa sas rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la/ phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing yon tan mtha' yas 'od srin rab 'bas par/ 'gro ba dang tshul smid du gyur bar mthong // la ya
54a2(1): 'byung ste// phyogs kun zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing / 'gro ba snod bzhin skul yang byed pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ya lo 'jug/ pa la sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'jug/ sna tshogs snang bas 'gro ba kun
54a3(1): ga zhidu rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'ad mi ma las der yang mthong / ba spu'i sgo nas por gzer rab bkye ba'i/ 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i srin la la la 'dug/ sngar chang
54a4(1): rgyal ba'i spyod pa bas dang pa la/ sa la dgal zhing rgyal ba shes/ par byed/ la las gsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams/  bde gshegs bsod dmas 'byung ba ci bzhin mthong / pha rol byin pa
54a5(1): 'phrul sas rgyas sus dris pas 'thod / de nas sangs rgyas kyi byid kyi rlabs kyis bajig ter gyi 'das me tog ga rgyad kyis rgyung pa'i ka'i dang / snying po rgya 'tsholab pa byud nas brgyag cag mang tho'i mas
54a6(1): tha tsu ga shigagag rab tshugag gi/ kun tu shig gig go/ 'jig rnyed kyi dang pa po de dag thams pad re nas kyang mchod pa mngod par sgrub pa'i smin bams gyis kyi byam pa'i rnam de gzhid gshegs pa nad bya kyis
54a7(1): ma 'o pa ma tu pan so// 'di snya mnam kyim nyon tshogs kyi nyin gyimams rgyalan gyig na me che mtshonas pams zad du srim de/ ri bichi mi za ba'i bad pa'i dra sa bams cad kyi ga
54b1(1): nor bu ring po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin+da dang / rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs dang / mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang / spos dang can dan rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang / ring po che'i gzun
54b2(1): thams cad kyi sprin dang na nor bu'i rgyal po sgra dbyangs bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang / nor bu nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyi 'phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od gzer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi srin dang / rang rang gi lus
54b3(1): las rgyan thams cad 'byang ba'i sprin dang de lta bu dag la 'grogs pa'i 'jig rten gi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sprub pa'i sprin bsal gyis kyi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal
54b4(1): thams cad du mngon par 'bab bo// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams rab tu dgal bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ ga'i dang snying 'o me tog gyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho shor 'dzin
54b5(1): rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mdzod par sgrub pa'i srin gyi rkam ra dri bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyis 'dod rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu tham bar 'gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang 'jig rten gi6
54b6(1): dbang po rnams mos pa gzhang dang gzhang / dmyigs pa gzhadang// gzhan ting nge 'dzin kyi tshul kyi sgo gzhan dang gzhan tshogs/ gzhang dang gzhan yang dag papa bsgrag pa gzha dang gzhang/ das
54b7(1): pa'i shugs kyis 'apyod pa gzhan dang gzha phyogs kyi tshul gzhan dang ka'adi/ chob kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yus dang byin kyis rlabs pa 'jug pa gnyed dang gzhang
54b8(1): ba gos pa ma pa samang du gA'ang / rnam par 'arang pa'i rgyas rgya tshon sgro gzhan dang kyis de bzhi gas pa rnaM sa byung chu smras pa 'a chu su skyed do// 'or jig bzhi
54b9(1): thog pa'i rtso chos kyi dbyings rgya 'arjo mi pa lapa'i dbyings kyi sabs smos pa sa 'jig rten gyi thabs rdzamatsho bas pad yang de gzhi do// sa sa byab pa chem pa'i 'do/ ras rgya bas pa
54b10(1): nas bras sas/ rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyad kyi tshul rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ste/ le'u dang pa'o// dum bu dang / bas po rgyag pa// de nas byang chum sems dam
55a1(1): da nga jig ca kyi bang 'ongs 'di snyam du sems par gyus te/ sangs rgyas bcos na 'das rams sa sas rgyab kyi yo sa bas
55a2(1): yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi byarlabs ni ji lta bu zhig mngal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni ri lta bu rig padang / 
55a3(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs ji lta bu zhig mnga' / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi myi snyengs pa'i ni ji lta bu zhig mngal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs/ 
55a4(1): rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzind ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lang sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni ji lta bu
55a5(1): zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi myi 'phrogs pa ni ji lta yu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan/ 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi s+yan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas
55a6(1): cos ldan 'das rnams pa yangs rgyab kyi ni di Ta 'ig sa duyangs rgyas bcos lda 'das mas sa sangs rgyas kyigs ma Ta nyin pa dang / mas rgyas bcob 'a 'das rnabs la sbyangs/ tu
55a7(1): kyi ljags ni ji lta bu zhig mngal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'du
55a8(1): rnams pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni ji lta bu zhig mang la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer ni ji lta bu zhig mngal/ sangs rgyas macom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni ji lta bu zhig yang
55a9(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yeshes ni li lta bu zhig yangs/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems drapa' thams cad la smon lam kyi
55a10(1): mtsho thams cad da ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su spyo dang / byang chub sems dpa' skad la rab tu 'dug pa rgya mtshobams cad ni ji Ta thig tu yongs su gor gabyang chub sems dpa 'a thams cad la rgyam tsho gams pa mi ci gas
55b1(1): zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa rab tu gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongasu
55b2(1): blo / byang chub sems raba' thams cad la 'gyod pa rgya mtsho rnams mi de lta du zhig tu yongs su sund// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtshos rnams ni ngi zhwa bu zhig tu yongs su med/ byang chub sems dab
55b3(1): byangs pa gas rtsa yon pa 'do sa tumags sam sathod/ nga sa ses pa' bas pa la sa yo sa kyi pa rgya tsho ba pa sa bu 'an subs pa da/ kyang rgya sems dpal sa sa
55b4(1): rgya tshornams mjig du nan tu yongs su thor/ byang chub sems dpa' bams pa sa yong sas kyu tsho rnams me ga zugs pa sa su byod// byang chub sems dpa mas shes rgya yornamapa dang gcu
55b5(1): ma du thaMd/ sa ldan 'das kyis bdag pag sa yang banan kyi da nye 'a zung ste/ bya sa semapa da mas kyi sa des padzin gi kyi 'tshams cas pa sa dang/ 
55b6(1): sapa rgya mtshon pas kyang bdang pa yang byung / sangs rgyas byin pa pa 'ams sa rgya yoms kya nga/ yang rgyas kyi pa macomams kyang gnas yang grang mas kyi brdzogs tu
55b7(1): ya sa pa bya na pas rgya ra choms ca gas pas nga kyang / mas rgyas kyi ma tho ca rgyam tsha nams kya rnams pa ma padang/ des rgya pa
55b8(1): sad kyi zhing de sa bcigs su na pa 'o pa 'gyur ba/  rgya sa / byang chu rgya zung 'a sa skyes ba nas sa/ 
55b9(1): bI na gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pas sku ni byind kyis rlabs ni sa/ 'gro ba ma us kun gyi the tsom gcod// mos pa'i stobs ni yang dag sa rab tu skyed/ sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad/ 
56a1(1): sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams cad 'god// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shing rdul snyed/ de bzhin gshegs ya lta zhing kun nas gnas/ de dag bsam pa spyod yul ji bzhin du// the tsom mas par rom
56a2(1): rnams rab stan gsol rgyal ba kun gyi sa ni ji lta bu na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yul gyi rgyud rnams dang // sangs rgyas byin rlabs mtha' dang dpung myed pa/ de dag chul ni rnam dag stan tu gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
56a3(1): lus kyikyis 'jug ga rgyal pa'i mkhyed pa ji ltar 'jug pa dang / rgya chemamapa' yas stobs rnams rnam spyang pa/ rgyal sras kun la yang dag snyan tu gsol// sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin ci stang 'tha' yas dang / gyi snyengs chos nyid
56a4(1): nabu sbyangs dang / rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dpung byed pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams bsgrag tu gsol// ji ltar chos blo brang mnga' mdzad cing / 8ra/ rgyal ba'i myong yul ji ltar myi 'phrogs dang // sangs rgyas chos ga'ang
56a5(1): rgya chen de dag kyang / gzugs pa'i slad du yang dag stan tu gsol// rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar chad myed cing / sbyin dang 'gangs dang de/ bzhin ljags dang sku// sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' las pa
56a6(1): 'di dag tshul la 'jug pa stan tu gsol// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rje ltar sems can khams// chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dge dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dpung byed pa/ 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras sa
56a7(1): bsta nad tu gsol/ pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang / rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang // chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag/ byang chub snying po rag thams cad bstan tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
56a8(1): 'das kyis de'i tshe byang sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ zhal gi sgo tshams kyi mtshams kyi gsem nas 'od gzer sangs rgyas kyi 'ad kyi zhing du rtul shind tu phra ba
56a9(1): snyed rab tu bkye ba/ 'di lta ste rin po che'i gze ba rnam par snang ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste 'od shin tu phra ba'i kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 
56a10(1): zo byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gtugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste ram par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od gzeng dang / 'di sa // 
56b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'ang thams cad du 'byung zhing khyim pa'i rgyad ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'byung zhing 'khyis pa'i rgyad ces bya'i 'od gzer dang / 'di sa ste rin po che rdo rje dus byed pan
56b2(1): mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od gzer dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams pani kyi mtshan gyi 'amatho'i 'i shA rab
56b3(1): kyi sprug pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / de dag la gagyogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdus shin tu phra snyed kyi 'od gzer rab tu bkye ste/ 'od gzer de dag re re zhing yang 'khor gyi 'od gzer sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul shin tu wa
56b4(1): snyed do// 'od gzer de dag de re zhing rin che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcung sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shin tu phra la snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khabs rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te
56b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' de dan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya mtshol nas 'od gzer gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus bzhi dang snying po me rton gyi rgyang ba'i 'jig rnyed kyi khams rgya mtsho
56b6(1): dang /  byang chub sems dpa'i dkyis 'khor khams cad mthong bar gyur to// ge 'od gzer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang // sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi darlabs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 'byung bar gyur to// bskal
56b7(1): pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod kyang de/ phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod / sems can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas/ rnam par snang mdang byang chub mngod sangs rgyas pa phyogs nas kun tu snang 'is
56b8(1): mngon par 'dzes / spu rnams kun nas sprul pa'i / srin kyang 'byed// des ni sems can bsnod bzhin sprul byas nas/ byang chub sbyor ba chags myed rnam par dag/ srid pa'i rgyun na sdom 'khor ba'i che/ rgyal pas sems can yongs/ 
56b9(1): sra sbrid pa rang / de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bsgos// sangs rgyas nam 'anas 'di dag pa' mas so// rgyam rnas zla phyogs kun tu ldang khyang chub ging mi lal ga na ci byang / 'od da la rtse bkrun tu rab par byar/ 
56b10(1): byang chub bsam gyis kyi khub de sangs rgyas na/ phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu spyon/ sems can kun gyi sems pazhir tshim byas te/ sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul// de las chos nyid 'i sgra rab tu 'byung / 'di rnams
57a1(1): zungs rdu'i nyid ma cang tu kyang da byed kun rgyas pa ma dang/ bsosas sa kun lasangs rgyas rab bdugs kyi/ rgyu na kun pa n+d+he// zhing gi rgyu byed phyogs rnam
57a2(1): ras pa rgyal sras yang po rab tu dga' ste lpags// mchod pa sna tshogs car ma napa 'bems shing // thams pad 'khod de rgyal pa mngon gsus pa/ gsungs dbyang sa gcig las mnga' yas mdon rnams rgya mtsho
57a3(1): sangs rgyas shin tu ston/ 'gyo ba kun yid bzhin chos kyi char 'bab kyis// rkang gnyis gtso bo de la ltar yang deng dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa/ skad cig thugs la de dag bdon gsum cu/ rgya ba byang / 
57a4(1): chub shing drungab ston mjed kyis rgyas pa'i drung du sbyar te 'dong bar kyis// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho// 'od gzer kun gyi sgo nas ragu snang / de'i chos nyid ci lta ci 'dri de dag ltos/ 
57a5(1): sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon gsum chos stonang to// de'i tshe 'jig rten 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gzer gyis yang dag par sprul pa'i rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' rang / 
57a6(1): 'khod kyi dkyis 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te wa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ong bar gyurd to// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis
57a7(1): rgyan pa 'di dang mdab chags su shar phyogs logs ma 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i par ma'i dpal dri ma myed par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams ring po che'i
57a8(1): 'phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba du de bzhin gshegs chos kyis chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad pa ma rnam par lta ba'i
57a9(1): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan gcig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang drung
57a10(1): sems dpa'i lus kyi sprid bcas/ nas mkha' kun nas/ log par byin kyis rlog cing ring po che'i chang kyi 'od gzer par mA'-i dasrin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byed kyis chub pa dang / rin po che'i thom gyi na
57b1(1): bcu sa nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rngub pa dang / nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas sog par byid kyis rlabs tha dang / rin po che'i me tog gi 'greng ba'i sprid brtsan
57b2(1): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlag pa dang / phye ma'i shing gyi mdzod kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
57b3(1): kyis rlab pa dang / spos dang / gdug spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / spos thams cad kyi shing gyi srin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byind kyis
57b4(1): rlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rab pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das
57b5(1): bya mas nas gang rdzogs su bad te/ me ton snang ba lnga tshonas kyi snying toca nag seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo blang bcas te 'khod bar gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang 'dab chags su/ 
57b6(1): rdo phyogs ra 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ring po che thams cad/ snang bas rnam par rgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod te/ 'jigan ter gyi khabs par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khabs 'od
57b7(1): 'tha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan ra de bzhin gshegs pa kun margya pa'i shod dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor kyi dkyil yodo rgya 'tsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam yarang snang ba'i bu
57b8(1): gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu 'khon gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang ra ba der 'ong bar gyur te nor bu'i rgyal po rgya
57b9(1): kyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsas par byas pa'i snying po'i sprin bcus nas mkha' kun nas yog par byin kyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyad kyi sI bcus rab yal kur nas yog / 
57b10(1): ma byed kyis rngub pa dang / no bu'i rgyal po ring po che 'od tho ba rab tu 'ab ma zhing sangs rgyas kyi mtshang shin tu sgrogs pa'i sprid bzlas nam ma khal kun nas yon par byed kyis rlas pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po lung/ 
58a1(1): nas shA byang ci yangs rgyas kyi chom pams pa rnags pa'i mi brgyas rgyas smra bum sa sog par byid kyi rab padang / sa rdzu po na su 'ad sa da kyi
58a2(1): byas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad ma 'dres par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs ston pa'i srin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yon
58a3(1): par byin kyis rlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po 'od phro shin tu stug po 'i sgron mas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su sgrog pa'i sprin bcus// nam mkha' kun nas yon par byin gyis rlab dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas
58a4(1): kyi zhing bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal myed khang gi gzugs rnyan yang dag par ston pa'i srin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin kyis rlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi
58a5(1): mtshon gyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs rnyang rnam pan snang ba'i smon bcus nas malas kun nas log par byind kyisarlab pa dang / de dag pa sogs pa no su rgyal po'i sprin 'jig rten gyi
58a6(1): rgyam mo rus bla mo snyed kyis dpasa'a'adran nas sog par byedad kyis ra byed cing / bcos ldan 'das gang na sa de phyi te 'am sang 'a sa kya bcas das cosas btan te/ med dra di la dang / las sa
58a7(1): nad dang / pad ma rag sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri mngon par smras nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khor par gyur to// de nas a nga 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dpa'ang ba chags su nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
58a8(1): ring po che 'od ming du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi stan yongs su 'byung ba mde bzhin gshegs pa spos mngon tu snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa 'i 'khor
58a9(1): dkyil 'khor rgya 'tsho nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes 'od 'phro ba'i rgyang zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi lam rgya mtsho'i rdul gi na tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga sa pa der 'o/ 
58a10(1): bar 'gyur ten rin po che sbom dang bye ton sna tshogs thams cad khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pas rkyang ba khang pa legs pa'i sprin
58b1(1): hrul nas ya kun nas log par byin gyis rngub pa dang / rin po che'i smod pa dang pral song tho ba'i khang ba skyegs pa'i sprin bcas nas sapas kun nas log par byed kyis nub pa dang / bu tin bams cad kyi du
58b2(1): thegs pa'i sprin bcus mam ma khal kun nas yog par byid kyis rnas pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi gaN+DI ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprin bcas nam mkha' kun nas sog par byin gyis rnab pa dang / rin po che'i
58b3(1): 'phreng ba yongs su rgyang ba'i khang pa migs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byind kyis rlab pa dang / 'od gzer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa rgyang thabs car 'byung
58b4(1): ba'i sprid bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin kyis rlab pa dang / rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyis rab tu rgyad cing rgyan du ma yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprir bcus nam mkha' kun nas sogs
58b5(1): bar byin gyis rlab pa dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rgyan gyis rgyang par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i srin nas mkha' kun nas sog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / de rag la sogs pa khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprin 'jig rted kyi
58b6(1): mkhas rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis ram mkhas kun nas yod bA/ byin kyis rlab pa byed cing bcom ldan 'das gang ma sa der sbyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyags 'angal nas nub phyogs su brtad te/ 98/ 
58b7(1): go'i khri ri po che'i pad mchen ma so ma sna tshogs gser las byas pa snying po can mngon par sprus nas snyis mo kyang bcas te 'a'od pas gyur to// de nas yang dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'das
58b8(1): chags su byang thogs na 'jig nyid kyi lams rgya mtsho byen rgya bad ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes sun yod de/ 'jig gen kyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'dig rted gyi khams me tog sung pa sa'i drud de de ba'i gshenas
58b9(1): seshes kyi dpas kun tu dbyas kyi rgyab po bzhugs pa'i 'khod kyi dkyis kho rgyamatshonas// byang chub sems dpa' se go le nad gzer snang bas mthul byin pa'i zla grob shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi 'am
58b10(1): rgya tshos nu gis tum pa nyid dang skan cig tu babags das bcom ldan 'das gang ra pa der 'ong bar zad te/ thos dang do sa gachogs pas pa par shing rgya mi brgyas ma las rung das sag par bya / 
59a1(1): gardzob cing zhothams cad nas lo pa'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing gi sIn ba cus sun malang kun nas yog par byin kyis nub pa dang / gling gi gzugs thams cad las rgyanamam
59a2(1): yongs su ston pa'i gang gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kung d+has yog yar byin kyis rlab pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi srin rab tu na pa'i me tog gi ging gi srin brgyas nam mkha' kun nas yog lam byin kyis rnab pa dang / rim
59a3(1): che 'od sro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rnam par byas pa'i shing gi 'khris btsus nam ka kun nas yog par byin kyis rlab pa dang / tsan dan gyi bye ma thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed yang dag par sto dang pa'i shing
59a4(1): gi sprin bcus nas mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis drag gi dang / sngon gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ rab tu stonang pa'i shing gyi srin bcus nam ka kun nas yog par byid kyin kyis rlab pa dang kha don/ 
59a5(1): mthalayas pa'i zhing gi srid bcus gos kyi mdzod kyi nyi mas rnam par/ snang bar byas pa'i zhing srid bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog gA/ byind kyis rlab pa dang / sgra dbyang su thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid tu ni
59a6(1): nA ban tu gtong ba'i gang gi yin bas rapa sal bkun namaman la byin gyis rnas pa dang // de dag su rdzogs pa zhing ni yid 'dzin nyin gyi khams rgya 'i tshul shin tum pa nyid kyis rnam ga'as srung
59a7(1): nas log par byin gyis chub pa byed cing bcom ldan 'das gang na deng phyinang te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogs su brtad te/ seng go khri ror bu snod ma'i bad pa'i snying po mngong par sbyang ras dkyis po krung
59a8(1): bcas te 'a'ong bar gyur to// de ras yang 'dzig nyi gyi khas rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su byed dang gar kyi phyogs mtshams da 'jig rten gyi khams pargya mtsho 'jam du chu bkrung dang / shes gyi kha dog rgyul mthar zhes bya ba yod de mdzi/ 
59a9(1): rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams ring po che rgyan tshogs kyi snying po na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad myi 'jigs pa'i smon pa bzhugs pa'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos
59a10(1): kyi son can gyi mdzod kyi da pa'i dpas kyi gzi ring kyi bar phye zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rted gyi 'ams rgya mtsho'i rgyal shin tu zla ba snyed dang / sman cig tu 'bags das / bcom ldan 'das gang da' der thong bar byar te/ 
59b1(1): seng 'ge'i khri rin po che kha dog 'ba' yas pa'i pad ma'i snying mo can gyi srin bcus nas ka kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / seng ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu phyogs bcur rnam pA ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
59b2(1): smras so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i/ chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid myed/ ye shes sa ni thob pa'i rnams/ 'jig rten gtso bor rab tu mthong // shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams/ 
59b3(1): sangs rgyam thams cad kun gyi yang / cu'i rnal bar 'phrul pa bzhugs chos kyi dbyings sa rnam yod cing // lus kyi dngos pa rang 'jug bste/ rbab mo'i ros rnams rtonapa gyung nas/ smod lam dag gis yang dag byug/ song 'am/ 
59b4(1): rgya mtshos byud gyur cing ga se shes sa rab tu gnas/ chos sa rnam 'byor khong du chud// dpyod pa'i mchog sa rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kyi drung dag tu// chos kyi dbyings pa spyang bas na// 
59b5(1): dang bzhim thas ni rab tu mthong // 'ang rnams 'byas thab 'ams \u0f7f / 'askas pa bye ba 'am yas pa// bams cad gzigs pa'i chos sam rdzu coMn la rab tu stong// bad lamang la dri nupa gci tu sbes ra/ 
59b6(1): mngod par byas pam skyes mtshan nyid byed pabre/ zhing rnabs kun tu 'ang nam pam mdzes/ 'jig nyid kun gyi bas ma thun dam/ sesems cad kun la 'don gsus ca// sras kyi sri di kun byas shing / bya
59b7(1): chub dong tu sems cad 'dus/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthu na'is na/ byang chub sems dpam brjod pa ste/ gang gis mgon po mthong ba'i rgyu ma pa'i byi rlabs shinang tu ba gang / mnon pa ca stod gang 'azhugs pa'i// byi
59b8(1): rlabs mtha' dang / dbung byed de// chos dbyings rab tu byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam cang rgya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od gtsug yung rab tu 'phyang bas sangs rgyas kyi byid kyi rlabs kyis
59b9(1): phyogs brgya rnam par smras te/ de'i tshigs su bar pa 'di dag smras po// zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas kyi// gsung kyi dkyis 'thar gA byin te/ rlob kyi dkyis rna sa byas nas// yon tad srid ni rab tu brjod/ 
59b10(1): sang dag sangs rgyas kyi sku/ mam dan ram mkha' 'dra ba ste/ gzugs kyi sku yang rab stan cing / chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug/ dgas dang mos pa'i grugs rnams sa sang mi rgyas gonas rnams thams cad pa/ ras
60a1(1): soganas shing de dag ri/ de ba'i ma gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug/ shes rab chu du 'a chos 'di dag/ kun nas shes par gyi nus te/ se shes phyig ni rnam sa ging / 'di'i rgyab pa 'jug par 'gyung
60a2(1): kA rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs dang / chos kur rnam par spyad pa dang // rab tu 'jug dang ldang banyid// / mnyam pa nyid la rab bzhugs// chos rnams mtha' yas klod kyi rnams// chos mtshan nyid rnams pa
60a3(1): ste/ kun mkhyen nyid la rab bzhugs shing / chos kyi rgya mtsho kun la 'apyod/ sangs rgyas zhing na kun lakhod cing / thams cad kun rnam par mdzes/ 'ongs pa byed cing 'phos pa myed/ sangs rgyas nyid de 'dra'o// 
60a4(1): gzugs rnyan 'dral ba'i sku rnams ni// sems can rgya mtsho'i nang dan sA / mos pa ci 'dra yod pa'i rnams// de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / pyod pa mang po
60a5(1): sus spangs pa / de rnam byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad pa/ spru la 'ang / rnam 'phrul gzhan dang dge mthong / lus kyi rnas/ ni re res kyang // chos dbyings rnams kun tu khyab// 'khor po
60a6(1): kun nas 'khor pa stedadang / chos kyi 'khor mo gas 'a phyi khyab/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzeng dang / gzi rjid bye mad pa'i rgyal po'i blong so thos kyis sangs rgyas kyi byed kyi rlabs kyis phyogs sur
60a7(1): rnam par bltas te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad nas/ 'od gzer smin ma phyogs rnams bcur// kha dog mtha' yas 'dar ba'i 'od/ sems can kun la bsam pa tho/ 
60a8(1): sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ byang chub snying po kun ma bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu la te 'khod kyi dngan rnam par mdzes/ thams cad dul na 'angs 'dres par/ 'od gces dkyil 'tho rgyas pa
60a9(1): dag sa/ phyogs rnabs gzhan dang gzhanas macu/ shing gi rgyung rnams cadab tu yodang / da kyi rnams rgyam cho kyang // thugs kyi mas kyang can gyu na/ meng rnams mapa' dang gan kyi lus dang / bying gi na sa
60a10(1): tu gangs// bya ba chub snying po pa rnam 'phrus dang / byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo ltar ba dug/ skad cig sems kyi skyon pa byed/ shing rnams 'byams klas thams cad dang / rgayang la bye ba 'asamasas das/ 
60b1(1): byang chub sa das ma sa bzhan rnam na pa ston/ ngas rgyu ni rnams pa da/  ma rgyas sa na tho
60b2(1): ma rnyed kyar kyi rung ngog de nas byang chub sems dpal seng ge'i 'od gzer snang bas mthu byin 'am zlas kyis gangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rnabs kyis phyo pa brtsamags te// des tshe tshi la cu marapa 'did
60b3(1): sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ chos kyi 'khod mo rab tu 'khor/ chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas khrim gyis mngon tu sog/ 'dzin rten che rnams rgya 'tshor sa/ nas
60b4(1): kun dgang yod pa// thams cad tu 'khon po'o// de ni smon lam rnam 'phrul ba// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi phyir ngag gisaH/ zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang / chos kyi 'khor
60b5(1): so kun tu 'khorarnam par snang mdzad byin gyis rlabs te/ zhing rnas rgya mtsho kun yang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag/ rjod cing zhing rnams kun tu 'byung / zhing kun rtul la sku'i rnams/ thams cad
60b6(1): snang mdzad pa'i gsung // sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrog/ zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi// 'od gzer dra ba phyogs brgyan// sangs rgyas 'od gzer kun sgo nas// byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul
60b7(1): kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis/ chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal ya/ te/ 'gro rnams 'dul pa ji bzhin du/ gzugs kyi skur rab tu mthong / dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ mgom po ci snyed bzhugs pa
60b8(1): rnams/ de dag kun gyi mtshan yang sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnam par phrul la ltos/ da ltar 'byung dpa'adas pa dang / sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa/ de dag kun gyi bsam yas la/ chos kyi 'khor lo rabu glag
60b9(1): de nas byang chub sems dpal chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod myi zad pa'i dpal gyi// ni brjid mar mes sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcud rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
61a1(1): gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i/ ye shes tshogs 'di kur non cing // ye ges rtogs pa rnyed pa'i rnams// de dag 'di'i tshul la bzhugs// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs/ shing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung
