61a2(1): sangs rgyas kun gyi dpyod yul te/  byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod// skan cig re re'i sems kun la/ chos kyi dbyings su rnam par rgyu ba de bzhin nyid la gnas shi tem/ chos rnams rgya mtsho bung la zhugs// rgyad kyis rom phyin pa rnam
61a3(1): skas pa bye ba ba sam yas su// sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag tu/ 'di rnams kun na gnas ging 'byod// rdus rnams ne re'i steng nas kyang / chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung / 'di rnams kun kyang khyad par byed/ le shes rgyanas byed
61a4(1): spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul ru/ lus pa myed par kun bkang zhing / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam spyod pas/ sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes snyegs dbyangs/ chos kyi dbyings
61a5(1): ni rab smon pag chos dkyis des batheb pa'i nas// dkris kyi rgya mtshornas pa spyod/ bzlas pa rgya mchor ma 'dres pang / sna dab byas nyernams shin tu sngo/ sus rnam sa bams cad shes pas gas/ bya
61a6(1): kyis de dag sa la zhugs/ sgra'i ges la rmongs pa myed/ sems can sgra yang spyod yul te// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang rnam pas 'phrul pa'i dbyangs shes so// sa nas sar yab kyi nang gyur cing / bstobs kyi sa ya
61a7(1): rab gnas te/ skal pa bye bar spyad pas na/ chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od gzer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byind kyi rlabs kyis// mdor par rnam par snang bar byas
61a8(1): ba'i snying po can gyi srin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyam ma po zas cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nas 'khal kun nas yon la ma byid kyis rab pa dang / seng gen
61a9(1): khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin kyis rlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri phyogs kun nas phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi
61a10(1): srin bcus nas ka kun nas yog par byed kyis rlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos kyi me tog pad ma'i phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / seng ge'iSh+Ti
61b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi gdang thams cad yang dag la mthod pa'i nod bu'i rgyas pam zhing ba can gyi med pam kun nas log par byin kyis nub pa dang / seng gos rgyan dang / phred pa babs par 'byung zhing d+hA bas dang sbre tham
61b2(1): brgyan pa'i snying po tsam gyi snyim bcus nas kA kun nas yog pam byid du chub pa dang / seng go'i khrig thams cad kyi yal g.yas nor bu rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi srin bcas nam ka kun nas yog par byed kyis rnam pa dang / 
61b3(1): seng go'i khri spos dang / rin po che sna tshogs kun nas brgyad pa'i snyoms rnam yar snang bar byas pa'i snying po cam gyi ljin brgyas nas gakun nas 'ason par byin gyis rnaMs pa dang / dre dag la sogs la seng ge li i'i khrid 'din stod gyi
61b4(1): rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byind kyis rlab la byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gaben pa der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su btang te/ seng ge/ 
61b5(1): khri nor bu ri ni po che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sru sad nas dkyil ma dgrang bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang mdag chanas su ker dang / 
61b6(1): lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bye du r+ya'i 'od gzhen kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de// 'jig rten gyi/ rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dbas dri ma byed par snang
61b7(1): ba na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dgas ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor kyi dkyis 'khor rgya mtshos nas/ byang chub me tshams dpal ye shes kyi 'od gzer shes rab kun nas smon pa'i blo gros shes bya
61b8(1): ba / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nul shinang tu phra ba snyed dang ska gcig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de 'ang bar gyur te nos bu med bzhin gyi rgyam po thams cad kyi thu kyi phrin brgyas mapa
61b9(1): yon pa byi upa nga/ rid pa ma med dza pa 'i be na gyi mtshan # rgya kyitha 'i sa nam la pa gyi kyi nas / 'a na mtha tha ma
61b10(1): nam ka kun nas log par byed kyis rlab pa dang / rin po'i 'od tho ba sgron ma'i gzugs gi bla re'i sprin bcus ram ka kun ras yog par byin gyis rbab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdu 'phrul dang / 'od dang shA
62a1(1): ga dbyangs rab tu stor ba'i bla ro'i srin bcus nas ka kun nas yog par byinas kyis rnab pa dang / nor bu dang gos dang rgyan thams kyi gzugs rnya yang dag par ston pa'i tha ro'i in bzlas nas kA kun nas yon pa
62a2(1): byind kyis rlab pa deng ka me tog thas cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam kaH kun nas yog par byin kyis rlab pa dang / dril bu sna tshogs kun tu smras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam ka
62a3(1): kun nas sog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / sad pa'i dra ba mtha' yas pa A tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gyi bA re'i srin btsus/ nas ka kun nas yog par byind kyis rlab pa dang / gser gyi ze ba 'od phro zhing snang ba rgyal mchen
62a4(1): gyi bla re'i sprin bcus rab ka kum mas yog par byind kyis rab padrang / rgyan bsam gyis/ myi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis rgyad pa'i bla re'i srin bcus nam ka kun nas
62a5(1): mog par byind kyis rbab pa dang / de dag la gyogs pa zla re'i srin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdus shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mamaka kun las son pas byed kyis zab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'an
62a6(1): ded byed das cos ldan 'dams kya 'das te// gang dponas byags sa nubs te/ seng gisazhi ladus chogs me chos rab tu tsun pa'i snyi pa tham shA dpa kyis bkre
62a7(1): thA labod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od rabre tu 'bar bas kun tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'dzin
62a8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng ge ltar snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas du shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khon gyi dkyilha rgya mtsho nas// byang chub
62a9(1): sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od khro gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang ba der 'ong
62a10(1): bar gyurd te/ sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa'i rin po che'i thugs kyis spris bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byind kyis rlob cing // 'od zer snang ba'i rgyan kyis rgyand pa'i me tog kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcas nam mkhas
62b1(1): kun nas yog par byid kyis rngub pa dang / mu tig mang po kha dog mthal yas pa thams cad kyi srin bu nus nam mkha' kun nas yog pan byind kyis rlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dang
62b2(1): thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi srin bcus nam mkha' kun nas zla mog par byin gyis rlob pa dang / rin po che 'od bro ba sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcas nas 'ba' kun nas
62b3(1): yog par byind kyis nus pa dang / rta rin po che'i mchod rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis rab tu rgyan cing dris bu'i dra bas bres pa'i gdugs kyis 'phrin bcus nas ka kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa dang / rin po che gi
62b4(1): gi ya sa ga thams cad kyis rgyar pa'i gdugs kyi srin bcus nas ma khas kun nas log par byind kyis nub pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs kyi srin bcus dam mkha' kun dam yon par
62b5(1): kyi kyi / ga ya sbyi na ma yin rnams dam sa su nas sogs kyi kyis pa dang / shA rje po sa pa gas pa shAn kyin
62b6(1): ka kun nas log par byind kyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yulargya chen rnam par ste nad pas kun tu rgyan kyis khyab par byed pa'igadugs kyi hrIm gyis nas mkhas kun dus yog par byin gyis rnam
62b7(1): ngag de dag sa rdzogs pa gzugs kyi snying 'jig rten gyi khams zlumachis rdul gan tu zla ba snyed kyis ras gsung ram sog par byed kyis rnab par byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das dang da pa de byed te/ bcos ldan 'dasas byas
62b8(1): 'chal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs ma tshams su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri men dra ri ma yid du 'ong bar 'ad pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po cang dag mngos pan smras nas dkyil mo babyung bcas te garjod do// de dang 'ad nyid kyi
62b9(1): rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su rub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od gzer 'bar ba'i skar shed la nad kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rted gyi khams par sa'i rgyung de dag sas
62b10(1): 'jig rted gyi kham ma smos kyi rgyun yid du 'ong ba'i snying po me de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho 'chad byed pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'thor rgyal tsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzer dang / ga'i rje
63a1(1): ring po che thabs cad du sdang ba'i 'od kyi dkyis khor gyi spyir bcus nam ka kum na sa yog par byid kyis rlob cing / ring po che 'od zegro ba'i gzugs kyi dkyis 'khor gyi sprin bcus nas gakha' kun las sog par byi na kyis rdzas
63a2(1): dang / me tog gyi sprin rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi srin bcus nam mkha' k+Sha kun nas yog par byind kyis rlab pa dang / 'od gzer gi sgo nas sangs rgyas sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyis 'khor gyi spri bcas
63a3(1): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rab pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs rnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyila'akhor gyi sprin bcus nas ka kun nas sog par byed kyis rlab pa dang
63a4(1): ning po che'i ma la ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nas ka kun nas yog par byinakyis nub pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i le ru r+ya'i rigs kyi
63a5(1): 'od kyi dkyil khor gyi sprin bcus ras yangs kun nas yog par byed kyis rngub pa dang / sems skad cig cig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su gnang pa'i 'od kyi dkyis 'khor gyi snyid brgyas nab gsun nas na/ 
63a6(1): gyid kyisas pa dang / 'das rgyas thams cad kyi son lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyis mthar bya smi bcus nas gzung ras yin pa byed kyis rngas pa dang / 'thod kyi byis latshan bams cad du
63a7(1): sems can 'dul pa'i sgra sgrogs pa nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyis khor gyi khrim nus nas ka kun ras sog par byid kyi rlangs pa dang / de dag la rdzogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin 'jig nyid gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul gnad tu za ba snyen
63a8(1): kyis na ba ka kun nas yog yar byind kyis rlab pa byed cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phyag 'tshal nas nub dang byad kyi phyogs mtsham su rten te/ seng ge'i khri 'od gzer 'bar ba myi zad pa'i ga ni
63a9(1): rdzi kyi zhing po car mdzod par yul nas skyes mo blang bcas te 'dzad dang / de nas yang 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chams su zin ga phyog pa ma 'jig rten gyi lams rgya mtshos pang ma'i dro'om dpa' phyi zhing po
63b1(1): mtho lus sa byang chub sems dpa' rgyas kyi dbyings su'ang tho ba rnam par snang ba khyung da bu gros shes bya ba byung chub semapa dbya ga nyid gyi khams rgya mas zhin tu zla ba nyid dang ska ga rgya lasas dag / 
63b2(1): ma ca mi pa kyi rnams ldan pa thos pa kyi u m+b+ha
63b3(1): mnas byed kyis rnas pa dang / langs rgyas kyi'i mas na kyi rkyed dadas pa snang ra byas pa'i 'od de gi sa pa sa sun yo tam gyis kyis rnam pa dang / shA ke pa
63b4(1): song gzed sbyi brus rab kra sang das mos par byin kyis sasadang / sa rnams par gcin ras pa gcigs chud par sa sa ga te/ rgyas kya 'byu TI / sems par thos su spyi
63b5(1): bya ba rjod pa'i 'od gzer gyi smin bcus nam ka kun nas yog par byin kyis rngag pa dang / rin po che tshad myi shes pa thams cad dang bye tog thamasacad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin brgyas nam 'am kun nas yog par
63b6(1): byid kyis rbab pa dang / de dag la marnas pa 'od gzer gyi sI 'jig rten gyi thams rgya mtsho'i rdul gin du phral skyed kyis parnam ka kun ma man par byid kyis rnab pa dang / bcom ldang 'das la byag 'ayas te/ 'onas
63b7(1): phyogs su nyan nas seng ge'i khri ring po che'i sprod ma rab 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprus nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas sang 'jig rted kyi khams rgya mchog ni dang / snying po me tog kyi rgya
63b8(1): kyis rgyan pa 'di dpa 'dab chags su kra steng gi phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi sod rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de// 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi/ 
64a1(1): khams mtsha zhing nu 'ong ba nas la rnam zhes bya bad/ de gshegs pa man tan dang thugs pa mazhes pa skyed pa'i rnam pa 'a pa rab tu snang ba'i rgya po mas pa mthong ci sa
64a2(1): mamo ngas kyang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang / sor 'phrus chags pa byed pa'i blo gros zhes bya bag byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya 'tsho'i rdul shin tu phra brnyed dang / ldan cig tu 'phags nas gcos rje
64a3(1): sagapa pa des 'ong bar byas te/ mang na sa 'don mab la yas pa 'dabya ba'i sbyi brgyas ma sa sumangs log par byes kyis rjod cing shar bu ri pa mi kun pa 'od kyi pa 'di zla ba'i khye bzabaras lang
64a4(1): mgasar byed kyis zab pa dang /  rgya sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rgyan chen po ldan ba srung bar 'od 'gro ba'i sprin+da bcus rnam pa 'ang ka kun nas log par byin gyis rlab pa dang / spros pa mam pa kod bro la'i snying phras rapa las can
64a5(1): nas log par byin kyis rlab pa dang / rgyang thams cad 'o pA ba'i snyi/ brgyab nas ka kun nas yog par byed kyis rbab dang / sangs rgyas/ sethams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'ong bro bo'i snying brgyas rab sakun ra 'od
64a6(1): byin kyis drab pa dang / shing dang ze ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'od bro ba'i sprin bcus nam ka kun nas yog par byin gyis nub pa dang / rdo rje sna chog 'od gro ba'i sprin bcus nam pa' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab pa pa/ 
64a7(1): nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i 'apyod pa mtha' yas pa rjod cing 'od po'i sprin bcus/ nam ka kun nas yon par byin gyis rwas dang / mu tig gi sgron ma'i 'od phra'i srin bcus nam ka kun nas log par byin gyis rnab pa dang / 
64a8(1): de dag lasasags pa 'od bro ba'i sprid 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam ka kun nas yog par byind kyis rlab pa byed cing bcom ldan 'das gang na der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 
64a9(1): steng gi phyogs su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od gzen 'byung ba'i pad ma'i snying po can dag mngom par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
64a10(1): mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i tshul shin tu zla ba snyed nas kyang chung chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi ni bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu bri ba snyed byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' gajig na/ 
64b1(1): kyi khangs rgya mtshos chus shin tu za ba snyed kyis rna cing 'dun tu byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rgyus rnam pa sna tshogs kyi satshang pa'i snyi 'jig rten gyi khams kya tsho'i nus gang dran pa rnyed kyis rang ka kun nan
64b2(1): thog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur da te/ byind nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyud kyi snying po can dag mngon sprus cing skyis mo krung bcas te 'a'ong bar gyud to// rdo / 
64b3(1): ba rjes pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bsu'i khung bams cad de senas 'ong gzer gyi lding rin po mams pa ltar 'don pa tshogs pa 'ag nyer gyi khas rgya mtsho'i drus ginani du za ba rnyed rab tu 'byung bar gyu to// ri
64b4(1): tshe re'i donas kyang byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri ba la'i snying po gam la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi lams rgya cho bcu'i chub gi tu blas byed nab tu 'byung bar gyur to// byang chub sems das 'i sa kya cwo phyis
64b5(1): rgya rgya tsho khams kyi 'drul ginas/ tha' mab pad kyi thubs kyang bar byas nas dang tum pa de re sa zhing byam byas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing dus shi su tha ba shed rab tu bajug par bya / shing re res yang
64b6(1): byed sa yang 'dzin ro du smi pa sa nga yang na du
65a1(1): spags pa'i sgo gnas yang dag yar skul pa byed par gyu rad to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rtem gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phral snyed kyi 'gro ba thabs cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi sar
65a2(1): lag rnam par snyan cing rjod pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi srin thams cad kyi 'char 'ba' ba'i sgo dag nas
65a3(1): yang dag par skal pa byed par gyur pa to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nad tu phral snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham su chos kyi dbyings snang ngas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag
65a4(1): bar skul ba byed par 'gyur ro// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi nga khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi bskus chos kyi da dbyings gang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par tha dad pa dang 'od thams
65a5(1): zad kye sgo gnas yang dag par sprul 'byed par gyud to/ sems kyi / skad cig re me la 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtsho'i rdub gis sa ma / byed kyi 'jom kyi snre 'a'or rgya batshobapas cad da/ byang chub des
65a6(1): byed pa kyi rdzu 'gas 'dus te/ 'di ni gas sems kyi snang ci sa sems ca d+hi kyi su sa zla ba da kying nam kyi rgyud du sa pa'i sa ma par ni mas can chen
65a7(1): sems pam byin gyi thogs nges pa/ ri bar gyi rdul grin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dag ya nges pa'i phung po la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri bar gyi rdul king tu tha ba snyed ni dgel pa dang yid du 'ong ba mtho'i ris su skye ba la rab tu das/ 
65a8(1): semam par rings kyi rus shinas su zla ba snyed ni nyar pos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la rab tu 'dod do/  semams pan ri rab kyi rdul gidang tu zla ba snyed du dge ba'i gshes pa skye bur ra'i ma rabs kyo rtogs pa rab tu na kyu
65b1(1): yang dag par 'thob pa waM yang dag par sprus mo// zhing de dag me res yang sems can ri ras kyi rdul gi dang tu bra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams cad ku nas lA ma ning gzigs pa la yongs
65b2(1): srungs te rab tu dgod do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ni rab kyi tshul shinang tu phra ba snyed 'a bas brgya sa cas kyis rab tu gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs zad byi shes pa dang / sangs rgyad kyi ning mong su ngas
65b3(1): bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtshol la rab tu 'god ngo do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can rab rib kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang rgyud yang dag pas 'byung ba'i gnas brgya mtshonas
65b4(1): bdu 'amyong pa la rab tu 'dagod don byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od gzer gi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur to// / 'od zer thams cad ts+tsho nas sA 'byub ste
65b5(1): kun karas 'gro ba kun 'greb kyang na yid la skyo byed zhum bag gangayang myed/ 'di'i tshul la rgyal skas rab tu zhugs/ chos kyi/ sgon mas kum la rab byod cing/ chos 'dris rnas pa rgya mchas pa
65b6(1): par byed/ gam pa' dang dpung myed lhag ma gang yang byed// de dag chos nyid zhi ba rab tu sgrog/ dus gsuM rgyal ba'i smon lam ka de sod pa/ rgyal sras de dag 'gro la pham don tu de dag thams cad ma lus/ 
65b7(1): yongs su spyod/ de dag spyod pa'i rgyud ni 'di 'drag pargyal ba'i dun gyi 'thor cu/ phyogs nasas kun na gsus ca sras bcang cig rgyas pas se ge ma ma thos ba ga dmi tsho te/ 
65b8(1): gcan /  gzer no rnams re thapasamam pa'i//  zhing rnams de dag ba tu 'jug/ myod pas kyig kyi gram nas songs pa skye rgyal zlas de dang khyong sra yin no//  ze ba
65b9(1): ri na lagasas shing/ ga pas dbyings kur bu du bya skyong byas kyang/  sems can rnams la ga par gyi byang de/ sa Sh+T+rin sa dag tshub pa da / nas rnams thamal pa lam byi gyi rgya thas
66a1(1): dag d+hA sa sa gabang cig sa mtha' kyi sgrurgya skye /  yo
66a2(1): gis thams cad rab tu ston// sgyu ma lta bu lus myed dngos kyang myed// de 'dra'i chos nyid chags myed blos rtogs so// bzang po spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus// rgyal
66a3(1): de dag chos nyid 'di yin te/ 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang stsogs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dpung myed pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par
66a4(1): 'phrul pa thob par bya la'i phyir sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'odagazer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang bdaphyogs rnam par stond pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o// 'od
66a5(1): gzer rin po che thams cad kyi khwa dog sgron ma'i sprin du bdal la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'byam klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te
66a6(1): phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings rgya mtshol rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas/ sems cad rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu gnang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po che
66a7(1): cad rab tu spyod pa'i rgyan kyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod nas sangs rgyas kyi srin 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul shinang tu phra ba snyed rdul shin tu grwa/ thams cad dang mnyam pa dag rab tu smos nas/ 
66a8(1): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ci lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi chad dus gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa phabs te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
66a9(1): thams cad kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa rgya mtshol rab snyan nas sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu 'don par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba dang / 'thun pa'i sprin gyi chas rab tu / 
66a10(1): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smom lab ma sus pa'i sprin gyi cha rab tu 'bab pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams thabs pang du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'kho dag tu dga' bar phrang pa byas nas sakyi
66b1(1): ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su skor bu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar pad ma chen po chu ba rin po che thams cad las sprungs pa/ nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod pa sna tshogs las byas pa so ba rin po che
66b2(1): thams cad kyi rigs kyi chang 'bebs pa ze ba'i phreng ba'i rgyan thos rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i snying po 'dzam bu'i dra krung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag cing 'od gzes
66b3(1): kyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba sems kyi skad cig sas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthal yas pa ston pa'i sgra rab tu 'byung ba nor bu'i rgyal lo ma pa lams pa dang / 
66b4(1): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs rnyam gyi sprin gyis thams cad du ga bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa'i daspyod pa dang / smon lam thams cad rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byind par gyur te 'byung ngo // bad pa chen po de byung ba'i rjes
66b5(1): sa byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la lam pa myed pa'i dpyad med shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol/  rdul yin tu phra ba snyed dang snyan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod du
66b6(1): de nyid nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la/ lan du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'chas te/ pa sa rnon mo de'i snying zo sa 'drag na// byang chub sems dpa'i 'dzin
66b7(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang ze la'i phreng de dag la 'khod do//  de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa myed pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad myed pas rab tu dga'
66b8(1): 'i shug sa shin tu skyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho la bsam gyis kyi khyab pa sa rab tu zhugs pa'i mthus dang ldan pa zhing 'byas klas pa
66b9(1): thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyind pa ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad myi shes pas kun tu khebs par byed pa sems kyi skad cig thams cad la dmyigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings
66b10(1): kun tu sbyar pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad ya dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa 'phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'chang ba ting nge 'dzin thams cad la/ rab tu 'jog cing phyi ma
67a1(1): stodang / zhing nams de bre dag na ba bzhugs gang / zhing rnams 'gyur thas kun tu rgyas ma dad pasen phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams pa gan kyang byung po byang chus chung du 'ong/ gnyi sa/ 
67a2(1): kun gyi rdul bran mchog nyid kyin byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan brgya mtshor 'od// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor bu nye bar 'dod// chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas rtog tu rgyas par 'gengs/ zhing rnams thams cad gzugs rnyan rab tu
67a3(1): ston// chos dbyings rdul rnams e shes 'byor yul can/ kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi 'od tu yang dag byung ga/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mchog yul can / chos srin nyan cing ram
67a4(1): tu mkhas pa'i rnams/ sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun na gnas/ zhing rnams kun tu skal pa rgya mtshor spyod/ rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar spyodapade nas rgyas ba'i sa rnams rgya mtshor bzhugs pa sangs rgyas chog
67a5(1): rnams gzham dpa ga'ang 'byung ba ga de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag gis ga sa pa rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kud bkang zhing / de dag
67a6(1): rnam phral rgya chen kun la bzhugs/ zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mang po snyed/ lus kyi srin ni rtag par nub tu nyon / sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la n+tu/ bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi 'char yang 'pheg su/ 
67b1(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal ba da ma rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byi nad kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas mi
67b2(1): shes shin tu za ba / dus rnams kun tu de 'byung ste// chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na/ 'jig rten mgom zhes rab tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// 'dres pa myed cing gnas pa byed// sems can thams cad gi
67b3(1): bzhin du/ gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kun la rab tu bzhugs// thams cad mkhyend pa thams cad gzigs/ zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes kha dog
67b4(1): bsam gyis myi khyab par ga/ sems can thams cad yid bzhin du/ sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang // de bzhin sku'i sprin kyang mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag las/ myi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rnams
67b5(1): sa rgya 'ad par sgornams nas/ hUM dbyangs thab mo rtag tu lce sangs rgyas yod kas rgya mtsho ni / byang chub sems dpa'i grong sul lo// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor 'o dag ga'
67b6(1): dang dpung byed rab tu spor// ye shes zab mos shes bya ba// rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan / chos kyi dbyings rnams kun
67b7(1): bkang zhing ga yang dag sangs rgyas stond pa mdzad// sku rnams re re kun las kyang zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam khar// sangs rgyas sems cad 'byung zhing // rnam par 'phrul rab tu ston da/ de nas byang
67b8(1): chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtshor rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcud rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun lta bcwa
67b9(1): sa rtsa l+r-i margya che ga dang byung / thong nas tshogs sa s+ho// galagi da na sa/ 'ag da zhin ma mag kyi
68a1(1): dbyin kyi rlabs ni rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun la mngon/ sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin// thams cad gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi// rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad mthong
68a2(1): mtha' yas 'od mngal sangs rgyas smin// chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog/ ye ges rnams rgya'i tshul bzhin du// rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug/ 'jug pa rnams la 'byung ba byed/ de gyi maM sangs rgyas rab tu rjod/ 
68a3(1): ul na bzhugs myed rang bzhin byed/ de la 'byung ba myi mnga' ste// sku dang mtshar byang de bzhin myed ga/ rgyal ba gzugs rnyan 'dra ba'o// 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sbyin// bsam pa kun las rab tu 'byung // yang dag sangs rgyas rnam sung
68a4(1): ku sems can rgya mtsho 'dul pa mdzad// 'jig rten khams rnams pa badzad kyi/ snying po byang chub kun na snga pa/ 'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad ni bzhing rnams kun gyis rnam par 'dzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag
68a5(1): sos tan rgya mtsho zar gyi shes// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ de dag yon tan zad pa myed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thos 'od/ tho ga'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi byind kyi rnangs kyis/ phyonas babyung gas / 
68a6(1): de'i tshe tshigs bu bcad pa 'di dag gas so// byasam gyis myi khyasangs rgyas par/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhugs pa/ de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi// sangs rgyas rje phral thams cad bzod / 9/ #
68a7(1): gis lus kyis bzhugs pa rdzas/ zhi bkun rdul gyi sbubs su yang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo // gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi gyad sngar 'byung / 
68a8(1): kum tu byind kyis rlabs rnams dang / rnam 'ar 'phrul pa rab tu ston // kun kyang bzang po'i smon lam dang // spyod pa gang gis rnam spangs pa// rba/ de dag zhing rnams thams cad tsu// sangs rgyas kun gyi
68a9(1): pa rnam par grus 'gro 'i ka kun tu mnyam bzhis nyid gyur cing // kun tu lus kyis rang gnas te// ye shes kun kyi rjes song ma// sangs rgyas pyod yul zhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas ye ges zhugs pa'i rjem
68a10(1): chos kyi dbyings sa jas par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyis spu dag tu// rgya mtshol zhing la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas kun kyi zhing dag tu// byind kyis rlabs rnams rnam par bstan pas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi phus
68b1(1): rag dang / phyir gyis kun na rab tu gnas// byang chub snying por rnam 'phrul dang / byang chub mngon par mtshabargya zhing / chos kyi 'khom la skor ba dag/ skan cig sems kyi ston pa byed// zhing rnams 'byab zas thams cad
68b2(1): rang / bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams// skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams can na// byang chub sems dpa'i srul da pa rnams
68b3(1): sangs rgyab su sa rnams khyod kyang // mapa' ma rnyed par gyi rung ngo // de nas byang chub dpas seM na ma 'ong sazer snang gas gsur phyid pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byid kyis rlabs kyis thog brgya ba pa
68b4(1): lhas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par mdzad kyi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor// chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon tu yog/ 'jig
68b5(1): tes khams mas rgya tsho // phyogs pargya cad dgang 'ong sadarnam sa cing sum can 'a jam zhor// de'i nyon lam rnas / brjod rnams rgya sa/ gnan dang gas kyi kyang dganas/ shing nas#
68b6(1): gnas pa kun tu ya pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu khor// rnam/ par snang mdzad byind kyi rlabs/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun su yang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag/ brjod cing zhing rnams kun tu 'byung / 
68b7(1): zhing phu rdul pa sku'i rnams thams cad chos char rab tu 'ber se 'dres pa byed cing 'byung ba byed// 'jig rten dag mamam par marje zhes pa byed phrag grangs byed par// zhing kus rdub bran 'grus rab ca/ 
68b8(1): rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung // sngon duspyod pa rab tu sprog// zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi// 'od gzer dra ba phyogs bcu na/ sangs rgyas 'od gzer kun sgo nas// byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul// 
68b9(1): kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis// chos dbyings yongs su rab gsas te// 'gro mams 'dul pa ji bzhin tu// gzugs kyi zhum sa pa rab tu mthong // nus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi// mgod pa ji snyed bzhugs pa/ 
68b10(1): rnams/ de dag kun gyi mtshan kyang sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// da ltar 'byung dang / 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa// chos 'khor lo rab tu grag/ de nas
69a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod myi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid par mes/ sangs rgyas kyi byind kyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcu rnam sa te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dan spes so// 
69a2(1): gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i// ye shes tshogs 'di sun rngon cing // ye shes rtogs rnyed pa'i rnams// dag 'di'i tshul la zhugs// chob kyi dbyings dang mnyab pa'i dbyas/ shi rasas kun tu rab tu 'byung // 
69a3(1): rgyas kud kyi khyod yul te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod// skad cig re re'i sems kun la// chos kyi dbyings su rnam pas rgyu// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing rnyed// chos rnams rgya mtsho kun la bzhugs/ rgya gyi/ 
69a4(1): pha rol byind pa rnams// bskald pa bye ba bsam yas su// sangs nga rgyas thams cad sku dag tu// zhing rnams kun na gnas shing skyod / rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang / chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung // 
69a5(1): zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed// ye shes chags myed pyod yu'o// / sangs rgyas thams cad 'apyod yul du// lus pa myed parakun bkang zhing // rnam par bral rnam 'apyod pas/ sangs rgyas bco
69a6(1): yul rnams la bzhugs/ sangs rgyas kum rjes snyegs dbyangs te/ chos kyi dbyings mi rab smog pa na/ chos dbyings rjes su shes pa rnams dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la 'byod// bska'adas rgya mchod pa
69a7(1): 'dres par// sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu spogs// dus rnams thams cad shes pas gsal// dbyangs kyis de dag sa la bzhugs/ sgra'i shes la rmongs pa myed// sems can smra la spyod yul te// thams cad
69a8(1): bye dang pa kun kyi yang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyangs zhes so// sa nas sar yang phyir gyur cing // stobs kyis sa rab gnas te// bskal la bye bar spyar pas na/ chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug/ de nas byang chub
69a9(1): sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od gzer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi khyin kyi rlangs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam lhas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang pa sangs rgyas
69a10(1): bzhugs pa'i/ chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid byed// ye shes sa ni thob pa'i rnams//  'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong / shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams/ sapas
69b1(1): rgyas byapas ga su kyi yang / tsu nam 'o sagyur ba 'a zab kyi sris sa nam thang cang //  byar gyis sag // nams spyo nas/ spyod par smra/ gyu
69b2(1): bsod nams rgya mtshos khya myurang cing / ye shes sa sa rab tu gnas/ chos la rnam khong du chud/ spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag rtsa/ chos kyi dbyis la
69b3(1): pyod pas na/ rang bzhin lus ni rab tu mthong // zhi rnams 'byam klas thams cad du// bskasad pa bye ba bsam mas s+ho// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams// rgya mtsho kun la rab tu pyod// bdag 'thong bas
69b4(1): ni lus dang rdul// gcig tu 'dres par mngon par byas// ma skyes mtshan nyid myed pa ste// zhing rnams kun tu yang rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam 'thun par/ sems can kun la mngon gsum du// lus
69b5(1): kyi srin ni stan byas shing / byang chub don tu sems can 'dul// sangs rgyas thu'i yis na// byang chub sems dpar brjod pa ste/ gang gis mgon po mthong ba'i// rgyas pa'i byin rlab gi rab tu zab/ mgod po ji snyed gang / 63
69b6(1): bzhugs pa'i/ bying chub mtha' dang dpung myed de// chos dbyings rab tu gang byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'tshang rgya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od po// gtsug phung rab
69b7(1): rtsa 'byung bas// sangs rgyas kyi byid kyi rlangs kyis byos bcur rmad ltas te// de tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras s+ho// zhi ma kun tu sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gyi dkyis 'khor smra byin te// chos
69b8(1): kyi dbyings rnams gang byas dus/ yon tam sim na rab tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra la ste/ gzugs kyi sgra yang rab stan bcing / chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug
69b9(1): draga' dang mos pa'i shugs rnams dang // sangs rgyas bstobs rnams thams cad sa// rngarab tu gnas shing de dag ni/ de bzhi ma gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug// shes rab chu dus chos 'di dag/ kun nas shes par gyi
69b10(1): nus te// ye shes byig ni rnam sbyangs shing // 'di'i tshul ya 'jug par 'gyur/ rab tu gnas dang byinang rlabs dang / chos kun rnam par 'apyad pa dang // rab tu 'jug dang lda ba yi// mnyam pa nyid la rab tu zhugs/ 
70a1(1): chos rnams mtha' mam grong gi rnams// chos kun yam ma rnams pa ste// kun mkhyed nyid la rab zhugs shing / chos kyi rgyamamo kun la gyod/ sangs rgyas zhing makun 'khod cing / thams cad kun na rnam par
70a2(1): mdzes// 'ongs pa myed cing 'phos pa byed// sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o// gzugs rnyan 'dra ba'i sku rnams ni// sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang / mos pa ci 'dra yod pa'i rnams/ de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong // 
70a3(1): kun tu bzang po'i smon las dang // spyod pa yang po lus sbyongs pa// de dag thams cad pa yul 'angs// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong // lus kyi rnams kyi re res kyang // chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab
70a4(1): 'khor los kun nas 'khor 'i bre/ chos kyi 'khor lo bsam gyi khyab/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'od gathong dang gzhi rjid kyi zad pa'i rgyal zo mtho gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byed kyis rlathas kyis
70a5(1): phyogs brtsam nas pa yar te/ de'i tshims sa 'azhi da // sangs rgyas thunisas bdam/ 'od gshe nyin byonas rnams thung mdog ya ba 'a pa'i yod/ masas
70a6(1): grangs pas ma 'jo/ sangs rgyas shing rnams 'ams cad kyi byang chu stong po sus na bzhugs// bdud rnams sems par ra btus she bar kyi nang nanas par 'dzes/ khams pa rtsul na 'angs 'dres par
70a7(1): 'dzag ma pa kyis tsha rgyam lam ga thog pa ra rgyas gzhang dang gnams 'ad+ha/ 'i bya rnams rab tu thong/ zhing sbyinapa pa mi margya ma mthong / byags kyinams kyang kunas ma // mi rams yang chen nyam 'angs
70b1(1): 'khor ni// tshul rnams thams cad rab tu brjod// dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis// myi zang chus rnams rab tu bstan // sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun ma yang // rgyal ba rnams ni dbyig gsor 'dra// snying po byang chub
70b2(1): rnams na snang / 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa yin/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'grol rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas byind kyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcu rnam par brnyan te/ 
70b3(1): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// lta zhing blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams// sku gzugs bsam gyis myi khyal ste/ dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'dres// mtshan mar kun nas sangs
70b4(1): rgyas rnams// phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'byung // rdul rnams kun tu 'jug pa'i sa// sangs rgyas srin kyang de bzhin stan/ skad cig skad cig sems kun la// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar// rnam 'phrul
70b5(1): gdan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che/ brgya 'tsho'i chos rnams 'byung ba mnyas ra/ sangs rgyas kun kyis byinang rlangs pa// 'di'i lus rnam par spyod// 
70b6(1): kun d+ha bzang zo smon lam la// gang rnams shin nga tu gnas 'gyur ba/ nyede dang de nag shing dag tu/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun sa wA ye shes pab rnas gnod cing / chos kyi dbyings la shos par ni
70b7(1): thom pa rgya mtshogs pa ste// / smon las kun gyis 'byung ba'o//  sangs rgyas kun kyi sku dang gsung // chags pa myed la rab tu thugs pyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// spyod yul kun kyi sku gnas
70b8(1): shing / e shes stong sul gyu pa'i rnams// chos kyi dbyis la rab sod pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis gnon to// skad cig sems kyi zhi rnams sangs rgyas shing gi rdum mnyam pa// de dag chem nyid
70b9(1): bzhing du/ du cog byed du rnam pa myong/ di du na pa'i sted pams byed du/ 'di kyi ma 'phrul pas yongasanyi 'di la gas /  na tsa ni nyud par byed// de sa
70b10(1): se mangs thogs thong brgya chags pa byed pa'i na gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bar nam par 'gas te/ 'i mitshigs bu rkan pa 'di gasna to// 'di rnam pa rgya chobs ya bad du/ 
71a1(1): @gsung ni bab mo byung // dbyangs kyi yabral ga kun rgyas pa// chos kyi smin gyi char 'bra saso// brjod pa rgya mtshothams cad kyis// sems kyi na dus tu// sa
71a2(1): zhing rnams kun tu yang // chos rnams bstan pa rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrus mthong zhing // sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang // byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug/ rdul rnams
71a3(1): re re'i steng nas kyang // chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed// chos kyi sku ni tha dad mon// nam mkha' bzhin te chags pa med// gzugs kyi skur ni rnam dmigs sa/ 
71a4(1): mig yor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do// mig yor yul la mi gnas te// na mkha' bzhin du dngos po med// mnyam pa nyid rtogs gyur nas// ye shes rgya mchi mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te// gzung ba med cing byung ba med// 
71a5(1): nam kha'i mnyam pa nyid dang mtshung ba// gzung du med sla 'di na stan to// zhing rnam kun gyi sangs rgyas rnam// de dag spu gcig rtse yi tshogs// ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis// spu rnamra kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong // rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste// chos
71a6(1): kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // bla med chos kyi 'khor mo dag/ zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor// ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par// spu rtse gcig tu rnam sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang // de'i mtha' ni rnyed
71a7(1): bar bka'// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa// de bzhin du 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho
71a8(1): bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re re re yang // de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun
71a9(1): nas 'dus par gyur to// 'di na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu/ kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos
71a10(1): nyid 'di khon rab tu ston to// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / bam po bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
71b1(1): kyi spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rna
71b2(1): bar snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par btags pa'i tshogs namakha'i dbyings chags pa med cing / rgyal ma
71b3(1): bye ba par byed pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i glong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing / shin tu 'dal ba'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi sgo'i dbyings ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas par
71b4(1): 'gengs pa/ phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nas yogs par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i klong / phyogs
71b5(1): thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon du yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snying po can/ zhing 'byam
71b6(1): klas pa thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyingasu 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su grub par byed pa bskal pa thams cad du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i
71b7(1): 'od can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing rjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'dra kyi zhab kyi drung du byang chub sem pa'i ting nge 'dzin
71b8(1): sang+yas thams cad de bzhin gshen pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po khri bya ba 'di la mnye bar bzhag pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khabru 'byam gus pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ namakha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho tham cad
71b9(1): kyi khams su gtogs pa/ dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i rig su gtog pa/ shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa dang / phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams
71b10(1): cad snang ba 'jig rten gyi kham rgya mtsho'i ris su gtog pas rnaM par non pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pas byas kyi stob thog pa med phra chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings byas kyi sku zad kyi gzug brnyan rab tu
72a1(1): snang ba chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul gnad tu phra ba dang / mnyam pa dag tu rdum phra ze rim
72a2(1): ya 'ang zhi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed la rab tu bzhugs pa gzhing re re zhing de bzhin / gshegs pa 'jig rten gi khams kyi rdul shi nang tu bA ga snyed la rab tu 'jug ste// de bzhin gshegs
72a3(1): ba re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi na tu phra ba snyed kyis ting nge 'dzin thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par gzhag no// 
72a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzi nang / sangs rgyas thams cad de gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de ye mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la/ de'i tshe phyogs
72a5(1): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam 'gras pa thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal ya stanang to// yang dag pare/ rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces
72a6(1): klung bka la 'a to/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar byang chub sems rab dris ting nge 'dzidang sangs rgyas bams cad de bzhin gshegs pa na par snang mdzad kyi spyi'i snying po 'di sa mnyam par 'azhag pa legs
72a7(1): so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhim gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di yi sngon gi smon lam kyi byin kyi rlabs dang / khyod kyis
72a8(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon las dang // spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i yang mthus 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lokho rab tu rab tu bstod pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye ges rgyam po thams cad rnam par gyi
72a9(1): sa dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtshom gus pa snang bar bya ba dang // sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byung ba rnam par dag por bya ba dang / chags pa byed lam 'jig rten
72a10(1): rgyam gras pa thams cadang yongs su gnang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi lus bam sa cad la chags pa byed par 'jug par bya ba dang /  sangs rgyas kyi 'thos thams cad blo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang / chos kyi chu kyi
72b1(1): byab dang de ba'i gshegs pa pa'ab cad kyi gas sa da lag tu ma kyi byas chos su gzung ba'i phyi byed kyis so mdzad dag des langs rgyas pam da 'a
72b2(1): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar sgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings ya dang dpung myed pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar sgrubs so// dus gsuM
72b3(1): gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar sbubs so// 'byes klas pa mtha' dang dpung byed pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar sgrubs so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par tha rang pa
72b4(1): khab yo ba kyi dad pa dang nab ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rngas par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbam tho rgya mchos la rab tu 'dug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar sbubs so/  sems
72b5(1): can thams cad kyi skang rgya mtsho dang chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi/ ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams mang po/ thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus ma
72b6(1): dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsdus so// sangs rgyas kyi gsumagi yan lag dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar smrab so// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la
72b7(1): nye bar sgrubs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang / rdul shind tu pra ba'i khongs na lus 'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar sgrubs so// de ci'i phyir sem/ 
72b8(1): de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas bco ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang pos rnam par
72b9(1): rgyan pa /  'od gzer gi dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shi nang tu rgyas pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khom rnam par drag pa'i sprin 'byed pa// rin po che 'od khro ba thams cad kyi sprin gis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa / phyogs thams cad
73a1(1): du spos 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gyi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sna byin pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu'abyung/ 
73a2(1): yang dag par stond pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang ltar byang ba rnams kyi kum tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mchod
73a3(1): lo'i snang ba yang dag par ston da la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi gzugs rten 'byung ba rnams rkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go// 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khaT
73a4(1): brgya mtsho thams cad rang shin tu la'i khongs ma song pa thams cad tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs kyi drung dag tu byang chub sems dpas rang thum su ba'ang thos spyi 'o sa phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin nas rab tu bam tho/ 
73a5(1): byang chub sems dab kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas bcom ldanan ngas de dag gis reg ma pag tu de ras de'i mong gting nge 'dzid de/ las A 'a'i ni rgyam tsho 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgya lazhis
73a6(1): rtsa phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad du sems kyi smang gcig re re la ting ro 'dzin las sdang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / pa tid nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i byin kyi rabs kyi rna chos kyi dbyings dang / 
73a7(1): bcus gsum mnyam pa'i dus thams cad kyi rgod du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da wAr byung ba'i thams cad kyi sgo dang / ses thams lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang / mnyam zhing sems can thams kyad
73a8(1): gyi sems pa rgya mtshos 'dug pa'i rdo dang / sems can thams cad kyi sus dang mying gi 'khor lo las sdung ba'i sgo dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du tshas kyi dbyings nam par 'byed pa'i sgo dang / rgyal gis byam pa sa
73a9(1): pas rgyab kyi chu'i sbyid mangs dang bung byed pam byam sas pa 'i da do chos kyi rgyas rgya mtshos 'ams cad ras tu 'gran pa stong garas la sa par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpas kun tu 'a'ang ma mi ting 'dzin
73a10(1): de bas yangs pa lag tu / de'i tshe byang chub sems dada' de dag tu ba san le re zhing nying nge 'dzinang rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul ginang tu bra la snyed la rab sa sugs par gyur to// gzungs rgya mtsho sprin 'dzin
73b1(1): rten gyi khams rgya rgya tshu la shin can pa byed pa yang ras kya zhugs pa rgya /  kyi sa rgya sbyin 'a te kyi lA sa sgyu rgyas kyi dang sa ba snyed pa yang ra cwa zhus / 
73b2(1): kyi dbyings kyi phyogs su rnam par snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba'i yon tan gyi snying po can rgya mtsho'i sIn 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par
73b3(1): gyur da to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad
73b4(1): kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la 'ir gzhan rang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul kin tu pA ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur pa to// byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan
73b5(1): kyi gnas 'pho ga dang 'byung ba dang / byang chub tu rnam par 'chang rgya ba dang / mya ngam mas 'das pa stan pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul gi nang tu nA ya snyed la yang rab tu/ 
73b6(1): zhugs par gyu rang to/ 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi nga/ rgya mtsho thams gad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'akhor rgya mtsho rnams dang / rdus shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi khongs
73b7(1): na yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems dpal rgya mtsho rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur de te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthul dang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzind gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu
73b8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs tsam du g.yos te/ rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sna yang shi nang tu grag par gyurapa te/ 
73b9(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khob kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad tu yang nor bu rgyam po chen po bcu'i sprin gyi chang mdzod par zab par byar / brgyag pa sem 'di sa bu nor bu'i rgyas po mams dang ldam
73b10(1): ga'i gser dpal kyi rgyas mtsham gyi dpal gyi ljin gyi chang mngon par bab zo/ 'di lta ste nom bu'i rgyal po thod kyis rnam ye gas pa khyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon yang bar zo/ 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyas da/ 
74a1(1): phyogs bcung rje po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grems la'i sprin gyi char mngon lam pan so// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyas po byang chub sems rapami gzugs tang ring po che'i snying zas srid kyi
74a2(1): 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po sasas rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo/ rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par zab lo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing snying po bya/ 
74a3(1): chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngong bar babazo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpal
74a4(1): thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor dang rab tu grags par byed pa'i sprin+da gyi chur zab zo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgya za nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzis kyi sprin gyi char bab bo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid
74a5(1): 'ong bas phyogs thabs cad du khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi chang yang / mngon par ba' ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprim gyi char bcu'o// 'di dag mngos pa khang par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa
74a6(1): cad kyi ba su na ma cang dang / 'a ga' ga sgo mams sa sa sna cig su larang pa 'di dag 'byung bas gyur to// zhibarnams sa ca sa kram tu bab pode pang ma
74a7(1): longs rab tu 'jug pa sa 'og/ su tu rnam 'brub rnas pa 'di 'dran pa 'ang ba byed pa shing nge 'dzis sras la 'dug pa mama' dang / dpung byed do// sras rnams pa sa pa ras kyang kun sa mang pa de/ sgrub pa ras tu bya sa
74a8(1): chos dbyangs rtag par 'ge na ting nga 'dzin kun gyi chul dang phying dang nam 'phrul ba/ mas cad sub dbyangs kyis chags pa byed par rgya me sgrogs// ting nge 'dzin bams cad gnan dang gnad kyi rnam bas
74a9(1): kyi che bzhi gshegs pathams cad rnams kyi rlung ba/ cu/ tshub kun gyi phyid yul yangs bgang byas te// zhing mas ku tunam ngo kyis pa mang ba mang/ zhing kur rgya kun gyigs rnang ji
74a10(1): de sbyar zhing kun gi tu phra ba'i rdub bran sa/ ting mi 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus son// rnam par snang mdzad smon las dbyings pa rab tu grags/ kun tu bzang po'i yus ni ram mkha'i macad nyidang
74b1(1): mas cang rings kyi gnas/ de banin nyid lags// sras kyi sprin me khrob kun dpa mnyas pas sun ba rgya zhing // sems pan can la mas la pe bzhin na de da stod// m+b+ha chub nu na
74b2(1): gang yod la gang mtha' dang dpung khyed kun la rab tu zhugs pa nams/ kun tu bzang po yi smon lam gnas pa dag la stan/ rnam pa 'bral ba 'di 'dra das la tshad kyang byed/ 'khor rnams rgya mdzo rjem za' mtha'
74b3(1): dpung myed pa ka sa tshad myed thams cad lus kyi nang kyi kun chung cing dbyangs la zhing mang 'dra bar rnam 'chang brgya bston// shi ba rnams thams cad 'byas klas pa na rnam gnas shing // nas par 'phrul pa dam pa ston par rab
74b4(1): tra snang / phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod// kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes pa stobs la zhugs// ti nge'i'adzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab
74b5(1): tu mAnan ka/  chos rnams 'byam klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs/  rang gi byang chub 'apyod pa sngan chad pyad pa ston// de ltar zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'bral pa/ phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang
74b6(1): rje rab tsa da / ti 'dzin rnams la 'jug pa rab tu gan pa'iphyir ga rgyal pa'i 'od gzer smin lam yod tad legs pa 'byung/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yod ma thams cad la bangs
74b7(1): rgyas kyi mthus thal mo spyar teg byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ye lha'ing dbyangs kyi ra ro gcig tu de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste/ blo lam
74b8(1): kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu 'byung // de bzhin nyid mnyam nam mkha'i snying po ste/ chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la bzhugs myed kyang // kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na
74b9(1): snang / phyogs bcu kun tu yon tam grags pa khyab// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mngal// rgyal ba thams cad spu thob phyir 'apyod pa// phyogs bcu'i yon kas rgya mtsho yod pa'i rnams// rdul sbubs kun tu de dag chung byas
74b10(1): gling zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes/ zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs d+had na/ rgyas sras dang ting nge 'dzinang dang 'gyod pa dang / chos rnams kun la 'apyod cing gnas pa'i rnams// rdul dang mnyam pa'i spel ba/ 
75a1(1): byed pa sodang / gang gi ngo tsam pa 'a bla chog / sa ngangasas yang ni bab pa kyang ya ga de cos kyi dkyis mas sa byas sa ma gyi con cadang / ba'opa
75a2(1): sabyab bar 'gyurang pa dang / zhams bcamams kya par 'byung bar 'gyur ba smra/ mas thamams kyang ci gar lung 'gyung dadu/ sems par rgya mdzad rtswa thung babyu ba/ sems rnams pa rta gas na
75a3(1): zhing ston// 'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang // kun tu zathang po khyod la mdoran gsum gnas// sangs rgyas kun kyis gnas par gyur da pa'i/ chos kyi 'char mo de ring khyod kyis skong/ gshis tu
75a4(1): rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas po che zhes bya ba sas kun tu bam/ po'i snying nge 'dzind dang rnam par 'phrus pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes/ bya ba ste// le'u gsum pa'o// // de ras byang chub sems dpas
75a5(1): sum tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rted kyi las thams byas la rnam las smras/ sems can gyi khams rgya mchos marnam par smras chos kyi dbyings rgya mtshos rnas par gas gathoms na
75a6(1): can khams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas/ sems can thams cad kyi gsam sa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par lus gcus rgya batsho ba rnam par sgrub/ 
75a7(1): sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho sa rnam par ltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho sa rnam par ltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor yod
75a8(1): ba thams cad la smras so// kye rgyag pa'i sras dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dra shing 'jig le yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sangs
75a9(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las byung ba/ rgya mtsho mkhyen da pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i
75b1(1): dang phur byed par 'azlam pa lags ni rnams gyis kyi bya 'o// sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems pas mas cad kyilas bcu conas lda dan pa'i mi shes ni bas pa kyis kyi bya'o//  rgya
75b2(1): ldan 'das rnams kyi smra nga dad pa dang dab po rgya mchos 'jug pa la legs ni bangs kyis kyi khya 'o// yangs rgyas bcas ldan 'das nasas ti zugs kyi gang gi sa las 'du ba nyid dus pa
75b3(1): 'i shes ni 'ams kyis kyi khyam pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bas cad kyi rnas par grus rgya mtshos ga pa ldan pa'i yishesa'i sa bya / 
75b4(1): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu stan pa yongs su dag ya nI bA sramra gyis kyi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa mamagrod pa rab tu snyan pa rgya mtsho mi bsam gyis kyi khyal ro// sangs rgyas
75b5(1): bcom ldan 'das nas kyi sangs rgyas kyi skur du sa dang pa yongs su dag da ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas/ kyi yon tan rgya mtsho ma pa' dang dbung byed pas rnam pa rna
75b6(1): bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po yongs su dag pa'i ni bsam gyis myi khya // sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' mas pa ni
75b7(1): bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od gzer rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs kyi srin rab tu 'byed pa mdzad pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
75b8(1): dpal rin po che'i 'od 'phro rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho la rab tu grub pa ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sangs rgyas
75b9(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos 'phrul rnam gsum yongs su stan pas sems cad rgya mtsho yongs su dan smin par mdzad pa dang / gdul ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
76a1(1): 'dus pa rgya mtsho thams cad la son pa don yod pa mi bsam gyis phyi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa rab tu bzhugs pa ni bsas kyis kyi khya po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
76a2(1): 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byi nad kyi rlabs kyi mthu ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skye
76a3(1): sangs rgyas ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstobs la thub pa myed pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi myi snyengs pa la
76a4(1): zi lad kyis byi non pazhi bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pa 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la tha myi dza dad par spyod pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
76a5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyi myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po'i ye shes rnam pas dag pa ni bsas kyis kyi byang // 
76a6(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'phrogs ba ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyimathul dang de bzhim gshegs pa'i byind kyi rlabs kyis byin tu drangs
76a7(1): bas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khams rgya mchod thams
76a8(1): cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam pamargyadad pa dang / skal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa gtung rjes su zab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin
76a9(1): dkyis 'thor rab tu rjod pa dang / them pa ca thams cad kyi rang pa rgyamatsho ba dang ba ri lta pa bzhin turab tu mun pa dang / sems cad thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtshos sangs rgyas kyichos kyi chus kun tu snang ba sa da
76a10(1): bar skyed pa dang / sems cad thams cad kyi bsas pargya mtha'i sgrib pa'i mi khams cad rnam pas gzhom pa dang / sems can bams cad kyi sems dang pyod pa rgya mchos la 'byung ba'i lam nas par rung ba dang / byang chum
76b1(1): sems dpas rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon las rgya mtsho sa rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par san par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams babang thos pa khyod kyi'i 'or rgyalatsho rnam pa
76b2(1): de bas kyis shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang
76b3(1): snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtshol la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi myig dus gsum gi rjes su song ba yongs su spyang pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kun nas
76b4(1): snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya tsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po byang chub thams cad tu sangs rgyas
76b5(1): kyi sus thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal spang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyangs rgya chen po dang / thams cad mkhyed pa nyid yang drags pa'i yug po rgyamatsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir de'i ma tshigs
76b6(1): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zhag// sa pa la dpung byed des mi zhing rnams khyab// sems cadabasam la spyod pas ji bzhin snang / rnam par snang mdzad chos
76b7(1): kyi 'khor lo'i/ bsam la gyis kyi khyab rgya mtsho 'i zhing yod pa/ skam rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas// sems can rgya mtshoyongs su sbyin bya'i phyir// sems can nang na rgyal ba rnam par
76b8(1): rmes na thams cad na rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsas kyi khyag// mas rgyas sus sa 'dug pa shin tu bas// srid pa'i gnas pan dad pa chung ba'is sangs rgyas bya ma chub shes par gyi tshus so// gzhas
76b9(1): gang rnapas gi nang tu sems btan zhis dge' ba'i gshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kun kyis byind kyis rlabs pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu 'dug/ gang rnams sems dag nam/ 
76b10(1): byed du byed cing ga rta snying rnam bams can khrong nas byabs dgas dang / dad pa 'i shing nabs zer de dag ni/ 'di dag zas gi ba dgas pa zab par 'gyur// kun su bamang pa'i smon las rag dang chos dbying/ 
77a1(1): nas mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la// gnas gis spyod par rab tu smras pyod pa/ de dag rgyub ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so// gang gis rgyal pa'i nas 'grus 'di mthabasas// byang chub sems
77a2(1): shA/ ga gi lus kyis shes pa kyi sa mam pas sa hrI shi zhug pa da nga gyur spya
77a3(1): kun tu chos kyi 'khom mo rab 'khor po ga rnam par 'asla mdzad su mthul yin no// bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang // rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs zhing rnams ca// de dag su rtse shu rgya
77a4(1): lam gyis ga rgyal ba'i khyod yul shi nang tu bgad par byab kun tu bza dra ba'i smon lam 'apyod pa rnams// / mthal dang dpung snyed mngon par sgrub pa dang // kun tu rtsig gi lus dang lus ldan pa de na man
77a5(1): po'i spyod yul 'di nyan non kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di/ ngag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol shin tu stanang pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma khyod pa dang
77a6(1): byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so ga gsung po gsung bar 'gyur na/ rgya brgya gang zhe na sade ga sa 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su byed mni tshogs pa rkyen gidas tu sar pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rte/ 
77a7(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin tu gnang pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyings dang / rnam pa shin tu bstand pa dang / 'di ltan 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu snand pa dang / 'di lta rtse
77a8(1): 'jig rten gyil bab rgya mtsho'i rgya shi dang ma nyan pa dang / 'di ga ste 'jig rten gyi lams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i chub shin tu san pa dang ni 'di sa skye 'jig nan gyi khams rgya 'thor ga tu 'angs rgyas 'byung bge sa
77a9(1): pa rang ga 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi kha pas rgya 'tsho skal pa'i byind kyi rlabs shin tu sa nang pa dang / 'di lta ste smras pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shi nang tu snya nang pa dang / 'di sa skye 'jig nyid kyi khams rgya mtshol bgyid/ 
77a10(1): ginas na stanang bzhi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu snyand pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu dra ba snyed sangs rgya
77b1(1): nan ma phyin pa dang // snru las kyi sam pa /  sna sa
77b2(1): rgya mtsho chu 'gin tum pa snyed zag bcus 'byung ngo // bru dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brgya gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyid kyi rnabs dang chom nyid rab tu thon pa dang / sems can rnams kyilas kyi tshogs
77b3(1): chub sems dpa' thams cad / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang / sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang / bsod rnams kyi ma ba bskal pa 'thun pa chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
77b4(1): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par sgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par sgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par dag pa dang / 
77b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rgyu mthun pas mngon lam 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul dag khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang na/ 
77b6(1): rnams kyi smon lam gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o// kye rgyal ba'i srasadag de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la dmyigs pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa rgya rkyen la dbyigs pa 'jig kyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdus gi rang tu bral snyed
77b7(1): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung ngo // 'byung ngo // 'byung ba 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya cho 'byung ba shin tu snyand pa 'di nyid gsal bar rjod pa'i phyir sangs
77b8(1): rgyas kyi byind kyi rlabs kyis de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// / sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bas mngayas pas// byinang rlabs nas 'bral de dag 'di lta bu// 'ang rnams rgya mtshol sta dang la mthag dpung byed// rnam par snga/ 
77b9(1): mdzad chos kyis yongs su spangs// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi bsam kha bzhin/ smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam sbyangs shing / sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas// phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams
77b10(1): cad 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi rnam 'phrul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sgrubs cing / nam mkha'i dbyings la 'byam klas zhing 'byung ngo // spyod brgya
78a1(1): mtsho mtha' dang dpung phyed rnams pyod cing tshad myed pade gshegs yul la 'jugapa phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun sbyor zhing / bskal pa mtha' yas zhing rnams re rer 'apyod/ sems can bsam dbyings
78a2(1): bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i/ las kyi zhing rnams rgya mtshothams cad 'byung // nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs pams// mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// 'di rnam sa rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams/ 
78a3(1): rten nub bzung shA tshogs dri byed pa// dang la rgya mtshornam par shes bu'i phyis// rgyab sras rnam sa ni phyogs brgya zhing rnams sbyob// chos dbyings chus kyi 'ongs su rgyal blas rnams / gsun tu 'bang ba'i khyad pa yod pa dga'
78a4(1): rdul kyi khongs su mthan sas zhing zlom te/ rnam dag mkha' bzhin mthal dpya dbung yad byed gnam mkha'i dbyings 'dri'i rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/ snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhangs drung na// pad ma'i stan 'khod kha dog ang la yas cas/ 
78a5(1): de dag shing bar sa lus kyi nang ma 'thong / gang cig sems kyi dus 'asug 'byung ba'i ga zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug la kun kyang ston da/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus gsum zhing snya pa rnam par snang badzad rtsa/ 
78a6(1): 'i nas da pa rnam pazhing tu baspyad pa'i 'jig rten gyi las rnam ma ma da yang 'ag rted kyi 'das rgyamatsho du mi tu zar rnyed de/ 'di ba ba da kyilabs rgyam tshos bani dran bam pa gyi byab mothos pa// 
78a7(1): tu gnas thog 'jig rteran gyi khangs rgya mtsho sa sa ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshol la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od gzer gyi rgya mtsho sa rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
78a8(1): rgyar chos sa mi sangs rgyas thabs cad kyi 'od kyi dkyis 'khor rgya mtsho sa rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten kyi 'ams rgya mtshol la ni rin po chems cad kyi 'ang gzer gyi rgyu mtsho la rab tu gas 'jig rter gyi 'ams rgya mchos 'ani/ sangs rgyas lams
78a9(1): kyi sa bang cug ma bo 'din rgan gyi mas rgya mtshol sa mi smram ga su'i byas kyis zu nga ltag 'di nga chu bo che ga 'i la dang de'i bya cho sem mas kyi/ 'jig byed kyi 'das rgyamatshol 'ami yi
78b1(1): se gyi dbang po mas par gyisas kyi gzugs kyang rgya mchos rab tu gan mas 'jis rted gyi sa rgya dus ni kyang chub skye pa dag la la ya kyi smras rgya ma mas tudam so// ga kur gyi chen
78b2(1): byang chub sems rapal kun tu bzang po yi smod lam gyis 'byung ba'i rgyud rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu gnas te/ de dag la phyogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas pa ga nang tu sa rang ba ni 'jig rten gyi zhes
78b3(1): rgya mtsho re re zhing yang dag pa 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpada' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab gnas pa shi nad tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su
78b4(1): sta nang pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin cen rang bzhin dri myed pa/ rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho 'i 'od ldan ltos
78b5(1): 'di dag rgyal ba'i bying rlabs rgya'i sa dbyibs legs 'khor bar snang // rang de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi mgus rab yang su khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho sa la TI phyed 'od can nam ma kha'i dbyis// traN
78b6(1): sra gnas ka sdang ba'i snying tho 'od can ror bu'i brgya mtsho dag la legs pA/ gnas// 'gro ba de dbus rgyal kha 'khom la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po sko// 'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen
78b7(1): grisasu pa su byed pa'o// gsas bye gag smon pa bu sa rgyas pa'i bu cig no nus brgyan/ 'od gabes pa'i kun nas smin 'brar 'gro zhin kyi 'od can teg shing mang 'a 'a dang dpung byed bya tshor bas
78b8(1): 'i rgya mtsho dag pa gnas sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab rkyang zhing rnams 'byam zlas kun kyang rab tu mnges// 'di rnam pa rgya mtsho kyis tho bar dbyings rnams lal sangs rgyas byin pa gnas/ sangs ging ri cem pa bldad/ 
78b9(1): rin de da sa sems dad dang / gar de na rgyal tsho ma cogs dang bang sras pa de ba'idags/ rar bcos 'an sa pas 'du bdang kyi mtshang sa nyan cas pa/ ra ru ni nga rab byab pa'i yin ma
78b10(1): mnyam pa'i dbyis pa gangs/ chu'i phung po ngag dang rdo rje rgya bco bta la'ang de bzhin gnas// yas shos brag dang rgyal mtshan me gog rgya mtsho dag sa gnas// kun na'ajams 'gyus 'di dag rgya ches nas bams
79a1(1): sa'ang byed pa yadang / zhi rnams ning dang bung dang thong gi gzugs dang rnam pa sa tshogs te sa tshogs kyi che snying po dris zas pa langs dag ni byed drung / gnam pas mamogs de dag gdu pa / 
79a2(1): yi dbyings sa rab tu gnas/ stengs rgyas kyi ljid kyis kun nas log pa martag tu nas la ba'i dbyings la gnas// zhing rnamapas rgya mtsho 'byam bus pas sbyis tshugs yod dang byed la gnas// bya rgya sem sa dpa'i grod pan po / 
79a3(1): ced 'khor los gzung bas dag par gnas// de na sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams ca ba kun nas rab tu snang / rin cen sangs rgyas gsung rnams su tu gtod ldan las kyis de dag spru// chob kyi dbyings matos zhing rnams 'byam
79a4(1): klas kyig yod sgyu ma dang a 'drag sa byig 'grus na kye rnam dag dri myed sems kyis gnad tu skyed pa ste// nam la la'i dbyings nas sna tshogs rgyad kyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang rtag las kyi yul ni lasam gyis myi khyab 'di
79a5(1): dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan// skad cig sems kyis zhing / rnams 'bya'o kyis 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams/ zhing rtu / kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing / de na skal pa
79a6(1): rgya gcor 'thob spyi bya byi bya papyod/ chos dkyisakyim lam paka ste de sa bas can 'argyas rgya ches mang/ 'dus nalas phun na chab kyis sas pa'i zhingams rgya tsa ca
79a7(1): sangs rgyas sprid kyis byin gyis rlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas/ ji ltar rdus blan gcigs rnam sprul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o// rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdza / 
79a8(1): shing rnams 'byam gas thams cad byin yo lta du smras sprid rgyu 'dra// snang ba skyed cing 'byung byed byags bcu dgar 'grod 'od byed// ma la la gnas pa do dag tag la 'byung zhing 'dag pa sa de bzhin 'gyug/ nyis
79a9(1): hu sangs pa de dag spor lam nas sbyangs las kyis yongs su bathung // kye rgyal bu'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyi dbyibs minam par sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos byam bus pa la pa 'i
79a10(1): kun nas zla bzhi / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i byam klas pa la ni ya sa la'i rnam pa du ya rnam pas bye ba 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ri klar nas la khyi lang ba'i dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtho
79b1(1): labyas gus pa la la ni me kog sna tshogs kyi dbyings su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'ibyas klas pa la la ni khyim sa sna tshogs kyi dbyings su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa sa sa ni sog
79b2(1): can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug go sha 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa ya ya ni mtshan sna tshogs dbyings su 'dug ste/ de la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs gi rang tu bstan pa ni 'jig rte gyi
79b3(1): 'a las rgya mtsho'i rdul gin su dra ba skyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang pos 'jig brten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su sun pa'i byi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rnams kyis phyogs
79b4(1): bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing la ltos// rnam phye sna tshogs tha' yas dbyibs su gnas// dbyibs rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te/ phyogs rnams kun
79b5(1): na zhing rnams rgya mtsho sAng la la zlum po le la zur gsum ste// dri drag la la phyogs na gru bzhir gnas// nor bu pad ma 'khor mo yan lag rgyad/ kun kyang las rnams rgya mtsho rnam par bris// rdul byed 'od kyi dbyibs/ hu hu
79b6(1): dang rgal 'dzind cing // gser sas grub pa rnas bye shA tshogs te//  rdo yang mthal yas pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug/ sas rnams gya/  tshobasam pa dag pas gnas// 'di rnams rgya rtso chogs
79b7(1): bo can gnas ka 'di la ci ltar sprin gnas bzhin// de dag rin na mang bzhi rnam par phye// de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnamakhar mdzes// zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par rtags/ 
79b8(1): sna tshogs rgyad dang snang bas kun na gnas / rnam par 'phrul ba gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar byed pa ni/ rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin
79b9(1): nyin chos nyid 'di 'i rtag tu song ba yin/ de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho las pa kyi khyab// sA gcig rtse la bus pa gyi khyang zhing ga thams cad rdus snyed sna tshogs dbyings su gnas/ kun sangs rgyas rnam par snang 'dzid
79b10(1): bzhugs/ 'khor rnams rgya batsho mchos rnams rab tu stod // rtul gcig me a pA dang yangs pa'i rnams/ thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan/ kha dog dbyings rnams kun kyang rnam pan rtag de ma
80a1(1): sun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khom/ rdul rnams pa kun sa rab tu zhing stan pa/ de dag smon lan rnam sprul pa yin/ nam mkha'i dbyibs su las kyis sprul pa ni// sna tshogs sems dang phasas pas rnam
80a2(1): bar rtags// sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad ya// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa smra khang pa dag/ rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin to// rdul phran kun la shing rnams shin tu gnas/ kye rgyal ba'i
80a3(1): sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun dag ni gzhan dang gzhan du shes par bya ste/ 'di skar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni nin pa ci'i rgyan khams cad kyi spyan par no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
80a4(1): la ya ni rin po che gcig las rnam par sna tshogs su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la sa ni rin po thams cad kyi 'od gzer gyi lhun tsacan no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa la ni
80a5(1): 'od kha don pa tshogs kyi spyan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchos/ la la ni rgyam thams cad kyi mdog gi yun can no// 'jig rten gyi/ khams rgya mtshos pa ni rdo rje'i gzhi'i gyi zhigs pa'i yun can no/ 
80a6(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho sa sa ni rin la che'i mtshan nyid kyi spyan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos ni tu
80a7(1): sangs rgyas kyis sprub pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho la la ni mnyi ma'i nor su dkyil 'khor gyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos la ni rin tho tshe shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no// 'jig
80a8(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni snang ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos la ni rin po che thas can kyi khe dog 'od phro ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho la la ni dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyis spos kyi lhun can no//
