80a9(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ya ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi cod can gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi ltung can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
80a10(1): ya ya ni rgyad thams cad shi nad tu snyan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig cig gis dmyigs pa cad yongs su stan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams
80b1(1): kyi rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rin po che'i dbyibs kyi lhun cad no// 'jin rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya batshos la ni sarba/ 
80b2(1): rgyas pas par kyi gsung dbyangs rnam par dbyigs pa'i lhun cam no// de nas byang chub sems dpal kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spyan gi nang tu sman pa/ rgya mtsho 'di nyid sa rab tu 'azung bar bya ba'i phyi sangs rgyas
80b3(1): kyi byind kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu rdo yar bltas te de'i mi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras mo// zhing gi rgya mtsho sa la ni// ring rlung bzhir kun mu bsdes/ rdo rje bzhed du myi gnas sra/ rin cen pa ma tshwas la gnas// la dang 'od gzer / 
80b4(1): bzhin te// dag cing bzung myed 'od gzer 'byung // rgyan rnaMs kun gyi 'od gzer gyis// sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma myed// la la 'od gzer rang bzhin te/ dag cing 'od gsal gzebs gnas// 'od kyis sprin cen sna tshogs 'od// 
80b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas// zheng nas rgya mtshos la ni myog gso wu bur gdas pa ste// brjod du myed cing gzung du myed pa ste// smo sum dbang ga gis rab tu 'byug/ sa la nong bu mu tig rgyu// snying pa6
80b6(1): rjes cad rab tu 'jang // thu nyin mthor lo'i gzhi ngas pa/ byang chub sen// dpa'as yongasu gang / rin cen 'od bro 'byung ba'i zhing // nod blo smin// kyis madron legs ging // rin cen thos par shA tshogs ldan// bas na
80b7(1): las kyis sprul pa yin/ sa yas mtshan las byung ba ste// gzhi kun mtshan kyis kun tu bris// cod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod// sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par smras// rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba yi// 'ang ma
80b8(1): thos pa yod la gnas/ yu la ra myi gnas sgyu ma bzhin// yongs su rtogs pas yang dag skyed// sangs rgyas sku'i 'od gzer gyi/ nor bu sna tshogs kun tu gnas// sangs rgyas sprin nas rnam par snang // sangs rgyas kun kyis rab tu
80b9(1): A la kun tu bzang po yis// zhing rnaMs rgya mtsho shin tu sprul// nam mkha'i rgyan rnams thams cad dang // smon lam rnams kyis rnam par bris// phye rgyal pa'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya batsho'i rgyang shin tu bstan pa ni/ 
80b10(1): 'jig rten gyi khangs rgyal tsho rdub zhin tu phra ba snyed na shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar dmyigs pa rnam pa sA chog su mams pad kyi smi rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa 'a thas car kyi yon tam gyi khor lo rjes bu rjod pa
81a1(1): rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di ste ste 'jig rten gyi khams pas cad du gtogs pa'i seMs can nas kyi las kyi rnam par sbyid pa rgya mtsho las rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di la ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams car kyi smon las rgya
81a2(1): mtsho'i grong yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs rnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmyigs pa'i rgyud dang / 'di lta ste dus gsu gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs rnyad sna tshogs rnam par dbyigs ni
81a3(1): rgyang dang / 'di la ste ga sems kyi skad cig la skal pa mtha' yas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul yong su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di sa te rgyan gyi dbyigs pa thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi skur du byung ba'i rgyad dang / 'di ska ni ring po che dang das
81a4(1): thams cad kyi srin rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par stond pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpal kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su stond pa'i
81a5(1): bya dag ste/ kye rgyal la'i sras dag de dag la rdzogs pa 'jig shes gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan ginas kya pham pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams shi tu zla ba skyed do// de mang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sa
81a6(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shi nang tu zhum pa 'di nyid yongasu stan ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs brgyam rnam par smras te te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnabs rgya tsho
81a7(1): rgya che mtha' yas te// rnam dag las kyi rna la sna tshogs gnas/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnas kun kyang // sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas/ kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gyi rnams// rgya mtsho rtag
81a8(1): par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung // rgyan dang rin cen 'od phro sna tshogs smin// sgra byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams// de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i zhing na grag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang smon yab
81a9(1): srin kyi rnaMs ka/ de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin// 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag// rgyad kyi sprin rdzas kun nas sgra 'byin te// seMs can de dag rna spyin ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byind kyis kun nas s+tha yang sprog/ dus gsu
81a10(1): 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i// rdo 'bral zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // dmyigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun// de 'dra'i zhir mang rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos// 'das pa'i skal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang / phyogs bcu'i/ 
81b1(1): da ltar byung ba'i ci snyed pa'i bskal pa de dge rgyan mar yangs pa yang ga zhing rnaMs rgya mtsho re re dag na snang // dmyigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnaMs// 'gro dang mnyam khas 'jig rten kun tu 'gengasaparnam par 'phrul
81b2(1): zhing sems can rnam par 'dus// 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam mthar to// spos 'od sprin dang de bzhin me tog klung // rgyan rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang // rnag lam kun tu khyab par rab tu byung // 'di ni zhig
81b3(1): rnams rgya mtsho'i na ma tha sa to// phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams/ sna tshogs rgyan kun kyang ma lus par// zas cad rgya mtsha'i zhing gi dbyings dag na// nam ma kha'i snying ba'i mdza bar ston pa snang / rgyab sras ku tu
81b4(1): bzang po zas cad kyi// zhing rnas mjal yas 'byam klas rgyan gyi rdzas// 'gro la'i sgrangs snyed skal pa rgya mtshor rnam spangs zhing rnaMs rgya mtsho kun ma rab tu snang // kye rgyal pa'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams dag rgya mtsho yongs
81b5(1): pang byaga'i chub rtsa tshas 'dis ted kyi sa rgyam mo ba nyi ma bskyed cishes par bya te/ 'di las kyang chub se sa das ma khye ci ba sa ste bas sa dun ba'i ge sem sa kya bags pa dang/ 
81b6(1): byang chub seMs dpa' rdzas kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i srid rna pA 'phes par bya ga dang / byang chub mes dpa' rnas kyi mas dpa'i dkyil 'khon rgya chen po rnam las dag pa dang / byang chum sems dpa' nas
81b7(1): sa da ya sa 'i sa nga/ bya chus pa rgyas kyi mas la sa su rnams pa gyu dang/  sa/ 
81b8(1): zung ngun sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chugs sa dpa'i sa thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu 'god cing gzung ba'i rnam par 'aspyod pa dang / byang chub sems 'byung ba rgya mtshos rnas par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems rapa' rnams kyi na sas rgya tsho
81b9(1): mdzod par sgru ba rda la dag pa dang / byang chub sa sa ris pa rnams kyi rgya rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par smras parna bar dag pa la rab tu 'dug pa dang / 'di sku ste byang chub sems dpa' nas kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par sgrub pa rnam
81b10(1): pa dang / de dag sa thogs pa 'jig rten gyi kham yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul gind tu phra ba snyed cu shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems drags su tu bzang pos ang 'dzin
82a1(1): na kyi sa rgyamams su dag par bya 'i rgyas nga nyid du yar snan pa'i kyi sangs rgyas ni rtsod kyimams kyis phyogs parna ma mas /  // 
82a2(1): mams rgya mtshom mas cad sna tshogs rnam/ smon lam rgyas rnams rgya mtsho kun gyis byung / 'a dogs pa'i mas pas kyi rgya mchos dan// 'di rnams rgya mtshodag tud mung khyed/  mapan
82a3(1): gshen snyen kun zhing // sbrus pa mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sungs te// snying rje byams pas 'gro yangs kun bkang zhing // 'di rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa 'di kun srungs// chos ni kun tu ting nge 'dzin ma kun gyis
82a4(1): sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yongs spangs te/ bsam gtan tshul dang rdu par sa sbyangs shing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa 'byung // mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing / rgyal pa'i
82a5(1): anyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas/ bzod pa'i rgya mtsho chul rnams so// ngas sbyangs shing // rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas 'di rnas 'byu bsod nams srin ni na mkha' mnyam skyed cing / 'gro ba kun lam
82a6(1): don khyod bachud de/ bsod nams rgyam tsho sems can kun sun pas/ 'jig rten 'ams nas rgya mchos kun kyang 'byung // zhing rnams rgya ma 'i rgyal snyed chad byed yi'i pa zos byin la ma sus kun spangs te/ 'an pa// ca
82a7(1): sapas phyi nang myi bang goms byas pas// dri byed rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yangs pa 'byung // 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod chad myed dang // chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs spyangs te// sna tshogs thabs smos sems
82a8(1): can spungs pas na// 'di 'dra yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi lus dang sa dbyangs shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun bzhugs nas// 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal mtsho skams pas/ 
82a9(1): zhing gi mchos yangs 'di kun dag par 'gyur// stobs rnams brgya mtsho ga nas byed yongs sbyangs shing // 'gro ba'i 'dra chad myed rnams sbyangs te/ sangs rgyas mtsho yangs sun snyed bkur bas// zhing rnam mtsho rnas das
82a10(1): rnam par dag kye rgyas pa'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba
82b1(1): ba ni sku rdzas kun tu man // 'dis se sangs rgyas 'byung ba gA la ni chos kyi dbyings thams ca gzugs kyi sgras gang bar shon ta/ sa rgya rgyu mas pa'i bu cho dkyim // 
82b2(1): zas pa ni skye ci mad ring po gsas kya 'byung ba pa sani sas rgyab kyi zhing dmi mas dag par byed kyis 'o sangs rgyas 'byung bas yini 'a rten gyi babya tshos 'ang thos za ga/ 
82b3(1): byigs kyis rdzob po nga sangs rgyas 'byung ba sa la ni chul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi cho tul kho lo byin kyis rlob thog sangs rgyas 'byung ba sa sa ni tshul mamam gyis kyi khyab par bcadad pa'i chos kyi mamam kyi
82b4(1): kyis rlob po / sangs rgyas byung ba la ya ni sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sangs rgyas
82b5(1): 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su stand pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byind kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba 'gyur ba babs rnams sna tshogs
82b6(1): kyis gonas shing rnams rgya mtshor rab tu 'byung ba de dag sems car pa/ dpas bzhin mkhyen// sangs rgyas labs kyi sgo mang rgya mchog/  sangs rgyas chos srubams kyis kyi khyab ze gabyin sonapa
82b7(1): mtshan nyid myed pa'i gzugs// gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston la ltos// su tshe thungar la la rnam par ston// la swa skal pa bsam yas byi nad kyis
82b8(1): rlob/ chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo// rab tu mdzes par 'gro ba 'di na bzhugs// la la zhing rnams rgya cho so yas dag/ spyod gi 'byam kA sa phyogs bcu kun yang / la la zhing gcig rnam par spyodapa
82b9(1): mdzad/ smon lam lus kun kyang tshul gcig go// la la bsam gyis myi khyab theg pa'i rgyan// sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas pa ston pa mdzad// la la theg pa cig kyang rab ston te// rgyal pa'i thabs ni gcig mtha'
83a1(1): nasam yas pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i srin rnams rab tu 'gyeb// 'grol kus de dag mngon bkang zhing 'das kyi sgonas sems can brgyas pad// sangs rgya gsung gis kun bgang gis
83a2(1): zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog/ bsam/ skal par de dag gsung sgrog cing // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas zhing rgyan bsam gyis myi khyab ste// 'khor rnams yongs dag
83a3(1): kun nas 'khor bcas pas// zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs bcu rgyas gar byas shing // sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs// de ltar sangs rgyas thebs ni bas myi khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas rkang
83a4(1): zhing // 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon gsum ste/ sna tshogs rgyan rang sang du ma'i tshus dang ldan/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten dkyi khams rgya mtsho'i skal ba'i byi nad kyi rlabs kyi tshul shin du spyan pa
83a5(1): nI 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul gin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di lte ste zhing rgya mtsho la la ni skal pa grangs myed bA byin gyi rlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho sa la ni skal ba tshad myed par byin/ 
83a6(1): shing mya chos pa ra brjod tu byed par byid kyis rlab pa ste/ de dag pa sogs pa 'dig chen gyi 'ams rgya mdzegs pa'i byin gyi rnams kyi rgya zhin tu bgan pa rgya mtshoni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyal shems pa pa ste
83a7(1): sa kya pa masas nga bas yin sbyid kyi sa rdzus 'i smra ci kyi nas pa na nyid pas pags gyis pa smraH kyi skyes kyis kyis rgyag
83b1(1): kya zlugapa/ rgyam cha nyid rnams 'di sa khyonas dbyis dang / byi mas rgyum byed dang ltu/ dus ga'anarnams sgrus pa'i ga gas 'du// sa pa nas sa na sa phrus
83b2(1): dri byed nyon mdzes pacas// a ya na dag sa la nyon mongs na pang dag/ rnas pa'i phying ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul kyis 'byung // sems can 'du gas rna babang dang tshul la 'jug// skas pa zhing ni rdus rnyed 'am
83b3(1): kyang bag 'jig ce lasams rgya ma shing rgyam shing da/ de dag kun nas sangs rgyas pas rgya byur byed // 'di dang byar rnal pa'i 'dzi rten rgya tsha'i la / mapa 'od dzin
83b4(1): byid 'choms/ chos ldan byag 'ang 'ad pa ma datha pang 'i byed 'bang po gas pa'i phyi/ gal pa 'di ga pa su sa byang / nga rgya ba tso/ 
83b5(1): sbal pa la yang myi'i rtse po mtha' yas 'byung // skal pa'i tshul rnas/ zas cad sa chul bad myi shes// smon las stobs thus skas pa/ sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur// skas pa sa la mtha' mas rnams kyang
83b6(1): skal pa gcig tu 'dus// skal ba la la gcig kyang skal pa bye ba'i mthul// skal pa rgya mtsho kun nas sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khaMs kyi nang nas sgra yang byin skal pa la sar skal pa
83b7(1): kun gyis rgyad kyang byung // mying gi rgyan rnaMs rnam par dag pa 'ang de la yod// skal pa le la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu yis byung // skal ba'i tshul rnams kun gyi 'di ni rgyan yangs yin// zhing rang skal pa rgya mtsho chul ni
83b8(1): gcig gis dag/ zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad myed gzhal du myed// skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i grangs kyis skal par 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam ar 'byung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
83b9(1): de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i skal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khas rgya ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas sprul pa mtha' yas pa kun nas
84a1(1): gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi las rgya mtsham gtogs pa'i sems can nas kyi bsod nas kyi rgya mtsho chen po sogs pa rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun sa nyon mongs pas rnam par dag du
84a2(1): pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna tshogs kyis 'askyod pa rnams skye bras 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste sems can rgya mtsho chen po byang chub sems la gnas
84a3(1): pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga nad tu dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dod pas skal pa rgyan pa dang pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i byang chub
84a4(1): sems dpa' rjes 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas skal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu mang por kun nas gnas pa dang 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pas yongasu mya ngam las 'da' pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub dang
84a5(1): 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khamasargyan gyis rgyan par kun nas gangs pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i skal pa mtha'
84a6(1): yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag la btsogs pa sang jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i skas pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu/ 
84a7(1): phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i skal ba mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid nga yongs su snyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs ba
84a8(1): rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos// chos kyis 'byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar// de dag 'byung zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba yang / 'di rnams rgya mtsho zas
84a9(1): cang rab tu ldag/ sems can nyar yongs kyi bad ldan pa dang / las nyon mongs dang bas sgrings pa'i rnams// de dag sa ma la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams// kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin/ gsems can nas dag sa sa/ 
84a10(1): ldan nas rang ga bsod nams rtam dang rnam dag 'apyod sus can// rna ma deg yul la nyod mongs ldan gyur nas// de dag mos pa sna tshogs 'byod yul gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i dus dkan/ skal ba de ni rnam
84b1(1): dag par blag ga sems par nyan mangs ldan par gyur pa yang / rab tha ba nyid bsas las yangs pa'i/ byang chub 'ams pa 'i ltang skyed pa dang / de dag pas pa 'i kun nas skyes pas// de bzhidi skas la rgya tsham
84b2(1): dag/ bsam gyis kyi khyab zhing rgyam yongs su spong / bye ba mang ma was yas kyi bang pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' byams na kun rgya zang // rgyan la rnam la pa dang yod pa phyin// skal pa pa dang rgyas kyi bye ngas dang / drug
84b3(1): rnamam pa phru la rgyas sunas ga sangs rgyas shing gi dus rang mnyam g.yi/ ga rgyal zas dri tshul 'dod pa de bzhin dug/ zhi nas rgya mtsho'i chub de dag par gyu gags te rgyal la nas ni skyes kya ngan shing nab rgyad kyi
84b4(1): gis su rgyan par 'gyur / bsam la yongs dag de bzhin rgyas 'gyur te ga 'di ni zhing rgyad phun gsuM tshogs pa'o kA gas te rdul ba mya rang 'das kyu rad na// re re de zhing rgyan rnas 'grib par 'gyur /  sems can rnas kyang tsA
84b5(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga kyi dge pa'i ke tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu za ba de ges par bya/  ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang sa byod pa dang / dasang
84b6(1): srung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas kyis gsung pog gsung ngo ngo// gsung bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho'i rdul gi nad tu phra snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pakyi
84b7(1): nanadang pa dang 'di lta ste/  'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byu ba kyi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khes rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings kyis phyogs rgyas par
84b8(1): dgengs pa tha myi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor tha myi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams
84b9(1): cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgengs pa tha myi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spru'ad pa'i sprin dang / mtshan kyi 'khor ma myi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten
85a1(1): tshul ba gyi dang pa dang / 'di ga she 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchodas su cwa sbyi tsa mas gtsigs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshoms pad yongs 'argyaban gyi dad pa dang / 'di na ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag sa chub
85a2(1): zas pa pas ca sa sas kyi las/ kyi bras rgya chem pa mas ca da pam gyi dang rgyas pa'i thas de pa yi te kyi sa kya tshul gyi dang 'i kyang 'di nyid gyi sa rgya tsha sa
85a3(1): dbang ma gas pa chogs rgyad byang kun nas thes spangs te/ thogs nams kun kyi zhing du mngon gang ba // de dag pa dang gyur ba mas yang byed// dus phrad ca tshus bud ras gtsu kyis 'a rnams na thor/ 
85a4(1): 'jig rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang / naganod pa dag la 'dre ba nyes pa myed/ rdul gcig la ni mthal mas 'od kyi sIn/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang shing / ga bde gshegs nas kyi byang chub 'byod snyan
85a5(1): kyang // rgya mtsho zhing rnams pa dang gang yang myed// rtul rnams kun la kha dog pas kyi khyab// stsal la'i sprin gyis kun tu gar byas te// sangs rgyas 'phrul las sems can na 'dus yang // 'byam rdzas phyogs na pa dang gang yang byed/ 
85a6(1): rdul kun la rgya mtsho'i chos rjod de/ de dag 'khor lo'i bzhin 'khor mdzad cing // thabs dang ma bu'i sgom sna tshogs kyis// thams cad rjod kyang de la ra dang byed/ chul gcig sa ni rtsul ba kun gyi gsug ga'agro ba snod du gyu
85b1(1): la de dag rjod byas te/ rgya mtsho'i zhing du skal par byid rlabs kyang // de dag gsung ni yan lag tha myi dang // zhing rnas rgya mtsho mthal yas rgyan gyi rnams/ thams cad rdul sbums gcig tu rab tu mjung // rgyas panas kyi rdzu 'phrul mthur
85b2(1): la ltos yas kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa myin// rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar 'byung ba de dag thams cad snang // de dag gshegs dang byon pa gang yang byed// 'gro ba kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par bamyal
85b3(1): gi nang tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi las rgya mtsho shi na tu snyan pa'i phyogs gsas par bya ba yang dag par smranas pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bzhi pa'o// 'phags pa sangs rgyas lam po
85b4(1): zhes bya ba gin tu rgyas mtshan po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga 'i dang snying pa me tog gi rkyen kyis rgyan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa rnam par snas na
85b5(1): 'od kyang chus sems dpa'i spyad pa pyod pa'i tshe/ zhal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi las rgya mtsho'i dus shes can pa skad kyis sangasas dag par byas te/ chang thal pa re de 'i de sa ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'dig rten gyi yas rgya mche
85b6(1): rdul shin rtsa sra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung tu smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten/ gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu pA pa snyed kyis shin tu bzung ba ste/ de la rlung kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og pa ni gzhi kun nas rtog pa
85b7(1): sa bya bye rin po'i bams cad kyi 'ad ma la 'byur ba gyu miganis na to// 'i seng na nga gi dkyis na nan pa nacog kyi rgyu byung ba zhes byab pa / nor bu'i rgyam pa po rnas par
85b8(1): ba'i rgyas mchan gi gnyis shan nyag de'i steng na nang kyi dkyil 'bang rin po che'i sabu zhes bya ba ma ni po bams can gyims su'i gnas 'a / de'i nga kyi sa par nga na shes bya
85b9(1): dado/  sngams ga dag ris phre na pa byang ban ma dag
85b10(1): ngasas kyi gyis 'khoji ga'i kun nas dri ma byen cing yongs su dag pa zhes byab yod de/ deshog sams cad 'das ga ni yang ke'i khri gnyis ga sha de'i ga rdzung gi kyis la nga cas la na slog
86a1(1): kun sa rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de ga mu tika dang man shes kyi rgyal mtshad sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thos cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po ging dang the
86a2(1): rtog tshogs kyi slong gi gnyis ston to// de'i seng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun mas 'jim pa'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ni lar kyi sprin gyi gnyis nyon to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'tshang gyi
86a3(1): kunas b+hA ba zhes bya ba yod deg rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang spos kyi kha bas legs pa gnyis nyon to/  kye rgyas pa'i sras dag drung gi dkyis 'tshad kyil rab kyi rdus shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng pa ni rlu
86a4(1): dkyi' 'khor gzi rji kha zang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ste/ nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to// spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis rgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de
86a5(1): las 'das chen po baspring gi rgyas cham khyer ba'i 'od zer dang ze ga swa/ tshogs shes bya ba mdzad pas 'byung ste/ pad ma chen po de la'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho li gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyad kyis
86a6(1): rkyang pa yun nas grwa bzhir 'dug pa/ rna par dag pa kin tu rtan pa rje rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gis skor la rim gyis gnom par gnas pa shid kyi rgyud rgya mtshos la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dun go// de nas/ 
86a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang pos yang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho ga'i rang snying po rtse tog kyi rgyas kyis rgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid rjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
86a8(1): phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gzhi rgyan me teg 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgya mtsho de rin ce na kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te/ 'phrul rnaMs kun dang mnye ba'i sngan chad sangs rgyas
86a9(1): kyi/ brlang cu rjod ce rgya mtshod sbyangs pag drim byed// rgya cher snying rje'i sprin kyis las nas kung bgapa zhing // 'di gi tshul dang mnya ba'i sras kyang kun btang ra/ na kyi sprus pa rgya mchom yod pa lung bsan sa
86a10(1): rten rgya mtsho'i kha sa de sangs shing rdza bar dag/ sangs rgyas rna pan snang las smon la tshe mdzad de/ 'od snang btang ma kha'i dkyil na gnas pa ni// rlung gi phung pos tas kyang myi spyod kyi g.yo ste// nor bu kun rgyang sangs
86b1(1): rgyas snying po'i/ me tog mdzod kyi gtor ba rin cer yid 'ong bzhin// sngon gyi smon las dbang gis 'a'i dbyings la gams// rgya mtsho'i rgyur nas mas cad chonas rkad par gnas// phyog sa dang phyogs tshabs tu
86b2(1): cu 'od kyi sprid yang gtong / gnor bu pas pang zho nas byang chub sos dba'i rnamag 'byung ba ding 'od gzer smin 'bar phyogs rnams kun dag ga'od gzer me tog tshon rang 'od gzer khor lo'i tshogs ga phyogs chams na
86b3(1): 'dus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par byed// rin cen kun gyi 'od gzer sprin rnams kye ba ni// phyogs dang phyogs tshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed// sug sngal thos cad gzhis zhing byang chub mchog pa mgo // 
86b4(1): mjig rten rgya mtsho bas cad 'od 'gro rab tu 'bar/  'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams// rim cen kun dang sprus rnams rgyal ba 'byed// rgya byin dag rang tshangs pa 'ang tham sa sbyar 'dra dag
86b5(1): gro bkun gyi lus sra lus nasas kun kyang gas/ sul la don kye chos kyi dbyings kyi rangs nyas pa// da gser zhonas dasangs rgyas thams padas nga byung shon// rdzog sa sus su byas
86b6(1): tshim byas nas / tshul rnaMm sna tshogs sgo nas sems can rnam para'adul// 'jig rten rgya 'tsho me tog snying po de nang na/ rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi rin cen 'od kyi
86b7(1): sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar bar snang rnaM bar snang mdzad/ rdo 'phrul zhong la ltos// skal pa rgya mchor 'gro ba sdug snga la sal byas te // smon yom sangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang / bzang ba'i spyod pa rnyes
86b8(1): ga yi ger sna pa'i dgongs pa las di byad mad de dag 'byung ba yid ka gisas rgyas pa chen po'i mdog sangs rgyas pas po che zhes bya ba sas/ 'jig ten gyi yas rgya mchog ni dang rnying ba mi 'og s+ho kyi rgya ma ma
86b9(1): rgya tsho ba tu dag pas spang bshes bya ste /  le'u pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i zas da/ de la 'jig ter gyi lams rgyamatsho ba ni dang srim 'i mi log gi rgyad kyis byung dang 'ang dug chem po mdzes bu'i chu bdongs te ma'i nga
86b10(1): la rten pa ste/  nor bu'i rigs brgya 'tsho spos kyi can dam bas cad las grug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyad kyi yul thams cad kyis lhun shin tu 'phags shing 'i khad kyis non pa/ nor bu sos dri zhim po ga'i rdzing khor lo rje ban+de
87a1(1): snang ba'i snyib po pon nor bu'i rgyas pa rdo rje rtsa zhing myi gags pa skar shin tu khregs gang sa pa rin po che'i rna thams par kun nas 'byung ba// dran pa che'i shing kyi nags ras kyi rgyas kyang thegagagis rgyab pa yo kyi
87a2(1): kyi mchog mang po sems las kyis rgyan pa thon gyi me tog/ dpas can 'alas cang shin kya bzang bas rnas byeng rgyam pa/ nong pa'i rgyal po 'dig rkyen gyi lal la ga par kyi dbyings sa su rna ras can nas thosas zen de dag
87a3(1): sogs pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu rgyan pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dag kun tu bzang pos yang khom yug gi rgya dang / yon tan yongs su dag pa'i phyir ga sangs
87a4(1): rgyas kyi byin kyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcu brna bar ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten gyi khas rnas rgya mtsho gang yod pa/ mtha' dang dpung byed rnam pa can ka/ nor bu mang pos rdza dag ma pa sas mdzin/ 
87a5(1): dag pas rgyas rnam par gru par byung / ni byed kha bun rgyud kyi rgyu pa ni// no bu ma du pa de bzhi go yang dang kyi sapa pa'i chogs pa sa gas dog pa pa
87a6(1): shi nad tu sra zhing rtan// mtshams rnaMs myi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'phrul// mtshan ldan nor bu rin rkyen rnam bkod pa// rgyan rnaMs kun kyis yongs su dge bar snang/ spos chu'i sprin kyis kha dog pa yas te// rid cen can dan me
87a7(1): kog kun tu kra ga bA ma sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog// rid cen mi mchog dri zhim ldan rnam dang ldan// sna tshogs shing gi sprin kyis kun nas rgyan/ nor bzangs kun kyis yun nas gzi rjid 'ab 'od gzer ljin
87a8(1): kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ gos kyi mdzod kyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas // spos kyi 'od mo gdug pa gdugs 'chang ba'i// byang chub seMs dpal mar pos chos dbyings gang // sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho mas cad 'byin
87a9(1): ka di ni rnam khar snang mdzad chos po tham// rid cen mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang // shanor bu dag dang kun nas 'od wa zhing // kun la rnam par snang mdzad sku gnas pa // gzugs tshul du na na song la ldang // bas par gzugs su
87b1(1): zhes bya sto/  yoru drug pa'o// kye rgyal pa'i sras dag de la 'am yug chen po de'i na nga'i 'jig rten gyi kham rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni nor bu mang po yi rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa rdo rje lham gi nang tu legs shing tha ba tam pa gi rinapa
87b2(1): sa cad las sgrub ba rgya mchos rnam yar phye ba'i phyogags pa'i sgri brtson gyil gyi dma' pa'i 'ang mnyam nying rnam par dag pa non du rin pa me'ams par kyi 'dog da nga A gyis rab rgyan pa mams pa sa pa kyis
87b3(1): kyi byings ga bu'i nor bu'i gzugs pa tshogs kyi rab tu sgrubs pa/ ri bya rje'i chomams card kyi rkyen kyis rgyad pa/ rin pa 'i yid du 'gro ba'i bang sa bams cad kyis ka'i thub pa'i dbyigs pa lasas pa can rdzogs pa byung ba'i/ 
87b4(1): da kyis ldan sa yon pa nong bu'i rgyam tha las kyi badzin pa mas na kyis pa'i btas pa rnam // nor bu'i rgyal po ras sun byed / shegs pa zhi gi rgyun gyi sbyin gyi na rnas par me pa de ji gshegs
87b5(1): pathas cad kyi 'khyod yul kyi 'od dang gnor bu'i dra ba'i myig phral lta bus rnam par phye ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la grogs pa sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyud shi nang tu snyam pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rngub
87b6(1): gisu tu phra ba snyed ngo do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khaMs rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyang rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su rjod pa'i phyiraka/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu brnam par ltas te/ de'i
87b7(1): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyes so/ sa'i 'akyil 'khor gzhi ni rna dag mnyam// khor lo'i dra bam sgrubs ya myi shigs sra// rin cen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing // rin cen sna tshogs kun kyis kun tu gang
87b8(1): yid 'ongs ni rdo rje gser gi gzhi/ rin cen chu ba 'i lo'i 'khor los sgrubs// pad ma dkyil 'khor ga'izhi yin med rtogs// tsan dang bye ma rin cen kun tu kre// 'od gzer sna tshogs rin cer me tog rnams/ rdo phre
88a1(1): 'byed pas phyog su sprin yang 'bar// sangs rgyas 'od snad nor bu rnam par kram// sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas yog// thams cad sIna? ni phyogs na smin ni sdug lnga las nga / myi zar yangs pa kun nas
88a2(1): khebs par 'dug pa phreng rjes khams phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par rab tu spog// red cen rang snang sangs rgyas ston lam sun// ga shin tu dus ming rtag tu rgyan sa sor// sngar chad kyong/ 
88a3(1): pa tsi dra dpyod pa dag na ga kun kyang nor bu'i 'bya las gsal bar sngag// de'i rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs bting // de'i nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul snang / sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi nas / rgya mtsho kun gyi cu zad
88a4(1): re reng snang / me tog snying po tshor gyi 'khor los sbubs// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag 'dod zhing ka/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon las kun kyang sgrog/ snying po byang chub khong du rnam 'amyal lo// rin cen 'od dang ldan ga
88a5(1): gi pa'i nong sa rgyan sapa rab tu 'argyas gsangs rgyas chos nyid 'dri gas brtag tu ston // chos dbyings nam mala' lta grang sa dgongs / sangs rgyas ca yul le ges rgya ched dang // sun tu gzang po'i 'od las du
88a6(1): shes pa dag de dag phyogs nas rgya mtsho kun tu yang / gzhing rnams rgya tshodabyings kyi phrul la 'jugs/ shi nang tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las 'jig rten gyi khabs rgya mtsho'i sa'i gzhi'i rgyan shing
88a7(1): ldan pa zhes bya ba ste // ledu badrad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil khor de la spos su'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu dra ba snyed song+ge de/ de dag sun kyang
88a8(1): ma thams cad kyi rgyud kyis rgyun pa da nor bu'i rgyal po dang / thos thams cad kyi rlungs tu smras pa / nos sa rgyal po sams ni pa 'i du 'angs 'od nam par sna ba'i drabs gnas sa /  po gyu
88b1(1): lo gdu gagang pa 'i mangs cad kyi 'dogs pa'i sa khyad kyis sums nga nam mi shes kyi rgyas mas kyi shu wa nyi rgyadang sa byed pa ma na pa rgya 'o/  de rlo ba dang
88b2(1): rtsegs pa gang gA'i klung gyi bye ba snyed kha dog tha yas la bcus kun nas skor ba'o// 'di lta ste nor bu tham cad kyi pad ma yid du 'ong ba grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong brgyas kun nas spro ba'o// 'di ga ste nor bu rdo rje gnang
88b3(1): cu swa ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdus shin tu dra ba snyed kyis rab tu sgrubs pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog pun d+ha'i ka dang / spos kyi chus yongasu rgyas pa kun nas snyom pa'o// 'di lta ste ring po che'i shis kyi phreng ba
88b4(1): na pa 'a'ang zhing kun nas byang ba'i nos su dral bar thong bzhi'i 'jig chon gyi 'ams kyi tshul gi nadang tu lal snyed kyis kun nas ga sho/ tsan dan dang sde ba dang / nor bu mang po sgra bams par dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi kyi
88b5(1): tho gi byag kyis rab par snang ba byas pa gang las klung kyi byed kyis bzlab gnas rgyun pa'o// 'di lta skye pa dag dang / rgyas pa dang nil ma pa kyi tha zu sa
88b6(1): rgyam pa'adadzin pa me me su 'di rang nos su mas par kyi ba rtsel me rtswa ba rjid pa byed pas pananas zhir pa'o// denas kyis byas sems dpa sus pa pa'adapo pa yang /  rje tsho
88b7(1): nyid yongs su sum pa'i phyir ga sangs rgyas kyi byed kyis phyogs brgyam nas yang smras te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa stengs derna mas kyi chu bo'i rgyamatsho mong bus kyan pa mdzad de// 'i ras
88b8(1): gos kyis kun bting bar/  myi shigs rdo rje lta bu sra zhing mdzes pa spos dang nong bu'i rgyal po mang po dang / nyi ma'i nor bu 'od bro lug sprin dang // pad ma rid chen phreng ba 'ang kun nas bres// gzhi rnams dri byed mid rtsa 'ang/ 
88b9(1): 'o// ga spos kyi chu'is yongs su rgyas pa ste ra rin cen 'od gzer sna tshogs mye tog klong // spa dbyangs rab tu gtod pa'i dbyangs kyis kyang // sangs rgyas rnas par sprul pa'i rab tu srog// re skas phreng ba yid du rlung ldan/ 
89a1(1): ga'adzim 'i ze no pa mang pas rgyas/ gegs su chud nan ci par shA nunas nas par thegs pa/  ni na cu 'i med pa dang / de bye sa kya nas nang bya sa/ 
89a2(1): mo'i sA dag kyang / ga rnam par 'phrul yang dbyangs su rab tu sngo// / spos chus song ga din cen sbubs pa ste// me tog pun d+ha rigs kun nas skor// spos dang 'od dang chug thom 'od zer kye// de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nam la
89a3(1): dzin cen rgyal mtshan su tig 'bar ba can/ gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun byung zhing /  rin chen no bu'i dril bu dra ba dag / thams cad mkhyed pam 'jug pa'i mA yang sgrog/ pad mu'i grong khyer rnams kyis sun nas rgo nga / 
89a4(1): ba dog pa las nor bus rnam par rgyan pa/ phyogs nas kun nas mu zhig rang sprin kye ba'i// grong khyer rgya mchos de dag rab tu rgyan dra mas bzang nyos kun nas skor ba ste// rin cen byas pa'i gzugs khyim gyi rnams ka na
89a5(1): du ma 'a bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i rgya chos bzang zhing mdzes pa te rab tu brgyan // sngan chad na sa la rul snang mdzad kyis// sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yongs srungs pa gi rab tu rgya che mapa' dang nga
89a6(1): byed pa 'ang // de dag kun kyab rda ba bral la byed ka/ spos chu'i rgya tsho de dag da de re zhidi yang spos chu'i chu klung g.yas su 'khor zhing 'bab pa// glo bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas shin tu pA ba snyed kyis 'khor byas te/ 'os
89a7(1): chu'i chu krung de dag thams cad kyang 'khom sun nas rdo rje'i ba ma kha dog dang / dri ga yas las sbubs pa'o// nom bu'i kho lo dang nom bu'i 'od rnam gar dag la sna tshogs kyi maba' kun nas dkrigs pa'o// sangs rgyas 'od ci
89a8(1): khor rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par snang yang byas pa'i 'od gzer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dra ba rin po che shes cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khengs pa'o// 
89a9(1): byed pa'i 'od kyi klong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshen kyi dbyibs lta bus rab tu 'byung ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od gi nad tu 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi khabs rgya mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis shin
89a10(1): tu sog par byas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang sangs rgyas thos cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khengs pa'o// dus gsum du gshes
89b1(1): stand pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi nang tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu / bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gyi rgyad dang yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su snyan pa'i byin/ sangs rgyas
89b2(1): kyi byi da kyi rlabs kyis phyog su rnam par smras te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung dri ma myed pa'i chus rgyas shing // gzhi ni nor rdo rje pad mas byas// rin cen mang po'i mil bus gzhi kram zhing // 
89b3(1): kun nas rgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong // them spras phre las de dag kun nas skor// pan ma 'phyang ba'i mu khyud 'khor can te// me tog rgyan pa'i mu tig 'phreng ba dang / me tog lnga ldi sna tshogs kun nas bres// nor bu'i chu ba
89b4(1): spos chu 'byung ba ni// rin cen la/ dog pa dog lhar 'bag/ rin chen nor bu mye tog mdzes pa dkod// sa'i snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas su bsnyad rjod sa/ de dag rdog pa nor bu zla ba ste// rin cen sna tshogs thams cad
89b5(1): dab klong ngo// phyogs rnas bcu po kun tu rtag par yang ka spos dang bdug pa 'od phro'i rgyan 'byung // chu lo rnams las rin cenathams cad kyi// 'od zer bro ba kun tu rab tu 'byung // me tog no
89b6(1): bra'i phung po'i thugs rnaMs kyang // rin chen 'od kyi 'od zer rab tu 'bar// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs rnyan mang po dang / sangs rgyas gzugs rnyan rid cen rnams las snang // rin ces 'khor lo'i gzhi rte yid 'ong
89b7(1): las la so/ chus rgyas pa'i cha kub rnams kyang 'ba'// rin rtse gser gi dris nu dra bzhis // sag cing sangs rgyas gsung dra sna sgrog 'bab / rgyas bkun gyi byang bachun yod pa dang / kun tus 'ang ba'i spyod mchog ras tu 'jur
89b8(1): sangs rgyas smom lam dasgra dbyangs rnam pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag// rnam dag rnor bu'i ngos dang ro// ma kun nas// sgra rnams sgrogs par kun na rab tu snang // chu bo thams cad dpa' klong dag las kyang // byang
89b9(1): chub pa sas ra 'i byin ci 'a' 'a dag chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rtsus byed par/ 'byas thas grogs mas kun ma rag dang/ chu krung de dag thams par dri byer zing / nong bu'i rgya pa na gyis bun bya pa// mdzod cu
90a1(1): dpal// sangs rgyas gzi'i rjid 'bar// nor bu'i rgyal por sangs rgyas gzugs rnyan snang // spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa ste// chu klung gi lar de dag re re zhing
90a2(1): yang rin po che'i me tog bun d+ha ri ka'i phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas skor ba'o// chu klung gi bar de dag re re 'ing yang rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi 'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul gnad tu dran
90a3(1): snyed kyis rdza byal 'og gir phyi gsesams ca nas kyang rgyan ras cad kyi sprin rtag kA rab tu 'byung ste// gnor bu'i rgyal po byang chus yos dpa'i dbas 'byung ba'i sprin dang / 'od sa kyang ras tu 'byung mo// shing gi ban re dag lams par 'a gi ca
90a4(1): dbar bsnyen spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu dag kha'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thas cad kyi smon laM skul pa thas cad du byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongasu gang ba'o// spos 'od bro ba'i sprin gyi 'od gzer gyis rna pA sna ba bar
90a5(1): byed pa'i sprid kyis mngon par khyab pa'o// gaspos kyi rgyal po ying du 'ong ba snga chog+sa/ dkyis rnal rgyas la'o// nar bu'i rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i 'a dog yang dag par ston papas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang 'o/ gagos kyi
90a6(1): tshogs sna tshogs sprin lha bus mngon yar yog la'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i sprin kyis yog par byed las rna ma brgyas ma/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thas cad kyi rna bar 'phrul la'i 'od kyis mngon par
90a7(1): gang ga 'o nor bu rgyal tho seMs cam thos cad kyi las kyi rnam par sbyin rgya mtsho'i gzugs rnya gi nang tu stod pas rgyas pa ste/ de dag la rdzogs pa chu klung gi bar de dag re le nga yang rgya ginas tu snyam pa ni 'jig rten gyi las rgyu mtsho'i rdul ging tu phra ba rnyed
90a8(1): go / de rab byang chub sas dpa bung tu bdang pos yang sbos chu'i ma thung gi bar gi rgyan yongs su dag brgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su su da pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byidan kyi rlangs kyis phyogs byam rnapa lam smras te/ dod kyi tshigs su bca pa hU~M/ 
90a9(1): so/ cu byung dang na shi tu na ba dadag / ri byed tu ban gser gis rnam pa dris/ yas ga me gag sbyin rnams 'byung lding ba / shing gi phrer pas su sa mad ma bya shing ni sas sami dris pa la nongs pas nin bye ma pa'i
90a10(1): rjes kun kyang 'byung ka me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po cam // phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed/ gzhing rnams nor bu mngon par kram pa ste// me tog rnga bris ri dben 'bru dang ldan// kun nas rin chen gyis khyas pa ste/ rgyan dums zas
90b1(1): thas par 'azugs cad lung mas rgya par byar du rgyab pa k+Shag nams sa masmras na gang / thogs nam sas gan shi rung nu sa rmu t+yA rgyu sa nga bya
90b2(1): pang rgyas ga.u tig sal pa'i dra bas rnam par phye ka nor bu'i khor lo'i kun nas rab tu bkod // kun na rgyal ba rnam par tshul pa snang / 'byam klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis/ sangs rgyas smra bang pa la kye ba kung na pA pa ka sangs rgya
90b3(1): mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing ka ma stobs bcu banga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog// rin cen sna tshogs pun d+ha ri ka zhes // chu rjes kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos // de las kyi zang 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i rjes ka rab tu byung ba'i pad bcwa
90b4(1): tshogs 'byung ga shus gsu bo'i rgyang rnams pas cad kyang // nor bu'i de dag 'bru'i nang na ste// 'byung ba byed cing gzung dra napa yod pa gyis// de ni sangs rgyas rnga bar thul pa'i mthu'ag/ d+hal bu lar snang mdzad pas bad d+ha kA d+h+ya dang sbru pra la sas
90b5(1): rab su byed pa sngar car gangs rgyam man sa tha thu dag gis// ro dag 'gro napa 'o bar snang ba byed ka rdus rnams rgya mtsho mas cad dag pa yang ka rgyal sras pas nga spyad par 'ag 'byed do// rang gi zhing dang snyan sa'i rnam pa'o mo ba rnam dag// Tha
90b6(1): chus pa'idi de dag bathod/ kye sa bya ba'i sngas dan sangs rgyas bco'i ldan 'as rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams sna mtsho'i ga nga tu spangs pa ni bams nga kyis kyi khyang she kye rgyal ba'i bang dag dam kyi shed/ jig rten gyi / 
90b7(1): rgya mcho gzhi dang snying po mye tog kyi rgyad kyis rgyas la'i dbyigs pa dag la 'angadamyigs pa re re zhing yongasu dag pa'i yon tan dang / rgyan shin tu spyan pa rgya mtsho 'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhes par bya'o// 
90b8(1): rjenas kyang chub sems das ku tu gsang thos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam tsho mang ma dag kyis yon tan mapas dang dpung byed lam yang can nas ya da da rgya gas/ rgya ma nyid sa sa ma gyi/ g+sa
90b9(1): kyo byed kyi rlabs kyi sa phyogs brgyar rnas par smras te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa'id dag smras po// ming gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang // rim rtse 'ad rjes gnas pa sre// khrug cing 'brel pa'i sprin kyis thun dam yogs ni chen
90b10(1): 'od kyang rna ma 'as ka rba tin no bu'i smin pang zad kyigs// rangs rgyas gzugs rtad phyogs su rnam par snang // ti ma yod pa'i rnam par grub pa rnams// byang rgyam ses dpas nas gartag tu sto pa byed ga/ sangs rgyas gsung gi sri ni / 
91a1(1): / ra bas pa bar s+ho/  pa da nga thu gyu nga sa / sku rgya rna par yang ba ma
91a2(1): pa na ma dang salas rgyas ma ni pa byed las rtsa kyi
91a3(1): byig g.yob 'dra ba ste // mas cad dag mchis nyid 'di yang snang // 'di'i na braru snang mdzad spyod yul te ka/ smon las rnam par bral las 'byung ba'o// da bzang po 'apyod pas gang rnams 'byung 'gyur ba'i// byang chub sems dpa 'gas
91a4(1): mamo rgya 'tsho bas ka de dag rgyal thas kun la rab kyis ka rang ni gni rnams rgya rdzo dag par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa can gyis 'bring du la pa bye ba rgya chem sa ya su re da khyod bus lams pa payang ba/ 
91a5(1): sras de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shi nang tu stan // gang zhen kye rgyal pa'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du myed pa bcu'i rdul gir tu phra ba snyed po de dag la 'jig rten gyi khabs kyi rlung sangs
91a6(1): rgyab kyi zhing rjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du myed pa'i rdul shinang tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor ba
91a7(1): 'jig rten gyi khabs rgya mtsho 'byas klas pa de dag yas cad ded gzham dang gzham la gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'jug pa/ phyogs gzhan rang gzhan la lta ba rna la gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyad gzhan dang gzhan thod
91a8(1): gzhan gyis rgyas par dgengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'dra ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres pa rnam par 'phral ba dang byin gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste/ kye rgyas pa'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
91b1(1): rgyas zas pa sa ma ni pa ni'i rgyachol nas sa gnam pa jig rten gyi 'das rgyam cho bya ma bu sa man ma po che 'don sa ma mas ga rgya chos rab tu ga na rnams
91b2(1): ring po che'i phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po tshan gyi rgya chos rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khas 'byam thal pa sa la spos bcu'i rgya mtsho la ral tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khas rgya batsho 'byal gras wa sa la ni me tog thathas cad
91b3(1): kyi rgya chos rab tu gnas sogasa'ajig rten gyi khams rgya cho 'byam klas pa la la ni nom bu rin po che dra la'i rgya chos rab rgya gnas saso 'jig brten gyi khams rgya mo d+harnam pa la la ma 'od gzer kyi rgya mtsho long cu bya dang pa'i rnams
91b4(1): rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi zas rgya mtsho 'bye klas pa la la ni byang chub sos da di nor bu'i cod pan can sna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho 'phyaklas pa la la ni seMs can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya
91b5(1): drab tu gnas yog 'jig rten gyi khams rgya cho 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po sa rab tu gnas so/  pa de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya cho 'byam klas pa'i gnas yin n+ya
91b6(1): \u0f7fsnyan pa ni 'jig gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// 'jig rten gyi khas rgya che thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan/ dag tu 'dug pa ga stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khabs rgya mtsho 'byam klas
91b7(1): pa la kha ni ri rab kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rte gyi khas rgya mtsho 'byam klos pa la la ni chu klung kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dbyam klas pa la yatI 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
91b8(1): klas pa ya ya ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'khor lo'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni dmyigs mangs ris kyi myig lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi
91b9(1): khams 'bya ba klas pa la la ni shing gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa rtsegs pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ya la ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig
91b10(1): rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni phyogs 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ya a ni pad ma'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi
92a1(1): las byas thas pas la ni nyagacas kyi dbyingasas so/ ngag rkyed kyi mas byas thasas sa pani sems can gyisasakyi kyi sa na gyi la babyas las pas 'an smi kyi kyi su
92a2(1): tes kyi zhes pa byab mas pa la a ni sangs rgyas kyi macan gyi dbyings lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi las 'byab gras la la la ni 'od kyi dkyis tsham gyi dbyings ga zu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brgyam thams pa'in ra na tshogs dbye ba'i gyis das
92a3(1): 'o 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba klas pa sa la ni dbyigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu ste// kye rgyas pa'i sras dag de dag pa sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs rno bar bye ba shin tu snyand pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams
92a4(1): kyi rgyal shinang tu bra ba snyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag ni lhun gzhan dang gzhan du snyan pa s+ho/ 'jig badzin gyi khams kyi tshul la ya ni phyogs thams cad kyi nor bu'i sprid kyi
92a5(1): spun no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la sa ni 'od kyi spyan can no// 'dzigarten gyi khas kyi tshul la la ni rin po che dang spos 'od phro ba rnamasacad kyi lhun cad no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni ring po che
92a6(1): thams cad kyi skye to/ la spong las sbubs pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs rten gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul yis ni sangs rgyas kyi 'a'od kyi snang
92a7(1): can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la ni rin po che'i 'od kyi tshul lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi 'o/ dog gi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha dog pa la ni ring po chethas cad kyi kha dog gi stan
92a8(1): can no// 'dzin rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya tshe yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhan can no// 'jig rten gi khams kyi tshul la ya ni sems can thams cad kyi las rgya ro yang dag par 'byung ba'i rna
92a9(1): 'i sbun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chus la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spong ba'i dkyis khom yongs su dag pa'i sku'i lhur can no// 'dzin rten gyi khams kyi tshul la ya ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smod lam rgya tsho
92a10(1): spu'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi thabs kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la yani zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sA'i lhun can no// 
92b1(1): 'jig cen gyi khams kyi chulas la ni sangs rgyas kun kyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha' dang dpung byed pa'i kun pan no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprub pa'i kho lo'i sna'i kun can no// 'jig rten ni mas
92b2(1): kyi chus sa la ni les pan bams par gyi dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra'i sun can no// 'dig rten gyi 'ams kyi tshul pa 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'on tu tucha las su dad pa'i sgo'i bu pan no// kye rgyal ba'i sras deg de dag pa yogs pa
92b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam zas pa'i tshus kyi lus ni/ 'jig rten gyi khas rgya cho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dazang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khangs kyi rgyud 'byas gus pa'i chus kyi lug
92b4(1): sa pa donang pagi ldan pa'i nyid gsas pang dra ba'i phyir sas rgyas kyi byed kyi bas kyis byes bca nas pa smra te/ de ya pa 'di k+Sha ko/  rjing rgyu yi ca ga zug / 
92b5(1): 'gyed snying po can ka/ nor bu dang ma rgya mtsho kun la gnas la ya gapa'aganyi rang rgya cho dag lnga gnas ka/  rnam par sna tshogs tshul gi gzhi gnas shi ba yang dbyings kyi bsna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang ya / ri rab grong khyer ging
92b6(1): dkyil 'or dang / zhidi rgyud khams cad pa la phyogs kun sta ga la 'a'od lus me tog snying lo can// nor bus byas la kun nas snying dang tras sa'i rgyud las mra tig 'od zer lus// no bu'i gzhi gnas su
92b7(1): kyang myi shigs sral/ khyab kyis la la kha dog sna tshogs sas 'od 'dra 'ad phro mar mye'i srin gyi mdog/ la la'i rgyud ni sA dang skad kyi lus// de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mapa' yas 'byung // la la'i rgyud ni bsod nams
92b8(1): sgra'i lus / pyod pa rnam 'grus sprin kyi sgra'i lus ka/ a la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi swA// ya la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yod tan sA// zheng gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho las ma 'ayas la// kun nas kyi bang du ma'i sgonas 'jug
92b9(1): rna ba 'phrus yangs pa myi zad rgyud kyi rnams// tshad byed kun gyis phyogs bkras rnam par dgengs na// phyogs rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'dra 'gyur da te// sangs pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyud zhugs pa// phyog brgya kun tu 'dul
92b10(1): snang ba yang ka 'gro ba byed cing 'jug pa yod pa myin// tshus gcig gis ni rgyud rnams kun kyang dgengs// thams cad ma lus re re rab tu 'dra// de la ba dang gang yang myi dmyigs te// gzhi phyed kur dgengs yab sa dpung sar byed/ 
93a1(1): ljin pas nas par bye can sa gas pa mas rgyas kyi na byed pa'i rjes sa ste/  sa kyi / de ba na mos kyis kyiso yang sa rgyas kyi ni do byed
93a2(1): shin tu thub byed kyi nang na thos ru'i rgya tshe dbus pa ni the ba med du 'ong nyi la dod gser mtha' mas pa zhes byab ste/ de'i ni nas nod bu'i /  byang chub 'ims dpa lags par kyi phras rab lar gyis pa 'du
93a3(1): rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dzin rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du byed pa'i chul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khod kyis spor dang / dmyigs pa thams cad kyi rgyud kyis rgyan pa'i kun can rab tu gnas te/ de dag pas babs cad kyi sa khrung 'di
93a4(1): gser rnam par snang ba zhes bya'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de ni rdo rje ngas cad kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi 'khor lo a mtshams non bu rin po che'i the la mang pos rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i khor thams cad dang / rin po che'i me tog gi rgyad tham sapar kyi
93a5(1): rab tu yog par gyu dad pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rgyul shin tu bra la snyed kyi 'khor kyis spong pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas sa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste/ der bani gnanas pa
93a6(1): chub ni sam dag cing / dri ma byed pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyis zas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu bre ba snyed/ 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs kyis pad pa dpal gyi rgyud ces khyab tha bas / 
93a7(1): kyi 'tshams can rin po che'i pad ma dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyis mtshams can rin po che'i pad ma shin tu a pa sa la rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi
93b1(1): rog su'i bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas mag pa/ kun nas nyon mongs ging rnam yar dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdus shin tu sra pa byed kyi khyod kyis don pa yod de de na bzhi gzhan pa nas
93b2(1): 'od gzer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shi nad tu phra la snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khas rin po che thams cad kyi rgyad kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung kyi dkyil
93b3(1): lal gyis mtshams can gzhin po che'i me tog gi le pa sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor ma gzi rjid bzang po'i nyi ma'i sprin kyis kun nas yog pa/ yan lag rgyad du ram sa pa'i dbyings cad 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas
93b4(1): kyi zhing gsu kyi rdul gin tu thal snyed kyi 'khor kyis slob pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de/ de na bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma skyed pa'i ye shes kyi dpal gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// ro'i phreng 'jigarten gyi khams sa sa
93b5(1): ba ga rin pa che pad ma'i dbyings ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i 'od gzer dang / rin po che ga 'ang ba ma pa lams par snang ba'i 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mo'i / srin kyis kun nas log pa gagacig tu ras pa 'jig rten gyi lam sang rgyan
93b6(1): kyi shing 'azhi 'i drus gin tu ma pa snyed kyi 'khor byas sgom pa yod de/ den de yin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od gzeng stoms dang brtson 'grus sag la mas pa yang reg par byung ba zhes bya ba bathugs mo/  de'i ster 'jinag rten gyi las sangs rgyas kyi
93b7(1): l+r-ing gi chul byed pa shis sul ba nyid 'das pa na 'jig kyi khams yong shin tu bye di ma chog sas ma'i 'a'ab mo zhes bya ba zhin po che bams par dris su'i dra ba'i rgyadan kyis mamams cad/  da da ma kyi rgyan 'ams par
93b8(1): ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo'i mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas// phyogs thams cad gA du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs su sgrog las/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rno yar dag pa'i jig rten gyi khas/ 
93b9(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi khor gyis skor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od gzer rga ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i sdeng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi
94a1(1): shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams brtse ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya la 'jig rten gi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor ba rnam pa dag cing kun nas/ 
94a2(1): nyon mongs pa rin tho ga 'a'i rgyal mchan gyis ma thams cad / rdo rje'i khyim gzhal byed rgya mtsho sa rab tu gnas pa kun mas su ma mo'i dbyibs su 'dug pa 'khor lo na bu byug gi phra ba'i spe kyis ca nas ga pa do
94a3(1): den de la 'i gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpas zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i seng 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi 'argyal shin tu zab snyed 'das pa na 'jig pa rten gyi thams kyi 'a gzer bangon
94a4(1): gisas rgyas pa'i dgyis khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyab kyi zhing brgyan gyi rdul gin kyi ma ba snyed kyi 'khod kyis skod la cig tu sa ma 'ab ba rtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa me hon pa la sna rogs kyi na
94a5(1): sa 'amams can/ rin pa sems byed kyi 'od gses dang rin pa chod kha dog rgyu mtshol nag tugs pa/ mdon thams ca dkyigs/ nye dang mu tig dang / shegs pa zad dam mnapa mad/ den paci na/ 
94a6(1): gshegs pa dga' la rgya mtsho'i grags dang / yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od gzer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i skyed 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdus gin tu brab snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi kham sa yang dgalar/ 
94a7(1): byung ba'i gzi rjid ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khasras sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi khod kyis skor pa kun nas/ nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa nor bu'i rgyas po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyi sa 'jams
94a8(1): can ga rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad ma la 'dug cing nam mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas la myig phral gyi dbyibs lha yur 'dug 'od kyi me tog dra ba'i sprin gyi kha dog mtha' yas pa kun nas sog pa yod de gde ni de bzhin
94a9(1): gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen po ye ges rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshang zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sI radabyangs rab tu sgrog pa
94a10(1): zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khaMs sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba ni sar dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che yi bzhin gyi rgyal pa'i 'khor lo'i shing gi rgyan gyis mtshams cad gnor bu
94b1(1): pa yang de/ des bu zhin gshegs pa sa can gyiga'i rji mug skyes pa'i yus zhes bya ba bstan pa ga das ze 'jig rten kyi mas sangs rgyas kyi nyi gi nga shid tu zla ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rted gyi na'i'i rgya pa gyi
94b2(1): bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyi nakyis 'khor gyis skor pa gcig tu dag pa rgyan mtha' yas pa dang mu tig gi 'bru rab tu byang ba dang / rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgyad kyis mchab
94b3(1): ban ga rin po che'i seng ge 'i la ni'i rgyad dang mu tig gi phreng ba dngag rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa kun nas thus pa'i dbyisas su 'dug pa la spos dang nor bu dang me tog sa tshogs kyi ri 'am
94b4(1): ring gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kyis mtshams 'dog rnam par sna ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khaMs swas/ rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi tshul shis tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor kyis skor pa
94b5(1): kun nas nyon mongs shing rnaM pa dag pa rdo rje ltar phyi dbyigs shing sra ba'i rkyen kyis mtshams can me log sna tshogs rnam la mang po na rgya mtshol la rab tu gnas pas pra baM kham pa'i dbyims ltar 'dug pa/ lga rdzas rin po rjem
94b6(1): bA res kun nas 'alog pa yod de/ de sa de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid ched myed pa zhes bya ba zhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul shin tu zla ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
94b7(1): rten gyi khams snang ba'i 'dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis sgos pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgya kun nas snang ba'i sa
94b8(1): tshams canag spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho byed tog grong can gyi gang chen mtshos rab tu gnas pa me tog ma khyil pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
95a1(1): den bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snas mdzad 'di bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ma snyen 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam
95a2(1): rdul byed pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi kham sangs rgyas kyi da zhing bcu'i gzhi'i rdul gin tu phra ba snyed kyis spo la/ rnam khas dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis ma
95a3(1): can ka rin po che'i gos sna tshogs rgya tsho yang rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'jug pa rdo rje'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pA yod de/ de ma de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu
95a4(1): gas pa'i dpas zhes byas gzugs ro'i sbed 'jig rten gyi las sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nu gi na skyed 'das pa na 'di khyen kyi 'a sa than tshigs yid du ma sa mar thegs thab/ 'jig rte // 
95a5(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed khor kyis skor ba/ gcig tu dag pa rgyan mang po thams cad kyi bla re'i sa mtshams can mye tog gi dra ba rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la ral gnas pa/ dbyings dpas kyi bye'u skar
95a6(1): 'dug pa ga nor bu'i shing dang spos rgya'i dzin rgya mchos kun nas mog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la grug pa myed las kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi
95a7(1): shing gi tshul kI tu tha la snyed 'das pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'o bro snang ba dri ma byed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi thams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi zhus shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor kyis skor la nyon mongs ging rnam paca/ 
95a8(1): ba nor bu'i rgyal po rin po cho myi zad pa 'gyod pa'i sa mtshams can spos dang 'od phro ba sna tshogs can gyi pad medade rgya mtsho'i can la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs lus sbal gyi mgor ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu 'i 'od kyi dkyil
95b1(1): khor rnab par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i can drin gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yo/ tan dri ma myed pa'i spyan zhes bya la bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khaMs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
95b2(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa ma 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khes sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu rdzun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khon kyis skor ba rna
95b3(1): par dag cing kun nas nyo mongs pa'i dbyibs seMs can thas cad kyi lus ltar 'dug pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgyan gyis sa mtshams can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi snying po 'byung ba'i mtsho la rab tu gnas pa dbyings yan lag brgyang du 'dug pa
95b4(1): 'khor yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang me tog shing gyi drabs kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa myed pa'i ye shes phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi
95b5(1): khas sangs rgyas kyi ring gi rtul shin tu za ba snyed 'das lam 'dzin nyid gyi khams rdus dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig kyi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing maco brgyad kyi dul ki bya za ba snyed kyi mtha kyis blom pa / gcig tu dag brgyad kyin ca
95b6(1): sa ca kyis ma thams cad/ me chog gi seng gosa'i rgya chos sa su gnas par byings su migags zhi sa skyes pa sru na pa/  su rgyas pa nan po semam cad kyi slob cag kya kyis
95b7(1): gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de me de bzhin gshegs pa dpal tshad myed pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i snyed 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa nag 'jig
95b8(1): rten gyi las phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu cu'i rdul gis tra phra ba snyed kyi 'khor kyis skor ba kun nas nyon mongs shing rje bar dag pa no bu'i rin po cho'i sprin gyi thang pa rab tu
95b9(1): 'gyed pa'i sa mches can ka spos dang 'od phro la kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ri rab rgya mtsho la la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs nor bu'i ze ba 'khyil pa ltar 'dug pa// nor bu'i rgyal po dbang po 'od kyi dkyil khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas
95b10(1): pa rab tu 'bang ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog la yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa/ chos kyi dbyibs dang nam mkha' kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shin tu
96a1(1): khyer bam la na jig na kyi khams nan chug pas dpas ya dag par 'byu she sa ca rgyas kyi da 'i sa byed kyir kyis nas tu
96a2(1): ngan pa 'i kyi thanas par snang ba'im mamams cad bgyi na'i dbang po las cad smrar / pa/  pa'i rgyan pa rgya mdze larabatug sa pa// rgyan gyirnapa cwas sa sa ca das / rdo rdo ma sa kyi
96a3(1): gnas pag pa nang su'i smin pa'i 'acu na pas kun nam pags med de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa can pasod nachos kyi nyid kyis shin tu 'gas pa'i gzhi dzid ces kyag bsugs so//  na gyi las rgyang bye du
96a4(1): pa gzhan dang gzhan gis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can// gzhang dang / gzhan gyis rgyas pa sa dgengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan tu yongs na ba gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam par la 'dres pa rnam sam byas pa dang / byin gyi rdza
96a5(1): gzhan dang gzhan gan sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod cu myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra gaspyod kyis kun nas yongs su sgo sa ste/ 'di snyam 'dzig rten gyi khas kun nas rlom sa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i dus gi dang rtsam sa byad kyis sud nas rnaman/ 
96a6(1): 'jig rten gyi khas chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shinas tu pra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su spong ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skor ya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas khyil pa sangs rgyas
96a7(1): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu dra ba snyed dang // 'jig rten gyi khams khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gi khas dkyil khom sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tshul shin tu bral snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi mas kyi zhing ya
96a8(1): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i chug gin tu za ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyis kho masangs rgyas kyi zhing bu'i rdus shin tu pra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul gin mas snyed dang / 'jig nyid gyi pha
96a9(1): phung lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rgyal shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khas phyogs 'byam zas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shis tu phra ba snyed dang / 
96b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra la snyed dang / 'jig rter byis las khyad khyad sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i chul shin tu phra ba snyed
96b2(1): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'bya ba klas pa sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang / lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyi bas snyan
96b3(1): brdun san sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i chu shin tu ra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi kham sa med kyi dkyis thon gangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i dus shin rna la snyed dang / 'dig rten gyi khams smi sangs rgyas kyi zhing lacu'i dus gis par rnyed
96b4(1): dras sa rgyas kyi se pacwa'i rgyu shin pa byed da sa[] mas pa
97a1(1): de bams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khyams kyi rgyan kyis rgyad pa'i rgyal nalan ces bya ba ga sangs rgyas kyi 'ong gi rgyus shin tu za ba skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khas kyi thod kyis stod la gcig tu dag parin po chemam kyi
97a2(1): gang chen chol rab tu gnasa'akhor kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ pad pa'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i sprin kyis kun nas yog pa yod de bde na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rdo ba bsnang ba'i mdod klu'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i ste 'dzi/ 
97a3(1): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor kyis skor ba// rin po che khams
97a4(1): cad kyi the tog gi zhe ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas paka dbyibs kun nas dkyil gakhor du 'dug pang / mu tig grong khye dpal kyi dpas seng ge'i khri smin kyis kun nas yog la yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi rgyam tsho mtha' 'a
97a5(1): ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs/ rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul gin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi kham/  sprul pa'i spos zhis po dpal gyi dkyil khon ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi/ 
97a6(1): mang rgyas kyi zhing gsum gi chu gis byam pa snyed kyi co kyis rnas na ga dag cing kun nas nyan mangs pazhin po che masapa kyi rgyan dang /  na byam thams sa pa de na'i dkyis gas phyid/ 
97a7(1): rna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin kyis kun nas yog pa yod de / de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mcha nyid spru 'ad pa myed par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig she gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu ma
97a8(1): babyed 'das pa 'jig rten gyi khabs gzhi'i 'dog dang yin du 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gi khams sangs kyi zhing gan rdul gin tu za bsnyed kyi sa 'od kyis stod pa gcig tu dag pa yos phyi'i kha dog mapa' yas pa rin pa che nyi dzi dang ldan pa/ 
97a9(1): 'tshum cho mnas rgyagadas pag dkyis no bu bam mo lar ga pa/ su cig nyi pa'i rgyas kunas snang ba'i yod kyi 'ang ba shegs pa'i sprin kyi gnanas sogs 'di ni / den de bzhin shes pa pa segs par 'byung ba nam pa
97a10(1): rad gargya sa sro ga de'i byed 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi shib kyi rdul gan tu bre ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dgen pa'i las kyis byung ba zhes bya 'jig nyen gyi 'bas sangs rgyab kyi zhing lnga'i dus za ba nyid rkyen
97b1(1): zhor kyis spor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs ging rnam yar dag pa spos dang rdo rje'i sos rab tu gnas pa/ pad ma'i dbyibs sbyar 'dug la 'od / kher rtswab dang bral ba dang spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshen
97b2(1): ba chos kyi shugs kyis dgyes pa myi zad pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi' rjid kyi dkyis la ro
97b3(1): bya 'jig nyen gyi khabs sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtag gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lakhod kyis thom pa/ rnam par dag cing kun nyon mongs pa rin po che thams cad kyi nyan par sbubs pa'i rgya 'tsho sa la rab tu gnas pa gzungagasu kyi
97b4(1): dbyangs sung 'dun pa// 'jig rten gyi khams rin za che'i cod bar gyi 'od dang 'od gzer gis kun nas yog pa yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa dri ma byed pa ma tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i sdeng 'jig rten gyi
97b5(1): yang ba'i rgyas thams cad rgya chos rab tu gnas sor bla 'khas pa'i dbyig sung 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi skye gon gyi dkyil khor gyi rjis kyis kun da yod pa yod de/ des de bzhin gshegs pa byan rnam pa dag
97b6(1): me chog gi dpa' zhes bya la gzhugs so// de'i lce 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul gi nang tu yang snyed 'das lan 'dag 'jig rten kyi ya 'od khro ba'i dbyings dri ma myed pas yang dag par lags pa zhes bya ba ba'i
97b7(1): rkyen gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ni brgyad kyi rdul shin tu zla bsnyed mo kyis skong pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shi rnam pa sa dag pa rin ze rgyan 'od mang po skya ma hol la rab tu gdas pa / rin po me rims kyis gno ba da shA 'i dbyisas
97b8(1): 'gyur 'dug pag rtag tu spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i lus sna tshogs kyi snyid kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa slob pa la yub la byed pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten ni khams sangs
97b9(1): rnam kyis shi she sa rab nyid bdas pan 'dig nyin gyi khams ma pa'i 'ad mi dgang ba zhes bya 'dzi kyi las paras rgyal kyi zhing rgya'i du gin tum pasnyed kyi 'or kyis nong pa/ rnam ga dag mi bu das can mos / 
98a1(1): zan pa che la nas kyi rgyas sacas kyi rgyam po sam gan pa/ rgas la myis das sna ga pa/ skye tog pams cad kyi rgyad kyi ma de'i sbyin kyis ku nas sogs pa/ den de bzhin gshen
98a2(1): mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhus so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das la na 'jig rten gyi khas dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
98a3(1): sa rgya'i chul gis kyi phral snyed kyi 'khor gyis zlos pa ga/ gcig tu dag pa rin po sna tshogs kyi chu'i rgya chol rab tu gnas pa/ myig phrul gyi dbyibs snyar 'dug pa / sa'i snyam thams cad kyi sgra dang nor bu'i rgyal pos gdugs kyi sprin gyis kun na/ 
98a4(1): sog pa yong reg lem de bzhi gshegs pa gse shin tu 'bar ba'i ri rab sas me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gi khrus sangs rgyas kyi zhi ra gri rdul gis tu phra ba snyed 'das par 'jig rten gyi kham pa mi po che 'dod
98a5(1): rgyan pa zhes bya bag 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsrung gcin/ gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor ba sgom pa/ kun nas nyon mongasashing rnam par dag pa rgya byin gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta 'jug pa/ nor nun/ 
98a6(1): rgyal po s+ya mtsho sa rab tu gnas pa nyi ma sprul pa'i me kog gi rgyal tshan gyi smin gyis kun nas yos la yod de// de ma bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpas shin tu 'phags pas chos kyi dbyings su rab tu spang ba zhes bya ba 'juH/ 
98a7(1): so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcil gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ste/ 
98a8(1): kyi 'khor gyis skor bag rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa na dzin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kha rab tu gnas pa mkhar gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ snying po byang chub kyi me tog rin po che shin tu rgyas pa'i sprid kyis kun nas yog/ 
98a9(1): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sgron ma kun ras snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khabs rnam par sna ba ba'i 'od zer
98a10(1): khor lo zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi ras sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcung gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis gcig tu dag pa rin po che'i gos kyi klong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me hog ki T+Te kA la khyim pa'i das sngar chug pa/ nor bu'i rgyam po 'ang/ 
98b1(1): ki tha byed 'a da/  na kyi'amatsham pa sa sgyus pa'i pa kyag yi kyi la nga rgyad kyi 'i gyu yo kyis nangs pa ma
98b2(1): 'i rgyalatsho la ba rgyags da 'byis kyang rgya pa ma ma kya 'di tham sun po 'byung ba'i bu'i rgya pa ma rnya kyi zungs yog pa 'a de/ de de ban gshegs pa 'aspyod pas kyi grang sa bya shi gas kya thas
98b3(1): byis spong sa rlab pa dag cing kun nam nyang mapa la rdo rje'i pa brgya tsho dranas su gams pa/ rnam yin gyisus kyi dbying ga bajus pa sa byang rgya ba she dpa'i dus kyi phyig par bya ni rin po tsho'i tshad ba ma 'i su / bam
98b4(1): gyis kun nas yog pa yod de ga de na de bzhin gshegs pa myong ba'i stobs bdud mi'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so de'i steng 'jig rten gyi 'ams sas rgyas kyi zhing gi rtsub shin tu za ba snyed 'das par 'dzin rten gyi 'tha' car dang
98b5(1): mchog lhur yid du 'ong ba'i tha las rgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rter gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drugag gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khod kyis skos pa gcig tu /  pa/ rdo rje ltar khregs pa'i can dang ri po che'i rgya chos rab tu 'das pa yang
98b6(1): rgyang cu rnal yar bkod pa'i dbying sa ltar 'dug par mu tig gi me tog yang po gan rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyas za dz+nyAn gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa com dab gzugs su rjud pasashin tu'abags pa'i dbus byin
98b7(1): yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul shis tu phra ba snyed 'das na 'jig rten gyi 'gas gzhi dri ma skyed cing kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten 'ams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu kun
98b8(1): gyikyi chus shin tu bsnyed kyi 'khom kyis slob ba kun nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa// rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya chol rab tu gnas pa spos chu'i klong gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa dri zhim po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'char gyi ljid kyis kun nas / 
99a1(1): gsong de na de de pa'i gshegs pa sa kun tu gsapa pa'i dpung ba nam mang na pa snang ba mes bya sugs so// de'i skye 'jig med gyi sa rgyas kyi ngag du gas rgyam gnyis rna la 'dzi kyi
99a2(1): gi mdog bzang po rab tu rgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor pa gnas par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa mye tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa garang rgyam phra/ 
99a3(1): ba'i klong gi dbyibs su 'dug pa sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po sprid kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu zhal stond pas shin tu 'phags pa 'od ces bya ba gzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi lam dang / 
99a4(1): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tshan kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i dpal gyi dbyangs shes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams dasangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor ba rnam par dag
99a5(1): cing kun nas nyon mongs pa gser gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa ka seng ge'i khri pad ma kha dog sna tshon snying po po can smid kun nas yog pa yod degade na de bzhi ma gshegs yon tad su phyed
99a6(1): me pa rnam par snang las grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba gzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig 'arten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi spro ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi zhing nyi gu'i nus/ bya
99a7(1): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor ba/ gcig tu dag pa rin po che'i gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis myi khyab pa rna
99a8(1): par snang ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprid kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'od zer gyi smon ma/ mam kha kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de dang 'das chags su lho phyogs sogs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bad
99a9(1): 'azung ba nis byas nga da/  de sa 'jig rten gyi 'bas kyi drung ba dang rgyas kyi rgyas mchad kyi thug nas pa bres pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bams cad tu yon car rgya mtshol gA'i gyu ma na rab tu garnam tho de bams par byasas 'jig rtes kyi 'ams cagan
99a10(1): mas snang sa zhes bya ba 'jig rter gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nu gis tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jo gyis stong ba gcig tu dag pa nor du'i rgya zag cag sna ba rgya bcos rab tu gnas tha/ nor du'i gyi khor rin po che dam pa pa'a' las bya
99a11(1): sems dpa'i lus sprul pa'i hId kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba bad ma snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul shin da tu pA ba snyed 'das pa na
99b1(1): 'angs pa khams rkyed byapa nang po masasad kyi la gas pa sa zhes bya 'ad/ de dgashe kyi kyis kyi rgyun 'a byas kyi seM bya gas so// do pas
