116b4(1): shing gi drun ya bye ba yis pa/ zhing rnams sa la rdza yalas 'khris// rgyan dang dral rnams pa dad par//  tshogs kyig yo lta bur snang // rjod du byed pa'i zhing gi rnamasapa/ rkyen cig sa yang rab tu snang ka/ 'od ni gzhan dang gzha bye ba/ yangs rgya spod/ 
116b5(1): oM khaM yu las 'byung smon lam rgya rgya mtsho rnam ma bas// zhing rnams a rna bar sbyangs/ de dag rgyan mang thams cad du'o// zhir gyi rgya cho shin tu snang // kun tu bzang po'i smon sam gyis// zhing rnams yongasu gang sbyangs pa// de dag kun la dus gsum gyi lnga zhing gi 13
116b6(1): zhing gcig nang na thams cad snang // myig sor bzhin du spros pa yin/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rnam bral zhing rnams gang yod pa/ shing gyi rgyud ni 'di la snang // kun kyang nang na song bar gnas// ling gi tshul kyi
116b7(1): mo g+ha / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam phul pa// shor bar de dag kun na snang / myig yor mtshan nyid myed pa'o// la sa rgya mtsho'i dbyings su 'dug/ zhing rgya mang po de dag ltos// ri ma pa ri'i dbyibs 'dra dang // 'jig rten khams ni bsam skye Sh+ya
116b8(1): ling rabs sa sa rnam par bris phyin yo la dbyings su gnas pa ye// sna tshogs shing gi dbyibs gangasug/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun tu khyab ka 'di rnamam nor bu'i 'khom sa dbyibs// sa sa lang ma 'i dbyibs su gnas pa/ yan lan d+ha la sna chos
116b9(1): pang gA sna tshogs la don dri za byed ka kha la khro la byims su ru/ grwa'i dbyings dang khyad khyed de/ sa sa grong khyer dbyibs su 'dug pa/ tshangs pa'i lus su rab tu gnas// lha'i dbang po'i gzus phrad dbyings// zla ba khas skar la la gnas
117a1(1): spangs te ma rangangs ldag sa dbyings su sul/ 'jig rten sa la dkyis 'khon te/ ma'od u kyi thug dbyims na/ las myig gi tshul yang 'dra/ sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyib gsu/ an na rdo rje dbyings su 'jun/ 
117a2(1): dbyings kyang 'drag byang chub sems rabs kung tu gapa/ zhing rnams la la seng ge'i dbyings / nong bu'i go char mngod sbungs dang / gzugs dang byings ni du ma phye/ gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gams/ dang gi rgyang rig gi
117a3(1): ngas zhing gi dbyibs rnams kyi bad pa// rab tu gnas pa'i byin rlabs dang / sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis 'byung // zhing rnams la la skal pa tsam/ rasra rnas pa bcu pa ste ka zhing rnams sa la dus banyam pa'i/ skam pa bye bar rjo
117a4(1): ba yin pa pa nga skal pa cig la yang ga zhing rnams dam pa 'o// 'byung ba snang /  tshad myed grangs kyang myed pa'i ka 'jig pa de bzhin bsas kyi khyab / zhib rnams la la sangs rgyas byed ka/ 'di rlabs pas sangs rgyas bcas
117a5(1): la ya'i zhing na sangs rgyas gcig ya la sangs rgyas mang po'o// sangs/ rgyas byed pa'i zhidi rnams dang // 'ji rten gyi khams su yang sangs rgyas smra ya la shegs mdzad cing // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston pa/ 'pho dang 'byud
117a6(1): dang sku tshe dang ka byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya dang // bdud kyi sde dang 'dus pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo skar ba ston// sems ca bas pa ji bzhin du ka/ gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston // chos kyi 'khor lo rab sko la// 'jig rten kun ma
117a7(1): tha myi dang ka sangs rgyas zhing rnams re reras pa// rgyal ba gcig ni skyes gyurd te// lo grangs bye ba phrag stong du// chos kyi dam la rab tu stonang // sems cad snod du ma gyur da la// sangs rgyas ston pa myi dang de// sangs rgyas bems dang ldan pa ni// 
117a8(1): de nyid cig kyang kun tu mthong // sangs rgyas mang po ni zhing gi rnams/ zhing rnas de re dag tu yang sangs rgyas bye ba yasam gyi khyab// rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye// rgyal la so so de dag na// sprul pa mang po rab 'byed cing ke/  chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa na
117a9(1): nas kA sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/ shing rnams la/ 'od myed de// mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che// / reg na sdug sA la spu gri 'dra/ wA naM myi mazad spyi yang g.ya'// zhing rnams la la lha 'od can/ sa sa khyim gyi 'od can te // a
117a10(1): nyi zla'i 'od dang ldan/ zhing gi dra ba bsam myi khyab Sh+tsa/ zhing rnams la la rang kyi 'od// zhing gi 'od can dri ma myed // gang tu stug snga la/ myi mthong ba/ rdo dag sems can dge les 'gyur // sa la ri'i 'od can te// zhing rnams la ye nor bu'i 'od/ 
117b1(1): la ya bye'i 'od can te// sems can rnams kyi las kyis byung // zhing rnams a la sangs rgyas 'od// byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang // zhing rnams la lang yad ma'i 'od sa/ 'od zla shod can rab tu badzes ka/ shing rnams pa sa me tod 'od
117b2(1): spos kyi 'od dang ldan pa gang yod// spos dang rtug pa'i 'od phro can// smon lam dbang gyis rnam par dasbyangs// zhing rnams la la sprin 'od can// nor bu'i go cha 'od kyis sal / b+h+yok+Shasangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis snang // yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sbyangs ldan
117b3(1): yin cen nod pad 'od dang ldan ka/ rdo rje'i gser gi 'od kyis sdang / yongs su dag 'di sgra dbyings can pa/ de dag ni ni sug sngal byed pa/ thams cad rgyan gyi 'od cang dang // zhing rnams la la dor bu'i 'od// sa la snying po byang chub 'od// 'khom rnam su ku dang hU~M
117b4(1): spang ka 'das rgyas sprub pa'i sdang ba can pa/ sangs rgyas yin gyis mngon gam yog/ kun tu 'od kyis rab tu steng // chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ 'od rnams la sa 'jigs sA tsaru// myi bar 'jigs pa'i nga ro cad// rtsub cing rung ba'i
117b5(1): rnams rang ka yid myong 'jigs pa chen ze bzlogaka/ dmyal bar myog/ song gaste nga kunas dang // ngag shin rje'i sug sngas rnams su mya red brgya mtsho'i zhing gi rnams / nyon 'das ldan pa'i grwa yang 'byung / la ya ga de yid 'ong thA ka rga bar byed/ 
117b6(1): stod rje pa 'a dge ba'i sa ma dang 'bram bu babyangs// 'ang gis / dag nga rab tu stog/ rna mas tu byin ska bang dbyung dgra'ang dag gsangs pa'i sgrar dbyangs te// 'jig rten bur kyi dbyangs bu 'ang / sa par
117b7(1): 'jams ma gang gas pa ri kyi shAn 'a cid bya mtshan 'dasasadang / dong bugang 'i gathug pa swA dang / rnam ma gA'i na sa thong gi bla rab dang / sa rgya sa gyi ba dang /  rgyas
117b8(1): mas byung rnas 'ang sa sa s+ho//  n+tus da byed pa rab / rab kyi pa sgrug/ 6 // sa
117b9(1): pas kyi'i zhi das skyes bying bang gas ga sas s+ho// sna bya byas pa thaM TI nang gi byangs mams la sas rgyu nas / shA'i ma tshas kyi dbyin sa/ dedag panas
118a1(1): yul drisu 'byed par phyogs su bya byung ba'i dpung su 'jig gyi lams dpas kyi zhes byar byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi la na rapas kyi grwa zhes bye ba de can pa 'ad bdas mang po rgyu chos rgya / rnam pa dag kyings
118a2(1): ga 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu bra la snyed kyi 'khor kyis spor pa// kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gzhis rgyang bayas pas rgya la/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi gar gyi 'khor yug rgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas rlong pag rin
118a3(1): che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin kyis kun nas 'ayog pa'i rab dang grong khyem dang khang khyim dri ma byed/ cing 'od rnam lam dag par snang bas rgya pa thas dang skom dang gos kyi longs 'aspyod yid kyis bsams pas 'byung brgyad kyi rnam pa rjod pa rjod sa
118a4(1): dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpas kyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus sa//  spos chu'i rgya che'i 'od nam 'badag pa zhes bya ba 'bor de/ de las / tog gi 'i rab me tog gi 'od 'gro ba'i rgyas kyi rgyal mtsham zhes byab rim
118a5(1): po che 'a khri'a'ang bcu 'i 'khor gyis skor bcing brgyas pa zhig byung ste/ ri ba de'i steng na nags chen po yal ga yid dkyil 'khor rin po rkye me tog shin tu rgyab pa zhes bya ba spos kyi rgyal mtsham stong phrag dbam tu1
118a6(1): myed pa shin tu sbreng ba'i rgyan can mye tog gi khang pa rtsegs pa dpag tu myed pa 'phreng ba rnam par bres pa/ nor bu'i 'khang pa myigs pa rnam par dkod pa'i rin po rdo'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu myed pas kun nas rgyan pa rin po che'i me tog pun d+ha ri ka
118a7(1): dpag tu myed pa'i 'phreng gis kun nas slob pa/ spos dang rin po che pad ma mang po dpag tu byed pa thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa/ rol tho A tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu myed pas kun tu rgyad pa/ sos dang drug pa'i 'od bro ba'i snyir
118a8(1): dpag tu byed pas kun tu snang bar byas pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag brgya sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas skor te/ 'di ltar nags chen po al ka'i dkyil 'khor rin po che me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ de'i shar phyogs logs da grong kyis
118a9(1): chen po 'od phro snang ba zhes bya ba myi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor kyis skor pa/ rin po che 'ba' shig las byas pa chu dang zhed du/ dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis shing thags dang phru ma'i ral
118b1(1): tsun gyi rgyan cing kun pa 'ong pa/ na pa tha sa rgyas kyi rgyas gang // dzinam ldan mtshan mu pa la dang yangs dang kra mu Tha sa zin nu gas nam ya kya thA na gyi na na ga rgyan / 
118b2(1): kyi tshogs 'byin pa bdun gyis kun nas spor pa// rin po che'i rgyan dang khang pa migs pas rab tu rgyan pa/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang / dris bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi phreng pa'i dra ba dang sen dra mi sa 'i dra ba dang rdo rje'i pad ma'i rlalas kun nas mag pa
118b3(1): ri pa tsha gi rgyang ye tog gi dra ba dang rlom mar gA mang yo 'ams cad t+ya sI de zhid tu 'ong bas kun tu khyam pa thos dang byed pa'i rgyud sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa 'od deg ro'i 'dzo kun mad+mo bye ba zhag zhig tu stong bgra bcu yong dri/ rgo da 'amam bya
118b4(1): ring po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste// sgo de dag re ro'i mdum du yang rin po che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis rgyam pa 'dun bdun gyis rkyed pa'o// bza' shing gi rab bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcum kyang kun nas skong pa ste/ bza'
118b5(1): shing gi ra ba de dag thams cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i gong sna tshogs kun ma/  ga po tri khyo kun pa 'byung ba byal sna tshogs thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i lta ra ba byin pa'o// slong khyer chen po 'ang za ba'i sprin ces bya ba de / bying skyes pa
118b6(1): thams cad kyang das kyi rnam par spyod pas rdzu 'phrul 'os pa ste// nam kha las rgyun s+ye dang lha mnyam tu 'apyod pa yid bzhin gyi yul la long spyodazhe bsha stag go// de nas lho phyogs logs pa lha'i grong khyer shing kyi mye ton
118b7(1): sna tshogs shes bya ba yod do// de ram shA tsugs sogs dgu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yad do/ de nas lho phyogs logs ma gnod gyi grong khyer rdo rje 'i dpas sna tshogs kyi rgyal cham zhes bya ba yod do// de nas ldo phyo sa/ 
118b8(1): sogs na dri za'i grong khyer gnas byed khang bzang po zhes bya ba ma da de dang 'dag chags su l+h+wam yin gyi grong khyer lar su mtshan zhes bya ba yang ro// de dang 'ad chags su 'das ma labang zag zong khyer rin gyi sna tshogs pazang ba'i lte ba sa
118b9(1): bya yod do// de dang mdab chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgya bzang po lnga sogs shes bya ba yod de/ de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrab khrig brgya stong bcu'i Shar bram smo pa na blong khyer de dag re re ni yang rgyan mang pocu mas byung / 
118b10(1): rnas / khyod khyer byes 'an khrig rgya byong kyi 'bar byas skor ba'i gam me// dgas mas men po sel gnyi kyis mthod nan ba r+b+ha tog rgyas pa zhes gyu ba 'asu da/ snying po byang rgyam rin pa rgyas mi sto rnam par snang ba 'o/ 
119a1(1): cad kyi 'dog ra 'jug pa'i phre ba mang po rgya chen par sprin sus tums pa/ rim pacan 'di chung du thogs nyid dus zhu de/ 'od kyis ma'or nas pa dag pa'i sna kyis kyang 'atsug zu 'dagan ma mas na
119a2(1): bang snang ba byas pag byang bams cin pacan chogs ma pa sa pa rab pa 'ams cad kyis byas shi tu sabyung / song sa rgyal mobams pa sab byang chum mengs pa'i yu spang tha pa
119a3(1): ma ma rab tu byung ba mdzar/ de'i 'du bya bad ma chen pa me gan ni tham san na bul dkyis thos bya brgyad dag chad bye ba phrag pa rgya 'a la rtsa ba thos dang rin po che dang rdo rje'i rgya chos zug pa/ rgya ma ba

119a5(1): dkyimya la za brjod du byed pa/ bye sa zhig brgya'i 'am mabyas zhosan thogs pazu 'od kyi dkyil lacom rgya chen po ras tu 'byed 'azeg/ thams pa lapa yid du 'ong ba'i 'byung ba mngon par rgya //

119a7(1): kyi thog mar bla na myed pa yang dgang bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi ri bor mi rab kyi dbyangs shes bya ba ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya tsho'i tshul dri ma byed par phyogs kun
119a8(1): tu sAd ma zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so// kye rgyal ba'i us dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der/ lo brgya na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe// nags tshas chen po a la ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i e ton/ 
119a9(1): rgyas pa zhes bya ba der sa brgyan thams cad kyi rgyan kyis rab tu rgyan par gyur te/ 'di ltar nyin po che yin du khro ba'i sprin bsam gyis kyi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying po tsam du gyur da nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil khor gyi sA ya
119a10(1): rab tu 'byin// phyogs rgya dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed// gzhal byed khang dang khang khyim gyi rdzas thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed/ rin po che'i me tog dang 'od kyi dkyil khor gyi sprin kyang rab tu 'byed/ sems
119a11(1): can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rgya ba yangs pa'i sgra dang dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan kyi 'khor lo rab tu gtong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi smon pa ma dang / dpyod pa dang 'byung
119b1(1): mngon par sgrub pa'i sma dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu spags pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhas te/ rgyan de dag 'byung bas 'jig rten gyi la
119b2(1): dede de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po rnams kyis/ khong du chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyam pa'i dge' ba'i rtsa la yongs su sbyin pa dang / sangs rgyas lta bar 'thos pa dang ga snying po byang chub tu mngon pa
119b3(1): gzhol ba de dag thams cad kyang lhas snyun du 'byung bas yang dag par skul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs la yon tan thams cad kyi ri lo ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku cam sangs
119b4(1): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye bar rab tu 'phros pa/ sku snying po/ byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dpung myed pa rnam par dag la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil dkyis
119b5(1): nam pa na ba byas sa ga pangs pa nyis gyum pa sa ses par gnyam pa cigs ju sa ras tu 'byung ba/ 'thob bas pa sa sa tu gnosasas kyai sna sa ma gom pa las pa'i sri kyi bas byed pa'i ye
119b6(1): rten gyi khams bams can gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khod kyi smin gyis khyab yang mad ba/ 'od zer gyi dram kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de pad ma chen da po de la mngon par 'byung bar gyur to// ji skar thos rgya'i rgya mtsho sa par
119b7(1): dag pa'i 'od sa rab tu gnas pa'i ri ba ze tog gi 'ong spobs rgyad pa'i rgyas mtshan gser shInd tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse so la nagasatshal chen po sal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas par sangs
119b8(1): rgyas kyi dan sa bzhugs pa// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams dpas kyi kun tu yang yi ba byol song zag drus bcu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse yo/ bzhugs par snang / 'jig rten gyis khams rgyamatsho kun tu tshus kyi che bkun gyi 'jig rten gyi/

119b10(1): bsapa da kyi'i ngas kyi das kyi sprin gyis// spyod mams kyi mdzod spunas/ 'od ses dge bsam pa khams cad/ yongs su spyod pa zhes snab/ 'od gabed srungs rgyas kyi 'i ni rdul shin tu ma bzhes hU~M 'ib kyis bar
119b11(1): rang grab kyis ni/ 'jig pang kyi na lung sa 'dus lamams cad sa dag 'ang su bcom pa 'dis de pa 'di gshegs pa man ldan thams cad kyi ma'i nga sa kyi kyis 'dig sems
120a1(1): gakyis lag tu 'ang mdam sems sam las su rgya nyan yongs la thams cad kyang rab tu mig 'gyur smimapa pas mas 'a byas pa bya gas ma sa rgya sa rnam mams ca ca'am/ 
120a2(1): bcom sems can thamams cad kyi rnyog pa yang dag par dag/ dge ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung mos pa yangs pa'i kyil 'khor yang yongs su dag kyi khom pa dang ngan song dang ngan 'gro lis ngas dang / 'jigs pa
120a3(1): cad kyang rnam par rgyal lus dang / sems kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi / sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob pas gyur da te/ de dag 'od
120a4(1): gzer des yang dag par smras pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang pa la'as cang 'khor rgya stong ma dag gis shar za / bcom ldan 'das gang ba des 'dod par byanyas mo rtse rgyal ba'i zas dag de la mong khyer tshon pa 'ang las 'od kyis kya ba dang / 
120a5(1): rgyal po sta ma rga ba 'i nang tu myang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba grong khyer bye ba/ khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po 'byung ste/ de la bud myedabasod nams dpal la bgyogs pa stong phrag gsuM brgya rtsa bdun yod do//

120a7(1): ste sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta ste tshul yangs pa'i sprin kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa khong du chud do// 'di lta
120a8(1): 'gro ba bams cad 'dul ba'i rgyad chen khyod du rgyud / 'di la ste smra'i smin kyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po khong du chud / 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgya chen pa zhes byang ba
120a9(1): 'ongs chun do// 'di lta ni rjem thams kyi gyis pa bzhin du rtog sa shes bya ba gakang snyoms chen pa nga chu 'di la ste tshis gyi ga'i rgya chen po rgyam mi mo rnye pa zhis rgya ma ma ma pa gas dzin pa yang gyud // 
120b1(1): 'di thams sa cha mthobs dang sushes na sa 'phes par byed pa 'os bya sa rnam 'am kyis kyi na zin pa ngas chung /  yang sa khyed mid kya lags kyi 'odi sa sa dA nanas pa'i gras yin
120b2(1): bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud ngo // de nas rgyal po gzho nu gzi rjingad chen po zhes bya ba de chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la
120b3(1): tshigs su bcad de smras pa// nyi ra bzang po stong gi rnams// mkhal la mngon 'am 'phags pa bzhin // snying po byang chub dri myed la// sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu snang // skal pa bye ba stong sde dag gis// 'gon mo 'jig rten 'byung ba mi
120b4(1): sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa'i rnams// rgyal ba kun na rab tu snang yA/ ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od gzer la// sangs rgyas sprin ni bsam gyi khyab// gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snab// de bzhin gshegs ya mnyam par bzhags// 'od bro smin
120b5(1): rnams rab kyi ba // 'od gzer sprin la zad myi shes// 'jig rten 'di dag snang ba dang byed// sangs rgyas rnam par phrul pa ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las// 'od zer rnams ni dri myed pa// sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus/ 
120b6(1): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas dgeng su bltos// sangs rgyas sung ni yid 'ong/ 'gro ba shun tu rab tu grags // 'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lags/ sangs rgyas yon kamarnam lam 'jod// sangs rgyas 'od kyis thog pa
120b7(1): sems can+da kyang bde bar 'gyur dka/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi 'ag ba kun kyang dga' ba skyes// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnamasarin cen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing // stong pa'i sprin kyis rgyas pa'i drang / 
120b8(1): phyogs bcu kun mngon par 'ong // snying po byang chub 'di la yang // / sgra'i rgya mtsho zab mo grag/ sems can thams cad sdug snga la wI ka/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// kun kyang srid zhu ldan gyurapa te/ dga' zhing shin tu mos
120b9(1): byas shing la chos kyi rgyas po lta ba'i phyir// chos kyi ji ga d+ma gon gyi drung du 'dod// kye skyel ba'i sras dag rgyal bu stso ru ka'i rjid chem thos tshigs su bcad pa 'di rjod pa'i rje/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rabs kyis 'jig rten gyi
120b10(1): rabs kyi pha rnamams cad kyi gnas kum tu shin tu brag sa yar gyurd to// de nas rgyas po spyan dga' bzhin tu gtsang ba la tho gros kyis rigs su bcad 'di dag gams ga 'azon po skyes pa/ bya dzu su TIg+sas
121a1(1): gakun kyang mthun par ldan gcig tu// rgyas 'a yan pa'i phyim deng shig/ slang nas sa thams cad kun tu yang / rke ba'i rjes rnaM A thAgs shig / bu dang chud ma 'thor bcas dang // rgyal bu lta ba'i phyir yang da/ rmed/ 
121a2(1): khyer rnams kyang rgyan par bgyis ka/ rgyan rnams kun kyas kun tu zhes// rgyag mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams / nom bu lnga tshogs rgya pas gleng // rin cen dra ba'i bla re rnams/ na a ma'i dkyil ru bres par gyis// / na kha 'di ma
121a3(1): cad du ga khasil snyan gyin kyi spa dag byang ka/ lam gyi sna yang rgyan par gyis// rin ce ma char kyang kun tu yob// gzhon pa rim ce ni rnyed par phyis// rgyal ba lta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // rang rang po pa'i khor rnams kyis/ sna tshogs sbyin
121a4(1): kyi chal po ba shig // rgyad kyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dgang byar gyis ka/ spos dang par me'i 'od kyi smin// / me tog garba gras rnams bsam yas dang // se so do dang phreng sprin dang // gos kyi sprin gyi
121a5(1): char pho bshig// ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri// nor bu'i 'khor/ los rgyan par gyis// dri myer can dan phye ma'i rnams// nam kha'i/ dkyil ye rab tu ston// nor bu'i 'breng dang me tog 'phreng // rin cen pong
121a6(1): phyir kun 'dzinga'o// de ras rgyal po lhan dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po babod nams dpas la sogs pa bud byed stong phrag gsum bzulas brgyan dang / gzi' rjid chen nol sogs pa ku du cu dang / blo zos kyi spyod
121a7(1): phyogs pa blon po snod drug brgya dang / de dag las stsogs pa'i 'khor bye ba khra ga bIg rgya stong bdun brtsam bdun gyis skor cing mkhyen tu ba rang te/ grong khyer chen po 'od gro bsdang ba nas byung de'i khor dang bcas pa mam pa'i dbyings
121a8(1): mngom par 'phags te/ rgyal ze'i rdzu 'phrus chen po dang rgyal po'i sathu chen pos na ma mkha' bams cad rkyen kyi spring+ge gams cad kyis nas lam rgyan te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de do dmag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhams
121a9(1): sa byate/ zugats+tsha kAcig tu 'a do// zhal thong lde gang rgya ba thog sa tshogs pas snangs / nas zeng pa da ches sa can ca bye shAn TI/ rgya khyod dang ldan gcis sa bcom ldan da
121b1(1): gnod sbyir gyi grong khyer rdo rje 'i dpal rgyal chan zhes bya ba nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi dang na yo dpal bas rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ gnod sbyin bye ba badran pa rtsas bdun dang lhan cig/ dri za'i grong khyer ga' la myed lang bzang po nas kyang ga dri ba
121b2(1): 'irgyal po ltan dga' ba shes bya ba dri za byed pa dgu rtsam bdun dang lhan lha ma yin gyi grod khyer 'khor lo'i tshon nas kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam yar dag pa las sems dpa' zhes bya ba lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag lnga brgya
121b3(1): 'khor kyis skor ba/ nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs zang po'i lte ya nas kyang nam kha lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bye kha nam mkha' lding gyi 'khor nu rtsa rtsa rgu dang lhan cig/ myi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga'
121b4(1): padaga' ba ldan pa nas kyang myo 'am ci'i dbang po rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba myi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco rgyad dang lhan cig/ lto phye chen po'i khrong khyer rin po che sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang lho phye chen po'i dbang po rin po che grags pa'i rgyas
121b5(1): narnatsham zhes bya ba lho phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag gsumadang ldan cig/ tshangs pa'i grong khyerd rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kya tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gis bam ngab byed pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa byed/ 
121b6(1): phrag bco rgyad kyi skor cing mdun tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das yon ba tan thams cad kyi ni/ rings kyi dpal de ba'i gshegs pa gang 'dze dong rnaMs bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas la spyi bo phyag 'ams nas phyog
121b7(1): chub khong do/  de dag la grogs 'gro 'a khyer bye ba khwas khrig rgya song grong khyer gyi 'khom dang bcas pa dag nas sems car gyi rigs pa dang pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po khor dang bcas ke/ bcom ldan 'das la byag 'chal na phyogs gcig tu 'a'od
121b8(1): ngo seMnas bcom ldanas sa re ba'in bshegs pa sod ta pa kying sa kyimams de dag du ba'i dbang # kyi kyi ma sa smra sa rgyam sas pa pa dgapas ma
121b9(1): 'i ma cwa ga yis ca brnyams ya bajig pa bzhi du the pa rnam sa 'ong sa so// der byang chum pos sa ma ma ji ma ba kyi chuba'i da pa mcho ma / 
121b10(1): 'a gshegs yod dang ma tsho gyi rab kyi dpo kyi 'od ba da par spas rangacho rgya ma myos kyi dpa b.rang tuchang ro// 'di dag cang kya gyi sababs ma nyid kyang de 'and kya rno 'iyi' 'as ra ro/ ji dashes
122a1(1): mtsha masacad pa sang das par gas nga chub kyisem pa shes sa tuthob so// 'di sa zhe mos kyi nga kyi byon panas sa snang ba'i nga ba'i rdzun nas ya pan sa na
122a2(1): 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smor lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang la rab tu ze go/ 'di lta ste yon tan chen po rgya mtsho sa yal dang dpung byed pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i spyod
122a3(1): 'a'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ sgo yangam la nas spang sa zab yo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes snang bar bu slob bo// 'di la ste phyir gyi ldog pa'i stob chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang 'acu chen po'i rgya mtsho ba me shes
122a4(1): snang ba rab tu rngon no// 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung myed pa smrabang pas rgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khom la ye shes snang ga rab tu tho rdo/ 'di ga ste yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad myed par rab tu 'jug pas mngon
122a5(1): bya pa'i rgyamatsho ba'i mishes ma'o tso zang ba 'dzig gi hom rkyes lam sacid na mi dbyig ging mos rgyama'i sngo kyi byas dag par smra bas rgya chos 'i ges kyi 'ang b.ras ma
122a6(1): 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings sa la dpung myed pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmyigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon du snyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phyal la rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu tho pa/ 
122a7(1): ngas ste sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang phyi 'jigs pa thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ga'i rjid chen pos de gA zhenas pa yod kan thams cad kyi ri rab kyi dpas kyi 'od rgya mtsho la segs kyi sdang ba rab tu
122a8(1): thob ma sangs rgyas kyi srid kyi rlabs kyis do'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag snang so// rgyal ba'i chos nyid 'di bos nas// bdag gi ye shes snang ba skyes// de rjes ni sangs rgyas sngon yod pa// rjem mo rnams kyang rab tu mthong // sku me ku
122a9(1): 'i ga bu / phun gsum tshogs 'gyur kun kyang 'thong // mtshan gyi nos rnam dbyigs dang // gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa yang shes/ sngan chad sangs rgyas chung dag tu/ rnas pa rgya tshor spyod kyang de/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsham
122a10(1): mchod nas nying kyi brgya mtsho yongs su spangs// sku'i rgya mtshos pa po dag / rgya chen song su kun btang zhing / pyod pa'i dam pa rab 'byed de// rgya mtsho nyid yang shin tu sus/ skar dang gangs sang rgya mtsho dang / bya nas su ra
122b1(1): bzhin te// rgyab srid btsun mo'i 'khor bta ba zhing // zhing gyi rgya mtsho yongs su spangs// zhing rnams so so re re la/ skalang ba mas yas su// byang chub khyod pa rab pyod de/ zhing kyi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs/ kun tu 'bang po smon pas kyi
122b2(1): spyod pa rgya mtsho kun spyod nas/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun d+ha phyu/ nyid kyi rgya mtsho rab tu byangs// ji skar nyi ma 'i 'od snang ngas/ nyi ma'i dkyil khor mthong ba bzhin ga/ sangs rgyal le shes 'od snang bas/ rjod gyi skyong ba nas kyang 'tho
122b3(1): chos kyi dbyings ni kun dgapa ba'i// yid kyi rgya mtsho ngan pa'i rnams// dri byed 'od cer kun kyang mthong / sangs rgya kun gyi byin rnabs kyis/ byang chub khyod pa srung ba // nang gi rgya lachos ma pa'i rdung sa/ de gang bdag gis sbyang na/ 
122b4(1): byas/ kye rgyal ba'i zas ngag de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas ma mdzad chen pos bcom ldan 'das dri bzhing gshegs pa sor tan thams cad kyi ri rab dpal kyi snying de mapyong d+ha dang// snyer bkur ba dang / mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pas po mdzo
122b5(1): mas cad pa sang da par gsol pa'i shes bya ni 'ongs pa sud she ba ni ga tu stor / rgo pa byang chum bams cad 'a 'dod pam / byaba'i rnam pa ma dong /  sa rgya
122b6(1): ye shes gyi rang ba ni shing tu rjong / de la'i ro gshegs pa'i chu 'o kun ma la bar dmyigs shing mthong ba ni rab tu rjod/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'gran rnam pa kyis gyi khyam pa ni shing tu nyon// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par myong ba nga
122b7(1): phung byed pa rgyar rab dod/ byang chub sems dang gyud tu 'ang ba sdod pa dang / 'on par ni mdod par grub pa byed ci / sems can sa kyin k+Shims pa nyid byung byung thu pas skyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi 'ong kyi dra shi tu ra
122b8(1): kyis rab dan papa'i 'os su 'dzid tu zung // de sas de bzhi gshenas pa 'ad tar bal sa myo sams kyi ji tsha pos ni rigs nga/  bya bya nga tu
122b9(1): drog can pa'i ma so na na yod ma ma cing po zas sa te/ slong bakhyod kyi sa tu dong / chom kyi byi pani byed bya chi/ 'dodom pa chen po nyin ldan y-i las kyang bshing chos ma/ 
123a1(1): gsang gi chus nyid du ming rtsig lang stod kyang rtso rna seshes kyi gsu sa khyod kyis 'ayod pa de gar 'gyur / ung 'di kun dpa shes pa'i ni/ bsod 'grus cangs kyi na te/ yod la thos che 'a pa'i rnam chos na
123a2(1): dag par byed ka thams cad rdul 'jug tshul du ka gan pa rgya mtshor du myod pa rgya mtsho'i ring gi rgyan kyi rnams// de la 'di 'dra tu 'gyur ba/ sems can rnas ni re ro'i byir/ skrag pa rgya bacho kyad khyod cing // 'khodar kyang skyel byed pa'i rnams pa de dag
123a3(1): 'jig rten dkon por 'gyur// skab pa phyi ba'i mthar thug pus // rgyal ba'i de re mchod byed kyang ka/ gang gi sems la smyo byed pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i 'gon po kun ka/ khyod kyi smon sapa dbang gis sas ka
123a4(1): rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams na/ khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag/ mtha' dang dpung myed rgya tshol // blo chen gang rnams 'jug dang bu ni// de dag tshul 'di gnas par 'gyur// ngal mchod la byas pas kyang // gzi rjed
123a5(1): chen po sto 'chen gyis ka/ sems can ri rab drub mnyam pa ka byang chub yongs su spyod par byas ka/ byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag/ sun du bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams pa chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing ga ni 'i
123a6(1): rgya 'thodag par byed pa kye rgyal pa'i thas dag de la smrab pa rgya che ba mgasal zhes bya ba de la gab pa yang ba chu byung gab ba'i bye ma byed cig 'byung ste/ de'i me phyi sa kyi sa 'gas pa par sa gnyis thub par 'gyur te/ rgyal sa la/ na
123a7(1): ngag de bzhin gshegs pa yod tan thams cad kyi ri rab dpal gyi sprin de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni yo bye ba bcur gyur dpa to// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas// de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyind pa'i dbyad zung po rgyan kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du/ 
123a8(1): nags chas chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i 'phyan bzang po rgyad kyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par phras pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi dzod chen pos mthong ngo // 
123a9(1): 'khong nas kyang go rgya batsho mapa' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thor tho// ye shes rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos kyi klong gi zugs kyang rab tu thob po/ kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par 'dang ba zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen pa
123a10(1): rab tu thob bo/ dbyigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis rgyas par byed pa'i snying rje chen po yang rab tu thob po/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang byin kyi rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dgal ba chen po yang yi rab tu thob bo// chos kyi rang bzhin
123a11(1): nam pa'i dbyibs rnam par dag pa 'os btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo// rang ba'i 'dri ma byed pa'i chos kyi dbyings yong su dag pa'i phyim shes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa yang rab tu thob tho/ tshag pa la byed pa'i dbyings rnab pa snga
123b1(1): pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo// rab tu khong du chud pas rI ma myed pa'i klong la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba so so yang dag par rig pa yang rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su
123b2(1): ngag dpang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba yang rab tu thob bo// de dag yi phyogs pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu kun nas mnon par gyur da te/ de nas rgyas bu gzhon nu gzi rjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byi nad kyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams can la tshigs
123b3(1): su bcad de sprul pa la/ skal pa bye ba bsam gyis kyi khyab tu // 'jig rten gyon po'i dam pa shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob rab thob// de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong // sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab kye ba/  do// 
123b4(1): mtha' yas rgya chen rnam par dag// 'od gzer sprid kyis 'jig rten kun du khyab // kun tu rgyal ba'i yom tan grags par byed// 'od kyis reg pa rmad kyis rga ba skye 'gros de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhig/ ban tshun sri zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing/ 
123b5(1): sangs rgyas na phru la 'di dag kun kyang mthong // sprul pa'i dra ba sprin rnams/ bas gyi khyab/ rnam par du ma'i 'od kyi 'dra ba 'gyed/ phyogs bcung zhing rnams rang kun kyang gang byas shing // sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston / rgyal ba rnams1na tu
123b6(1): kyi lU rtse re re nas ka dbyangs smin kye bas nas khal kun bkang zhing // mum/ nag chen po kun nas sdang bar byed// dmyal ba sdug bsngal kun kyang dza/ pas gsel/ sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu po ni// sems cad dza
123b7(1): kyi rjod dge rgya mtsho rnams thams cang dbyangs kyis kung tu smra yang sbyin sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul ba 'di dag slob pa/ sangs rgyas 'khor na rgyam tsho rgya ches// mtha' dang 'dud byed la bdag rab tu byung / den rgyal batshor
123b8(1): kyi khong na yod sems cas rgya tsho bya ma rnams kyang 'dras// cad byed nas par 'phrul pa dag la gos// shing rnams kun da rgyal ba mngon par zhugs// de ltar bde gshegs le shes chags pa byed/ sems cad dod tu rnam par mdzong pang
123b9(1): rgyas dag la'i mos par kun kya 'dong bar byas// bde la'i ming dang sri zhu spro ba yis// bde gshegs de ni lba ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems ni yang dag skyes bya zhing // 'gro ba sum/ 
123b10(1): la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te// kun tu bzang po'i smon las kun btang zhing ba/ chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bam bya// / sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa byed pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa
123b11(1): gyur te/ de'i thos pa'i sems can chad myed pa'i rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur da to// de dang pa dang ma dang lhan gcig tu 'khor thams cad dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong de dag gis skor cing 'dun
124a1(1): ra tu shes so / ye shes kyi rim pa rnaM ba mdag cing dri ma byed pa'i snang ba zhes bya yang nor par gyur to// pha ro lad tu phyin pa'i 'dakyis 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyad ces bya ba yang zhugs par gyus to// ning thams cad dus
124a2(1): dag par 'jug pa dang / snang ba gapa' yas pa mthong bas rnam par dag mi la khyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la chub tu zhugs so// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod rnams kyi spri dri ma skyed pa'i 'od kyi rgyab chen zhes byab la yang rab tu zhugs par bya/ 
124a3(1): torjes su rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho 'byang thas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang rjes su rtogs par gyur torto// 'dug pa'i dkyis / 'khong le ges chen po'i grags kyi rgyun ces bya ba la yang rab tu sums
124a4(1): rang byung du gyur pa ba shi nad tu mthong ba'i shugs kyis dbang skur pa'i/ ye shes rgyas mtsho yang zhugs par gyur da te// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya ma 'i mtshan nyid 'od rnam par sdang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur pa / 
124a5(1): spong lam gyi stobs tshad myed pa la bac+doMs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rol datu byidang pa'i kun bzang po rgyud kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' gni
124a6(1): rdzid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// legs oM yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can// / sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yang dag gnas// / sems can kun gyi dgon dang gnas gyurd pa// rgyal ba'i dam pa bsam gyis myi khyab 'gyur// ye shes rgya
124a7(1): mtsho chen por mngon par 'byung // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas 'apyod yul rgya chen myi zad pa'i// bsam gyis myi khyad tshul du 'jug par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan smin mthong ba'i// / ye shes sa yang phyi non par
124a8(1): 'gyur la/ phra ro lang phyin pa rgya mtsho kun kyi tshul// grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas par byed// gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang // so so/ yang dag rig tshul myi zad dang / spyod pa smod lam khyod kyis mngon sgrubs pa'i gzhal byed ye
124a9(1): shes ldan pa khyod 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind kyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur// smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te// rnam 'phrul 'di la yer shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam/ myi khyab// chos dbyings dam pa
124b1(1): mas kyis kyi khyab pa'i 'a'am sa rgya che rnam par nga byas te /  sangs rgyas smin sa rnam yang lta bar gyis// rgya mtsho'i 'ang dasus dri byed rnam par spyos pa de'i byang drab spyod pa 'jug par gyis la sngon gyi spyod chu rgya nga sa thong
124b2(1): do kang nas ma pa// de 'dra'i tshul yang byed kyis shes par gyis / shing rnams re re 'das rgyas mang po ngas pa brgya mtshos yang shin kya chod pa byas pa/ rjod srong de'i ldan bu 'di 'di// 'di tshangs zung ba'i rgyad pa yos tu
124b3(1): rgya mtsho'i myi zad rgya chen dang // / zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang // / smon lan bsam yas go cha dgos pas na// 'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing // zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mtsho spyad
124b4(1): byas nas / skal pa 'byam klas kun tu spyad byas shing // rgyal la yon tan 'od ces mnga' bar 'gyur // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i brgyan bzang po rgyad kyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngam las 'das nas/ lhan rga ba shin tu
124b5(1): byang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur pa te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi rjid chen spos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur da to// nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bsod/ 10sh+ya
124b6(1): nams rgya mtsho shind du 'phags shing zi lad kyis phyi non pa zhes bya ba gsum/ pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgyapa'i rnam par phrul mthong nas 'khor thams cad dang / dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i
124b7(1): tshogs thams bang dang ka/ ring po che bdun dang grong gi phyi dang yul phyir bcas te/ bachom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho gan tu 'phags shing ze lad kyis non pa gang na bzhugs pa'i nger 'dod nas / des bcom ldan 'das/ 
124b8(1): de la rin po che'i khang pa rtsegs pa spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yul lo// des de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu lta ba'i dpyod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i yod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'phrul shis tu
124b9(1): wa ba snyed kyi 'dol 'khor rang bcas pa'ang yang dag par bshad par gyur to// de thob nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi rjed chen pos bsod nams chen pos rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thong zo// ting nge 'dzin de thob pas kyang dus
124b10(1): gsum gyi byang chub ses dpal thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon tu gyu to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil kyis mya non pas 'khob kyi byi/ 
125a1(1): bab dang sa dpa' yid rtog pa sod mapas 'byung gangs mchos kyapa 'a/ nya che rdzas kyi bya rgyab pa rgya 'acom// mda' dang bung byed sapas kyang kyi ke rang brangs dang nga byed de gso rdzas / de ga ngoms sa mtshod dang/ 
125a2(1): gyur dag khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams pams cad kyi// rgyas pas srid rnams kun kyang shini tuma'ang // de dag yod pa rgyalatsho mas dang / kyang / sad pa ji zhi ba spyad pa yin du 'dzi// 'di rgyas rgya mtsho 'das sun
125a3(1): 'ashes sa sa dra ba ga ba byung pa ka/ de dag sangs rgya bya kyisngo bu cing / rangs cang ga'igs par gdod rtsi ba par 'byung /  'i bur tu mtsho'i du byed kyi/ ga shAm tshung ba myod byab kya rgya
125a4(1): kun gyi sngon daphyang rgya mtsho rnams// skabs rang bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba 'i 'od// zhi rnams rgya mtsho yongs su rag pa rnaMs// phyogs bcu dag tu ci ltar mthong ba bzhin/ khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te/ smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur// 
125a5(1): 'khor kyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang / khyod kyi spod las yo 'gyur rab tu dga'// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag gis// byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// mnga' dang srung skyer zhing rnams byam klas par// skas pa
125a6(1): mtsho rag tu dbyang ba pyod ka kun tu bzang po'i 'gyod pa thams cad dang // smon lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyis// / nags tshal chen po'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor ring po che'i me tog rgyal ma de nyid du// de bzhin gshegs pa grags sa rnam
125a7(1): bar grags pa'i spyan pad ma'i dbas zhes bya ba byung bar gyu rang to// rgyal po gzi rjid chen po de nas shi mos nas/ rgya mthum spong ni lha'i grong khyer ring po che'i ba'i gnas zhes bya bar byir te/ ded bsod dmas dri sa byed pa'i dpal zhes bya ba 'a rgya
125b1(1): gau chen por gyu dad to// de nas lha'i 'khrong chogs tshor po dang bcas te/ rin po che'i me tog kyi sprin kyi tshan 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i dbyar pad ma'i dpal gas na bzhugs pa der/ 
125b2(1): dong ngo // der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag me ba'i spyan pad pa'i dul gyis chub yangs pa'i sgo kun gyi rnam par sna pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi langs rgya mtsho'i tshul shin gyi phra ba nyid kyi la da'i ma'odza / 
125b3(1): bcas pa yang dag par stan to// des dag thos nas rga ba'i snying po kur ras sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad kyi tshul brgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to// shinang tu rgyas pa chen tshan ma // sangs rgyas pa sazo
125b4(1): che zhes bya ba las rnas par snga 'ad kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu pa'o// 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba zhin tu rgyal pa chen po'i mdor khas lo bcu gsum pa// bcom ldan 'das 'dzig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtsho no
125b5(1): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun tu bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar k+Shad+ya
125b6(1): 'jug pa // stong gsu gyi grong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni yongs su/ 'dzin pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhan lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'jugapa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni lhan cig myod pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus
125b7(1): kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni kun tu dpyod pa dgas ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa / gleng bzhi pa'i 'jigarten gyi khams ni gnas kyi dam pa tshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa gling ni
125b8(1): byang chub kyi rgya mchan sum bcu sa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyib tu yang 'dug pa/ grong dag ni 'dod mapa' las pa khad pa megs pa'i byis sar 'dug pa gapa' shing gi ra ba ni bu rang dang bras pa/ nga po byang rdu su da byed pa'i dbyings
125b9(1): 'dug pa/ khang pa rtsegs pa ni kun ras smad du byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhi mchos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs nye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chad byed pas kun nas pasgom pa ste/ 
125b10(1): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi bis gyi snying po la gnas la phyir 'thun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khaltas rgya mchos bcu'i rtsab shin tu phra ga shed kur byed ka de bzhir gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su 'bya// ga ta shu dang / gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dang gang du/ 
126a1(1): rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi khab mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par mying mthun pa thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi lus kyi dbyigs su 'jug pa ga stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkhas
126a2(1): kA/ lding dang khyi ba ci dang lho phye chen po dang / myi dang myi la yin pa'i lag thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i mying 'bud pa thams cad kyang myi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongasu bskor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sangs rgyad kyi
126a3(1): sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i chu rdul gin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o// / sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu drag
126a4(1): nyis te theg pa'i sku dang ldan 'o / ga bya rgyan sem pa raba'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig se kyi da'abs rgya ma tsho babya'i du gi byan babyed kyi lags dang spang ba'o// nyid rje chen gyi gyulacho yi nyen gyi su cho chu chu shing tu ba ba byed kyims /

128a8(1): brgya mtsho de na yon tan ci snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kum rtsubs pa po drin yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po des stong gsum kyi gong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gadzid pa zhes/ 
128b1(1): bya ba ga'ang 'gyul dbang byed kyi zhwa'i lus kyi dbyings su 'jug pa / stong gsus kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul gnang tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khod kyis go pa yod dag song gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'ag nyed kyi kham thong
128b2(1): su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnam par dgod lag 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bra la snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mam kha' ldi dang / gyi 'am ci dang / lho bye chen po dang /

132b9(1): phyi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi myig gi rdul shin tu phra ba re de nas lus kyi rdul shin tu bri ba re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par dgengs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya 'tsho bcu'i rdu
132b10(1): gi dang tu sra ba snyed kyis bskal pa/ brgyab mo 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rgyal shin tu phra ba snyed du snyan cing rjod kyang zad lar myi rung ngo // 'phags pa sangs rgyas pas po che zhes bya ba zhin tu rgyas pa chen pa'i 'dod
133a1(1): bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku'i ba sbu bu ga re re nas 'od gzer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin da tu lA ba snyed lce'o
133a2(1): 'od gzer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho la pad ma rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul gan tu phra ba snyed mngong par 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i rdo re re nab rgya
133a3(1): yang dag par bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shind tu grwa ba snyed mngon par 'bon to// de dag las yang dag par skul pa'i tshigasu bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing yang shar phyogs kyi/ 
133a4(1): 'jig rnyed gyi lalas ji steng pa dang / chub gi dang tu zla ba ji rnyed pa'i 'dris rkyen gyi khams re re dang / nus shin tu phra ba rings kyang rgyam them sa byas cu latsho dang / nyan thob rgya mong snyed cig song ba dang / smra nga ru
133a5(1): gnod sbyid dang drin dang / lha ma yin dang / num mkha lding dang/ skye'o/ NI dang lta bye chen po dang / phyi dang khyi ma yin pa rgya mtsho nga snyed cig sod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su sprul par byed do// 
133a6(1): byon pa dang 'dra bar byon pa rgyanas kyi rgya batshomams cad che'ang de bzhin // de na byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / bying yin pargyam tsho rje snyed pa de dag bcom 'das de mi'in gags#
133a7(1): shegs gang ze marnam par snang ma rang tu 'od gze gyis pa byung smras rab / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag ma sangs rgyas rgyu mcho gang bcugs pa de dag pa grus te/ gar sa kyang chum sems das
133a8(1): pa yin pa'i khor de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khabs rgya mtsho brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / ldan lag stag ste/ yus re re ya e pa la twA pA rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khabs rgya mtsho bcu'i tshul gis tu phra la snyed
133a9(1): yod la yus me la la yang stog rgya mo la rgya'i tshul gis ma ma ma ma man de ses yang 'dzi na rgya mtsho la rgya'i chus gis kyi bya ma pan zhas na ro da/ bre rgya tsho jig tsod gyi khams rgya mtshos rgya
133b1(1): shi cu rdza ba zhi yod pa sha skrag sho// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / phyi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar rgya satsho de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen pa tsho rnam par snar
133b2(1): tsam 'i thod kyis mtho / byere re nying yang 'ongs rgya tsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i chul gis sam pa rnyed kyi ma'od byang nor mas sarang dam gagongs dang / du gzub kyis sprul pa'i ma rgya 'tsho ga pa mdzad/ 
133b3(1): rgyaji to// mdams kyi phyi re zhing chul rgya batsho 'dig rten sde 'ams rgya mtsho ba'i rgyas kyin tu zla ba snyed 'ongs su thA ba byes du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi 'breg pa 'ashes skyen stsa#
133b4(1): myi ma yi pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pang de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad ye chos rgya martso mang po rnam grangs du ma rnam las bye ba'o// rnam pa ma grol lo lo// gsal ban mdzad do// yang dag par stand to// de nas shA
133b5(1): phyogs su 'od khyod kyi khabras rgyam tsho 'jig cen gyi lams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul gongs phras snyed / 'das pa de 'jig rten gyi sems rgya yomams cad kyigs kyi sna ba zhi lus ma de/ dor de shi gshegs pa
133b6(1): sems can thams cad kya da skye mtsho rnam yar snang yadza ces bya la bzhugs shing mtsho zhes te/ 'og mar yang rke bar duyang dge bsam dge pa chos dor brdung po sa ge banang po ras pa yongs sugs sa yos
133b7(1): byang batshangs pa'i 'apyod pa yang dag par ston cing byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu stond pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad gyi don rgya ma
134a1(1): garnas par 'a sas tu rnam thag+sa d+hA sa/ sa rgyas @#
134a2(1): ji snyed cig ma ngalas dang / sems can yongs su spyod par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mangs pa dang yongs su snyan pa'i yon tan rnam par bye ba rgya mtsho snyed kyi rnam pa pa nga tho pa khon ta na
134a3(1): bar bye ba rgya mcho snyed cig bdal pa de dkun/ sangs rgyas rgya bco gajig rnyed kyi khams rgya mtshol na'i drus shin tu za ba snyed kyis dus gsum rgyal ma 'di nyin gyi khams rgya tsho tshad na shin mardza pa byed cags
134a4(1): spyad kyang zad par gyi rung ngo// ra 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten ragyi khams rgya mtsho thabs cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de ma 'thangams spyar mthing rdul po rid pa che ched mang po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rted gyi khams rgya
134a5(1): rdul shin tu rtsa ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la rgya sargya'i bdag po lha dang phyi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam mo de de// re re zhing yang 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
134a6(1): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khabs rgya mtsho'i 'khor lo dang ldan la sha stag ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rid ce mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho largya/ 
134a7(1): tshul gid tu phral snyed yod de/ 'di rnam sangs rgyas kyi susum rin po che rgya mtsho dang de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang / shangs dang ljags dang / spu dang thugs dang rin po che rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang po
134a8(1): reg bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad kyis lha na yid du 'ong ba'i bud myed rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu rnam par bye ba'i blon po rim po che rgya
134a9(1): 'tsho dang / nam mkha'i mthas 'gro ba'i rta rin po che brgya batsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin/ 
134a10(1): gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha' rgyas kyis rje dgengs pa'i gdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gis dri ma myed pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi ral gyi rin po che rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
134b1(1): cad kyis lha myi mthong ba'i kyi mug pa sgribs pa skyed pa'i rin po che rgya mtsho ra ba/ khams par du 'gro ba'i lham rim po che rgya mtsho dang gting nge 'dzin dang mnyam byang gzhag pa'i thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i tsho

134b9(1): mtsho brgya'i rdul shind tu pA ba bsnyed kyis sprul pa'i bud byed rim po che dang dra ba yid kyi lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bral snyed dang ldan pa/ srid/ pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'dzi/ 
134b10(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems bla na byed pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra pa snyed kyi mgo dang ldam pa/ chos kyi dbyings nas mkhas rgyamatsho 'jig rtem
135a1(1): bgyi khabs rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bral ba dang ldan pa ka/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i khasam pa 'jig rten gi kha mas rgya mtsho brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spyod tshugs can shes rab dang ye shes yang sa pa rgyabaco 'jig ba
135a2(1): ched kyi khams rgya brgya dras gis bya bral snyed kyi sdig dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa khams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten rgyas mo bcu rgyal gnang sum bad kyi rab 'di du 'ong ba dang ldan pa rlom pa snang dag yar grangs rgya
135a3(1): cho jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba rgya rgyal gi tu ma pa byed kyi sna legs pa dang ldanu pang/ chos rgya mchod rab tu ston pa la rgya mtsho 'jin rten gyi lams rgya mtsho ba 'i drul gis tha brab nyid kyi lce dang lda lachas kyi dbyingasasapa gnyi

135a6(1): gyi khya bas brgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan / chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho btsun rdul shind tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa// dmyigs pa thams cad yongs /

135a9(1): drab dag phrengs rgya latsho 'jig zed gyi langs rgya mtsho bcu'i chul gin tu bral snyed ma dzes pa thogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chum sems dpa 'dang can thos dang / rab sa rgyas kyi rnam par b.rad ba kos tu tsho rig tes gyi
135a10(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba ste gang tu 'bar bar pyod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mcho sarig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par rgyags/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri nyim ga

135b1(1): lus kyi sa spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang zhe snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i cam ngas kyi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rgyal gnad tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // pos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rted gyi khams rgya
135b2(1): mtsho bcu'i rdul gi nang tu phra snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par dgengs te/ de dag gi rga pa'i rgyam dang khabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba 'i sems cad rgya mtsho ga pa 'i snyed song bas dri 'im
135b3(1): ngag tshom par gyur da pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra la snyed rab tu thob bo// sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa'i rgya mchos
135b4(1): dral gis ma pa snyed rab tu zon po na gang gis dbyangs rgyamatsho lasadapas gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / de ba'i gshegs pa bsasacad las zam pa yongs su 'dzid pa rgya tsho 'jig rte gyi khabs rgyas

136a9(1): 'di yang de'i sras 'argyang /  pa byed mang po'i de ba'i da gshegs pa sems pan sa kyid dag tshad yo ma la thang du rgyasag pa dun mchos 'ang ya rgya
136a10(1): dag pan tu gis kyi nga thos pa la gas pa pa'i bgan ma su'ang phyirnams padag de btsun gyib sa tsha pa dang / skye da ma /

136b2(1): par shes na 'gro la rag ste/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi zil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni 'gro bar rka ste/ der 'gro ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i do'i zhal lta la dang / de la
136b3(1): pa sus dang / ma nyes pa ni bsang gagonos pa'i byed kyi rnam satag par byub chum snyems das nyid de kyin pa byung sa kyi rgyu nas nga rgya tsho 'ang de
136b4(1): cha pa pong ga 'jig rten gyi khangs rgya mtsho de phyogs ni gang na 'dug 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye 'am rnying/ de mad ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig gzhugs shing 'tsho zhes pa dang chos stonang par
136b5(1): bshes sa sa rgya po rin ze mapa mas gsoso pa 'a bcos 'ang das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtha'i mthong sa pa'i da mig rten gyi lams rgya tsho'i phyogs gang rnamachim sa dang mdu
136b6(1): kyi khadas rgya mtsho de 'di ras di nye nga ri bzhig ma mchis pa dang / da ma de ra de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho zhes shing chob ga ni thos su yang ma mchis te 'ji snye kyi mas rgya mtsha rje lnga chang bangs
136b7(1): des zan pa/ de nas de ba'i na gshenas pa thams cid myo 'odagapa chen mtshornam par sna yadang kyis/ rgya tha rin me mdza ba la 'di skad ces bags med to// rgyal ba na pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha phyog sa gangan yod pa dang / 
136b8(1): nana'amam nying de 'dzin bya mo sa byan ngan dang 'dzid rgya mchogarig rten gyi 'ams rgyam no bcu'i rdul shi tu zla ba nyid pa matam par 'jas kyang 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtsho byags gang da yod pa dang dzi de kyi sa kyi
137a1(1): mtsho de 'di nas nye 'am ring ba dang / de mad ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shi 'tsho zhes pa dang / chom sto pa yapa ma shes ke 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de la khams tha mas yang mtha ra
137a2(1): de nas rgyal po rim chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang cen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
137a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'di nas/ ring gi'am nye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig da ltar de ma bzhugs shing 'tsho zhes pa dang / chos bsto nga pal/ rlos
137a4(1): kyapa'i 'chal te ga bdag gis 'jig rten gyi rtsakha mas rgya mtsho de mi mtshan ma tsamra yang ma mthong ngo do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad ra kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin cen mang po
137a5(1): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de lta gas na rgyal po chen po rnam/ grangs des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs/ pa'i phyag gi zil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni/ de bzhin gshes
137a6(1): pa'i gyis kyi mas partog pa pang/ shing nge 'dzin snying po kyang rgyasakyi rgyan rnam par bye ba 'i ning po rgya mato cu'i tshul gnid tsam snyed la gnas pa'i kyang byimasapas rab tu sa kyang 'gro bar bya
137a7(1): de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba 'am de la phyag bya ba 'am snyen bkur ba' ma/ de las chos nyand pa bde blag ma yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po rin cen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems cad thams cad kyi dong
137a8(1): gang cher mtsho rnam par snang badzad la 'di skad ces gso yang to// bcom ldan 'das bskan tu gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mi phyogs gang ma mchis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas rag ji srid cig yas tshas
137a9(1): de bzhin gshegs pa ni da lha de na bzhugs shing 'tsho zhes pa dang / chos stod pa star tu ga ma sod/ dri nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang yadzad kyis/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' ma' te/ 
137a10(1): pa khyod kyi lanas 'da'i chub phyogs sogs kyis mtshams kyi sathal 'ang dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams klog gi nubagin tu zla ba snyed 'das pa da 'jig ter gyi khams rgya mchos mamams pa
137b1(1): mtshol gyi'i chu zhin sa pa la snyed pa mnyas pang gagagos de gar mnyam pa bzhag la'i yon sa rgyal tha na chenas pa shol de'i tshegajig rten gyi las bra mtshos 'jig kyi rnams rgya na sa
137b2(1): la rgya ma chog 'i byed gsugs sa de dag bams cad kyis de nye bkregs pa'i byed kyi mabyas rgyasatsogangag chen gyi 'ams rgyas so gargya'i bu gron su mas rnyed kyis byin kyi smra papa dad ga sa
137b3(1): mas de dag gis de kur rgya'i zam tha nan can mang po sa byin/  kyis rnabs sangabs thag tu mi mo la 'jig rten gyi khams/  rgyagasol ma nus sem ze ma dbyang ba dang / de ba'i gagagapa pa byed
137b4(1): pa thams cad dang / myi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'ig chen mtsho rnam par sngam mdzad dang sa/ 'jig rten gyi khams byamatsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi bil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa
137b5(1): dag de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam pas snang ma dza dang / de ma yin pa 'jig rted kyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi ma chos chu'i rdul gris su tha ba nyid dag sa sangs rgyas rgya mcho bcu'i dru gisas pa
137b6(1): ba snyed na sangs rgyas rgya mchog pa ci snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes stobs das pa rgya mtsho la brtsogs pang/ ye shes rgya mtshol 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdug gis thar ba snyed kyis
137b7(1): rag tu shes so// gcus gsum kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyal rgya mtsho la sogs pa myig rgya mchog/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na lag zig tu spu ru ra'i 'bras bu
138a1(1): gaganas pa ya ma ma ga tugapas pa'i kyis sasapa' snang ba lan na/ de das rgyab pa ces sa ras nying de 'dis rgyal ba sa smram sa sa shesas pa sems par 'as car cidun mim
138a2(1): rnam par snang yadang la yang gsol ba/  bcom ldan 'das pa da 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho de bzhi gshegs pa'i thug gi bris kyi snying po sa rab tugapa ne de bzhin gshegs pa g.ye shes gang chen ma mo rnam par snang bcad kyin
138a3(1): ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang ga bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos nyan pa'i slad du mardzo'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems cam thams cad kyi don gang chen 'tshon ma pam snang mdzad kyis na rgyal ze rin ce mang pos
138a4(1): 'di skad ces bkal sartsa 'ang to// rgyal po de'i dus la yas pam shes ma so a / byang chub sems dpal 'dul ya'i skyes bu rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bra ya skyed 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang ches mtsho rnam par snang mdzad
138a5(1): de la phu kha cig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pA ba snyed po/ 'i ste de dag dang / bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
138a6(1): brnyed pa de dag dang lhan gcig skye bu re re zhing mi 'jig rten gyikhyim tsha'i 'amanams smras pa rgyas mo bcu'i rgyal gi ma ba nyid du dan cig 'ag rten gyi 'ams rgya mcho 'amang po byung ba mtsho ris
138a7(1): ni 'jig rten gyi khams yi ba kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du pra ba snyed dang lhan cigs/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji/ 
138a8(1): ten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya 'tsho la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul gi nad tu phra ba snyed dang lhan gcig/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sbyar pa rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten
138a9(1): gyi khams kyi 'khor los sbyar sa rgyal tsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i tshul shin tu pA ra snyed dang lhan cig song gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor los spyar ba rgya mtsho re re zhing de / stong kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor ma
138a10(1): nyon gyi mas rgya mcho bcu'i chul gis tu ma ba snyed dang ldan cig/ ming bzhi pa'i 'jig rted gyi khams kyi gshangs su spru pa rgya mtsho re zhing / gling cig kyi 'khar lob spyad pa rgya bcos 'jig rten gyi 'ims rgya mtshol nam
138b1(1): dul gin byam sa nyid dang lham gcig zung cigag 'amar thos sbyar brgya mabar nyid ni khams kyi sgru pa da kyi las rgyam tsho bcu'i chub gis tha za ba snyed dang gnaci// las kyi kyis 'gyur mi na bya / 
138b2(1): kyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'dong pam cham pa dang / 'khor los spru pa'i rgyal po rin cen mang po de'i chub ma'i 'khod rgya mtsho dang / bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i chus gis
138b3(1): bsnyed pa de dag gis 'di skad ces smras te/ lha'i zhe snga nas gsan tu sol/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa la ye shes gang
138b4(1): chen rnam par snang mdzad de'i zha le lta ba dang de la phyag bgyi ba dang mchod pa snyen bkur bya ba dang chos nyan pa'i slad du 'chi bar/ gsol lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / rgyal po rin cen mar pos chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / 
138b5(1): bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ci ste khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'i zhal lta ba ni don tu myi gnyer chos mnyan pa ni tshol yar myi byed de/ dge 'dun rgya mtsho snyen bkur ba ni don tu myi gnyer// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho/ shA Datu
138b6(1): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni 'chol bar gyi byed sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don tu myi gnyen/ ham thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs pa ma 'tshar
138b7(1): rgya ba ni don tu myi gnye ba/ yul rgya mtsho 'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod ce myed/ yul rgya mtsho ga zhan du mi 'gro lam 'dod pa myed la/ gsute khyed sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal nyar thos dbang ba sangs rgyas
138b8(1): thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur pa nye/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyam 'dod chags dang bral ba la myi gnas// sems can thams cad kyang gsod pod kyang zhe sdang rab byams pa la myi gnas/ mu stegs can thams cad
138b9(1): kyi lha ba rgya mtsho la 'jug cing spyod kyang log pa'i sems sam/ yang dag pa'i sems lnga myi gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba snyan pa yang stod la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang phyin ma e ma/ de la rag go// 'khor
138b10(1): spos sgyur ba'i rgyas po rin cemam pa po res snyan la 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe/ chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho/ de dag dang bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung ma re re dang yu mo rde des kyang myig gyi khams re rer chos kyi dbyings thamasacad
139a1(1): sa dbang sgrub pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho la phyogs la sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi dang tu za ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur pa sto// rna ma'i khams re res kya pa
139a2(1): a kha khong du chud pa'i byang chub ga' na sos dpa'is 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur da to// sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la rten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa rang sa ngas
139a3(1): rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// lce'i khams rer res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro banyis rgya mtsho la stsogs pa nyan thos kyis 'jig rte gi khams rgya mtsho ba'i
139a4(1): rdul shim tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri myed pa rgya mtsho la stsogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu tho
139a5(1): yid kyi khams de res kyang sa'i stobs rgya mtsho la sogs pa surba rgyas tsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i tshul shin tu la/ skyed ram su tham 'o// de nas rgya pa rin ced zang zo'i chung ba rgya mtshor
139a6(1): dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'i rgyas mtsho'adzim chen gyi khams rgyas co bcu'i tshul shes ma ba da kyis gting zhes da ni mig rkye kyi khams kyi
139a7(1): bcu'i tshul gi nang tu tha ba snyed la gzhan gyi ring kyi 'jog pas byas so rgyas pa jim ses mang po la tshigs su gcad de smras pa ra// bdag cag kun kyis sangs rgyas rgyamatsho ga'od// yongs su mchod de snyen bkung chum
139a8(1): bgyis// 'od kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho chos ma bos pa// sa ma nga rgya mtsho 'di dag mthong ma gyur // dra ni / sangs rgyas phrin lus smras pa'i// sa pa sgyu mtsho'i byig kyang thob pa ma gyur// byang chub don tu phyogs rnams/ 
139a9(1): kun dbyings su // rna bas spyod pa dam pa baspyod par bgyi/ sA'i khams kyis rang rgyalas thob ste/ rten 'a brel 'byung ze mchos rnams rtogs pam 'gyur// skyes kyang / nyan po mo ma pa rgya mtsho tho 'o// des
139a10(1): ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor bar gyur rang // lus kyis sa ma nga rgya mtsho tho ba las na// sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu sprug par bgyi// yid kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho'i rnams// 'tshas bar gyur da pas gzhan la snyan
139b1(1): par bgyi/  gi rang tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// 'phags pa sangs rgyas pas po che zhes bya ba gi nang tu rgyas
139b2(1): yi mdzo pas maco rdza ba / bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon pas sangs rgyas pa sa ka da'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snyi po byang chub la zhugs te// mo gnang tu rnam yar dag pa myi gnyis las yang dag par 'apyod pa
139b3(1): chos mtshan nyid byed pa yang gi/ nang tu gnol 'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'apyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid nyes la bsgribs pa myed pas rtogs pa thugs su chung 'ad/ byi rgyal ldog pa'i chos car/ 'byo
139b4(1): yul 'thogs pa byed pa nas yang danod pa bsam gyis kyi khug pa/ dus gsus gtam pa nyid la gis su byung ba' po tha bkun su 'ad na seng ge'i'i meng ma'i snying po can la bzhunas ke/ byang chub sems dpal sangs
139b5(1): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul gi dang tu ma kha snyed kun kyang skye ba cig gis/ dathogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga/ zhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa lngar sems can gyi khams la pyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings pa 'byod pa 'jis
139b6(1): rten gyi 'bas la pyod pa dbya na las 'das pa 'i dbyings la spod nyeb yas kyi rnam par smi pas spyod 'arnabasas pa'i dru pa/ spyod la/ dod dang mi ne sa 'byod pa/ 'jig rted pa dang 'dzin nam
139b7(1): sa par byong ba lus rgyas dang rgyas la byas la byed pa/ 'dam pa 'ango' 'os padang ska bya 'i la yod pa gsug da cin ni/ deras byang chub sems 'apa'adi dag 'di snyam byamams te/ bco ma lda
139b8(1): 'du zun kyi'i dag sa sem sa sa kyis bsas 'a sa/ yangs kyis kyi zhi yos thas rgyas kyi grod pa sa
139b9(1): kyi chung ba kyang drang / yangs rgyas rgyan panyid yongs pa kyang rung /  rgya rgyan pa mas su dag pa par byangs rgyas rgya mo 'god pa yongs pasas ca cang / sa ma rgyan
139b10(1): ram bzhin yongs su su du rung / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su gsar kyang rub/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bsrud kyang rung / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
140a1(1): khams sug sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas kyis byang chub sems dpas rnam par dgod pa bcu ji ltar nas par dgod pa de dag yongs su skad kyang rung / byang chum sems dpa spyod pa brgya thong pa zan
140a2(1): kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i tshad myed pa bcu yongs su snyan kyang dung/ byang chub sems dpa'i gte rnams yongs su stan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su stan kyang rung / byang chub sems/ dpa'i smon lab
140a3(1): rnams yongasu snyan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu rnams yongs su snyan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bral pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems raba'i mgo bcu yongs su stan kyang rung
140a4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung myi gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasasgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye bar nyon mongs pa byed ni
140a5(1): bya ba dang / 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos thams cad yang dag par stan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mod/ pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o dang / the tsom thams cad yongs su
140a6(1): bcad pa dang / nem nur thams cad shin tu sngags pa dang / gnas pa mas cad rab tu gzhom par bya ba'i gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa sun kyis cung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul snyan kyang rung ga gong du de bzhin/ 
140a7(1): gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs spyand kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bapyod yul spyan kyang rung / dgong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stand kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gyi snyengs pa sun kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshen/ 
140a8(1): b+hU kha'i ting nge 'dzin snyan kyang rung gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ska rang kyang rung / de bzhing gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po sman kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'phrogs pa stan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sh+yad
140a9(1): stand kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyam bstan kyang ru / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs bstand kyang rung / kong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags stand kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan kyang nyung
140a10(1): gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su nad kyang rub go du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spogs skad kyang rkyang / kong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog kyi mthu rnyan kyang rung snyam par da/ 
140b1(1): ba'i sa byed khyim pa 'ayas rgyas kyizhing nas byang ngam sems pa' sangs rgyas kyi 'ong 'argya'i chu gis tham pa nyid dang la ci tug bcom pan pa sa gang na des pa ni phyi nga ma ma tham la byag sa / ka thogs
140b2(1): bang na sa rmi yang pa'i snying btsan dag mngon pa nga smrab te/ dkyis ma grung bas nas 'ad dra ga lugs sogs su 'jig rten gyi 'ams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i dul shin tutha ma snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rted gyi 'bas na na tu 'ong ba zhes
140b3(1): bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed kyi spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/  byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal byang chub sems dpas sangs nga rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shis tu ga pa snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'dasaThatha tu
140b4(1): gangan sa des song ste byi nas pacom ldan 'das la phyag 'chas te/ ts+tshaphyogs su btan nas med ge'i khri la ba'i snyim po can dag mngon par sprus te/ dkyis mar mo chung bas rnaMs la do// rub phyogs sogs su
140b5(1): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tshul shi nang tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpad ma'i 'dog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed bcings myed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems
140b6(1): dpa' nor rab la/ byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul gin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gapan pa des 'do ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshas te/ drug phyogs su brtan nas seng shes
140b7(1): khri pad ga'i snying po can dag mngon par smra'ang te/ dkyis mo krung bcas nas khod do// byang phyogs sogs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams cam la ka'i 'don
140b8(1): ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig byed kun pyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems rapa'i rin chen dpal// byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ga snyed dang lhan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das gangan
141a1(1): kha der dong ste byinang nas/ bcom ldan 'das ya phyag 'tshal te/ byang phyogs su brtan nas seng ge'i khri pad ma'i snying po dag mngon par sprul te dkyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// bya shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'dzin
141a2(1): rton gyi khabs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i 'jul shi nad tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa la'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed nyi ma'i sangs rgyas kyi 'di nas
141a3(1): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang ma ba der dong ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang shar gyi phyogs
141a4(1): mtshams su brtan nas seng ge'i khri pad ma'i snying po can dag mngon pa na nga sprul te/ dkyil mo krung cas nas 'khod do// shar lho la phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdub shin tu phra ba snyed 'das
141a5(1): ba'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhim/ gshegs pa rig byed mtha' rgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub/ sems dpal myig gi dpal// byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi 'ing
141a6(1): brgya'i tshul gan tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gapar der 'ong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ gar smi'i phyogs mamams su la na das na se ge'i e pad ma'i snyi po pon dag mdzod par / byarkyen
141a7(1): te dkyil po krung bcas nas 'khod do// lho dub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
141a8(1): ba rig byed dam pa'i sangs sangs rgyas kyi'i banas/ byang chub sems dpa' rtson 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lha tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin nas
141a9(1): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho rub kyi phyogs mtshams su gtan nas yed ge'i khri pad ma'i snying po cang mngon par sprus te/ skyil mo kyang bcas nas 'khod do/ nub byang gyi phyogs rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
141a10(1): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpal chos kyi dpal zhes khyal byang

141b2(1): 'i snying po can dag mngon par sprub te/ kyil mo kyang bcas mas ma' do/ yon gyi phyogs sogs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rgyal gi nang su ma pa snyed 'das pa'i la rlol badzin nyid gyi 'ams shes kyi dzin

149b8(1): za ba zhes bya ba'o// chos dang phrad pa zhes bya'o// 'khor ba myed pa zhes bya'o// 'brel pa byed pa zhes bya'o// lam rgya chen po ha zhes bya'o// yapa dag par phyin par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// spyo pa dag pa zhes bya'o// mthong ba'i bdag po
149b9(1): zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la bgyogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mying bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsas brdzi lta la bzhin
150a1(1): du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal gyi 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' yan skye bar byed pa zhes bya'o// rnam par sgrubs/ 
150a2(1): pa zhes bya'o// chags shing zhen pa zhes bya'o// khur khyer pa zhes byan/ myi sdug pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// nad thibs po zhes bya'o// sdig pa byed pa zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug pasngas
150a3(1): ma srung sornam pa'i bad pa 'as bya ba des 'ang 'jig nyed gyi 'ams sos su da' ba gzhir byad pa shes byan/ su bdang phran phyin tsho pas 'das la ye byang tsho ba ses pa ni yu tags pa byed me
150a4(1): byed pa byed la zhes bya'o nyung bar byang ba zhes bya'o// yang du red pa zhes bya'o/  bachung bzhen gyi mthong gcu ba zhes bya kye rgyal pa'i sa lu ga dus parnas panag pa 'dags pa'i 'ad pa las bya ba de ba'ang
150a5(1): rkyen gi thams songs su dgan pan gnas zhig pa zhes bya'o// mongs de ba skyed pa zhes bya'o// ying da pa zhes byan/ des shid tu rtogs zhes bya'o// dashes par byed pa zhes bya spyor byed pa zhes bya'o/ mam
150a6(1): ba zhes bya'o// mtshan nyid byed pa zhes bya'o// bdag nyid rtogs pa zhes bya'o// ma skyes pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal pa'i sras dag sdug bsngal bano/  par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jog rten gyi khas d+ya
