150a8(1): spyar/ dras sarnas sanas byam// rtan pa'i lam zhes bya/ 'argyamagyub pa nas kyi men kyi rgya pa'i rnas pa gang sa mapa pa 'jis nyin gyi las yos su dpa
150a9(1): pa'i bded pa rnams kyi phyir bye ba rgya stong phrag bzhi brgyal yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'phrul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed 'dar mug bsngal 'phags pa'i
150a10(1): bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams che ba na 'tshog pa zhes bya'o// rdza ma lta bu zhes bya'o// nang dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// yus la yod pa zhes bya'o// rab tu 'phen pa zhes bya'o// tshogs pa'i sgo zhes bya'o// sdug
150b1(1): bsngal gyi skyon can zhes bya'o gas brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o// rang la 'azhog pa myed pa zhes bya'o/ 'gro zhing 'ob pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i srab dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang
150b2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi che ba ma 'che ba zhes bya'o// 'dun par 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba'i yam lag ces bya'o// a na sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rab rib byed la zhes bya'o// 'dud par byed pa zhes bya'o//  rnam par
150b3(1): dpral ba zhes curo ga gis tu gdung ba zhes bya'o/  kyi hud na'o zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang bcug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam 'phags pa'i bded pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chel ni 'ardzogs pa byed pa
150b4(1): zhes bya'o// skyon myed pa zhes bya'o// ma nyams pa zhes bya'o// 'grogs pa myed pa zhes pa'o// tshad myed pa zhes bya'o// sa/ yangs pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi yan lag ces bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o// chags pa byed
150b5(1): zhes kyis kyi rgyal pa'i zas dag gang sdug bsngal 'gon par 'am nya'i rdzas 'bagasa'i bded pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyis stan badzan pas khyod yul zhes bya'o// 'dod cag sa dang 'tha pa'i mamanas shes/ ca
150b6(1): bya'o// mdzad pa la drug pa zhes thun dod rab tu chung ba zhes bya'o/ rang bzhid la gtugs pa zhes bya'o// ba songs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ na dra pas bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o// 'gro bsdug pa zhes can
150b7(1): skyob pa'i sa mtshams shes bya'o// 'khrug pa myed pa'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la 'phyogs pa 'jig rten gyi khas myi che ba na 'phags pa 'i bden pa rnams la phying bye ba rgya stong brag la ni
150b8(1): rgya yod de ka de dag gis sems can rnams khas pa pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed 'di ma sdug pasngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi
150b9(1): khams dbyangs smon la mams sa brngub pa zhes bya'o// ya 'alag gnas pa zhes byan/ gso rgyu chel ba zhes bya'o// 'brel pa zhes bya'o// 'dod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// myang du myi rung ba zhes bya'o// skye gnas pa
150b10(1): rnyis pa zhes bya'o// nye ba 'gro ba zhes bya'o// dngon pa zhes bya'o// kye rgya pa'i sras dag gang bsdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa 'i bde pa zhes byab de ma yang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pan 'bya ba'i gan na
151a1(1): sa bya'o// sa pa dang rnas /  ra pa /  sa yi pa sa/  zung du da/ 
151a2(1): sgo zhes bya'o// rtogs par bya ba zhes bya'o// bsgribs pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyas pa'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa ma gnas pa myed pa

151a4(1): bya'o// shi nang tu mchod pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal dgog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gi khams dbyangs rnyog pa na ma thong bas man/

151a6(1): pa zhes byaro// 'gro ba'i don rjes bya'o// phyi g.yol ba la mdo tu gyur pa zhes bya'o// khyad ler gi don ces bya ste/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag de lung de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs rnon#
151a7(1): pa mA 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mying bye ba brgya stong phrag pa'i yar+ya yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig brten na ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa cwa/ 
151a8(1): yongs su bstan pa yod pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad myed pa dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ tshungs pa myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa mu myed pa sa mtshams
151a9(1): myed pa brjod du myed po chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam me kha'i dbyings kyi mangs gzugs pa dag na dang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su stond pa yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams re re na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
151a10(1): kyi phying bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi brgya yod de ga de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'phrul lo// / sham phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs da/ 
151b1(1): de bzhin du byang phyog pa dang / de ba'i dbyang gar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin tu gar lho'i phyogs mtshas dang / de bzhi su ru phyang gaphyogs mamams dang / de bzhin canan ga/ phyag pa dang / de ba'i dun bya pyod
151b2(1): gagasas dgran sa ga sathas pa'i 'ad pa yong su bdun pa da 'ag shen gyi mas 'i ren yang 'bugs pa'i 'ded pa rnams kyi byed rtses 'argya thong mag pa'i 'a ba'i lan yod de dag gis se
151b3(1): ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// 'jig rten gi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gang phyogs nas steng gyi phyogs shes bya ba nas phyogs bsas lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag pa
151b4(1): 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams yongs su lagan pa yod do// 'dage nga rjes kyi 'ams re re na yang sdug bsngal kyi byed bye ba brgya sto 'bras pa'i bachu ba ni brgya yod de// de dag gis sems can rnams bsas pa'i nam
151b5(1): bzhin du sa so/ kun 'byung ba'i 'ded pa'i phying dang / 'dod pa le bdes pa'i phyim dang / yas kyi bde pa'i bying da kyang de gnyin no// kinas byas pang chen pos nor/ ba
151b6(1): phal po che zhes bya ba las 'phags pa'i 'den pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lathil gnyis nas 'od gzer bye ba brgya brag bkye re/ song gsam sa
151b7(1): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling bye ga 'phrag brgya las nang to// shar gyi lus 'phags gling bye ba phrag brgya dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang / byang gi sgra byi snyar
151b8(1): bye ba zag brgya nga / rgyal po cher po bye ba zag brgya btsun to// kho bran rdo rje'i'i bye ba phyag brgya song po byang chub sems dag kye sas tu son to// mngon par/ byung rtse 'am cu ga
151b9(1): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'chang rgya ba bye ba phrag brgya bsta nad to// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa bye brag brgya ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bye ba 'phrag brgya bstan to// ri rab ri'i
152a1(1): rgyas pa bye ba zag brgyabs sa rgyas pa ca tha'aba'i zhes lams kyi rnam pa bye na nan to// che ma'i ga'i mi byeb zag rgya ba to// gas 'an byas pa/ sa da ma
152a2(1): lag brgya sum to// ga'ang 'phrul dbang byed kyi rtswa'i ris bye ba zag brgya bstan to// tshangs pa'i 'jig nyes byes ga brgya ba sa dang to// rgya rlom pa sna ga zag brgyab can to// dege rgyas bye ba phrag brgya ba to// 'bras bu chen po rgya
152a3(1): zag brgya bstan to/ 'og kyis gi bye sa phrag brgya bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khongs su gang ci yang chung ste/ gnogs pas 'gyur ba de dag thams cad rnaMs kyis yan to// ji ltar 'drin bcob ldan 'das sangs sa
152a4(1): kyi gdan la bzhugs shing // byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdus shin tu phra ba snyed dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ bskor cing mdun tu byas par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jam bu'i gling bye ba
152a5(1): phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa khye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ngo // de dag thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcwa brgya 'ongs pa/

152a7(1): chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gi khams mying 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gi mdog rang

152a10(1): bcings pa byed pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed pasgribs pa byed pa dang / rig byed ma bkun smra dang / rig byed dam bu dang // rlig bye dbang 'brug dang / rlig byed chungs pa dang / rlig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba ga
152b1(1): thams cad na yang byang chu semapa dmas 'jas dpal zhes bya bgasag 'an nyid brjod de gcig ji lta ba bzhid thams cad na yang ste/ ram kyi tshigs su bca pa 'di dag rgya sa sos bya // 'jig rten du
152b2(1): dang kyi ldam zhing thal bar gyur te/ dngos byed pa'i/ yang dag sangs rgyas lus shes pa/ de dag byig gi lam gyi gnas// shes rab chen po sras mthong zhing // dang ma po'i 'dra shes kyi 'jug la// rnam par ba sgoms gang shes
152b3(1): 'gyur ba// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// 'jig rten khams 'di mthong 'gyur te// sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la// gang gi sems ni phyi gsopa/ sangs rgyas chos pa gang gi rnams// mnyam pa'i sems sa

152b7(1): pang skye byed pa// de dag grags pa chen por 'gyur/ sems cadan rnams pa skye ba byed// 'jigs pa yang yod ma yin te// de ltar gang gis shes pa ni// de dag bla na byed par 'gyur// gang gis cig la gang zhes shing /

152b9(1): bar byas so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so// shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /

153a2(1): 'og kyi dbye ba phrag brgya'i bar tu ste nang te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ci ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdam ye bzhugs/

153b10(1): gzer de dag 'jig rten gi khams de dag 'ongs nas/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gi khams brgya bsdang bar byas nas/ gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gi khams
153b11(1): yang 'das 'i dang bye ba brgya bsan pa nas/ 'og gyen bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan pa ste/ 'jig ton gyi khams de dag khongs su gang ni sa ma rung ste/ gtogs pas gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji skas
154a1(1): ras sa pas ca kyi gdang la 'thams gang/ byang chum sems nas yangs rgyas kyizhi nga bama'i bu gnas thab skyed dang ba lags pa de bzhin 'jig rten gyi'ardza ma ma rna bzhi rtse zag tutu hA ma/ 
154a2(1): bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pas snang ba ste/ thams cad du 'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyos bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu la bcu'i 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mying 'di zhes bya ba/ 
154a3(1): ngag steg 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang nor dpal dang / rin cen dpal dang yon dpal dang myig gi dpal dang 'o// ba rtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang ye shes dpal dang bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba
154a4(1): ngag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mying 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gseng gi mdog dang yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad ma'i khadog dang / tsem pa ka'i tha dog dang / 
154a5(1): gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na yangs la'i spyad pa pyod pa dag ste'o/ 'di snyan cig byed phyi ga 'o ba dang / rig byed myi spyod pa dang / rig byed brtsis pa skyed pa dang / reg byed kun 'byod dang / rig byed pa sgribs pa byed pa dang / 
154a6(1): rig byed mtha' rgyas dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sde tshogs shes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpal de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems 'apa' re me zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas/ 
154a7(1): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra la snyed dang lhan gcig tu phyin te/ gcig na ci lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub seMs dpal 'jam dpal zhes bya bag stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ci lta ba de bzhin thas cad na yang brjod do// 
154a8(1): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyab so so nas smra bar gyur da to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ba'i rang bzhin du/ thugs su chud nas pa sgrib pa myed gzigs te// zil gyis me nod chags pa myi papar 'ang // skye dgu rab tu 'dul yang shi tu stang/ 
154a9(1): lus gser gyil po 'dra ba de// sku ched skye bar gyur pa rab tu mthong // skyes bu'i zla ba rnam par mdzes ma de/ tha ma'i sku ya pa 'dzin pa sel las mthong // yon tan tshad las 'dus kun ma la 'ang / dgongs pa mkhye
154a10(1): bzhin shin tu ma khas gyur dus 'o/ 6/ byes chu po rje ni mngon med gshegs pa // ma las 'chags ker gshegs pa nad tu mthong // phyogs brgya kun tu rnam sum ba snang ba 'o// la las mthon ti rgyan gyi
154b1(1): de ba'i sa 'og ga 'dod pa'i yos tan ldan pa'i skye dbu mams// gzigs nas 'ashad par de bzhin pa las 'bod gaste 'arjid mtshungs myed mangs las la myig ga seng ge'i 'or gsung ba de ga zhi mthong / gsu
154b2(1): ma nom yang 'og gsung yang ga ga su'i maba' mang gaston pa nga yas mthong ga gab cing bkun las rnam par grol ba de/ gas dag pab nas 'byung las rab tu mthong ka sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs byas spyod pa'i rnas ga gzigs shing shi pa de gnos
154b3(1): la las thong ka' las byang chub rnying po dpa pa chos rnams thams cad mad lnga sangs rgyas gde/ yon tanams dpa sa phyi pa dang sas pa rnal pas pa nyin med pa smras pa mchog gal las chod kyi thang mo gang yang yang zugs / 
154b4(1): brnyes pa de mthong ngo // a las skye dgu chad bye rje 'dul bang ka skyes yu dal la de ni de bzhin mthong / la las gzhi'i brjid chungs pa myed ma di/ 'jig rten thos pang zis kyis mdad mdzad rnye// rdzu 'phrul 'chags byed pa byed stobs yang lab// seng
154b5(1): gang ra ldan pa de na thong / sa pa sa pa'i 'i sa ra dzin parten spoms bya nga das pas yang // rnas pa pa de ma byas thug/ sa phyog yang de gas she/ sa #
154b6(1): de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs yo'o/  su 'jig rten gyi khams song snang bar byas nas/ gsung de bzhin du snyed/  dgi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams stong gi yar tu snang bar byas te ga 'dri
154b7(1): rten gyi kha'as re reb yab 'jam bu'i gling bye ba brgya sman nas 'ogasrid bye ba khrag brgya'i bar bya 'astan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de du/ kI khams de dag gi khongs su ga kyi yang drung byen sogs par gyur pa ra
154b8(1): dag thams cad zil kyis bstan to// ci ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig kyi khams le le'i gling bzhi bye ba phrag brgya kun tam yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi gdan la
154b9(1): bzhugs par snang rog thams cad tu yang sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par 'gyur to// byang chub sems dpas de dag thams cad kyang gying 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di skar ma
154b10(1): dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gi khams mying 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste
154b11(1): 'di ltar/ gser gi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i khangar dgabyang chub sems dpa' re
155a1(1): rabazhi gshegs pa'i mtsha 'di zhes bya ba'i zhapa 'bring na tshangs pa'i byad pa myong pa dag sa 'di ltar rig byed byinas pa zhes bya ba nas pa rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dan no// byang chub sems pa rjes
155a2(1): thams cad kyang re re zhing byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tshul gan tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jas dpa' zhes
155a3(1): bya bag stam dang dor 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra ba 'gyur to// gang gis bde la gshegs rnams kyi chos bab pa / gzil byid/ 
155a4(1): non pa brjod pa'i rnams// gapa la 'jig rten rtag tu myos 'gyur pa/ de dag thams cad rims kyis rab tu ston // gal te bdag gcig byed du zin na ni// de'i spyod yul stong bzhi pa 'ang myed// rang 'byung chub
155a5(1): rnams shin tu bsal ba'i// bdel gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar byung // mkhyen dang rnam grol zhabs dang ldan pa'i rnams tshungs pa myed la grangs kyang nam yang myed// de ni 'jig rten 'di na la
155a6(1): ngag/ rgyal thonas pa byed par 'dod phyir ro// gang sa phung po byed tsho khams byed de// skye mched dag dang bye zhing 'chi byed pa'i mas ni 'jig ted 'di rnyed pas / skyes bu me she nas snga rab tu brjod/ can
155a7(1): nab dang phyi zhes bya bar gdags brnabs// de dag rang bzhin dngos nyid stong pa ste// rtog pa myed cing rnam rtog de bzhin byed// gzhal du myed pa'i chos nyid 'di 'dra'o// de dag la ni g.yo ba ras yang byed// snyems shing
155a8(1): ldog dang sgrib pa gang yang byed// 'jig rter thams cad rjes su rab tu mkhyengs/ mtha' yas bcug pa'i tshul ni ShAdra'o// zhi ba'i ti nge 'dzid 'apyod yul dgyes pa'i rnams// rtse gcig gnyis la grod pa 'ang ma yin te/ 
155a9(1): mid kyis thogs pa de la'ang gang yang byed// 'dir ni sangs rgyas ni ba chur byo ma ga rgyu dang rkyes ngang bya ba rnams dang / las kyi rnam spyod brjod pa'is/ rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi ldog ste/ bdel gshegs chos ni de ltar bsam/ 
155a10(1): myi khyab/ phyogs rnams bcu na ji ltar 'khod pa'i// 'jig rten rnam pa sna 'tshogs kun gzigs shing // sems can tshad myed yongs su 'grel mdzad kyang // skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtog myi mnga'/ thams cad ma khyod/ 
155b1(1): da na gas ga mngon/ de yang than rnanas pas kyis tu gsos// dedag paras pa 'dra di bzhin tu/ thug paras ni ga chos kyang s+ho/ gas pa sa rgyamanus pa'i kya gas
155b2(1): pa men po'i mdong / byam mo bam 'byan pa'o// de ras 'ad ze de dag 'dig rten gyi khams de dganas 'das te/  byanas mangs su 'jig rten gyi 'tha pong than bca snang bar gru po// byung ba tun
155b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag bstan pa nas 'og khyen bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste// 
155b4(1): gtogs par gyur nga pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bsunang to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdam la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bca'i 'dul gidang tu zla ba snyed dang babs gcig par sna /

155b6(1): de dag rabs cad kyang 'jig rted gyi khams bying zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs te dang ste/ 'di skang gces kyi mdon nas 'dra ba'i mdo ces bya ba'i de dad ko byang chus sems pas de dag payas pang kyang de bzhi shes pa'i
155b7(1): mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi sam 'bring ma rangs pa'i sung pa 'apyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltang rig byed myi gsol ba nas rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba ma dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag pams pad re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa'/

156a4(1): gyurd cing mang por rab tu 'gyurd// mang por gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin 'gyur// 'gro ba'i khams ni du mar thugs su chud cing thams cad tshul dang 'dral bar rab tu 'gyur/ sku myed de la chags pa gang yang myed// byor pa byed cing /

156a6(1): ma mi gag pa de gshegs leges de 'dra'i rang bzhid do// de ci tul bya ba'i bu de 'di 'ang dang / de das 'od me de da 'angag tod dede dgas 'ad te/ gang phyo sa logs su 'jig rten gyi 'ams brgyan/

157b1(1): bas pa 'ji ba 'ing rab tu shes// de dag mos ma yongs su rtogs par byed/ gaphyogs rnams gang bya yid kyis spor byed pa// bA kun tu mngon shes myung ba yid bzhis thob// bde bar gshegs pas ba sngags ni
157b2(1): ba'i chos thos shing / de la zhum pa byed pa gang yang byed// zhing rnams yongs su baspyod pa shes pa dang // de bzhin byin rlabs rnam par rgyu ba dang // sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs su gnang pa dang // grangs byed
157b3(1): kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya/ grangs phyed chos rnams yos su 'dri ba dang // tsi nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus 'gyur zhing // dbyings kyi rnam pa shin tu yangs 'gyur dang // sems gcig sangs rgyas grangs can snyen

157b9(1): dro bag gzung ba ram par 'tshul ba dang / thams cad gabyedas kyi sems kyang gin tu ya nga // zhing ltar bano sa byed pa 'gro bya zhing // dam tshab ga'ams rnams ma dus na' bar myong // de'i sras dang sras kyi 'as / 
158a1(1): rgyas chos gis chags phyed de bzhin brjod// chos dbyings mtha' dang dpung myed pa// rgyas pa dgengs pa bde gshegs brjod pa mdzad// ji nas 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par // yongs su spang byed byin gyis rdos

158a7(1): byas shing // thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang / bdag dang bdag myed 'dod chags bral ba'i/ sems// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gzhan gi bsam pa yongs su gzhal byas shing // tog rnam rtog
158a8(1): thams cad rab spangs te// pyod pa 'di 'dra dag dang ldan gyu rang ba// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'or// gang rnams bsam gyis myi khyab zhing 'jil zhing // sems pan rgya mtsho la yid kyis mthun byed de/ 
158a9(1): blo can rdzu 'phyal stobs dang ldan 'gyurd pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong/ gang gis zhing rnams rnam par bsam pa na// gzugs dang gzugs byed 'du shes yod myed pa// thams cadra grangs su nye bar/ 
158b1(1): 'gro ba ni/ de dag las mi 'di 'drab 'gyur la 'ong // nagang rnams zhing ni rdul du zhig byas shing // thams cad phyogs su bkang zhing 'grang byas te// de dag nang du rgyal pa 'jung byed pa// de dan las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur
158b2(1): bar 'ong // de nas 'od gzer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das nas/ gar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya snang bar byas nas/ steng gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong khrag brgya'i bar du snang bar byas so//

163a4(1): thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin/ 'di don ji 'dra de bzhin du// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyen par gyis/ bdag gi lus la su gnas shes// gang gris nang gi bar shes pa/ yang dag yod pa' byed pa'i donades ni

163a6(1): kun kyang rnam par sgoms// sems ni phyir ldog myi 'gyur te/ dngos po kun ni brtags la'o// gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang / gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur/ ci ltar 'gal me 'khor lo'i//

163a8(1): kun tu rab tu 'byung / rnam par smin pas rab tu 'byung // phyi ma ji bzhin sngos de bzhin// sems ni dbang byed yin par bshad// dad pa'i chus ni ji bzhin du// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci yog/ 'jig rten thams cad ston

163b9(1): mchog na las dang / dz+raM / lha'i bu rnams kun ldan yang 'pho bas spang ba gang yang byed/ de bzhin las k+Sh+ma rang bzhin no// ci ltar 'jig rten la sa dka/ bas mang gis myi khyab par gyur kyang // de dag 'ong la ka sa

167b7(1): myed pa sa ma tshams byed pa/ gzhal du myed pa brjod du myed pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gzugs pa / thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du
167b8(1): yul gi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur da to// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang gshar gyi
167b9(1): phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin tu g+ho chub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du snyed kyi phyogs kyi
167b10(1): jig brten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad myed kha dpag tu byed pa grangs myed bsam gyis myi khyab la 'tshungs pa myed lasakun tu mtha' yas la mu myed pa gzhal du byed pa brjod cu myed pa chos kyi dbyings
167b11(1): kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mabs gtugs pa dag na sems can gyi rgyud ci snyed pa zhes bya la nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci snyed pa'i bar du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byid kyis rab tu
168a1(1): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdog/ sangs rgyas las po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpanas dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bre maco lnga pa'o// 
168a2(1): bya ba'i che kyang chus sems nas 'am rnams la mas thab pa byed sa kyi sa dang 'anapa 'i khang sa 'or babyed do dgas pa dang 'a pa yin/ pa
168a3(1): lus kyi las kyi 'thogs pa yin / rag gi las kyi 'thogs pa yid/ da med kyi shes kyi 'thogs pa yid/ lus kyi las kyi gathogs pa/ gshin ngag gi sas gyig tsun pa yid/ yid kyisas kyi gzug
168a4(1): sus kyi nges rnas par dag pa yi dag gi las rnam par dag pa yin rjod kyi las rnam par dag pa yid la lus kyi las nyer ma nyer mongs pa byed pa yin rag gi las nye bar nyid mangs la byed pa ming ming kyi sa
168a5(1): nyod mongs pa byed pa yin/ yus kyi sa sa ye shes sngon tu 'gro ba yin/ ngag gi las ye ges sngon tu 'gro ba yin pa yid kyi las ye ges snom tu 'gro ba yid/ rigs phreng gsum tshogs pa yin te rus srer gsum chogs pa yin
168a6(1): rgyung chung gsum tshogs pa yin/ gzugs phus gsum tshogs pa yin pa/ mtshan bu ni gsum tshogs pa yin/ dran pa phun gsum gogs pa yin/ zo gros yud gsum tshogs pa yin / rtog sra ba phur gsu tshogs pa yin / dga' ba
168a7(1): phun gsum tshogs pa yid pa blo mun gsum tshogs pa yid/ blo gros mchog tu gyu rang pa yin/ bye groste dam par gyur ga yin pa blo gros rab tu gyu rang pa yid/ blo gros chad byed pa yin/ blo gros grangs byed pa yin/ blo gros babs kyis
168b1(1): rgya yin/ blo gros patshungs pa byed pa yin na blo gros gzhal du byed pa'i yin/ bre gros brjod du byed pa yin / rgyu'i stobs can ya ni/ bsam pa'i stobs can yin/ spyod pa'i stobs can yin/ rkyen gyi stonas can yin/ dmyigs
168b2(1): pa'i stobs can yin/ dbang po'i stobs cad yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs can yin/ zhi ba'i gnas kyi stobs can yin/ lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i stobs cam yin/ phung po la mkhas pa'o yin
168b3(1): 'dres pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/ da ltar 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub yan lags mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin
168b4(1): brtson 'grug yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin dga' ba yang dgra byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas la yin/ rab tu 'byung ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi len
168b5(1): bsgoms pa yin pa spyod pa'i pha ro lar tu byin pa yin/ tshul khribs kyi ro ya tu phyin da pe yin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin da la yin / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol de tu byin pa yim bsam gtad kyil mo lang tu byid/ 
168b6(1): pa min 'ashes rab kyi pha ros tu phyi dang pa ying ga bya 'as pa'i pha ro 'ad tu byin pa yin snying rje'i pha rol tu phyinang la sing sa dga' ba'i la ro ladas kyi rang pa yid/ btang snyoms kyi pha ro langs phyinang pa yin pa gnas dang gas
168b7(1): ma yin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin 'das la dang yang 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam khar sbyin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang brtsod 'grus pa dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gnas
168b8(1): gcig nas gcig tu btsud par khong du chud pa yin ga khams sogs dang khams du ma'i shes par bya la kho du chung pa yin pa mos pa sna tshogs dang mos pa du shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin kung tu 'gro ba 'i sa
168b9(1): shes par bya ba khong du chung ma yin / bsa' gtan dang rnam khang ba cad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byung ba dang / ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chun pa 'in
169a1(1): ga bsgribs pa byed pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yis/ lha'i dbyig chags pa myed pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams spyod la yang dag par gcad par shes
169a2(1): kA bar bya ba kho du chung ba sin na lha'i dbang pos yongs su 'thu ba yin pa klu'i dbang pos yongs su 'thung ma yin pa gnod sbyin gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri ba'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin
169a3(1): ma yin gi dbang pos yongs su gzung ba yin/ nam mamakha' lding dbang pos yongs su gzung ba yin/ myi 'am ci yi dbang los yongs su gzung ba'i yam/ blto bye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su bzung po yid/ myi'i dab pa pos
169a4(1): yongs su bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin// lha'i dbang pos bkur pa yin / klu'i dbang pos bkum pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos bkur po yin/ lha ma yin
169a5(1): gyi dbang pos bsum la yin gams mkha' lding gi dbang thos bsus pa ga'in myi sa ma ci'i dbang 'os gsungs 'di rko bya chen po'i da'ang dngos bku ba yin gyi'i dbang pos bgyur ma yin// sems par
169a6(1): yin/ rlo rgyar dam yin/ nam pam 'dren par byad pa yin/ yongs su 'dred par bya da pa yid/ sems can 'ams cad kyi chog tu gyu nga pa yin/ gang po byu pa yin/ dru bong byung dang yid/ rab tu bla
169a7(1): yin/ dmasas byang nga ba yin/ sras tu bya ba yid bra ma byed ba yin// kye rgyas ba'i sras ji ltar ni byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams sanyam pabyed pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems papa 'das dpa' kyis/ 
169a8(1): nga sogs das la 'di 'a dusas so / ce rgyal ba'i sgras khyod de gang zhu po mang gas pad pa dang / zla bam pa so bde sa nyin pa stong 'artse ba dang / 'dang kyimams kyid ni dang napas
169a9(1): dang / 'di panas su tshu gis kyi zug gi da su khrod na 'di kyis gas / yongs su dring namam pa da / kye bya ba ma sam sa lags po// rtse chu ba'i thas kyang chu sem sa
169b1(1): ngag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpal rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob pas 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sogs pa byed pa'i khas su
169b2(1): 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba rnams kyi kham du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong pa'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang
169b3(1): chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / myi dge' ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / kun tu gzung shing kun tu/ 
169b4(1): mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa gnyis pas 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i
169b5(1): sa byang chub sems dpa' sems byas ma yi la byed pa'i spyor bya grang dang ldang ba'i yon can gyi khyang pas 'di dag thams car thob sam/ gyur ba'i byang chub sems da 'i 'as med la spyong bde gag she na ce rgya na
169b6(1): sbas 'di la byang chub sems dpa'as khyim gyi nang na 'jug pa'i che/  / sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas khyim gyi/ thibs pos zi snod kyis myi non par 'gyur gcig ces sems skyed do// 
169b7(1): kha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems bebs sems can thamasacad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur gcig ces sems skyed do/ bu dang bu mo dang 'brogs
169b8(1): pa'i che byang chub sems dpas sems cad thams cad sred pa dang shin tu bras las dga' ba rang myi dga' ba dang // rnam par bral ba ma gyur gcig zhes sems skyed do// 'dod pa'i yos tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
169b9(1): dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rold tu phyind pas 'dod pa'i gesas shing rnam par se yang bar 'gyur nga gcig ces de ltar sems bskyed do// grugs dang rol mo dang sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub
169b10(1): semams dpas sems can thams cad gang khan gi tshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i rtog pa rab tu thob par gyu rad cig ces sems bskyed do// chung ma'i 'khomad kyi nang ma 'dug pa'i tshe ga byang chub
170a1(1): ga sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod pa 'i gas la ging dang bral zhing 'phags pa'i sar chud par bya ba gcig ces sems pa skyed dog rgyan gyis brgyad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ba sems can thams cad
170a2(1): cad srid par 'byung gA'i 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas khur lor bar gyu rang cig ces sems bskyed do// khang tog tu phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing
170a3(1): chos kyi khang stengs su 'byin de par gyu nga cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdag gir bya ba byed de/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems myed kyi bdag gi thams cad
170a4(1): yongs su gtong bar gyur da cig ces sems bskyed do// ma bral zhig 'grogs pa'i che na byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'ja phyin te/ dradra ba dang shin tu bral bar byar gcig ces sems bskyed pa
170a5(1): bcon ra ya kha na ma tho ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas de sems can thams cad gnas myed pa la spyod cing gang tu dga' ba dang 'dod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim ngas khyim myed par
170a6(1): 'byung ba'i tshen byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang grol ba myed cing chags pa khyed de myi 'grogs pa dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dges 'dun gi ra ba'i mtshams/ rkye'u
170a7(1): 'dal ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gal pa sbed pa'i chos dang ldan zhing mithun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan 'ar gyur ngapa gcig ces sems bskyed do// khan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe ba byang chub
170a8(1): sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu 'byung bar gsol pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bar chad myed cing phyir rgya
170a9(1): ldog pa'i chos can bye gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa ya spangs te/ dge ba'i rtsa la shin tu sbyangs par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed
170a10(1): do/ sgra dang kha spu 'breg pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam pa d+mo bzhag cing nyon rmongs pa myed par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// gos rung sbyin gyon pa'i me/ byang chub sems dpa'as som
170b1(1): can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa myed 'ang gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe sa byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir de bzhin
170b2(1): gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bas rab tu 'byung bar gyur do cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas la bskyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe ga byang chub sems rapas sems can thams cad dge pa la mos pa mngon par skyed pas sangs rgyas gtung myi rkang
170b3(1): 'chang ba'i don tu brtson grus gcig ces sems bskyed do// chos la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro
170b4(1): ba'i tshe / byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'chags kha'i gnas dang bral zhi pa dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// bslab pa'i tshig yang dag par me dad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems
170b5(1): can thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par pyod cing 'asral pa khams/  cad sa shin tu skabs par gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// slob da dpon gyis bstan pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams
170b6(1): cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la dpyod cir tshul dang spyod yul phun gsumatshogs par gyur nga gcig ces sems bskyed do// mkhan pos snyan pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad gnas byed pa ya yang
170b7(1): dag par gzhol zhing myi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// bsnyed pa rdzogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad chos kyi khyad par pha rol tu phyind te/ thabs ma'as/ 
170b8(1): ba'i pha rol tu phyind par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa'as sems cad thams cad myi 'phrogs pa'i chos can du gyur da te/ bla na myed pa'i gnas pa rnam par dpyod par gyur / 
170b9(1): gcig ces sems bskyed do// bstan 'ating ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ba zhi ba legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// 'dug pa'i tshe byang chub sems
170b10(1): dpas sems can thams cad myi gnas pa'i sems kyis snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur dacig ces sems bskyed do// dkyil mo krung 'tsha' ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad myi g.yo ba'i sa la dge
171a1(1): pa'i wa ba shin tu brtan par gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// bzhi nas yongs su spyong pa'i byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing
171a2(1): dang dul ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur nga gcig nyis sems bskyed do// lkog mthong yongs su spyod pa byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa'i chos can tu gyur da rtse rgyam sa
171a3(1): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu mthor bar gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// dkyil mo kru ba'i dag pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam khang bzhag cing 'du byed pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis
171a4(1): 'jig nas par mthong bar gyur nga cig ces sems bskyed do// kad kyi zil 'jog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad sems rnam par grol ba phyi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur gcig ces
171a5(1): sems bskyed/ rkang mthi la 'deg pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as/  sems can thams cad kha ma' po da byed pa dang ldan pa thob ste/  'khor ba'i brgya mchor 'bying ba las 'bon parar gyur nga gcig ces
171a6(1): sems bskyed do// smar g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ngo che shes shing khrel yod pa bla na byed pa rang ldang zhing dge ba'i ma bzhin tu brtan par gyur pa gcig ces
171a7(1): rnams brjod // ska sa gaching ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thams cad kyi 'khrugs pa'i chos pas tu bgyur te dge ba'i rtsa ba ginas sa 'brel bur gyum gtsug ces sems bskyed do// bla gob rtson pa'i ma
171a8(1): chub sems dpa'am sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyirang pa thob ste/ gong nas gong tu dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par gyur nga gcig ces sems bskyed do// spyad pa gyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems rapas
171a9(1): sems can thams cad myi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba te ga thabs dpa pas mngon par bkab par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// so shing len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i
171a10(1): dngos po thos pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos mar par dag sa thob par byang gcig gyis sems bskyed do// so shing ba ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems pa thams cad nyon mongs bshin tul cos te sems dus zhing sems dang
171b1(1): pam gyu nga gcig ces bskyed do// dben par 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ma/ sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug sbyangs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// kye
171b2(1): dogs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems cad thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu 'byung bar gyur pa cig ces sems bskyed do// gtsang sA i las bying pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa sa
171b3(1): sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos sdang zhing nges pa dang ldan par 'gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// lag pa khya ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bzung ni du
171b4(1): bcangs pa'i phyir bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyu rang gcig ces sems bskyed do// ngo bkru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur
171b5(1): rje gcig ces sems bskyed do// khar pa len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'asan sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing lam bston pagyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// lhung zed len pa'i tshe byang chub ses
171b6(1): dpa'as sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad gyis mchod par 'os shingasnod du gyu dang gcig ces sems bskyed do// spyod yul du mngon pas bzhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas
171b7(1): myeng pa yang dag par gzhol zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur dang gcig ces sems bskyed do// lam du zhugs pa'i tshe sha byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad phyi na ma lus 'chi bar 'gro zhing sangs
171b8(1): rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i bla sgribs pa myed par grub par 'gyur da pas chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbung myed
171b9(1): pa khong du chud par gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// las mtho ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems pan thams cad shin tu zhum pa byed/ de/ khams gsum las gyen rtsa 'phags par gyur pa gcig ces sems
171b10(1): bsnyed do/ lam dma' ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba'i b+ha ya shin tu brtan zhing sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu 'dud par gyur da cig ces sems bskyed do// lam nyam pa
172a1(1): sabong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad lta ba yo zhing gyi drang ba dang pAl te/ lamanyam papa yongs su spangs par gyurang gcig ces sems bskyed do// lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe/ 
172a2(1): byang chub sems dpas sems cam thams cad g.yo byed cing rgyu byed de/ sems drang po dang ldan par gyur nga gcig ces sems bskyed do// lam rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad
172a3(1): shin tu rdul byed pa'i chos yang dag par thob ste// 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'i chos las rnam par 'grelang bar gyur /  gcig ces sems bskyed do// rdul myed pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa mthams ca/ 
172a4(1): sdig pa'i chos thams cad bas la te /  dge ba'i chos la rab tu gzho/ dpar 'gyur da gcig ces/ sems bskyed do// 'khor mthor ba'i/  chen byang chub sems dpa'as/ sems can thams cad dus gsum
172a5(1): rtogs pa'i chos zab mo bstan pa dang mthun par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// ka ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpasasems can thams cad khro zhing 'khor du 'dzinang pa dang bras
172a6(1): te khengs pa dang 'khrugs pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur da cig ces sems bskyed do// nags 'tshal tshal mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as/ sems can thams cad lha dang 'jig brten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas
172a7(1): drakya ngam se mas se ya rnyed da/ sa ma byang chum sems dpag sems pa na thams par thob pa ngasas pa dang / rigs pa byed pa sus tha'i dag sems 'ams la sa kyis mngan pa lags sa cas / 
172a8(1): ces sems bskyed do// shing cher ma can mthong pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug myed cing tshe rA dang bral bar gyur da cig ces sems bskyed do// shing lo ma can mthong / 
172a9(1): ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad bsan gtamarnam par ma'i rang ba dang tring nge 'dzin pa dang snyoms pam 'jug bya drug gis rab tu yog par gyu nga gcig ces sems bskyed do// me tog mthong ba'i tshe/ 
172b1(1): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas me tog lta bur gyu rang gcig ces sems bskyed do// me tog shing mthong po'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thabs
172b2(1): cad skyes bu che po ma ca gsum bcu rtsam gnyis kyi kye tog gin tu rgyas las gyu rang gcig zhes sem sa bskyed do// shing kog mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can khams pa zhing po byang chubatuganos 'ang sangs rgyab kyi cho
172b3(1): btsal ba thams cad 'bras bu yod de/ 'bras bu'i dam pa khrol par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// chu krung mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi se shes nyams sa myong gi chos kyi rgyu la
172b4(1): bar bzhag par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// yu ma mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud
172b5(1): bar gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// brjing bu mthong ba'i tshe byang // chub sems dpa'as sems cad thams cad chos thams cad kyi tshig shin tu bstan pa/ la mkhas shing chos thams cad kyis
172b6(1): skyes pa'i tshig gi yo dang ldang par gyu rang gzhin ces sems pabyed do//  'od pa mthong 'a'i ma byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thas bya'ang chos bams pan 'apyod pa dang ldangad zhing 'thos pa yong ba rgyas kyi
172b7(1): ces sems bskyed do / mtsho mthong pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmyigs pa la rab tu brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba myi zad par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// zam pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub
172b8(1): sems dpags sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su gsal la la zam pas gyur da cig ces sems bskyed do// yur ze mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun kyi sems dang bas su lal
172b9(1): mkhas shing bgasang nyas pa dang kun nas 'khor pa myed par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// ra ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang lo dang reg la sred pa rab tu byang bar gyur da gcig
172b10(1): ces sems 'byed du rnaM mya ngang byed pa'i rigs thachas mthong ba'i cheg byang chub sems dpa' sa sems cam thams cad sred pa zhin tu byed cing mya ngan byed pang shin tu thob par gyur gcig ces sems pa skyed dor bapal shing gi ra ma 'ong ba'i
173a1(1): a sa byang chub sems dpas sems can thams ca sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su myi gtob lal yin tub son lam gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// sems ca rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'thob pa ma byang chub sems rab 'a sems
173a2(1): can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par gyur nga gcig ces/ sems bsnyed do// rgyan myed pa'i sems can mthor ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad spangs pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa thob
173a3(1): pas rgyan myed par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// dga' ba mang ma'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' zhing mos pa dang sprod pas dga' ba mang bar gyur da cig ces sems bskyed do// 
173a4(1): myi dga' ba mang ba sems can mthong pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thams cad 'dus kyi dngos po thams cad la myi dga' ba mang bar gyur da gcig ces sems laskyed do// sems can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as
173a5(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad rab tu thog pas shin tu bde'i bar gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// seM sa de can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe ka byang chub sems dpa'as sems can pas
173a6(1): cad ye shes kyi rtsa pa rab tu thob ste sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur pa gcig ces sosabaskyed do// nad myed pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byangachub sems dpa'as/ sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan byed pa'i chos cand du
173a7(1): gyur pa te/ tha dad pa myed pa khong du chud par gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// sems smyu gagu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mos pa med par gyur pa gcig/ 
173a8(1): ces sems bskyed do// kyi sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad kyi dge' ba'i bshes nyen gyi bya ba la mos par ma gyur nga gcig ces sems bskyed do// drin gzo' pa'i sems cad mabong ba'i
173a9(1): byang chub sems dpa' ga sems cad thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sebs dpa'as thams cad kyi 'dzad pa shes par gyur dgacig ces sems bskyed do// drin 'azo ba myed pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems ra
173a10(1): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i lta ba la drid du bzo' ba myed par gyur da cig ces sems bskyed do// dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshi ga byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thams cad ma lus/ pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang
173b1(1): dadul ba la gzhol bar gyur de gcig ces sems bskyed do// bram ze mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dam par gyur da te/ sdig pa spangs par gyur pa gcig ces sems pasnyed do// dka'
173b2(1): thu ba can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad maHlus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la la rtson zhin dka' thub la shin tu gzhol bar gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// brtul zhugs la mthong ba'i tshe

173b6(1): bathod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad thogs pa myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur nga gcig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can

173b8(1): chos spangs par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do// blon po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as skams can 'ams cad dge ba'i chos kyi dpyod pa thams cad la bzang po'i yid la byed par gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed do
173b9(1): grong 'khyer mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur pa te sa 'phrul po che'i lus dang 'dra bar gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// rgyas po 'i gnas mabong ba'i tshe byang chub sems

174a2(1): cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis bsngags pas 'os zapar gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// slong bya 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams ca Na spobs pa myed pa'i tshal gyis chos kyi dbyings su chung par gyur da cig
174a3(1): ces sems bskyed do// stong phying ba'i rtsa byang chub sems dpasas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi nor byin pem gyur de gcig ces sems bskyed do// nang du phying pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can brgya
174a4(1): cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin par gyur // gcig ces sems bskyed do// myi sbyin nom byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa sems can thabs cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyid pa thob ci pa phyir spang ba skyed

174a8(1): rgyas kyi chos kyi khyod pa thams gang la ril 'gro byed par gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// rim 'gro ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad kyi myi dge ba'i chos mchod par thams car la rag su sa

174a10(1): ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas shing ngo tsha myed pa yongs su spangs par gyu rang gcig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas gsod pa tho ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems

174b2(1): nyams su 'del ba b.las pa thob yang bya rang gcig ces sems bskyed do// kha bas sbrum khrag thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad snying rje ched pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldang zhing sems 'jab par

174b6(1): kyi chos kyi pha yong tu phyind cing byas byas par gyur da cig ces sems ge bskyed do// chos baspyod pa'i / byang chub sems dpas sems shecas thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sa yang dag par

174b10(1): sems can thams cad mu myed par phyi nad te yongs su gdung ba nasal bar gyur da gcig ces sems bskyed dong / bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang / chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad shind tu bsol par gyur te/

175a3(1): pa'i phyig dang ldan par gyur gcig ces sems bskyed do// myig kyi dge bas lta pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpalas sems can thams cad kun tu 'arjes pas kun tu bzang por gyur nga gcig ces sems bskyed do//

175a8(1): yon tan 'jod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'as sems cad thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol de tu phyind pas yon tan myi zad par gyur gcig ces sems bsnyed do// mtshan rnams brjod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'

175a10(1): byed pa'i mthar byis cing rdzu 'grus kyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyi nang par gyur gcig ces/ skye mas paskyed do// lus spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa sems cad thams cad bsal pa la tog pa skyed ci lus kyi/ 
175b1(1): rubya byed gin tu bde'i byar gyu nga gcig ces sems bskyed do// gnyid sad pa'i tshe la byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad phyogs bcu thams cad du mthu chen thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes pa
175b2(1): shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur pa gcig ces sems bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yid la byed pa'i spyod pa gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di
175b3(1): dag dang gzhan thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur zhing / lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang badrad du bcas pa dang / 'tshangs par bcas la dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze la dang skye dkyus bcas pa dang / sta dang dri za dang phyi rang lha ma
175b4(1): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rted dang / hang thom dpa nga sangs rgyas su 'acas tha thams cad kyis myi mthogs par gyuras pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa ni sbyor ba rnams pad de// gis ca rgyas pa
175b5(1): ched po'i mdol pa sangs rgyas mas po che 'a zhes bya ba las 'byod yug nyen yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste/  bcu drug pa'o//  dge'apag gal sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ga ginas rgyag pa'i rjen
175b6(1): mdo// zam po bcu dbu pa'o// sod spangs pa'i yu kya yul yongs dag par rtag de yang smras nas sems can dri byed pan rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub yo byam rnams gsems pa
175b7(1): dam pa bzang pomi dpas la rnyis na ga spyong sum yongs dag rgyal bas spad ba'i rams ba dag gis rgyas sras na 'as la 'dir bgad do// yon kun spyod pa ji snyed gangasod pa// rgya'u sbas rnams sa ni tshud kyis go pa
175b8(1): za ngasas kyis spru la rgyam mas da/ 'od ta sa pa de dge smon pas/ mchom pa sa migs 'ji ba'i ngags/ man po ra ya brjo pakyang chus nga rgyas kyang
175b9(1): bya shes thog par byang chub sems skyes gyur ba'i ga'asor kan brjod pa 'i'ang mapa' yas dpag su byed// dper bu byed pas mdzod kyang pa ma gyud sa pa rab byed dang sa'i yon tan la/  bskal la yang
175b10(1): nor ba'abyung ba ri zhig smom / de dag yon tan chu bo thabs cad ni phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang bad myi 'gyur/ som tan mngagams rnams kyi yon tan las / dpe tsam zhugs cung cham marjod par gyu/ 
176a1(1): sa kha' las ma dang chags lab ltar shin tu chud/ sa chen lhun las rdul phran gcig kyang 'dra/ byang chub yon tan pas 'i sems skye ba// rgyu myed ma yin gyi ma 'byung ma yin // rgyas pa rnams dang
176a2(1): bde gshegs chos rnams dang / dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyes las skye/ de yang 'dod pa bskyed pa rgyal srid dang / dag bdag bde'i don dang grags dang snyad phyir myid/ 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhil ba'i phyir/ rig
176a3(1): rten dang skyed sems ni yongs su skye/ de ni sems cad rtag tu bde'i don dang // zhing spangs sangs rgyas yang za mdzad pa'i rgyud// yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya nang / ye shes rnam par thong ba sa sems
176a4(1): skye 'o rgyal la kun dang chos dang dge 'dung dang / de bzhin bla mar gyu rang ba thams cad ya// dad dang pos dge d+hA bskyed byas te// sri zhur ma tshon byas byang chub sems kyang skye// rgyal ba bdel gshegs chos
176a5(1): id ches nas/ rgya lang sras spyod pa rnams pa yid ches te byang chub bla na myed la yid ches shits+tsha/ skyes bu dam pa rnams/ kyi sems bskye'o// dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar skyed pa ste/ 
176a6(1): pos kan bams cad sangs su sru zhing 'dred// nem nu nas zhes nang las me nga stsos// da pa del ba'i grong du phyin par byed dad pa'i sems gsas rtog pa skyed pa nyid byas nas 'das kyi u'i ca
176a7(1): za ba yin/ dad pa 'aspyod mchog nor dang gter yin te// lag pa lta bur dge spus mA ba yin zhes/ yongs su ba tangos dad pa dka' bar byed// rgyal ba'i chos la dad pa spro ba skyed/ yon tan ye shes khyad ba pa dang pa byed/ 
176a8(1): sangs rgyas lams la stong pa 'ang rnyed par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsas pa dang // gzhan gyis/ sbyi nub dngos la dad pa'i bstobs// nyon mongs grub pa myed la gnas yin te/ bdad pa rang 'byung yon tam
176a9(1): chos pa yinadad pa chags pa'i sgo dang myi 'grogs te/ myi khom spong zhing 'dri 'dzi myed par byed/ dad pa bdud kyi lam las zlo ba ste/ thar las dam pa yongs su stond pa yin/ son rgyu yan sa bon ma nul bzhin
176a10(1): dad pa byang chub shing rab rnam par snyed/ ye shes khya pa de sgo rnapas 'phel bar byed/ dad la rgyal ba rnams kyi ston pa yin/ de las dang pos khyad par dka' ba la pyod pa'i rims kyis rnam par brjod par bya/ chos
176b1(1): tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon/ rin ce na/ seng ge'i rgyal po ci bzhin no// dad pas sangs rgyas su zhu gar byed pa/ de dag tshul khrims slob pa myi gtong ngo // tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams myi rtong pa// de dag yon
176b2(1): tan gnas pas yon tan ldan// tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste// bslab pas sa'i yon tan legs sa b+h+ra mon// tshul khrims bslab pa yongs su ma btang na// rgyal ba rnams kyis bston cing bsngags par 'os// 
176b3(1): dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa 'i de dag rgyal bzhi mchod pa yangs pa byed// rgyal ba rnams ka/ mchod pa su byed la// de dag sangs rgyas mos pa khasam mye khyab// dad las chos la pu dung gar byed pa de dag rgyal ba'i
176b4(1): chos kyis phyi ngoms su nyang ba// de dag bsam gyis myi khyab chos la mos// dad pas dge 'dun phu dud su byed pa// de dag myi ldog dge 'dun rnams la sos/ myi ldog dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa// de dag dad pa'i
176b5(1): phyogs kyis byin gyi ldog/ dad pa'i stobs kyis gapa rnams kyi sngon pa/ de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing no// gang rnams / dbang po rab tu bas sa no ba ga des ni sdig pa'i grogs po rnam paran+ya
176b6(1): spangs/  gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa// / de dag chos kyi bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin// chos kyi la shes nyen gang gisayongs bzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen yod su rdzogs// dge brgya
176b7(1): chen yongs su gang baphyogs pa/ bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthul ldan/ bdag nyid che ba rgyu mthu'u gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa thob// mos pa yangs pa'i khyar par sus thob pa// de dag rtag tu
176b8(1): rgyal las byind kyis rlabs// rgyal ba'i byi nang gyis gang rnams brlabs kyu dang pa// de dag byang chub don tu sengs kyang skye ka byang chub don tu gang gis sems bskyes pa// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan du mon
176b9(1): drang srong chen po'i yor tan su rtson pa/ de dag sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan skyes / sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa sa/ de dag 'dra dang bral ba rnam par spangs/ 'du dang bral ba gang gis rnam lamathas
176b10(1): pa ka de dag bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag/ gang gi bsam pa dang zhing rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam ga dam pa'i mchogs lhag bsam dam la mchog dang su ldan pa/ de dag rtag tu pha rol phyind la 'byor
176b11(1): pha ro lad byi nangs rtag tu mu pyod pa// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la 'byor// theg pa chen po 'di la su spyod pa ni de dag nan tan dag pas sangs rgyas mchod// nad tan dam pas sangs rgyas su 'chod pa/ de dag
177a1(1): sangs rgyas rjes drad phyed pa byed/ sangs rgyas rjes dran gang myi byed pa// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong // rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas sus mthong ba// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas myi dgrog na
177a2(1): phyir/ rtag tu sangs rgyas myi dgrogs su ma yin/ de la chos ni nub pa dpe yang myed// gang la chos nub nas yang myed 'gyur da pa// de dag spobs pa bsgribs pa myed dang ldan pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang
177a3(1): las/ gang gis chos rab ston pa mtha' yas pa/ de dag 'gro la byams pas khan pa chos// 'gro la byams las phan pa su tshol ba// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan// snying rje chen po'i mu su brtan pa
177a4(1): de dag chos kyi dga' bas dbang po dga'// chos kyi dga' bas dbang po gang dga' ba// de dag 'du byed nyes la btang bapo// 'du byed nyes la gang gis ba tung snyoms pa// de dag nga rgyal rlob sems brag byed spangs/ 
177a5(1): kyi kyi byed/ gzhadang na byen pa par gyud pa // sas spyang bar mthamams kyis nanas 'phrus pa'inapa ga gsas mi zhes sa pa tho// pal rgya da
177a6(1): 'ongs su dag pa ste// 'dzi pad byeng thobs dang gis tu ldan par gyud// na myi dbang po 'dag ni dungs byung nganas// des bag tu 'jigs gling kun tu byed// de bzhin du 'dab mi byed bungs pa'i rnams
177a7(1): 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung 'gyurab te/ bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snying rje can/ zhi ba'i sgra sgrog nyon mongs rab tu gsel// dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te// dbang po rgya kha pas kun kyang dka' bar #
177a8(1): gcig kyang bdag margya byid me ba shes// gcin ltar lha lo kun kyang de bzhin no// lha mo kun dang dga' ba'i gangs snang yang // chos bamang badrams kun ma'ang de bzhin 'dug/ galha rnams kun la chos rab brtson pa
177a9(1): srang / brgya byid skad gcig gcig gis rnam par 'phrus brgya byin 'dod 'chags zhe sdang gti mug stan// spa sa pas rang gi 'khoram rnams dga' byed na// 'gro dan gyi skyo skyong ba ci'i byin rdul stsal snyoms kyi
177b1(1): 'angag bsen gar gyi byed// brgyad kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang spru sa// de'i dbang du sems cad 'di ku 'dod// sus dam nyo mongs sun ca khri zhags kyis/ de sa sa bu po cang lajun nos kyang bcis
177b2(1): de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'gro la ma po bdud kyi rabang byed na// dbang bcu'i dbang pob rgyar pa ci rong ste// 'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs kyi zhog/ stong gsun bdag po 'changs pa chen po
177b3(1): yang // gang gsum kun kyi 'chang pa'i gnas na 'as ni// ka ma lus kun tu 'dug byang rab tu snang/ 'tshangs pa'i sgra sbyangs yid 'ong rdems kyang spron// de ni 'jig rten pa'i grangs pas shi g.yas pa gtad mdza

177b6(1): ci rob 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi dag skad gcig gcig la sems bsams shes kyi 'gyur/ ka sems can las sbyin lasam gyi phyi khyab pas/ brdung las 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'byung / rgya
177b7(1): mtsho'i ri dang lha'i gzhal myed khang // sa khron rnam mang kun kyang de las 'byung // rlung las bsrin 'byung char pa kun tu 'bab// sprin mar zhi bar 'gyur la 'ang rlung gi sa 'gyur// lo thog rnam par 'phe'u pa 'ang rlung gis
177b8(1): ske ba 'jig rted kun le rlung mi bder skyed/ de ni pha rol phyin la ma slabs te// sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslabs myin ma yang/ jig rter rnas grub bas ma yas ston byed na// rang mnyam thob pa ci rob pastong
177b9(1): myi byed/ rgya mtsho'i 'brug ra smra'i sprin gyi tshugs ni/ bya skad rnams dang ji bsnyed mi dgas snad/ na khye'u dang bu mo bud byed skyes pa'i sted// thams cad sba bzhin 'gro ba rnam par sgrog/ gde bzhi snga man rang gzhin

178a1(1): shes rab ye shes 'don ta de bzhin kun/ kha sod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngobs pa myed// rgyam mo'i klu ni rnam pan rtse byed na/ sha sa'i gzhi nas dbang spyar gnas kyi rab

178a3(1): thig dmar po'i mdog lta bu// dga' ldan gnas su kha yab mo'i mdog/ mtshe mar mthon ba ting be tu r+ya'i mdog gsum brtsa gsum du a.A s+pha gar ba 'ang // rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/

179b4(1): rgyas yongs su sprubad pa byed/ rdzing rnams te re kun tu pad sa rnams na khwa bdun pa dum brgyadan kyis rnam brgyan srulang pa byed/ pad ma re re la yang rdzas dang longs spyod kun dang mthun/ glang bro mchog gi nab 'phrus ji

180b9(1): 'bru la sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang / bsam gtan pa'i rnam 'phrul bsam myi khyab// de dag la yang dpe' bstan brjod par bya// de la 'dra'i dpe' lha yod myin de// mkhas shing gsas pa'i skye bo dpe' rnams kyis/ 
180b10(1): bsten na myur tu rnam par don shes 'gyur/ sems kyi lam la rnam tha rad brgya gnas pa'i// nyan thos gcig tu gyur da cing bar por gyur mar por gyur da cing de bzhin gcig 'gyur te// nam mkhal 'di la bsam gtan
181a1(1): sa gas da ge so da dag bya ga ma pa ma yang ma ga ma pa sa
181a2(1): 'cha'i ba 'ab pa 'og nas 'bar yang steng nas chu'i rgyud// steng nas mye 'bar 'og nas chu'i rgyud// 'gro 'dug nyal zhing 'geng 'greng ba de bzhin te/ skad gcig gcig la lus 'phrul pasam kyi
181a3(1): khyab// de ni snying rje chen po ldan pa yin// byang chub myi 'chos 'jig rten yal bar gzhog/ 'on kyang lus 'phrul bsam gyis myi khyab bston pa 'jig rten phan tshol ci'i phyir de gyi stong // gnyi zla mkhas
181a4(1): las rnam par rgyu 'dod zhing // phyogs kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang // lteng ka khron pa nin cen rgya mtsho sdod chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan bsnyon par byed// de bzhin bsam gyis kyi khyab gzugs kun kyang // skyeb bu
181a5(1): dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur bston// ting 'dzin rnam ma thar kun gyi tshul la khas// 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa rang 'byung dpal// mtshol 'tshul dang bar yan lag bzhi'i dpung // so sor rang rang gzugs
181a6(1): brnyan tshul bzhin mthong ri'i 'dog tu lha myin gnas su'o// byad/ du gser gi kha dog 'od ston te// gling rnams gzhan du 'ang sA// tshogs rgyan tu ston// 'dzam bu'i gling du ri gdag 'dra bar te
181a7(1): sprin rnams gang rnams ci ltar grub pa bzhin// dbang spyar gnas sugaser gi sprin bstan nas// nyi ma'i mdog 'drang glog kyang rab tu 'gyed/ dbang sgyur gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang / dag
181a8(1): ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog bston// khab pa mo'i mdog tu mtshe mar te// gsum bcu la rtsa gsum gnas su gser mdog tu// rgyas chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog nga mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu
181a9(1): rgya mchod // myi tsi'i gnas su mngon ting byed dra bya// klu'i gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste/ mA sma'i mdog tu lha byin gnas su'o// khyang bya rang gis snang ba'i rim ces
181a10(1): mdog gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan dang gzhan 'dzam bu gling du 'od 'phro A dA rnyig// sprin gyi mtshan nyid mtshul mthun glog kyang 'gyed// de'i tshangs pa'i dbang sbyar gnas su tshangs dbyangs su/ 
181a11(1): 'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dga'i rna'i dbyas / garos pa'i bA ra yang dga' ldan gnas phra theb smram gro byang su ma ste sa dag tu dong /  gsum brgya gsus su phyi na'i srang du ske/  dag brgya'i yis gangs su dri ba'i gang du sa
181b1(1): mi 'thab dbungs su rgyamatsho kun tu ste// myi 'am gyi'i gnas su thing bu'i smra// klu'i gnas su mal mo bad pa'i smra// gnod sbyin gangs su klu'i bu mo'i grwa// lha myi gnas su wA rdzas rnga'i hA// rgya mtsho
181b2(1): so// dga' ldan gnas su rin cen chen po'i char// rgyan kyi dam pa rin cen sna tshogs dang // gtsug gi rin cen zla ba 'dra ba dang // gzeng 'od bzang po'i 'char ba rab tu 'bebs// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan bzang
181b3(1): po dang / 'phreng ba byung pa rgyan kyi dam pa dang / mu tig dmar po la lar btags mdog tu// rol mo yid 'od char pa mtshe 'bebs// gsum bcu gsum du rin rtene sna tshogs te// tsan dan dam pa'i spos dang /

181b5(1): 'bebs bsam yas kyang // rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas su k+Sha dbang 'bebs de ni rgya mtshor chen por rgyun tu yang // char rgyud rgyun myi 'char pagatal shing tsam cag kyi zad rin cen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i
181b6(1): rin chen 'chang a pa yas rgyun gyi 'bas/ myi ci'i gnas bu 'breng ba sna tshogs// pad ma srung pa la dngos dang rim chen dang // me tog par gi ma li phye ma smos// pi bang rnga dang gling bu bshAn par ro// g+hu'i gams
181b7(1): b+hA ba k+tsi da kyi mas bu / khyen gas pas skyes smras rgyu batha bya sa sa/ 
181b8(1): shi ma li tsa ma pa ka'i// 'breng ba brda pa po kur par mu ta ka// gling rnams gzhan du'ang cham sa sna tshogs so// / 'dzam bu'i gling du chu 'angang rang gsal gyi/ ka chas rnams chos bzhin shin tu phra lar 'bebs
181b9(1): bye gog 'bras bu smad dang spom dang gag/ lo zas de bzhin 'jig pa rnyed pa de 'phel byed// de ltar smin rnams bsam gyis myi khya ba dang rmog dang 'brag dang char ba rnam pa byed kyang / khyim nas myi g.yo nam pa
182a1(1): tog pa byed/ klu'i 'phrul yang de ltar bsas gyi khyab// de ltam chu'i rgya mtsho gnas pa yang / klu'i nam 'phrug pa sa yas la ston byed na ros kyi rgya bachor zhugs pa'i yon bAdag mtha' yas nas 'phrul pa nga
182a2(1): cir phyi bston// dper bya de das kun gyis man spos sam// skyes bu de dag de ltar brjod bya ste// dpa' bo de dag dpel dang rnam par bral// de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang sbyar ro// mthal yab blo grogs yangs
182a3(1): paba'i blo gros ca naM/ ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can/ 5/ ye shes mchog dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i// rnam mapa'ang dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bgang // gang gis rnam mthar da de dag 'thos 'gyurang nas/ 
182a4(1): yid ces 'dzin cing 'jig rten sprob pa ni/ ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos dang de ldan te/ kyi yul kun na de ni dka' ba byed// 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang myed pa// so so'i skye bo'i tshogs na shin tu rgod// dgel
182a5(1): bsags bsod nams byas pa de dag ni// rgyu'i bstobs kyis 'di da la yid ches 'gyur// gang rnams/ nyan thos theg yas 'ang yid/ ches pa'i// myi rnams gzhan dor brtson// pa dag dang gzhan don
182a6(1): rtag tu su brtson pa// de 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba byed/ gang la 'khor bas yongs su skyo sbed pa/ de dag pa rtson 'grus das kha mchog dang ldan// brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang mu ldan pa
182a7(1): de dag mngon shes nam dag mngon par skyes// gang gis mngon shes rnam dag mngon skyes pa// de dag 'apyod pa mchog gi dra bar bzhugs// gyod mchog dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba yongs su

182a10(1): de dag zla skyed lam la gnas bla byed lam la dpa' bo gang gangs pa// de dag bdud kyi dpung gyis grub pa byin// gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub myin pa// de dag 'byung lam pa'i las yongs su 'das/ 
182b1(1): byad lam pa'i las yongs su su 'das pa/ de dag phyir gyi ldog gi sa yang phyin/  khyi ldogs bde gang gis byin gyur pa de dag pa gyi skye'i mazod pa 'dzan pa yin// byi spyi'i bzod pa gang gis tho 'gyur sa/ 'dzig brten
