185a10(1): bsnyad dang /  ko gas ku nal dang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang // da dang tshangs pa kyi dang ci'i smras te/ mos ga khams cad rgyal bzhin chos kyang thos// de dag stong phrag brgya brgya ma bzhi po// gang gis rgyal pa 'byo pa'i
185b1(1): don mdzad pa'i/ chos kyi bye brag sgo ma de dag gis/ bsam pa ci bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/ don dang don grogs kyang de bzhin te// sems can dgos grogs su
185b2(1): 'gyur byas shing / grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul// sdug bsngal rgya mtshol 'dus byas spyod kyi rnams/ grogs kyang don de dag bzod par khyed/ 'gro ba kun la pha mngon pade la don tu// de dag srog 'dod myi bdel
185b3(1): nyams su len// gang na 'byung ba myed cing chos myed de/ 'gon pa'i yon tamathar pa myi dmyigs pa// de dag kun tu rgyas srid che spangs shing zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas myed mngon bar 'byung // de dag khyim gi bskor sred gnas
185b4(1): bzhi// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrel ba'i rgyur/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la myi gnas par// mngon par 'byung zhing tha dad pa yongs su brjod// de dag skyod pa bcu rnams brjod cing // skyes ce na rnams kyi chos la
185b5(1): de dag 'aspyod/ drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus las/ yongs su sgom/ zhing 'gro ba'i don kyang byed// gang na se shes cad chad myed ldan pa/ da bdel ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa// de dag kun tu nad gzes nang du/ nyunya tu
185b6(1): can/ bdag la dbang myed tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston // 'dod chags 'barazhing zhe sdang 'bar 'gyur te/ kaM karti mug rgyu yas 'jig rten mem 'bar zhing // rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar 'gyur ba'i// 'jig rten bstan
185b7(1): cing sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu myi 'jigs bzhichos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas bdag nyid rtse ba brjod cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed// de dag
185b8(1): yongs bstond rdzu 'phrul rjes stond gyis// gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu' yis mthu' che ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bston byed cing // rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phyal pas sems can 'dul// de dag 'bras kyi tshul ma
185b9(1): sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba'i don tu 'jig rten myi chags tshul pad ma bzhin// dga' ba mos pa skye bar rnam par spyod// de dag brjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal po// gar mkhan rnga ma khan gyang dang rol mo mkhan// mdzes shing
185b10(1): sdug par bzhad rkang byed pa dang / rgyu mkhan gzugs mar kun tu ston pa byed/ ka grong pa grong po ma kha lo sgyur ba dang // der pon chos dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te// rgyal po blon po mda' rab pho ta dang // sman pa myi 'jigs bcud
186a1(1): lag mkhas pa byed// de dag nags 'tshal sngon po chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin cen myi zad gter dag dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin gi dang /  rna yas gas mkhas kya de bzhin lam ston 'gyur/ 
186a2(1): 'jig rten 'byung gang sa myi ring shes myur zhing // sems can las kyi tshal la myi shes pa// de dag kun la rmongs thabs tshong thabs dang // sna tshogs bzol rnams kun kyang brjod pa byed 'tshe byed gnod pa myed pa'i
186a3(1): sbyor ba rnams// sems can 'de skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags dang rigA ma bur sma dang gtsug lag sna tshogs rnams/ kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par brjod// drang srong rnams kyi dam pa'i mchog
186a4(1): gang lhar bcas 'jig brten dang 'gyur da ka brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' thug mchog rnams// kun kyang mkhas pa de dag rgyud dang kun rgyu mu stegs can// dka' thub 'byod yul myi smad spyod pa dang // sgren mo
186a5(1): gos myed ri'i dge sbyong dang // mu stegs can gi mkham po khas pa/ debyed/ de dag yongs 'tsho chos la 'gyod pa dang shA ka bla na yod/ dang bla ma myed pa'i rnams// ral ba ring dang byis pa'i rtul gugs
186a6(1): can/ de dag tu yang de dag mkhan por gyur // nyi ma'i rjes 'brang dka' thub lnga ldan dpa khyi dang ba yang brtul bzhugs mi dgas dpyod// rdze'u cam su stegs bcu gsub 'byor pa'i rna'as// 
186a7(1): de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyungs/  rnalas ye ges rgyal la dga' ba dang / su sregs khrus byed yul hU~M rgyu nga / mya ga 'bras bu chul khyod pa'i rnams// chos sems cad de dag ngam par 'gyur
186a8(1): gnas breg nang dang cig tu spyod pa ga ga thams sa nga ngas pa'i mas par dang / ga byig pa'i mas pa gcig su yod pa'i rnams// de dag sung kyang de dag sungapar pos 'gyu / khyer ros pa shegs car rnams
186a9(1): ji snyed par/ de dag bcwa ba mos la rtogs byas shing // bsgrubs dka byi ba zad drag gul dka' thub kyi ga su se gas pan gyi sdug bsngal spong bas 'dul ga/ 'jig rten lta khas 'khrugs pa zhes byas das/ 
186a10(1): gangan la gnas pa'i na shegs cad/ gsungs 'ang ba'i chog dang babs tshul gyi 'ded pa 'byor pa de dag susas byed/ gas pa dra byi lami sngags rig ca// gi nang tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bded pa thos gas / 
186b1(1): dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis// la ya spyi'i gi sang tshig kyis// la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang / don des rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang // rgol ba 'dus pa'i ye ges tshig rnams dang / bsnyad pa thub
186b2(1): khyed pa radang pa'i tshigs rnabs kyis// la la dag kyi skang tshig rnams dang DA kun la 'jug pa tshig des rnams nga/ klu'i tshig nges gnod sbyin tshig nas kyis// la la dag la srin po 'byung po dang / dri za grul 'bras lto bya'o che// 
186b3(1): myi ci lha myin nam mkha' ljid tshig gis// bden pa stan cing mngar bam 'dren par byed// de dag bden pa'i nges tshig tshul shes bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i chos nyid bsam yas tshig la sa shes pas
186b4(1): bsnyoston// de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o de dag 'gro ba bde mchog gi ti nge 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // 'od zer bsam gyis myi khyab rab bkye ste/ 'od gzer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul ka
186b5(1): 'od zes ma bong nas legs par rab bkye zhing // sems can ci snyed 'od zes de shes pas/ de dag mabong legs ma ngon byed ma yin te// bla na myed pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// sangs rgyas bsnyen te chos rnams yongs sun nag/ 
186b6(1): dge 'dun bstan nas kyi rnams las bstan te/ rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod brten bstan pas na / des mi mthong ba legs pa'i 'od / per grub// khwa'i 'od zes zis kyis no ba/ 'od zer byed byed
186b7(1): rab tu bkye byas shing // mun pa kun rang thug rna pas kun pas 'ang / 'jig pa rten 'phad pa'i te de rab tu snang / 'od des sems can ri snyi yongs bskul pa// de dag rgyal ba mchod byin kye mar 'dzin
186b8(1): rgyal ba mchod phyir mye ma ga thung byas pas/ 'jig brten sgrom ma 'jang pa'i rgyas par gyur da// 'bru mar mye mad+ma gi bye mar dang / ga shing dang mra dang sprig a pA'i spron// spos dang ro mchog rin cen smon pa dag/ rgyal ba rnams gso
186b9(1): 'od byed de zaza ron ga'od zer zlom zhes bya ba rang 'bye zhing / sems can dri zhing 'od gzer des bskas d+ham de dag byed pa nas sangs 'gyid pa'i mchog// sems can bsdus rdod che btad pa byod// gang rnams sred pa ras
186b10(1): sa rings tsha bsas ca ngazlas bya go mag byod pa ded rma ba dathos babyed bya nga byed pa dang ba thab ma 'os shegs dang bam ca ga byed byas pa dang / rma
186b11(1): skong ba'i ma byin te// 'dun byas sun phyu mis pa 'gas pas na/ de ga ni sgol pa'i 'od gze de zlal mod 'ang gzer zlos pa zhel ba rab sa kye zhing // sems pan ci nyid 'odagazer des bsrang ba/ nadang ba 'on tan nang
187a1(1): pa rab spangs shing // chos kyis rna' grol mos don tu gnye/ 'dad pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te/ chos kyi sagol ba'i ro la don gnyer bas sangs rgyas brgyad kyi chang pa 'jengs par 'gyur/ 'jig rten byed pa'i rnon
187a2(1): brngam par gsel// rdzing dang chu klung khron pa yu ma dang / mcho rnabs byang chub don tu byed bcud de// 'dod pa rnams spang bsam gtan bsngags pas na// sgom pa rnams sel de ni des grub bo// 'od gzer dga' bar byed pa
187a3(1): rab bkye zhing // sems can ci snyed 'od gzer des bskul pa dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog tu don tu// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems skyed do// thugs rje mnga' ba rnams kyi sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ pad pa'i gdangs
187a4(1): zhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon gtan brjod pas mi dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des grub bo// 'od zer mos par rab bkye zhing / sems can ci snyed 'od gzer des bskul pa// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
187a5(1): mos pas dga'// chos la mos dga' dge' 'dun mos pas dga' na// de dag rtag \u0f7f sangs rgyas mos dga' ste// chos la sosadaga' dge 'dum mos dga' ngas// sangs rgyas chos dang de ba'i na dge/ 
187a6(1): 'dun dang / gartag tu grogs phob bzod pa bla ma byed 'ob// sa das rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/ gsems can mang po bskus cing dran byas te / byang chub sems kyi yon tan paganang bas na/ 
187a7(1): des mi 'od gzer zos par byed par grub// 'od gzer sa 'od rnams pa chags pa rab 'byer zhing // sems ca naji snyed 'od gzeng des bsdus pa// rdzun byed pa'i byang chum 'dag nyer mig gasbyin pa sna tshogs yongs sun
187a8(1): de dag mchod sbyin lkug pa byed pa'i tshe// slongs sho ba'i bsam pa rdzogs byas ste/ tsa bsam pa kun tshul sbyid pa byin byas na// des ni 'od gzer bsod nams pa myal 'gyur / 'od gzer le shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing
187a9(1): sems can ji snyed 'od gzer des bskul pa// chos gcig sgo nas gcig myin pa'i// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes su shes// chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud dam// des rtogs don gyis ye shes rnam
187a10(1): 'bye zhing // chos kyi chog dor brjod byas pas ra/ des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer bya'o// 'od zer shes rab smor la rab dkyil zhing sems cas ji snyed 'od zer nges bskul ba// stong sa bdag byed ma skyes
187b1(1): byung ba'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ bdag po myed chos stong pa byed myed pas ga sprin dang smyig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos / rmyi lam lta bu gzugs brnyad rang bzhin rnams bstan pas shes rab smon ma de grub bo// 'od zerachog
187b2(1): kyis rnam 'phrul rab bkye ring // sems can ji snyed 'od gzeng des bskul pa// myi zad gzugs kyi mdzod rnams rab zab cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzom pa chos 'chang rnams pa yongs su lan pa
187b3(1): te/ drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing / 'gro ba kun la chos bzhin phan bkags pas/ 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul de glang po// 'od gzer gtong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems cad 'jungs pa ji rnye
187b4(1): des bskul pa/ skyed pa myi rten gyi rtag ces gyur nas/ de dag rtag tu sprin mos dga' bar 'gyur// 'jungs pa gdul dka'i sems can ma rgyal drang // nor rnams myi la brjin chul ges 'gyur nangs // dga' ba'i yid
187b5(1): kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od gzer des grub/ po// 'od gzer yongs su gdung myed rab bkye zhing // tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul pa tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu gnas
187b6(1): gyur da te/ rang 'byung 'gyur bar bya zhes/ sems bskyed do// dge' ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang / tshul khrims bzad la semasam ma pa bskul cing / byang chub sems la yang dag bsdus byas pas/ 
187b7(1): 'ongs su gdung byed 'ong gzes grub so// bzod pas rnam brgyar 'ong gzer dab pa kye zhig/ phyi mthod sems can ci rnyed des bskul pa// cho bzhi sa pa rgyas mongs spangs shing / de dag pazod mos gtag tu dag sa las gyu// sdi
187b8(1): sems ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te// byang chub don tu 'khrug pa ma byas shing // bzod pa'i yon kun rtag tu brjod byas pas// des mi bzod las rnam rgyang de grub bo// 'od gzer brtson dang ldan pa rab babye zhing / le lo'i rjes
187b9(1): can ji snyed des bskul pa rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo myed mchod pa byed par 'gyur// rigs par brtson pas dkon mchog gsum rnams la// 'aspyod pa skyo ba myed pas mchod byas
187b10(1): nas/ de dag bdud bzhi lam las yong 'das te/ myu rang tu byang chub blang nga myed rab tu thob// sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul byas te// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/  tha ma'i byas su dam
187b11(1): chos yongs gzung bas/ des ni 'od brtson ldan 'od gzer de grub bo// 'od gzer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing // rnam 'khrugs sems can sa ji snyed de bskul ba// de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ 
188a1(1): nyams su myi gnod mnyam bzhag sems su 'gyur// sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyor can dang / 'dra 'dzi yongs su rnam par spang byas te/ bsam gtan zhi ba'i mgon pa rab bsngags pa/ 
188a2(1): des ni zhi byed 'od gzer de grub bo// 'od gzer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // shes rab 'chalnga ba ci snyid des bskul pa// bden dang brten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs pa shes
188a3(1): bar 'gyur/ bden dang rten dang rnam par tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs pa shes 'gyur cing // nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'thob 'gyurang nas// shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar gyur // rgyal srid
188a4(1): nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtang ste/ byang chub don tu chos rnams gang 'atsal pa// de dag rim 'gro rab tu brjod byas pas// shes rab rnam rgyan 'od gzer de grub bo// 'od gzer sangs rgyas ldan pa rang
188a5(1): bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od gzer des bskulang pa/ desangs rgyas bsam gyis myi khyab shin tu mar ba'i rnams// pad / ma mchog lnga zhugs pa rab tu mthong // sangs rgyasra bdag nyid
188a6(1): che dang rnal tha rad dang / sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te// sangs rgyas stobs rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas/ sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od gzer des grub bo// 'od zer myi 'jigs
188a7(1): sbyin par rab bkye zhing // 'jigs mnar sems can ji bsnyed des sogs pa// 'byung po gza' dang ge sang cing brdeg pa dang // nad kyi 'jigs pa kun la rab tu gro'o// myi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can bskyab pa dang
188a8(1): srog gcod la sa las sems rgyud phyir gazlog cing / 'jigs pas bskyab tshol rnams skyangs byas pas// 'od gzer gyi 'jigs sbyin pa des grub bo// 'od zer thams cad bde bar rab bkye zhing // gnang kun pa'i
188a9(1): bsnyed des reg pa/ thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par gol/ kaM bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang 'jog/  nad gamos 'bras bu sAm dang ma pa dang // rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dag gabungs/ 
188a10(1): bshA ci ngo ma mar dag dang / 'brus ba zas bsko byin pas de grub bo// 'od gzer sangs rgyas bskon pa rab bkye zhing // che zad par mi ji snyed des bskul pa / ga sangs rgyas rjes ca drang sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur da
188b1(1): de dag mchi 'phos sangs rgyas la zhugs shing 'gro mchi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te// dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing // mchi kar/ sangs rgyas skyabs su btang byas nas// sangs rgyas la ston pa
188b2(1): 'od zer des thob bo// 'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od gzer des bskul ba// chos nyan brjod cing de bzhin 'dri ba byed// chos la momo pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// chos kyi mu ke'i
188b3(1): dus su chos brjod do// chos chos rnams kyi bsal ba rdzogs byas shing / mos pa spyod de chos la son gis shes/ brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de 'i thob po// sangs rgyas sngas rnams yongs su sprul pa'i phyir// 'od zer dbyas
188b4(1): dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / khams gsum smra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag/ kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung tu thos// gsal ba'i dbyangs sbyar drang srong che bstod do// rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la
188b5(1): sbyang ba'i gsung don tu yongs su btang las 'od zer dbyangs sngam thob/ 'od zer chi myed sbyin pa rab bkye zhing / sems can ji/ snyed 'od zer des sprul pa bag myed spyod pa thalas cad rnams spangs te
188b6(1): yon tang kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len/ 'dus byas rtag tu bde ba myed pa ste/ sdug bsngal tshe gamang pos yongs su gad / 'gogapa rtag tu bde zhing i dga' zhesabarjod pas chi byed sbyin pa de 'o mo
188b7(1): 'od zer khyang bar ldan pa dang bkyer zhing // sems cam ji snyed 'od zer des 'phrul pa / tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad yang dang / shes rang khyad par rgyal pa rnams las nyan/ tshul khrims 'phags kying 'dzin 'amags
188b8(1): pa ste/ shes rab 'phags pa thub la'i rgyal chen zhes byang chub don tu bsngags shing skong byas pas// des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob// 'od zer rin cen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / sems can ji snyed 'od zer des sprul
188b9(1): ba rin cen gter mar myi zad thob gyur/ drang srong che la rin snang bas mchod/ rgyal ba rnams rgyal ba'i mchod rten ya/ rin cen bul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs yang / rin cen btud te rin cen sbyin btang bas/ ring cem rnam
188b10(1): bar brgyad pa'i 'od zer grub 'od zer spos mchog snang bar bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des skul pa/ myi la myed pa'i spos dri cher gyu rad nas// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par skus ka gyi dang lha'i spos
189a1(1): dang byug pa yis/ bya'i bcol sa mchod par byas te/ spos kyi rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod brten dag byas pas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub pa 'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyar rab 'akye ming / bdus
189a2(1): ngang rgyal mtshan pa dan sna tshogs mchog/ rol mo sgra snyan spos dang khadugs spos kyis/ pho brang dam pa yongs brgyan te me tog 'gengs/ sngan chad rgyal ba rol mos pa sru byas te / mye tog byug pa gdugs spos bye ma dang
189a3(1): gdugs dang rgyab mtshan bA dan mchog dag gyis// mchod pa byas pa sna tshogs rgyan grub bo// 'od zer gir tu dang byed rab 'akye zhing /  sa rnams lag thil bzhin du gnas par byed/ mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams spyang byas pa
189a4(1): des ni thong gi nang tu dang byed grub 'od zer chen po smon ldan rab bkye zhing ga spos kyi chang 'bebs sIn rnams kun na mazhag mchod brten gam yo spos rgyas yongs btab pas / 'od gzer sIr dang ldan par rab tu phob
189a5(1): 'od zer lgang srub mas brgyan rab bkye zhib gos byed gas yod brgya ra dang lda bar 'gyur// gos dang bgo po 'phreng ba snga tshogs dgag yongs su btang ngas lngab srub rnam brgyang drug 'od zer bro mchog ldan pa
189a6(1): ngas 'akye ring 'akres pagakhas cho mchog thob par 'gyur /  kha zas skom dang bro mchog sna tshogs rnams ka byin pas bro mchog ldar gi 'od kyang thong / 'od zer nor stong rab tu brtse byas shing galongs
189a7(1): nga 'dzin ce na gter rnams thob par 'gyur/ gnas dang gter rnams myi zad dkon mchog gsum/ gsol las 'od gzer myig spyod rab dgye byas shing / long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur/ 
189a8(1): rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rted la zhe mar gyi gsol las myig spyod 'od zer grub// na pa rnam spyod 'od zer rab bkye zhing ga rna la nyams pa sA mang thos par 'gyur/ rgyal pa rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten ya sa sil snyad phul pa
189a9(1): rna ba nas spyod thobs/ 'od zer snga spyod rab tu dbye byas shing / sngan chad mchor dri zhim tshor ba 'gyung / rgyal ba rnams dnga' rgyal ba'i mchod rten ya spos rim gsos snga spyod 'od zer zul/ 'od zer lce spyong rab tu bkye byas gis/ 
189a10(1): swA snya ma yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bston/ myi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnams spangs te/ 'jam khar smras pas lce spyod 'od zer lus spyod rab tu dbye byas shing / dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par gyurang rgyal ba rnabs dang
189a11(1): rgyal ba'i mchod rten ya lus kyis rab btud lus 'aspyod zer 'og/ 'od zer sems spyod rab tu dgye byas shing / spros pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzind rjes su sems rlab byas pas/ des ni
189b1(1): sa spyong 'di zer de zab po// 'od zer gzugs zung rab tur kye byas zhing / tham ma'i yi su sangs kyi'i dbang ro mthong sku gzugs po rdzogs mang ba dang / mayod rgya byas gdun ma chu pas 'byung / 'od
189b2(1): spra skyong rab tu dgye byas shing / spre ni swA myin stong par tu shes/ rkyen las byung las smra snyon 'dra'o zhes/ sgra rnams snyan pas 'od zer de grub 'o// 'od zhed dri spyod rab tu dgye byas shing / dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu
189b3(1): gyur/ spos mchog spos chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub shing gi 'od de yin/ 'od zer bro spyod rab tu dgye byas shing / dug can dug myed ro'i mchog tu gyung / sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma yang
189b4(1): bro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'odod de yin/ 'od zer reg spyor rab tu dbye byas shing ka reg na myi bde thams cad bder 'gyur/ tri gus madrang dang rus kyi mara'i cha/ 'phreng ba yid 'ong srud pas pa mar 'gyur/ zhes
189b5(1): yang 'aras pa ba 'de bams byu ba gshegs pa lams / shebazas ste/ me tog byung bar 'ba' 'dam pa sa/ zhes mams pa'i 'ad de'ing/ nang kyi sa sa sa rgya
189b6(1): ba spu kun nas 'jig rten 'bar mdzad pa'o// bas ma yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur / rmongs pa'i las rgyal ba'in dag par byedapa rkyen las byung bas ma skyes rab bzhing / byung ba'i sku ni chos
189b7(1): bu min te chos ting ngam ma'a' bzhin du rtag gangs shes pa brjod las chos spyod 'od gzeng de lob pog 'ong ze sgom de dag la sogs pa/ drang srong rnams kyis spu'i rgo gcig nas pa gang 'ga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'o
189b8(1): zer 'byung / kun kyang rnga dad las ni tshul can no// ji ltar ba sku gcig gi sgo gcig nasa'od zer gang 'ga'i khye snyed yongs 'byung ba/ de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas/ drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul
189b9(1): de 'dra'o/ yom tan gang gis 'od zer grub 'gyur ba'i yon tan de la bstang grags sus byas pas de dag 'od zer de bdag nyid kyang 'byung / drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag bsod nams bta
189b10(1): grogs byas pa la/ rjes su yid rang bsol pa sus pata ba dang / gang gis mthong ste dge ba brtsegs gyur pa/ de dag kun 'od zer de dag shes// gang gis bsod nams byas shing dag bsags te// sangs
190a1(1): rgyas yang dang yang du mchod byas shing // sangs rgyas yom 'dod cing dom gnyen pa// de dag kun la 'od zer de dag skul// dmus long rnams kyis nyi ma gyi mthong yang // de myed ma yin 'jig brten
190a2(1): kun tu 'chang / dmyig dang ldan las shar bar shes gyur nas/ kun kyang rang rang so so'i sas la 'jug/ de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang // myed pa ma yin kun tu 'pho ba ste// de dag mos myed log
190a3(1): mtshand pa'i/ pha la gyis myi mthong blo grogs yangs la mod rgyan dang nor bu bzhon pa gzhal myed khang // rin cen ro mchog spos dang byug pa'i rnams// de dag che bar gyur da la yod mod kyi// nyon mongs phongs pa
190a4(1): rnams la yod pa myin// gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te ga dad la yid ches mos pa skyes bya rang nas/ bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du// myi 'gyur snyam du nem nur des byA n+dom+ba ljin+d+ra 'das kyi bdar
190a5(1): seng ge'i khri bcas nas zhes dang rinya gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das dag ngan pa der thal mo sbyar te// phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'dasas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol
190a6(1): byin gyis spya drangs nas rnam par rgyas pa'i khang pa gshegs so// dzi ltang bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig brten gyi nyis thams cad kyi lha'i khang gangs rgya yang gshegs par snang ngo // de nas lnga'i dbas
190a7(1): po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi gabus gsum bcu rtsa gsum gi khang pa thams cad du gru dang rol mo dang sil snyan brgya 'phag mang po btang ste// zhi bar byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA pa rnams la dge 'i
190a8(1): thal bskyed pa de dag rjes bu dmanas/ de'i tshetshigs zu dru ba 'di dag smra po// ngagagis dam pa gang shigags// gzugs rje chen po yang na pabyung rigs bas pa/ rnam par rgyal ba she gyur pa 'an
190a9(1): 'ang ba na kyis dang bgang zhin gis gsod bsgrubapa gzeng ga ri go 'byur ba 'dra de// rtse mo mchog tu gshegs byar du pa// des ni 'dir yang bkragis legs kyur cig/ 4\u0f7f shrIs dam pa gang zhig gis// thams cad
190a10(1): yang bkra shis legs 'gyur gcig/ bam zhi so dam gang zhig gis gser thul gyi sgribs pa myed par ras gzigs pa de// rin cen sna tshogs gshegs gyur dpa// des mi 'di sa yang bkra shis legs gyur gcig
190b1(1): mda' sa dgra bcom dri ma gsum legs pa// mdzod spu'i rtse mer gshe kas gyur da pa// de sA 'dir yang ba kral shis legs TIg/ pa kra shis dam pa gape zhig gis// sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zi la
190b2(1): kyis myi non pa/ rin cen sna tshogs gshegs gyur da pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur gcig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba myi'i mgon// rin cen rgyan du gshegs
190b3(1): gyurd sa/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur gcig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis naMsa?// shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing brtan pa de// ma la ya'i rtser gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs
190b4(1): 'gyur nga gcigan bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas bston mchog sogs pa myi mnga' ba// dri myed zla bar gshegs 'gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs kyu rang cig/ bkra shis dam pa ga zhig
190b5(1): gis/ grags pa dri ma myed pa mgon po bang pa'i bla// dri ma myed par gshegs gyur ba// des ni/ 'dir yang bkra shis legs na 'gyurard gcig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ mgon po
190b6(1): rgyas bcu'i rgyal gshegs pa glu blangs te tshogs su bcad de bzhin du/ 'jig rte nad gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzus lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtsham gzhan dang gzhan gis yang blar rdzogs pa'i 'das
190b7(1): rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas dkyis mo khrung bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar bzhugs pa de lazhis
190b8(1): bya 'jig rten gi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag ga da na de dag la bzhugs par snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam par rgyal ba'i de khang pa de yang sum bcu rtsa
190b9(1): gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang / lha'i ris tsam du che bar snang bar gyurd te/ 'di na ji lta ba de ltar 'jig brten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no// shin tu brgyas pa chen po'i ma dro'o// sangs rgyas pas che zhes bya ba

193b2(1): gsal ba'i gzugs myi mthong ba// de bzhi na sems ni ma spangs pas// sangs rgyas chos ni myi mthong ngo // ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs myed pa/ rab rib can gyis myi mthong ba/ de bzhin phug na gnas seMs
193b3(1): kyis/ sangs rgyas dag ni myi mthong ngo // de bas byig gi rnam par sbyongs// gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// chos rnams mthong ba myed pa yis// 'od mdzad rab tu 'thong ba yin// ji ltar
193b4(1): kun blos sngon bshad cing // bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin// sangs rgyab byang chub myi bsnyengs pas// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis sangs rgyas

193b6(1): ra na/ byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor// brjod pas brjod du myi rung chos blo ga zhan rnams kyis rnam par btags// des niyongs su bsgribs byas pas// bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs
193b7(1): byed// shes rab chung ba lam nor cing // bdag gi sems la myi khas las// phyin ci log go blo dag gis// myi bzang lus ni 'phel byed byed// nga gis stong tha ma mthong ba// de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang bachos
193b8(1): myig bsas kyis myi khyab pa'i// dmyig kyang de la yod pa myi na/ de bas myig ni spyod par gyis/ bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par bsom// gang phyir bdag cag sngan chad du/ pa der gshegs ma mthong chud kyang
193b9(1): zos// yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba na 'ang // gang gi sems la chags myed pa// des ni sangs rgyas cis 'byung ba'i// chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong // gang gis shes rab che mnga' ba chos su bde'i gshegs
193b10(1): mthong ba'i rnams// de dag 'jig rten dmyig can te/ gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya// lhag mthong byed par mthong ba ni// chos rnams ngan pas mthong ba ste// lhag mthong gis ni mthong 'gyur na// thams
193b11(1): rnyeng mthong ba myed pa yin/ kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni// yang don sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// de ni rang bzhin thams cad du/ shi dbyed cing 'tsho ba myed// sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba// dpal gi blos
194a1(1): ri bsngon bsar te/ de bal bdag gis chos kyang / sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus zla zlas kyis phyog sa brgyang rnam par banal ten do'i ma chis
194a2(1): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam par rtog spyod pa'i// dmyig ni shin tu khrul pa yin/ 'khrul da par mthong ba log pa ste/ sangs rgyas la ni log myi mnga'o// gang gis log par shes gyurar te// yang
194a3(1): dag ci bzhin ma nor nga ya// yang dag ma yin bden shes nas/ sangs rgyas dri myed mthong ba yin// mthong ba dag gis dri mar 'gyur// rnam pa mthor na de myed de/  sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong dang bral
194a4(1): de bas rnam par gzigs shes bya// de ni 'jig rten myong ba ste// 'jig rten de yang rnam par brtags// 'jig brten 'jigs pa shes gyur na// snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten rnams ni snang ba ni// 'jig
194a5(1): rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste// yang dag ji bzhin mnyam byas shing /  de ltar mthong na mthong ba'o// de ltar mthong ba nyon mongs byed// dbang du gyur cing zag byed pa// gang gis pa dang byed mthong ba/ 
194a6(1): dngos po rtags pa ma yin no// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni/  sangs rgyas chos rnamapa brjod pa ste// de dag yod pa ma yin las/ byarang bzhin de phyir brgyas pa yin// de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag / 
194a7(1): nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid byed// de dag la ni sod pa myed// mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos// chos rnams la ni mos byed de// chos kyi 'du shes rnas bsgoms shing // shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa
194a8(1): des ni thub chen mthong ba yin// ji ltar yon tan thos brjod pa// de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong // de mthong bas na 'du byed kun// rang bzhin gis kyang rnam par yi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dgelas/ 
194a9(1): 'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma sangs rgyas darapa' chen rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa chad byed do// 
194a10(1): rnam grol thugs ni sdig myi mnga'// 'jig rten thar phyin rgyal lo'o// yang dag ci bzhin ma nor da yar// skas pa rnams ni tshad myed pas/ ji ltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin// 'jig brten pa sgron mas
194b1(1): rab tu gzigs pa// 'du byed thams cad skad cig sa gas so'i skye bo de 'gengs pa gnas mkha'i kha bos mi bzung byas shing // de dag de phyir khom pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na// de ni grags ched 'thong ba yin/ 
194b2(1): mthong ba myed la mthong zhes bya// sod pa myed pa yod ces bya// mthong ba dag gam yod pa ni// ma bsgoms na ni rnam par bsgoms// ji ltar khA ba sus mthong ba// de dag gis ni lta ba zhig/ gang larang sangs rgyas spos/ 
194b3(1): pa'i// de dag chos rnams zhig pa myed// ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin// sangs rgyas yongs su sus mthong ba// de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/ chos rnams kyi ni sAngs
194b4(1): gcig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstanang // des ni bsod blo brtan pa de// chos mang bye ba rab tu stond// yod dang myed pa shes bya ste/ gang gi 'du shes rnam bsgoms pas// des ni sangs rgyas mthong
194b5(1): ste// yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpal ye shes blo gros kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnams par bstas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas
194b6(1): song pa byin// tshig gi lam rnabs bsdus pa'o// byis pa 'dzind dang bcas pa'i rnams// bdag lus yang dag 'dzinang pa la// swa rgyas bsnapa bar myi gyuras te// de bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba myed/ 
194b7(1): yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing // gang rnams dmyig yod ma yin pa// de dag bskal de yu grangs myed du// srid pa'i gangs chen mtshon mkhong // nyon mongs bcan ni 'khor bar bshad// nyon mongs myed pa mya ngan 'das
194b8(1): mya ngan 'das dang 'khor pa yang // rang bzhini brnyed par myi rung ngo // 'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te// mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin// 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa// bla ma dag ni myi shes so// 'di ni sangs
194b9(1): rgyas rgyal ba 'di// 'di yin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can// de dag sangs rgyas myi mthong ste// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ zhi ba'i rang bzhin ci lta 'brang // gang gis zhi ba shes gyur da pa// des ni tshi
194b10(1): gi lamya 'das pa'i// sang dag sangs rgyas rab tu 'thong // chos rnams kun gyi 'byod pa yi// rab tu brjod kyang bstan pa myed// 'od kyang mnyam pa nyid du lha/ rgyal ba chos rnams kun kyang mnyam / yang dag sangs rgyas
195a1(1): sa bu dpung byed/ log pa dag dang ba yang yang // 'gala' myed rtsa pa myed pas ma// de ni sangs rgyas de phyir brjod// de ras byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byed kyi rnabs kyis
195a2(1): phyogs bcur rnam par brnyas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam pa'i phyir// bsanal pa bsam gyis myi khyab par// sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang bla// de ni bdes
195a3(1): ba bsam gyi khyab// ci phyir zhen paska lang pa'i rnams grangs myed sdug bsngal sngan chad 'byung // 'on kyang bder gshegs ma thos pas/ bdag gcag 'khor las ma grol lo// de bzhin ma grol chos kyi rjes
195a4(1): yang dag nyid du brtogs 'gyur da te// gang la 'phrogs pa myed pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub bla na myed// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon gsum pa// sngon chad ma 'byung 'byung myi 'gyur/ pang phyir sangs
195a5(1): mthogayang dag la ni yang dag gzigs / yang dag byin bar yang+ga byin/ 'di'i mtha' ni bston pas na// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes kyang bya// khong byam chung chos brtan tre/ sangs rgyas
195a6(1): chos rnams rab tu brjod// 'di ni sangs rgyas sgom pa bste/ gcig tu dmyigs pa ma yin no// de ltar ma pa dang gcig gnas pa// mang po dag tu rnam par shes// gnas bai byed pa'i chos kyis/ ba sags
195a7(1): pa dag kyang rab tu byas/ byas pa byed cing byed pa byed// las kyi 'du shes rnams snyoms shing // las ji bzhin zhes byas na// rnam pa dag kyang myi myigs so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i// res
195a8(1): gnas ni dmyigs myed pas// gnas pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas g.yol pa gang yang byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs
195a9(1): brkyang rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// 'jug par bya ba gang yang byed// de bas bla byed ces byas/ gangs dra ba yod sbyi
195b1(1): de la slob pa'ang yod pa myid// de ni sangs rgyas rnabs kyis bsnyems// rnam par myi rtog 'dus ma byas// gang zhig sangs rgyas spyod yul la// de la bgrang ba yod pa myin// yang dag sangs rgyas
195b2(1): bgrang dang bral// de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// mun pa rnams ni rnam khas lad cing // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par swA / de la snang ba gang yang myong // myi snang ba yang ci yang myed// thams cad chos la kun nas dka'
195b3(1): skyes pa myed cing gnas la myed// 'dod chags myed cing rten pa myed// chos nyid de yang sbed pa myed// gang la gnyis su bgrang myed cing // gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas// ji bzhin rab tu gnas pa'i shes rab chen
195b4(1): bo legs par mthong / myi gnyis la la gnyis pa myed// gnyis pa myed pa stong pa ste// stong pa de yang khams gsum kun// de ni sangs rgyas mdzong ba'o// byil las byang chub myi gas kyang // de dag la rab tu gnas/ 
195b5(1): gnas pa myed pa'i chos kyis// rang gi lus ni rjes su lta// lus demyed pa ni lus su bshad// 'byung ba myed cing bstan du myed// de/ 'jigs 'tshogs mang po bltar byed pa// sangs rgyas sku ni bla
195b6(1): kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te ga de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// drin bzo myed pa'i sems can phyir// skyes bu drang srong mchog gi rnams// dpa' chen sems
195b7(1): can gtso bo dag/ 'od mdzad pa ni rab tu 'byung // thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de// sems can mkhas la rnam gzigs kyang / bsrid pa'i gcings pas sdug bsngal ba'i// sems can rnams ni de nas gzigs/ 
195b8(1): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na// sang dag sangs rgyas dpal nga mnga'o ga/ sems can gtso bo ma gartogs par// skyob pa gzhan ni gang yang myed// gas te sangs rgyas ma skyes la/ byang chub sems dpa'
195b9(1): 'di 'dra dag/ myed na 'jig rten khams kun na// sems can bde la ba gcig myi 'byung // sems can gtsol za/ 'dren mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ 
195b10(1): 'byung ba'i 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu// gang gis de bzhin gshegs mthong ba// de dag thob pa legs pang thob// gang gis thos shing dad 'gyur dpa/ de yang 'jig brten mchod brten no// gang gis sangs rgyas
196a1(1): mthong 'gyur ba// bdag gcag rnams kyis tho ba legs thob// 'di 'dra ba'i tshul thos pas// kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus ma'ang dpa' 'di yod// byang chub sems
196a2(1): dpal mam pa cad kyi// shes rab myig mi rnam sbyangs pas// spyod yul 'di dag mthong bar gyurang// rnam par snang mdzad thu mthong nas// da rung phyir zhing dang pa skye// de'i ye shes mtha' yas pas
196a3(1): nga rung brjod du yod pa yin// gang zhis mchog ni gro nas dang // rgyal thas gzhan gyis 'gad pa'i rnams/ de dag du rlung bdag bris kyang can 'das bas la san bgang par bya// shin tu rgya
196a4(1): chen po zhes bya ba las ri rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// / 'phags pa sangs rgyas
196a5(1): phal po che zhes bya ba shi nang tu rgyas pa chen po'i pado// bam po de nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dada' chos kyi blo gros kyang de'i tshe// sangs rgyas kyi rlangs kyis spyod pa mtha'
196a6(1): nebs pa nas rgya ga pa 'dza mnan de ltar byang chub sa tha kur byu chu da de sa
196a7(1): bar bzhan ma thag tu ngo'i mdo la phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul gi nad tu pA ba snyed kyi pha rolang nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
196a8(1): 'phra ba snyed kun kyang chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pag stag gis zhal mthong bar gyur da te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' sa yang te/ chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang
196a9(1): chub sems rapa'i ting ge 'dzin sbyor pa mtha' rabs pa la mnyam par bzhog pa legs so/ legs so// de bas rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shi nang tu tha
196a10(1): ba snyed kun mtshan mthung ba sha stag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gi smon lam ngag dang / khyod bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bstanang pas/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad
196a11(1): bsta nang par bya ba dang // sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya dang / chos kyi dbyings su chud par bya ba dang / sems kyi khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang / chags pa myed pa nyid du chud par bya ba dang
196b1(1): bsgribs pa byed pa'i spyod yul thob par bya ba dang / kun nas sbyor ba thob par bya dang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba dang / dbang po thams cad songs
196b2(1): su shes par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu la brtson par bya ba'i phyir byin kyis brlabs pa mdzad kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas
196b3(1): kyi mthu' dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstand pa 'di baspobs pa bskyed gcig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi blo gros la chags pa myed pa nye bar
196b4(1): bsgrubs pa mdzad do// thogs pa myed par nye yang bsgrubs pa sa dang do// mchod pa myong pa nye bar bsgrubs pa mngad do/ rmongs pa byed pa ker bar bsgrubs pa mdzad do// ba dab ba byed pa nye bar bsgrubs pa yang do/ khan
196b5(1): ma tho ba myed pa nye bar bsgrubs pa mdzad do// dpag tu myed pa nye bar dbasgrubs pa mdzad do// zhum pa myed pa tI bar bsgrubs pa mdzad do//  'phrogs pa myed pa nye bar bsgrubs pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
196b6(1): ting nge 'dzind 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangasargyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi spyi bo la phyag g.yas pas byug pa mdzad de/ de ltar
196b7(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phyag gis theg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi blo gros ting nge 'dzin de las langs te byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i
196b8(1): rigs shes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha' mthas gtugs pas shin tu yangs pa ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs
196b9(1): su skye ba yin na/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su bskye ba yan/ da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin Na kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems
196b10(1): chag ba rtsor bar byed pa gang la bsams te/ de skang du smras pa de dag gang zhen kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag mi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang 'byor pa dang da ltar byung 'a'i
196b11(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang gsungs por 'gyur ba dag go// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa dang / las dang tho ba'i byang chub sems
197a1(1): ga ba'i rnam par dgod pa dang / nas 'byor da la myod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dand pa dang / tsher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rna ra mnang pa dang / spyod pa phun gsum tshogs pa'i byang chus
197a2(1): sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / bsam la phun gsum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / gzho nur gyur da pa'i byang chub sems dpa
197a3(1): rnam par dgod pa dang / rgyal mtshas kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / dbang skur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod
197a4(1): ba ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs po dang / gsung po dang gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal pa'i sras dag de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub
197a5(1): sems dpa' gang zhe nas kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nasan mdzes pa dang bzang ba dang / myig tu 'ong ba dang // kha dog rgyas pa dang / 
197a6(1): thub par dka' ba dang / 'bru' che bar mthong ba 'amardzu 'phrul gi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / yongs su bstan pa'i rnam para'aphrul ba dang / rjes su bstan pa'i rnam pas 'phrul pa mthong ba 'a
197a7(1): sems cad sdug bsngal ba 'thong ba 'am pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya chen po thos par gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smod cing 'a phyi byed
197a8(1): byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems skyed pa dang po des ni thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su gzung bar gyur da te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang yas kyi rnam par sbyin pa shes pa dang / 
197a9(1): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang / tha ma shes pa dang / mos pa dad pa dang / mos pa du ma shes dang khams mtha' dad pa dang / 
197a10(1): khams du ma shes pa dang / tha mas cad du 'gro ba lam shos pa dang / bsas gtan dang / rnam par tha dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ges pa dang / 
197b1(1): su dran pa bsgribs pa myed pa shes pa dang / chags pa byed pa'i lha'i dmyi ka shes pa dang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du zag pa myed pa shes pa'o// thub par dka' gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin par gyur te/ de ni seMs
197b2(1): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa la spyad par byas te// byang chub sems dpa' bsnyen par bdel ba yang de la brjod
197b3(1): bar bya'o// 'jig rten gi nang na gtso bor gyur pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// phul du phyin pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// zig kyis myi non pa'i gnas kyang de la brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba yang de la
197b4(1): bstand par bya'o// sangs rgyas ched myed pa dang phrad par 'gyur ba yang de la bstand par bya'o// rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin gyi spyod pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ldog par 'a gyur ba yang de ya
197b5(1): brjod par bya'o// sems can ba sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa/ yang de la brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kyi chos/ thams cad la bde' bas kyang shas cher sems skye bar bya ba dang gnas gang
197b6(1): pos kyang de sa bdag nyid myo gas bya ba dang / bdag nyid gam do 'don par gyi babyur rgya ra gyi kyi rnam pa'i thas dang ma'ang 'ad pa'i byang chub semasadas mas dang gang / 
197b7(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la rnam pa bcur sems nye bar gzhog/ 
197b8(1): ste bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste pham pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go// snying brtse ba'i sems dang / pa de'i ba'i sems dang / gnas pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dpa' phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongs su bsrung la
197b9(1): sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / bston pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go// rnam pa bcu po de dag gis sems can la sems nye bar gzhog sten kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las rang
197b10(1): po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa' las dang lo pa de ni thog ma nyid du kha ton la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// mang du thos nas dben par gnas pa la yongs su bskul
197b11(1): byar bya'o// rab tu dben par 'gyur nas dge ba'i bshes su 'gyur bar yongs su bskul bar bya'o// dge' ba'i bshes su gyur nas nga lo bde ba la yongs su skul bar bya'o// de lo bde bar 'gyur nas dus shes pa la yongs su
198a1(1): bsrul bar bya'o// dus shes nas kyi 'jigs pa la yongs su skul par bya'o// myi 'jigs par 'gyu ra nas don shes pa la yongasu bsrul bar bya'o// don shes ras chos kyi rjes su dang brang ba la yongs
198a2(1): bskul par bya'o// chos kyi sdes su 'gro bar gyu rang nas/ rmongs pa myed pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// rmongs par byed par gyur nas rnam par dgod la la yongs su bsku bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na sems can rdzas
198a3(1): cad la de bas kyang gas cher sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po mngon tu gzhog par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyar bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gi dring 'jog par myi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ 
198a4(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni las dang loso pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rnal 'byor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
198a5(1): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs pa'i rnam pa bcus chosathams cad la bsko par byed de/ brgya gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad myi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang
198a6(1): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad bdag myed pa dang chos thams cad byed pa myed pa dang / chos thams cad myong ba myedapa dang // chos thams cang brda byed pa dang / chos thams cad gnas sted/ #
198a7(1): ba dang / chos thams cad sa rnam par rtog pa myed pa dang / chos thams cad la ched du byed pa myed pa ste// dmyigs pa'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul du brtson pa byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
198a8(1): 'di ni rnal 'byor da la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpano// kye rgyal pa'i sngas dag de ltar rnal 'byor de la pyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ sems can gyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul par bya'o// chos kyi
198a9(1): khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul par bya'o// chu'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul par phyin

198b5(1): rnam par bsgoms pa dang / rnam par sbyin pa bsgoms pa dang / na 'khor rnam par bsgoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa naH par bsgoms pa ste/ yongs su sbyin pa bcu po 'di dag gis #

200b5(1): pa yin ka gang gi spyod la kha na ma tho ba myed pa yid/ yid kyi spyodapa kha na ma tho ba myed pa yin/ sems skyed pa btsam gis da skye la bsgrub pa yin pa sems gzhan gi bsam pa shes pa yin6
200b6(1): gang zag gzhan gi mos pa rtogs pa yin/ sems can gyi khams thaded pa rab tu shes pa yin/ las kyi byin kyi rlabase tha dad pa rab tu rtogs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grub pa dang 'jig
200b7(1): pa yongs su 'jal ba yin/ gar dga' bar 'gro ba la myur ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzho nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar gzho nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems

201a1(1): rgyas grangs byed pa pa snyed bkum bar bya ba brjod par bya/ de ba'i phyi shA na de nas kyang shas cher chos thams panas mdzan gas ba sgrubs pa'i mams bya ba dang / gnas ga
201a2(1): de la bdag nyid sbyor ba bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhang gi dri ba 'jog par myi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i spos dag 'di ni g.yo rur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
201a3(1): dag rgyal ba tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' gang zhen kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu ga rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi skyeb rtogs par bya

201a10(1): de'i sems bsgribs pa myed pa ma ngon bar bsgrubs pa la de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / budag nyid ga'ang gi dring 'jog par myi bya ba'i phyir te/

201b9(1): dpa' dbang bskur ba de la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ye shes la 'jug pa bcu bka' bsngal te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dus gsum gi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ye shes brjod

202a3(1): nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gus to//

202a7(1): kyi char mngon pa pa 'bab zo/ lha rdzas kyi ros po nA 'angon par 'byung por gyur pa to// b+ha rdzas kyi snang ba rab tu byung 'am 'gyurang to// lha rdzas kyi re ro shin tu grag par gyur ro// gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo lha'i dbang 'o/ 
202a8(1): 'i khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig brten gyi khams thams cad du'ang phyogs bcur rgyas par 'byung ste/ chos bstand pa 'di yang thams cad du 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
202a9(1): khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu 'dra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags te/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal bar bka nas 'di skad ces 'dzerd to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpas
202a10(1): rnams kyi chos nyid de lta bu ston pa/ legs so/ legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kun kyang myo chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi bla gros zhes bya ba ga sug gi zham ring
202b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya bag stag nas 'dir phyin te ga thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu tshig 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag dang khong du chud
202b2(1): bya ba 'di dag gis don 'di nyid mngon par mos shing lhag chad myed par bston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras des ltar bdag gnag dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis 'dir byin to// ji ltar bdag gcag 'jig rten gyi khams
202b3(1): 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig brten gyi khams thams thams cad kyi 'jig brten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi me mo'i lha'i dbang po'i khang pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas

206b8(1): bshad pa'i chos nyid tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin na ni/ 'gog pa gnas su 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das ma gnas su 'gyur ro// bral ba gnas su 'gyur ro// ma skyes pa gnas su 'gyur ro ma byung ba gnas

207a1(1): rkyed ga tshangs pa'i dpyod pa yin na di rgyun du zhushes pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir / dge 'dun yin nas 'on tam rgyun tu zhugs pa 'i 'bras bu dge 'dun ngan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nas/ yod
207a2(1): tam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun/ 'on tam phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun padagra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nas/ 'on tam dgra bcom pa'i

207a6(1): pa ba ga shes de skang chob de dag la rngam par bsgoms ma ngo gi lus yang mngos par chags pa byed pa dang / zanas pa 'arjen byed pa dang / chos rnam sa gangs pa sred pa dang / 'das pargya bas
207a7(1): ba nga gam 'ongs pa ma byin pa dang / nga skar byung ba stong pa dang las pa byed pa byed pa dang / rnam par sbyin pa la tshor 'byed pa dag 'jig nyid 'di 'phos pabyed na dang / 'jig rten pha rol chung myil pa'i phyir tshangs so byin

207a10(1): da malal yongs su rgyas pang b+har dang / chags pa byed 'am yid 'bya ba dang // sems kyi bsgribs pa byed pa dang / gnyis su byed pa shin tu spyod pa dang / bsgrim bskyed par yod pa dang / macan ga byed 'di chos ma
207b1(1): ba dang / mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas sa kyi chos mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag pam sems pas tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa yid ye bya'o// gong du yang
207b2(1): lagyu dang ldan pas yid la bya'o// bcu ga zheni 'di lta ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las dang pa rnam par sbyin pa 'ashes pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan
207b3(1): dang rnam par tha da pa dang ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par ldang ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang / dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa dang / yongs su
207b4(1): rdzogs da mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa dang mos pa ru ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / khams tha dad pa dang khams du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang ldan
207b5(1): ba nga ga ng+gA'i sbyin thogs pa byed pa dang ldan pa dang / ba ba dbyen pa rjes su dram pa shen pa dang ldan pa dang / bag chags kyi namamams skyom pa yang dag pas gcas la shes pa dang ldan pa / 
207b6(1): de bzhim gagags pa'i slobs re re la yang rnam par dbyel gan tu rgya cher ba'i khong du chud par bya'o// thams cad byung tshang bye las bsgreba'o// thos nas kyang snying rje chen po sa brkang par bya'o// 
207b7(1): sems cad rnam par bsgom pa yang myi gtang bar bya'o// chos la shin tu brtag pa yang gyi gzhis par bya'o// bla na byed pa'i chos la yang dag pa 'o yi nam yang gin tu brtsam par bya'o// rnam par sbyin pa nga mdza la
207b8(1): myed par bya'o// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// rmyi lam gyi rang bzhin du yang yang dag par spyad par bya'o// myig yod gi rang bzhin dang yang tha myi dad par bya'o// sgra rnyan gi rang bzhin yang spyod yul tu
207b9(1): bya'og smras pa'i rang bzhin du yang bos par bya ste/ de de ltar zhugs pas nyon mongs pa chung bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang mngon tu bya gyur ro// des chos de dag gnyis su myed par rtogs sems dang po bskyed
207b10(1): nyid kyis bla da byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'don par 'tshang rgya'i 'i gnas yod do// chos thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin gyi shes pas gzhan gyi drid kyi 'jog pa'i shes kyi phung po dang yang ldan
207b11(1): bar 'gyur ro// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdor/ sangs rgyas pal po che/ zhes bya ba las tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
208a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bzod nams kyi phung po ci tsam zhig dang ldan nag/ sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang /

208a10(1): 'gro sne dI stong gi tshar yang nye bar myi 'gro/ brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba rgya 'i cha dang bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ga brgya stong gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig gi tshwa dang / bye ba khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / bye ba/

211a1(1): de'i 'og tu skyes bu dgu pa zhig skyes la ka skyes bu snga ma brgyad kyis bskal pa grangs myed par 'bra ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa baspangs pa de dag skad gcig gcig gis bgrangs te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu brtsa ba zhig
