228a5(1): 'byung ye shes sgrub pa dge ba'i rnams rdzogs pa'i byang chub ses dpa' yon tan can// grags pa chen po rnams la legasapar shod/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams sems thob cing/ 
228a6(1): pa/ brtson 'grus btad pas ji lhur bzod par bya na pa gang gis phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes bya zhing / yang dag sangs rgyas pa yang gnad bya dang / spyod pa dag dang sngon las yongs dag dang / ye shes gcer
228a7(1): ra ras tu nos 'gyur zhing // zo'o nas de dag mo dun phyogs par/ yongs su zungs pa nag sugang byed das gagang yang sa mdza byin pa mtshad gi 'ang/ dedas byag gang rab tu myod pa dang / 
228a8(1): ca ji ltar rlos byed dam bcas shing / yang dag sangs rgyas bsam pa mnyam 'dzin dang / myig gi dmyigs pa btad pa thams cad kyi// 'byung ba yon ca sa gocos 'gyur zhing // skyes su khyab chag de
228a9(1): bzod 'gyur ba'o// ram danasapa de rgya tshon khyod kyis thong// ji lta de dag phun pa kun ga las ning / ga'athan pa'i 'azhir rnams thams cad pan byam ma dris bral pa mi na ldamam
228b1(1): rnams// skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ldan 'gyur dang // kyi khos ngan song lam rnams yongs pa ngas shing // ye ges chen po 'i dkyil 'khor mchog spyong dang / yod tan bzang po bams cang ldan
228b2(1): 'gyur da cing / rgyal pa'i ye shes stobs kyang thob 'gyur dang / skyes su khyu mchog ye shes zhugs nas kyang // sems cad bsam pa ri bzhin bzhon byed cing // mtha' yas sangs pa'i zhing rnams zhes/ 
228b3(1): sras su// bston pa chen po'i las kyang byed pa dang / ci nas de dag spyod pa mchog thob nas/ myi khyu 'chog bsod nams ston byed de// zis kyis ma ron gzhan gyis kyi 'bam 'am// rgyal ba'i chos nyid
228b4(1): tu 'dzin byed bsnyon// seng ge bzhin du ji ltar 'jigs pa myed/ ji ltar zla bzhin dag pa'i mdog tu spyod// chus pad ma bzhin du chags pa myed pa// de dag rgyal pa'i yon tan ji ltar spyong // de na
228b5(1): sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi zla gros kyis byang chub semam drapal ba rtson 'grul tho gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ kye rgyas pa'i sras khyod na skyo bos phan pa dang / skye bo mang po sa
228b6(1): tu rtogs shing rnam par dag pa brtsams te/ 'dri zhi ba de ltarargyal ba'i sras khyod de bzhin gshegs pa 'dri ba chos mang po la rab tu gnas pa brtson 'grus chen po shin tu bsags pa
228b7(1): brtson 'grus ldog pa myed pas shin tu byung ba 'dri bar byed pa ni kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'bru
228b8(1): dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs tsams bstan par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen de pa nyid du sems bskyed pa thob rnams kyis thog mar sems bskyed
228b9(1): pa de myi nyams par yongs su bsrung ba dang / rim gror bya ba'i phyir bag yod par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras des rnam par bcus na byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ bcwa
228b10(1): ko pa zhe na tshul khrims kyi phung po gon tu baspangs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems ma nyams shing shin tu sbyangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa g.yo spu myed pa dang dge' ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bam
229a1(1): kyi ldog pa dang nga gi sems bskyed pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / phyogs khyi ma dben so 'i skye bo dpal 'dres pa dang / dgel ba'i rtsa 'a'i las 'jig rten gyi 'du shes dang 'do
229a2(1): pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spangs pad+ma tu 'thob pa dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba brtsam gnan tan rgyun chad pa myed pa dang / bdag gyi rgyud
229a3(1): kyi stobs kyi shugs shin tu rtags pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dri lag yod pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub
229a4(1): sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas pa ni rnam pa bcus na yongs su dag par gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras na nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa yin
229a5(1): shes pazhin gyi dran pa cas yin khengs pa skyed cing g.yes ba byed de bsam gtan zab mo le rab tu gnas pa yim sangs rgyas su chos theb mo ba cas bya ba da kun du byed cing
229a6(1): myi gcod pa yon lhag mthong mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing / ji skad thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du rtogs par zhugs pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi rjes su song ba'i sems kyis de bzhin
229a7(1): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zam mo 'o rjes su song ba yin/ sa dang mnyam zhing mthon man dang bral ba yin sbyor ba zang ngan dang bar ma la sems nyams pa myed pa yin sems can kun gyi
229a8(1): nang na chung ngu thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems gcig bskyed pa la 'ang ston pa'i bsam pa thob pa yin mkhan po dang bslob dpon dang dge' ba'i bshes gnyen dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang chos smra la rnams
229a9(1): pa rim gro dang bkur sti'i ngang tshul can du gnas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpal bag yod pa la gdas pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub
229a10(1): sems dpa' bag yod pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mo sa bya che ba rnal 'byor rgyud ma chad pa chos thams cad la gnas pa/ chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa myed pa'i tshul la zhugs pa sos/ 
229b1(1): yangs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dbud byed pa'i rjes su song ba rnams kyis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal pa'i lus byang
229b2(1): chub sems dpas chos bcus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na byang chub sems dpa'i brtsod 'grus thams cad la phyir myi ldog pa dang / lus dang srog sa myi lba ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo khyad pa
229b3(1): 'chol ba'i rkyen dang don tu gnyer ba byed pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings pa yang dag par gsol ba'i lhag thong la khas pa dang / gyi gangs pa'i chos rnam par spo pa'i
229b4(1): phyag rgya dang / rtag tu rgyun gyi chang par sgrubs pa'i smon lam chen po dang / yongs su phungs pa'i bzod pa shes pa'i snang ba dbang gi dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang / ma la grags bshin tu 'dags pa dang / mdod par 'du byab
229b5(1): skyeng ba'i po/ gom su 'byung ba zhes kye rgyal ba'i bcu po de dag gis de bzhi na gshegs pa mnyesal par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i zas de la byang chub sems da 'a chos bcu la gas pa rnams kyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pa/ rbaH
229b6(1): 'gyur ba yin te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste bag yog pa la gnas ke ba dang ga kyi skye ba'i bzod pa la gnas pa dang ga snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang /  pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la
229b7(1): gnas pa dang / dgyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas pa dang / dba'as mkhas pa gnas pa dang / brtan pa'i stobs kyi zhugs la ganga' pa dang
229b8(1): chos thams cad dam mkha'i rang bzhin la rab tu gnas pa dang / len pa myed pa la gnas te gakye rgyal ba'i sras chos de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis par 'gyur/ 
229b9(1): ro// kye rgyas pa'i sras de la chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sa rnam par 'god pa las 'da' ba yin te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bstogs rnams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shi nang tu bsngags pa pa/ 
229b10(1): pha rolang tu phyi rang ba rnam par bye ba tshad byed pa'i lam gzhan gi dring myi 'jog pa'i ye shes spang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rgyan ma chad pa dang / brjod 'byas zhig pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegasapa
229b11(1): kye'i byin rlabs kyis legs par brlabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas myi skyong dang / theg pa'i rgyan shin tu bshams pa dang / ye shes kyi bsam pa rab tu rno ba dang / sa dang sa ma yin pa'i chos kyi sgo
230a1(1): po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nas sa rnam khar dgod pa las 'dal ba yin jog kye rgyas pa'i sras byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni log ma das sa rnam par dgod pa rnams cam pa mkhas pa rna pa pa nga
230a2(1): pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo dag gis gang khyod du chud par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi sgo gang gis thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsgrub pa gang yid dang / rgyu 'thun pa gang yin pa dang / spyod yul gang yin pa dang / rnal ba 'grus
230a3(1): gang yin pa dang / yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi sgo rnam par bye ba'i khyad par gang yin pa dang / ci ltar thob par bya ba thams cad kyang rnam par dpyod do// de dag la shin tu rnam par spyod pas chos thams
230a4(1): cad la myi gnas shing // sems kyi rang bzhin gi chos thams cad khrod du chud pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang dag par 'da'o// kye/ rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di ltar thams
230a5(1): cad gis nas kyang myur tu 'da' bar bya'o snyam du myi sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de dag 'di snyam du sems ste/ bdag cag sa nas sa sa rnam par gnas pas ji ltar yang dag par gnas pa
230a6(1): de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs ches che bar 'gyur te/ ji lta ji ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po skyes par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su song zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa myed pas nye bar
230a7(1): gnas par 'gyur po bsnyam ste/ de dag sbyor ba rgyun ma chad pad cing skyo ba myed pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / tshogs kyi rgyan chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par 'god pa las yang dag par 'da'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la
230a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa bcus spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su spyad dang byas te/ bcu gang zhe na yo byad yongs su gzung ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad mchim par byed pa dang / tshul khrims
230a9(1): yang dag par blangs pa kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang / bzod pa nges pa myi zad pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa'i phyir myi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / dran pa'i stobs kyi shugs rmongs pa
230b1(1): byed pa dang / gcig las rnam pa la dad pa'i chos kyi rjes su song zhing khong du chud pa dang ga gnas byed pa'i bstod pa la sgrub dga' ba thams cad la sems de'i rgyal po lta bu dang / sems can thams cad dang
230b2(1): ma 'dres pa'i mu stegs su gyur pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis pyod pa'i dkyi
230b3(1): 'khor yongs su sbyang pa rnyi rnam pa bcus shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ba te/ bcu gang zhe na sems can gyi brtse po 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gzhugs pas yang dag par dgongs pa'angang 'das pa'i byang chub sems dga'
230b4(1): grogs kyis dge' ba'i rgyal bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi brlabs yang dag par gzung ba la mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i bla shes gnyen la yang dag par brten pa dang / mos pa dang rtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa la rab
230b5(1): tu gnas pa dang / chos pa dang phe thams cad sar gyi dang pa rton pa da pan dang / snying rje byin rlabs shin tu che ba dang chos thams cad yang dag par rig pa bzhi du rnam pas lta'i shes rab kyi sa ros pa ba
230b6(1): sa kyi mdzud par bsgrus pa dang / bcams mams pan spyod pa'i sto pa dang / snyom pa bam sang sa de bzhin /  kyi ngas ya ga 9
230b7(1): ba bcu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis myod ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su spyad par gyur bya'o// kye rgyas pa'i sras de la byang chub sems dpe'i smon la rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta
230b8(1): ste/ skyo ba myed par sems can gi khams yongs su smind par bya ba'i smon lam rang dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs brtsegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon las dang / lus dang srog gis
230b9(1): bsngo zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i spoms pa dang ga/ ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dpyad pa khong du chud pas sangs rgyas kyi 'ing la 'jug pa'i smon lam dang ga byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang gnyis cu
230b10(1): byed pas chus cig gi rgyud du 'gro ba'i spoms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo la 'jug pas chos khong cu chung ba'i smon sam dang mos pa rnam par sbyangs pas bzhin ngor yod pa'i spong bam dang / 
230b11(1): gya de dag ni byang chub semasad pa'i spyod pa de gar songs bu bya mal so na ma ma tshu yo kyi byan pas rgya ma ma yang macas brgya rab kyi thos gas sa la cho dra yos byam ba rlom
231a1(1): phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlabs pas bskam par gnas pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i theg pa'i rgya rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam
231a2(1): par spang ba'i smon lam dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de ltar smon lam/ rnam pad spyod do// de dag rnam pa bcus smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ bcu gang
231a3(1): zhe na yongs su skyo ba myed pa dang / rgyan chen po mngon par basmra ba pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug dang / 'jig brten gyi khams gzhan na
231a4(1): bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thos nas rang gi smon lam tu mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bsam pa phyi ma'i a na'i mur thug pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad yongs su
231a5(1): sbyar bar bya ba ga tu gas pa'i smon lam chen po dang ldan dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas myi 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad kyis rdzi myi snyam pa dang / 
231a6(1): su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter myi zad pa 'ang rab tu thob bo// gzungs 'khrul pa myed pa myed pa'i gter zad myi shes pa 'ang rab tu tho ma zad smod lam zad myi shes pas rtso
231a7(1): thams cad shin tu rtogs pa'i gzungs kyang rab tu thoza mang/ snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i gter zad kyi shes pa'ang rab tu thod zo/  ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyud kyi gter zang kyi
231a8(1): shes pa 'ang rab tu thong po// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi gter zad myi shes pa 'ang rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa'i ye shes kyi gte/ 
231a9(1): zad myi shes pa 'ang rab tu thob bo// rnam par sbyin pa la gnas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gter zad myi shes pa dang rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs mtha' yas pa'i gter zad myi shes
231b1(1): pa 'ang rab tu thob po/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dpung myed par gtogs pa la 'jug pa'i gter ma zad myi shes pa 'ang rab tu thob bo// de ltar gtor rab tu thob cing bsod nams dang / ye shes
231b2(1): kyi tshogs zad kyi shes pa dang ldan pa de dag ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pas sems can rnams la bsam la/ ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi gter gyi sbyin pa byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byab
231b3(1): chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ji ltar 'jug ce na/ sbyor ba ji lta bums rgyu ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen ji lta ba dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i sbyor ba ji lta ba
231b4(1): yas byung ga sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug skye/ de dag de ltar bsam pa la zhugs pa'i rnams / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing chos yang dag par ston
231b5(1): te/ de dag 'dod chags kyi bsam pa rnam khar bzlog pa'i phyi myi sdug pa yang dag par ston to// zhe sdang gi bsam pa/ rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po'i spyor bar yang
231b6(1): dag par thod to// gti mug gi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yang dag par ston to// cha mnyam pa rnas par bzlog pa'i phyim yeshes kyi khyad par
231b7(1): dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag par ston to// 'khor ba'i bsam pa yang dag par bzlog pa'i phyir sdug bsngal rnam gsum dang ldan pa yang dag par ston to// gnas kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir
231b8(1): gnas skyed pa'i chos kyi sku yang dag par ston to// zhum pa'i bsam la rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir nga / rgyan chen po'i yul yang dag par bston to// bdag gi nga rgyal gyis bcom dngos pa'i bsam pa rnam
231b9(1): par bzlog pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid yang dag par ston to// g.yol dang skyes kyi mnyam pa'i bsapa pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i lasam pa mnyam pa nyid dang zhi ba'i
231b10(1): gnas kyi bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par ston to// de dag ri de lur sems can rnams la las ma pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi gter yang das par ston te/ de yang don dbyer myed pa yang dan pa
232a1(1): par ston to// yi ge'i mtshams 'byed par sbyar pas yang dag par bston to// shes pa rnam par 'bye bas yang dag par ston to// bstan pa snga phyi ma 'dres pas yang dag par ston to// chos kyi tshul
232a2(1): ma yin pa'i bye brag dbyer myi byed las yang dag par ston to// mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya rnam par myi khrugs pas yang dag par bston to// chos rab tu 'god pa rgyun 'chad pa myed pas yang dag parna par ston to// 
232a3(1): mal lus pa/ spyang pas yang dag par 'byor to// the rtsom thams cad shin tu gcangad pa'i phyir yang dag par bskon to// dbang po'i rgyud la 'dus pa'i phyir yang dag par mthon to/ de bzhinas
232a4(1): gas pa'i phyag rgya la dgod pa dang gzhol bas sa padag pang ston to/ yang dag pa di mthal mtshan nyid myed pa rnam par myi 'khrugs pas yang dag par bston ko// chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhom
232a5(1): sa yang dag par batho nga sto chos kyi nga yang dag par dus gdungs pas yang ngas pamathon to// kadas bams cad yang dag depas sang bas yang dag su thod te/ de bzhin gshesas sde
232a6(1): 'dum su nga yang dag pa tshig dang gang da sA dang ga kyi las panyid la kyigs da
232a7(1): skye theg pa'i dbyangs kyi rjes su yobs sung dag khar bso tog dbes pams cad nas par 'dod pas byud dang kyi dga' bar btad par byu sa dag pa na na ri bzhi gshegs pa
232a8(1): byas da sa byed kyi 'as sa lung nga/ rlo mas byin na sbyin pa du phyin sa su
232b1(1): blangs pa myi rtong pa dang gnas pa myed pa dang nga rgyab myed pas tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su dag par byed do// nyes pa thams cad khyad du bsod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis myi
232b2(1): 2/ blugs pa dang mnyam pa nyid la gnol ba dang thon man myed pa dang zad myi shes pa sa ma nyem pa ra 'dzin pas bzod pa'i pha ros da tu phyi nad pa yongs su dag par byed do// mA ma pa chen por rtsom pa dang
232b3(1): brtsam pa thams cad la zhum pa myed pa dang / spor ba phyir myi ldog pa dang yod la byed pa'i phyir myi 'gyur ba dang / mthul mtha' yas pa dang stobs pa thub pa myed pa dang / sngon tu 'dod pa myi 'bogs
232b4(1): pa dang / dad pa'i 'bru chen po dang blang ba dang ga dor la myed pa'i tsho gas thams cad yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / thams can mkhyen pa sgo nyams pa a yang dag par 'jug pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
232b5(1): byed cing blangs byed pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / nyon mongs thams cad rab tu gse yong pa dngag ting nge 'dzin nosas pa mngon par 'asgrub pa dang / mdor par shes pa chen pos
232b6(1): rnam par 'phrul pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rim gis rnam par spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo rab tu 'jug pa ga ting nge 'dzin gcig la sgo mthas yas pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi spyod yul thams
232b7(1): cang shes pa dang // de'i yul gyi rjes su rab tu zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad ye shes kyi phyag rgya myi 'khrugs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ya nye bar gyur pas/ bsam
232b8(1): gtan gi tan gyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa yongs su dag par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa dang gzung ba dang blang ba dang bcad pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas yongs
232b9(1): chu skyob dang / zos pa thams cad kyis phyi ngoms pa dang ka ji ltar thos pa sa rgyal bzhin tu rtog pa dang // de la mngon gsum du mnyam par gzhog pa rung // 'dogs pa'i khu ba thams cad dang
233a1(1): a bral ba dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyab gyi dad pa dang / de ba'i na gshegs pa'i sgo nas kun gyis thub par thos pa da gzas pa 'dra
233a2(1): thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa rgyun myi 'chad pa dang /  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgo kun nas ldan pas thas cad mkhyend pa'i spor 'jug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag
233a3(1): pabapar 'byed do// 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i rgyud thams cad ston pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud yongs su smin pas yongs su myi skyo ba dang bsam pa bzhin du bya ba ston pa dang / bya ba thams cad la mngon par chags
233a4(1): pa myed pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang 'phags pa'i khyod pa bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du bsnyon pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar spyond pa dang / sbyor pa thams cad shin tu rtags pas rgyu ba dang / rgyan
233a5(1): thams cad bstand pa gnas myed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i spyod/ pas thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su spyod do// sos
233a6(1): can gi khams mthar thug par yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dzin brten gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su sbyang ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa mthar thug par mchod pa dang / chos chags pa byed pa/ 6
233a7(1): 'i mthar thug par rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings mthar thug par spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par rab tu gnas pa dang // sems skyed pa'i
233a8(1): mthar thug par bstobs la 'jug pa dang / 'gro ba dang ldog pa mngar thug par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zhing gi gnas kyi mthar thug par thams cad mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi
233a9(1): mthar thug payang rab tu thob par bya bas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag par byed do// bsam pa'i stobs kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pang dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dbang tu
233a10(1): gyur da cing thub pa myed pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs skob myed pa dang / byams pa chen po'i stobs snyoms pa'i spyod pa can dang / gzungs kyi bstobs don thams cad kyi sbyor ba la bsgribs pa
233b1(1): byed pa dang / spobs pa'i stogs 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / pha rold tu phyind pa'i bstobs theg pa thams cad kyi rgyan byed pa dang / smon la mau ka stobs gcan du gyi rung ba dang
233b2(1): mngon par shes pa'i stobs tshad myed pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la mos pa dam pa'i stobs rab tu 'dzind pas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa yongs su dag par byed do// 
233b3(1): 'dod chags kyi myong 'a khong du chud pa dang / zhe sdang ni khyod 'arjes su rtogs pa dang / ti mun ni yod pa rang tu rtogs pa dang /  mnyan pa'i myong ba rjes zug sa bya dang / sa pa sa cad tu rgyud
233b4(1): pa rab tu rtog pa dang na skad cig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i 'gyod pa rnam par rtog pa dang / sems dang bsam pa mtha' yas pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la yang dag par ji // 
233b5(1): pa bzhin du rtog pa dang gde bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo thams cad dang / ldan pa khong du chud pas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs \u0f7f
233b6(1): su dag par byed do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas pa la po che zhes bya ba gnad tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo'o// bam po nyi shu lnga pa// / de dag de ltar pa ngos
233b7(1): bya rnyed pa rnams yongs su spyong zhing /  pha rol tu phyin pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang ga pha rol gyi phyogs myi gtong bar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rgyan chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa la gnas
233b8(1): shong / sems can gyi khams ji ltar bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par 'asgrol lo de dag dge ba'i las shin tu brtsams pa bsnyon pas ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems cano sgrog lo/ brtsom pa chen po la
233b9(1): gzung bas sems can gyi khams myi khom par 'gro ba sgrol lo// lhag thod nye bar bstabs pas gzugs kyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can gi khams sgrol lo// phra ba'i ye shes nye bar bstabs
233b10(1): ba sa gzugs myed pa'i khams su skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsgos so// zhi ba'i tshul nye bar bstabs pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa'i sems kyi khams sgom thod
234a1(1): stobs bcu'i brgya ma chen po dang ldan pa bstabs pas theg pa chen po pa mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo// de ltar na sngon las dang po'i sa sa gnas pa che/ sems can
234a2(1): g.yangs sa chen po nas lhung ba rnam pa tha dang par 'gyur ba ji lta ba bzhin du shes te/ sgo sna tshogs nas kazu par bya'o zhes seng ge'i sgras bsgrags pa de bzhin tu ye shes thob pa'i rnams sems
234a3(1): can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu bzhugs pa yin no// kye rgyas pa'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu la zhugs pa ni rtag tu rgyun myi gcod par sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 
234a4(1): kyi rigs dang dge' 'dun gi rigs myig chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ de dag byang chub kyi sems gzhan gi sems kyi rgyud la gzhog pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs myi gcod pa yin/ chos kyi mdzod
234a5(1): rnam par 'gro la pas chos kyi rigs myi gcod pa yin/ bstand pa'i tshul dang 'gal bar myi byed pas/ dge' la/ t+ya na gi rigs myi gcod pa yin/ smon lam chen po yang
234a6(1): dag par brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs myi gcod pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i las yang dag par bston pas/ chos kyi rigs myi gcod pa yin/ snying po zoT
234a7(1): b.raro byed pa'i chos la brtson pas dge 'a 'dun gi rigs myi gcod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon sems can gyi zhing la 'debs pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs myi gcod pa yin dam pa'i chos
234a8(1): yongs su 'dzi nad pas chos kyi rigs kyi gcod pa yin/ tshogs chen po yongs su bsdud pa myi skyo bas dge 'dun gi rigs kyi gcod pa yin/ 'das pa 'ang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
234a9(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mdzad pa dran pa'i phyir rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdapas ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa myi gtong bas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gi rigs myi gcod pa yin/ 
234a10(1): de dag de ltar skyabs gsum gi rigs myi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pas brtsom pa thams cad la kha na ma tho ba myed pa yin te/ rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung / de dag thams cad tu thogs pa myed par
234b1(1): thams cad la byed nga pa'i sgor 'byung ba thob 'ang byed do// de dag de ltan lus kyi las kha ra ma tho ba byed pa dang / ngag gi las khams thob myed pa dang /  sid kyisas la ma tho byed pa sa gnas pas dge ba'i tha
234b2(1): don yod 'ang brtson pa yin te/ sems can gi don sbyor ba don yod par ba rtsom mo// sems cad don yod par 'dul yang byed do// chos don yod par ston rtog/ de'i chos bstand pa thams cad kyang / sems can gyi
234b3(1): bsam pa tshi ma la re bya ba la thogs pa skyed pas khong du chud par 'gyur ro// de'i sems bskyed pa gcig cas ye log 'ar myi 'gyur te / sems bskyed pa ga'an thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa thams cad markyen
234b4(1): ba nyid du yongs su sngo'o/ de de ltar chos dkar po pa sngags pa don yod/ pa de lta bu la gnas pas rgyan rnam par phye ba bcus sems bskyed pa thams cad yongs su sngo ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di ga ste/ 
234b5(1): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar lus kyi rgyan sems can 'dul ba ji bzhin du yang dag par ston pa dang / ngag gi rgyan the tsom/ thams cad gcod pa dang / sems kyi brgyad skad gcig gis
234b6(1): gshing 'dzin dus grashegs par byed pa dag sengs rgyas kyisanong gi rgyas pananas can mongs sa byed pa dang / 'od kyi kyang yod ma krin pa'angs dung byung ba skyes ma
234b7(1): cad snang bar byed pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sems can gyi rnam pa tshad byemyed pa'i tshogs yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i brgyan sems can gi bsam la ci lta ba bzhin du
234b8(1): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bstan pa'i mkhas pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyan mngon par 'das pa gcig gis phyogs bcu ma lus par rgyas rang
234b9(1): 'gengs pa dang / chos kyi byin kyis rlabs pa'i rgyan yul dang dus dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du sdod pa dag ste/ de dag rgyan de lta bus sems bskyed pa thams cad du mngon mngon par bsgrub pas sus dang dag
234b10(1): dang yid kyi las don yod pa dang / ye shes chen po don yod pa rab tu thob ste/ de dag mthong bas kyang 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smid par 'gyur ba'i phyir
235a1(1): sems can rnam pa 'i yong bayin ta/ thos pa dang nyed bku pa dang / 'thogs pa dang rjes munan pa dang rdzas sus tu byung nga cho pa thong pa nga sus sa na
235a2(1): dang cing mos pa dang / chung ngu na phyib 'dzod pa tsam yang 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sbyin pa'i phyir sems can rnams la do tu 'grub pa min no// kye rgyal po'i mas 'di lta / 
235a3(1): dper na rtsi'i mying mthong na ya del ba zhes bya ba de mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi lus la zhen pa las lhor thos pa'i dug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub
235a4(1): sems dpa' yang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad byang bar gyur te/  chos dkar po'i stobs kyi shugs kyang skye bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
235a5(1): dgang chen po chos nyid de lta bu dang / ldan zhing chos de dag la gnas te shes rab kyi 'od chen pos ma rig pa'i phun podags la nas bdud kyi sngags ji khor thams cad khyams pa
235a6(1): dang nyid rje chen po'i zhabs pa sa par byas ste/ ye shes ba sod nams kyi gonas kyi shugs kyis pas kyis rnamamams cad kyi la dkyis mnan nas rdo rje lu tsun shing de 'dzin #
235a7(1): la 'jug pas sems kyi dri ma thams cad nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad bsnga yang nas skyo ba myed pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba phun gsum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub ste/ 
235a8(1): sngom chad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'apyod pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis kyi khom pa dang / ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par gazlog nas mngon bar zhe pa myed pa'i stobs
235a9(1): dong shugs kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te// rim gris thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang shugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyi nang pa dang / ting nge'i dzinapa dang mngon
235a10(1): bar shes pa dang / rig pa dang myi 'jigs par yongs su dag pa mngor bar bsgrubs nas/ chos dkar po thams cad kyi bstobs dang shugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan dang dpe' byed bzang po dang / 
235b1(1): tsu dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa'i rgyan te yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa rab tu rgyas par byas te// ye shes kyis shes par bya ba'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / 
235b2(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos na 'dres pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur tu 'thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul yang smon
235b3(1): lam gyi khyad par ji lta bu bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ro// bsngon go byin kyi rlabs dang ye shes kyi byin kyi brlabs kyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas
235b4(1): kyi zhing stan te/ 'dus pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po che skor cing / mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnam par 'dul lo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems
235b5(1): dpa' cham de lasu rang du sa na sa pas rgya sa byed pa mam sa
235b6(1): mtha' yas pa dag tu dam pa 'i chos yongs su 'dzinadachos smra ba chen po yang byed do// de ltar chos smra ba byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang ngan par rdzogs pa'i
235b7(1): sangs rgyas byin kyis rlabs pa de dag chos kyi marjod chen po gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pas chos kyi tshul rab tu dbye ba'i rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis 'khod kyi
235b8(1): dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par bdag gi lus kyi rgya byin kyis brlabs te/ bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i khas la mtha' yas pa
235b9(1): ye shes zad myi shes pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i khyon kyi rlabs dang dbyangs gcig baspags pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i dbyings
235b10(1): kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa bsam pa dang bka la nyes pa dang / shes pa'i sa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / lus kyi byin gyi rlabs 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du phyin kyang zil kyis
236a1(1): no dad pa dang / lus kyi rgyan sgo thams cad du rnam par bstand pa dang / 'khor kyi kyis 'khor thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa khong du chud pas rab tu rtogs pa dang / tshig grol ba'i byin kyi
236a2(1): brlabs kyis bas rang ba dang / chos 'chad pa'i byin kyi brlabs la mkhas pas chos kyi gtam chen po byed de/ bstobs dang shugs kyi dbang thub pa myed pa dang / 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbang zhug pa byed pa dang // 
236a3(1): chos kyi dbang zi lad kyis myi nond pa dang / ye shes kyi ngabangaka' na gis kyi thub pa dang / shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa'i dbang chos kyi mtshan nyid 'khrugs pa myed pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa'i dbang margyams
236a4(1): sbyor ba rgyun chad pa myed par bsam pa shi nang tu rtogs pa dang / gabyangs kyi dbang chos thams cad rnam par gdon gyi tha ya la 'jug pa dang / smon lam gi dbang dpe' sna tshogs kyis bstan pa'i tshul te
236a5(1): bar pa smra ba la shin tu bstan pa dang / snying rje chen po'i dbang phyir myi ldog cing rgyun ma tshad pa dang / byams pa chen ponadabang bsngon gin tu bskyed pas/ bsam pa thams cad sim
236a6(1): bar byed cing 'od gzer mi dra ba chen po gtong bas chos kyi gtam chen po byed do// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sod 'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos kyi gtam gsung ba dang / byang
236a7(1): chub sems dpal ye shes dang smon lam gyi khyad par dang ldan pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na byang chub sems dpa' des phyir brgal ba 'am/ spyi gtsugs blta ba 'am/ zil kyis gnan
236a8(1): pa lam dri ba'i cho gas yongs su bri bas thub par bya bar nus pa'i sems can gang yang byed de de ni gnas myed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te byang chub sems dpa' dbang de lta bu thob pa la 'jig brten
236a9(1): gi khams brjod du myed pa tsam du yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de yang sems can stong gsum gi bdag po'i gzi brjid thob lag/ stag gis gang bzhig yin na yang de dag thams cad byang chub mo / 
236a10(1): dga' 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor du 'ongs ma thag tu lus bstan pa'i dbang gis zi lad kyis gnan te/ byams pa chen po'i dbang gis lus kyi gzhi tshim ltar byas nas ye shes chen po'i dbang gis
236b1(1): se nas dang bsam pa rnam par shes par byas te/ myi 'jigs pa'i bsam pa chen pos chos ston ya byed cing / spobs pa chen po dbang gis sems can tshim par byed do// kye rgyal pa'i sras de ci'i phyir zhen
236b2(1): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa ma mi se shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad byed pa dang ldan/ chos rnam par 'byed pa gim tu rnam par bye ba la mkhas pa dang ldan/ dran pa'i stobs dang shugs mnyams shing rgya che ba dang ldan
236b3(1): chos thams cad kyi chus rna' bar bar ga don gyi za bar bzung zhing blangs pas rtogs pa mkhris pa dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtha' dang dpung myed pa dang ldan/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la sgribs pa skyed
236b4(1): ba'i chos bstond pa labs pa dang ldan mos la la mkhas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis blangs lnga ldan pa dus gsum gri de bzhin gshegs pa 'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag phyir gnol ba'i
236b5(1): ye ges kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa sems can thos cad kyi gtso bo 'das pa dang ma byon pa 'ang da ltar byung ba rnams ke dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i bsam za bzang po rnam
236b6(1): ngag la mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos smrab chen po byed cing / de so'igashegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod kyang rnam pam 'byed do// sa 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam/ 
236b7(1): kyi ye ges kyi byin rlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi smon lam dang / ye shes 'byams klas pas dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzind to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chob kyi blo gros kyis yang / byang chub
236b8(1): sems dpa'i rim gis yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi le'u 'a ste yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsod nams tshogs bsags sebs la
236b9(1): gnas pa'i rnams/ rtag tu bag yod 'ablo brtan mthu' chen bdog pa dag dran dang ldan zhing byang chub sems rab myi gtong bas// phyogs bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed// brtson 'grus partsam/ 
236b10(1): rnam ma ldan mos pa btang pa can/ dag 'jig rten kun la rtag tu myi gnas kyi ldog pa'i chos zhugs mya ngan myed pa'i tshul mkhas rnams// phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed/ 
237a1(1): ga'artson 'grus gnapas kyang gnas nga byab pas / cu gsum g.yong dpas smo ge nga pa rna pa dan byeng bu zung ba byed
237a2(1): ba'i smod lam rdzogs byed bsnyon pa'ang de bzhin byed// ye shes gcig la zhugs pa de dag thob bya ba/ thob nas 'gro ba kun la sbyin pa rab tu gtong // bsam pa dag dang khams dang sbyor ba shes byas nas// dbang tho/ 
237a3(1): ji bzhin mkhas pa de ltar chos kyang bston/ pha rol byinang la 'artsom pa mthu chen ldan pa rnams ka 'gro ba rnams chos brtson de bdag gi don phyi gtang // pha rol phyin rdzogs 'grol ba mthu' chen ldan pa'i rnams
237a4(1): mkhyu mchog mthu 'is 'khod pa'i mtsho las sems can sgros/ dre ltang nyin mtshan skyo ba myed par brtson byed cing // drang srong rgyal ba chos rigs myi chad bzhugs pa 'ayis// dkar po'i spyod pa gang yang / 
237a5(1): rung ste spyad pa'i rnams ka thams cad don yod rgyal ba rnams kyi/ gsar 'gro'o// de dag ci spyod thams cad 'gro ba rnams la yang rnam sbyin don yod nyon mongs dri ma spyod par 'gyur// 'di
237a6(1): 'dra'i chos ldan de dag mud pa lasamyal byas shing // bdud 'khrugs 'khor lo phan byas byang chub thob par byed// de ltar bathon ni yi ges thol ba'i bde gshegs sras bde gshegs rnams kyi chos
237a7(1): rab mdzod kyang rab tu lasnyon da/ de dag smra'i bya ba kun shin tu 'byed// pa dad myi mchog zhim sprin kyi char yang mngon par 'bebs// de dag snying rje byams pas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing // brten pa de rnams 'khor
237a8(1): kyi bas ma pa shes byas nas// gang gi bas ma la zla gros sems rgyud ci 'dra ba// de bzhin rgyal ba 'i chos ni stong phrag ma ston// glang po'i stabs sdug tshul bzang 'gros su 'gro ba'i rnams// seng ge'i brtsas/ 
237a9(1): star rtag tu sus kyang myi thub cing // ye shes rgya mtsho lta bu ring pa bzhin gnas pa// sprin lhan 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis de skad ces smras pa dang / de la
237a10(1): bsnyon pas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo'/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las chos snang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi u gsum pa'o// / de nas sang
237b1(1): rgyas kyi a bus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi bar thams cad na gling bzhi pa 'od las
237b2(1): 'phyogs pa glong bzhi pa re re na de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bzhugs par snang ngo ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
237b3(1): zhabs kyi drung na khod par shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ma bshig ma btang bar byang chub kyi shing drung yang ma spangs khar ri rab kyi rtse mo nas/ mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i bu rab mche
237b4(1): mo'i khang la nor bu sna tshogs gang na der gshegs par snang ngo // ci ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das rab tshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ba bzhin du/ 'jig brten gi khams thams cad na yang
237b5(1): rab tshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ste/ byin kyi rlabs snga ma rnams kyang ma 'khrugs par snang ngo // de nas lha'i rgyal po rab tshemasade bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas khang pa nor bu sna tshogs logs su
237b6(1): mngon par shes pa mthong nas rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs kyi nang du gshegs pa'i gdan rdzu 'phrul gis baspungasapa'i seng ge'i khri pad ma'i snying po can lha rdzas kyi rin po che las byas
237b7(1): bog re brgya stong phrag bcus brgyan pa gser gyi dra ba rgya stong phrag bcos mdor bar bres la kamye tog gi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu khyab par byas pa/ 'phreng ba'i bla re bstor 'phrag bcu kun tu brgyus pa/ spos
237b8(1): kyi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus spos thams cad kun tu 'thul bar bdugs pa/ rin po che'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa/ mye tog gi gdugs brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bzung ba/ 'phreng ba'i gdugs brgya stong phrag brgya
237b9(1): kud nas bzung ba/ rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bzung ba/ 'od gzer brgya stong phrag bcus snang bar byas pa// rab tshe ma'i lha rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu btung ba / tshangs pa brgya stong
237b10(1): phrag bcus mngon par phyag bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong bcus mngon par bstod pa/ rol mo brdud pa brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra 'byung ba/ chos kyi klu'i dbyangs brgya stong phrag bcu'i klu dbyangs dang ldan la/ 
237b11(1): ta ga kyigapa kyi thos snga ye 'du zag da gas 'artsam sa brgya dzin 'phrag rjes phyi ma pa shA rgyas sa ca rta yos rabyaso bya kyis 'damatsho'i brtso cingasaso so byedarab 'phrad mangs byas kyi
238a1(1): phye tog gi sprin kyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'phas / 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag brgya rab tu 'ama' pa/ rgyan kyi sprin gyi chad brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'bad pa/ gos kyi srin gyi
238a2(1): char brgya stong phrag bcu rabatu'abab pas kun nas g.yog pa/ nor bu rin po che'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char rab tu 'phags pas kun tu snang bar byas pa dge' ba'i rtsa ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas byung ba/ 
238a3(1): sangs rgyas rgya stong phrag bcus byin kyis rlabs pa/ bsod nams brgya stong phrag bcus bsngags shing bsgrubs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu dbyangs pa/ smon lam brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par
238a4(1): dag par byas paspyod pa brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas blang ba/ chos brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu brtan pa/ rnam par 'phyas pa brgya stong phrag bcu drang ldan pa son tan brgya stong pag bcus shin tu 'phags pa/ brjod pa
238a5(1): brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brjod pa bshams so// ji ltar gling bzhi ke ba 'dir rab mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab mche ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdang bting ba de bzhin
238a6(1): bya 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi rab che ba'i gnas su yang khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su lhas rgyal po dpa 'tshe ma rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdang brgyad 'di 'drab dang / bgam
238a7(1): ba'i tshul 'di 'dra dag kyang bting bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bting nas zhe sa dang rim gror bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ 
238a8(1): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso lang do// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par ro rdzogs pa'i sangs
238a9(1): rgyas bde bar gshegs bsam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems pyad drangs pa bzhin du khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs so// ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i ri rab mche ma'i gnas su
238a10(1): lha'i rgyal po rab mche ba'i khyang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs pa de bzhin tu 'jig brten gyi kha nas thams cad du yang sarnapa 'che ma'i gnas kyi 'angs nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs par hA 'o// 
238b1(1): de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ras lha'i dbang po'i gnas thams cad tu wA spags te/ lha'i dbang po rab mtshams bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa btab to// de ra lha'i 'argyal po ra byed pa
238b2(1): sngon gyi de bzhir gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang des bum rdzonas pa'i sangs rgya rnams sa dge ba'i ma badzi skar bskyed pa de rjes su drang das/ sangs rgya kyi byed kyi rlabs kyis de'i tshigs yu bcad ba 'di dan
238b3(1): mo bkra shis rab pa gang zhig gis / mings rgyab grags pa'i nges par mtshar mirtags ga so du da mi ga no bu'i gcag du gshegs pa sto// des ni 'di kha m+bu shes ma na ni
238b4(1): rdo cig bkra shis dam pa gang shig gis// 'jig rten smon ma blo zhes mtshan brtags pa// sbyangs pa'i lam du gshegs pa sbyar/ des ni 'di ltar yang bkra shis mchog gyur gcig/ kra shis dam
238b5(1): gang zhigs pa sgribs byed gzigs pa 'dzum pa'i byar du mtshan btags pa/ brgyan gcig dang ldan par gshegs pa lta // des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur gcig/ bkra shis dam gang zhig gis// 6
238b6(1): 'jog rten sgron mar mye mdzad ces mtshan btags pa// rnam par rgyas pa gshegs pa ltar// des ni 'dir yang bkra' shis mchog gyur gcig/ kA shis dam gang zhig gis// bder gshegs yang ngas
238b7(1): don gzigs pa zhes mtshan btags pa// dri myed rtse mor gshegs pa ltar des ni 'dir yang bkra gis mchog 'gyur gcig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// de bzhin gshegs pa rang 'byung mchog
238b8(1): ces mtshan btags pa// rin cen sbubs su gshegs pa ltar des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur gcig bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten sgron ma dbyig gi lha zhes mtshan btags pa/

238b10(1): tshul du gshegs pa wAr ka des ni 'dir yang bkra gis mchog 'gyur gcig/ bkra shis ngam lag pazhig gis// yon tan kun mnga' dpal gyis rgyal bar mtshan btanas pa// dgal 'i rgyas
238b11(1): da rnam sa ban sa babya gos na sashi gsas pa shes pas sos tuyin sa sa rdzogs rnam na me dan bas dam brtsa 'dzim mi 'gyi/ 
239a1(1): tu gshegs pa wArA/ des ni 'dir 'a bkla gis rgyur gcig// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten phan bsod dka' thul drag por mtshan na dgas pa// kun nas mdog tu gzhon
239a2(1): ba zhar/ des ni 'dipa la de bkra gis mchog gyur gcig/ ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab mtshams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sngon gyi rgyal ba gshegs brjod de// mdzod par 'god pa de bzhin du 'jig
239a3(1): rten gi khams thams cad kyi rgyal po rab mtshe sa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sngon gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs pa brjod cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de mngon pa
239a4(1): bstod ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gra shegs nas/ bdan pa ting ba la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhug so// / dzI ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten
239a5(1): gi khams thams cad tu 'ang ga dang pa ting ba de dag la bzhugs/  par snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thagatu khang pa nor bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste dper na rab tshe ma'i lha'i
239a6(1): ris lams cad bcal rgya che bar gyur par sdang ste/ 'di ni rdza lta ba bzhin du jig parten gi khams thams cad na 'ang de bzhin no// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i 'dol
239a7(1): sangs rgyas/ pal po che zhes bya ba las/ rab pa che sa 'i lha'i gnas na rnam par 'phyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mabus phyogs bcu nas
239a8(1): chu ba sems dpa' mar po lhags par gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang 'khor sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu 'phra ba bsnyed dang lhan gcig tu 'ong ste/ byang chub
239a9(1): sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan gcig tu phyin to// byang chub sems dpa' de dge thams cad kyang myi ba'i zhes bya ba dag ste
239a10(1): 'di lhar yon tan dang ldan pa dang / blo gros dang ldan pa dang dpal dang ldan pa dang dga' ba dang ldan pa khrel dang ldan pa dang ga brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan ba dang / rig pa dang

239b2(1): pa dang mye tog dang ldan pa dang / nor dang ldan pa dang dpal dang / sgron ma dang ldan pa dang rdo rje dang ldan pa dang / bdel ba dang ldan pa dang / nyi ma dang ldan pa dang / dge ba dang ldan pa dang tshangs pa dang ldan pa/

239b4(1): ga zhan ma yin pa'i spyan dang / myi g.yo ba'i s+yan dang / myi skyod pa'i spyan dang chu'i spyan dang bcings pa myed pa'i s+yan dang / kun tu spyod pa'i spyan dang / 'od kyi s+yan dang dam pa'i spyam

239b10(1): 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi bar mtshe ma'i gnas thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba yod pa mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems

241a1(1): phyogs bcu dag tu rab tu snang // de'i tshe smyig rgyu ci 'dra ba de dag bgrang 'ang myi nus te// myig can rnams kyang de la rmongs// song ba rnams kyi spyod yul myin// de bzhin sems can gtso ba

241a3(1): rnam pan sgoms ma yod pa myin// 'ongs pa myed pa'i chos rnams la// 'gro ba de bzhin myi dmyigs te// de phyir de dag rgyu yang myed// de bzhin 'jigs pa 'ang yod pa myin// 'jig pa myed pami

241b9(1): dang mtha mra'i sems// ldan cig myi gnas 'byung par ltar// shes dang myi shwe sa de bzhin no// ji ltar lus dang rnami shes pa// gzhan dang gzhan las 'byung gyur da pa// de bzhin shes dang myi shes gnyis// 'grogs
242a1(1): khar gyur da ba zhas yar byed/ ji skar m+b+ha lan pa'i rtse/ 'a bral tu dug dug ni dug sbyin byed/ de ltar shes pa myi shes pa// shi nad tu sel pa byed par 'arjod/ sangs rgyas blas gang yang myed/ 
242a2(1): de dang 'dra la'ang byed pa myin// de las gzhag du 'gyur pa myed// de las rgyal bshinan tu dkon// de nas byang chub sems dpal brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnas par ltas te/ 
242a3(1): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa// chos rnams 'di dag bsal byed khar// mkhyen nas/ sangs rgyas thugs su chud// des ni myi mkhyen kang yang myed// ye shes kyi 'ang pha ro ya phyin// ji ltar ser dpabs me
242a4(1): ngo bo nyid kyis 'gal ba myed// de sar chos byin de bzhin chos// de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig/ sems can sems can ma yin pa// ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin skyed// gdags su myed las 'gyur sa
242a5(1): nyar chos rnams rang bzhin de bzhin no// sasongasanam ni ngesatha/ 'das pas brjod par byab ste// denyi da pa kyig de bzhin chom nyi / zhe
242a6(1): par byed pa bgon pa dang / nang bzhin byed dang rang bzhin dgacanas gas pa 'a dang byard pa kang / sangs rgyas dang bzhin decan no// kyang sa 'das pa gathub byed la gnyis kyi nas cam

246b4(1): ci log ma yin no/ byin ci log rnams ni na na ar byed/ byin ci log rnams ni phyi rol na'ang myed do// sems can rnams kyang na pa na'ang myed sems can nas sa ni phyi ro lad na 'ang myed de chos de dag thams cad ni gso ba brdzun pa sgrub
246b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi byang chu gtunam par 'tshang rgya bar byed de bzhal pas ni rgol bar byed krol khas ni 'grel bar byed/ zhi bas ni zhi bar byed pad rje dbugs byin pas ni dbugs 'byin par byed/ bkrugs pas gi byang par
246b6(1): byed dag pa sa ni sang bar byedapa mya ngan las 'das pas ni mya ngan las 'da' bar byed / bdes par gyur pas ni gde' bar byed pa se khang ma ga gcag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sas pa myi 'dug par gyi bya ba/ 
246b7(1): bdag gcag gis ni 'jig rten gyi gyod pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ldan par bya'o// bdag lag gis ni bla na myed pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la gnas par bya'o/ 
246b8(1): zar gcag gis ni sems can thams can la sems mnyam pas yang dag par 'jug par bya'o// bdag cag gis ni yul thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan par bya'o/  bdag cag gis ni yongs su spyos pa kha na ma tho ba myed
246b9(1): pa'i bag chags dang ldan par bya'o// bdag cag gis ni rtogs pa thams cad dang ldan par bya'o// bdag cag gis ni 'byung ba thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan par bya'o// bdag cag gis ni bla ga myed pa'i leshes ca
247a1(1): brtsam pazhems pa gdas myed pacwo mas babyed pa ma 'dang sngagasas pa da pa bya pa shA med pa sa sa par bya gas / 
247a2(1): sems dpa'i khyod pa gnyis pa zhe/ bde' bskyed pa zhes bya'o / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i gyod pa gsum pa gyi 'thun pa byed pa zhes bya ba gang zhen phye
247a3(1): rgyal pa'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid la brtson te/ bzod pa dang ldan zhing mngon par smra ba'i dang tshul can yin te/ de yang dag sa gnod pa ma yin pa rol la gnod par ma yin gnyis ka la gnod par
247a4(1): yin mdag la su bar 'am yin/ grazhan bsu par ma yin / gnyis ka bsdu par ma yin/ bdag yongs su gzung bar ma yin/ bdag yongs su gzung bar ma yan/ gzhan yongs su bzung bar ma yin gnyis ka
247a5(1): yongs su gzung bar ma yinayang dag khar blangs pa grags pa'i byed ma yin gyi na byang chub sems dpa' ni sems 'di lam skye sed bdag cag gis sems can thams cad la myi dge' ba thams cad spong/ 
247a6(1): bzod pa dang nges pa la bzhag pa'i phyir bdag gcag gis sems can thams cad la chos bstand par bya'o zhes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta khur bzod cing nges pa dang ldan pa yin las
247a7(1): de ga gal te srog chags brgya tong bye ba grangs myed la zhig 'ongs la/ srog cha kas de dag re re zhing yang kha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stod grangs myed par sprul te/ drung du phyin ya kha re re nas kyang myi snyan par brjod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya song
247a8(1): grangs myed pas kyi snyan cing yid du myi 'ong ba dang / myi 'dod pa dang myi sdug pa dang / myi dga' ba dang myi tshus pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pas brjod pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pas bsnyen pa dang
247a9(1): yongs su spang bar bya ba shas ga tu brjod de/ lag pa re re zhing yang 'thab cha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus la gnod par byas la/ nyis gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin tu pa skal da la was
247a10(1): myed par yang mtshams myed pa la myi shes skyo myi shes/ rgyun myi chad gtong ba myed/ sdod pa myed gcugs su myed dbugs 'byind pa myed/ phyir sri la myed par brtags kyang / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de lta bu'i 'jigs pa chen po
247b1(1): gyi cad pa / ma rungs ba skyes nga/ sum bsngal pa nyams su 'bas pa/ la grub pas ral te/ srog la mas par 'dis cad kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam pa sems te/ zug pa sas rnam zhi na/ 
247b2(1): gis log pa la gal te bdag gis sems 'khrugs pa shis byas su zin na de ni ma dul ba dang myi bden pa dang / myi khas pa dang ma zhi ba dang ma bsgoms pa dang / ma sdams pa dang ga sa 'khrugs pa dang / byas pa myed pa dang / mnyam par
247b3(1): ma bzhag pa dang /  bdag gi lus la rten pas gzhan gyi sems mgul bar bya bar myi nus kyis zhes te/ de lus dang sems kyi rang bzhing shes nas thog ma dang tha ma myed par skye ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran nas
247b4(1): chos 'di dag ni tshul gyis de bzhin no zhes nas/ phyir zhing sems dang bar byed pa dga' bar byed rab tu dga' bar byed/ tshim par byed gzeng mtho bar byed/ spro bar byed rab tu spro bar byed/ 'dul bar byed yongs su 'dems
247b5(1): par byed de/ de ltar bdag gis bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bzhag ste sems can thams cad yang don 'di nyid pastand par bya'o snyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar lus 'di ni bdag dang bdag gis song bse/ rang
247b6(1): bzhin gis stong ba'o// gong banyin pa ni bdes pa'am sdug bsngal pa na 'am gnyis su brjod pa gang yang myed do// gang song ba de la ci'ang byed de/ chos thams canan ci 'ang ma yin gis de bdag mtham
247b7(1): gis kyang yangabadag par shes par byas le/ sems can thams ca la dngos por 'dzind pa spang ba'i phyir chos brtand par byagos kyis ga de lta bdag gis 'di dag gis byams pa'i sems
247b8(1): dpa phan pa'i sems dang bdel ba'i sems dang/ snying rje'i sems dang / snying che ba'i sems dang / phan par dga' ba'i sems dpa yongs su kyi gtab pa'i sems dpa/ sangs rgyal ba'i sems dpa/ byang chub pa'i
247b9(1): sems dpa/ myi 'grogs pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi rjes su snyegs pa'i sems kyis bzod par bya'o snyam mo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang / 
247b10(1): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsum la ye/ kyi thun pa byed pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod bzhi pa gyi zad pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems

248a7(1): can thams cad kyi dbang po dpa brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa mchog dang nya ma'i rgyus yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir partson 'grus bcom mo// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus com

248b1(1): ngas rgyas byams sams na tshul ga cis sums par 'tshang rgyab yongs sushes par bya ba'i byen mi can 'grus byam/ ngasargyas thamasasal dang dbyung byed pa lams na na cab bas pan
248b2(1): bya ba'i phyir pa chog 'grus la col mo// sangs rgyas kyi mosathams cad rtogs pa'i ye shes chen po la mkhas pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus pa chos mo// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu 'brel ba bstan

248b4(1): te 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu sems can re re 'i phyir yang bskalang kha grangs myed par man myed pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal tu btug pas yang spo zhing mos te/  sems
248b5(1): can de dag kyang de tsam gyi bar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la de'i dus su sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das grangs myed pa zhig gyur he sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sus la bong ba de dag thams
248b6(1): cad kyang bdel ba'i yo byad kun dang ldan par gyur kyang byang chub / sems dpa' de ltan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub da tu mngos papa 'tshar gyi rgya zhing byang chub sems dpal de i 'jig
248b7(1): rten gyi khams grangs byed par rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir sems can re re'i don tu yang kha skal da pa grangs myed par sems can dmyal ba chen po na de snyed kyi sems can yongs su mya ngan las

248b9(1): sems skad cig tu myi bral ba'i sdug bsngal gi rnam pa de lta bu dngab kyi bral bar 'gyur ro zhes zer yang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' ni de la de'i phyir sems bskyed pa 'ga' btsam yang 'gyod pa dang ldan
248b10(1): ba myi 'byung gi de ni 'di snyam du / de ltar bdag gis mthus sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal gi rnam pa de lta bu las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ba ni/ bdag gis 'phob pa legs par 'thob bo// gal te thabs 'di 'dra las

249a3(1): par la jug pa myed pa btag pa bral gyi shegs pa'i sa kyis kyi mnan pa/ yongs su dag pa chen po can byed pa mongs pa byed pa dang ldan pa yin / dra pa de ga rjeg rten pa'i spyod pa rnams kyang yongs su

249a5(1): de 'jig rten 'di nas kyang rmongs pa myed par mchi 'pho'o// 'jig pa rten pha rold du yang rmongs pa myed par skye ste/ ma'i mngal duyang rmongs pa myed par 'gro'o/ ma'i sadal nas kyang mongs

249a8(1): de dran pa yongs su dag pa'i yan lag tshad myed pa dang ldan pa yin te/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpal da pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las kha skal da pa grangs myed pa na
249a9(1): chos thos par gyur da pa zab mo zab mor snang ba'am/ yangs pa'i chos rgyas rnam par 'phel ba 'am/ chos sna tshogs tshig dpa yi ge sra tshogs kyis bas nad pa 'am byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan kyi chos
249a10(1): sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs spang ba can nas/ bla na myed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba dang mos pas rnam par dag pa 'am/ 'jig rten thams cad la myi gnas pa'i os 'jig brten gyis khong du
