249b7(1): dpa'i sems skad cig kyang sems rnas khar 'khrus par myi 'gyur te/ dran pa rnas par 'khrug par myi 'gyur ro// spyod yul rnam para'akhrug par myi 'gyur ro// mgo rmongs par myi 'gyur ro// 'khor bar
249b8(1): myi 'gyur ro// bslad par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'di ltar smra de lta bu dag yid du 'ong zhing 'thug par byed pa dang / yid du myi 'ong zhing khong khro bar byed pa dpa 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed par grags
249b9(1): bar byed pa dag gis/ se go la rtogs pa tsam du yang ting ngo 'dini de las ldang bar byed par myi 'gyur ro// pyod yul las ldang bar myi 'gyur ro// chos la 'jug pa las ldang khar gyi 'gyu ro/ byang chub kyi dpyod pa la ma/ 
249b10(1): tu 'dus pa las ldang bar myi 'gyur ro/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsgom pa las ldang bar myi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa las ldang bar myi 'gyur ro// chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par
250a1(1): nas mas ldang bar gyi 'gyur ro//  sems pan yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i ye ges rgyun man par kyi 'gyur ro/  sems can yongs su dag par bya ba'i gnas shes btsun rnan pa bya
250a2(1): chob nges par shes brgyan 'ams par gyi sargyar chagang gis las kyi bsgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdig tso'i las sogs pa kyi rgyad do// gang gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib par 'gyur bas nyan mongs pa sun pa / 
250a3(1): gang gis chos kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos la rim gro byed par myi byed do/ gang gis chos 'jig par 'ong ba'i sgrib par 'gyur ba dam pa'i chos yongs su spyod par myi byed do// de la delta bu'i sgra 'jig rten gyi khams
250a4(1): grangs byed par grag pa myi snyan pa dang bstan pa bskal la grangs myed par gyi sdod pa 'khrug par byed pa/ sems 'khrug pa lus 'khrug pa// dbang po 'khrug pa myos par byed pa'akhor khar byed pa rnyog par byed pa/ 
250a5(1): rnam par rnyog par byed pa/ kun tu rnyogs par byed pas dkrug par sbyi byas kyang / de la byang chug sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skye ste bdag gis ni 'phags pa'i chos yongs su khasgoms las
250a6(1): nang tu mnyal par gzhag par bya'o snyam nas de snga thams cad kyi skye pa sa rab tu rtan ga gnas pa la rab tu na so sa la tog skye ba'i rang layis la 'acug go 'acos
250a7(1): ba'i rang bzhin la 'jug go/ gang gis sma de dag larjod pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid du shes te smras chags par myi 'gyur Da spras khong khro bar myi 'gyur/ zhing de'i dran pa nyams khar khyi 'gyur ro
250a8(1): de spa de dgra phams cad kyi mtshan ma 'dzind cing mtshas ma skyed de/ s+thA sa sgo la la mngon par chags par myi 'gyur ro// sA la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ sA la mngon par chags pa gyi skyed do// des sA de dag rtags
250a9(1): na gyi dbyigs te/ sA de dag tham so cad kyi rab bzhis rab tu shes so// rang bzhin de yang byang chub sems dpa' sa rab tu khong du chud do// mngon papa' bu byed pa byed pa'i rgyas 'debs shing chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul tu
250a10(1): chags pa myed par ya pa rab tu shes so// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i zhar da zhug pa phyir myi ldog pa'i ba'i mtha' yas pa bsam gtam gi tshul tha dad pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa ting nge 'dzin
250b1(1): shing ngas song zas zangs byed pa'i ba kyi ga dkyis sa mi demi zab pa da pang ba shesas dang sems nyid du sbed dpa den pa 'das pa na khasas
250b2(1): byed zhipa ni nyas tu shes pa / ga pas gis sems ca dedag 'ams mas med pa nus pa da pasaras tu kau de/ mas drug byed pa nyid pas kyi gyi /  bya
250b3(1): las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngag las brgya byam so// kye rgyal pa'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas chen ni rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rdzob kyi mongs brgya
250b4(1): dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmyigs su myed cing bstas pa myi dmyigs pa'i lus kyi las druben pa dang / dge gi las dben pa dang yid kyi las dben pa thob pa yin/ sa 'phags
250b5(1): babacings pa'i lus kyi las dang / sa chags ma macings pa'i ngag gi las dang ma chags ma bcings pa'i yid kyi las mi chags ma bcings par ba btashad pa gnas pa myed pa / myi gnas pa sems ji lta ba bzhin
250b6(1): du gnas pa sems kyi rang bzhin tshad myed pa'i rjes su song ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'byam sa klas pa'i rjes su song ba mtshan nyid kyi dmyigs shing mtshan nyid bstan tu myed pa zab pa gting dpag dka' ba
250b7(1): de bzhin nyid kyi rab bzhin gi rjes su song ba rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i skyon myed pa mngos bye la sbub pa la/ mkhas pa 'gog pa dang 'thun par gnas la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi spyod gus can zhi ba'i rgyud rab tu
251a1(1): kye rgya la ba'i bus sems can 'di nas thams can ni rang bzhin 'di lta bu se/ 'di gas sems pan byed pa'i rang bzhin nas kyi chos 'di dag 'ams cad gi rang bzhin 'di sa ste/ 'dis su rgyas pa byed pa'i
251a2(1): bgyin no// kye zhing 'did ka khams cad ni di lta bu'i mtshan nyidade 'di lams tshag nyid byen pa'o// kye rgyas 'di dag thams cad ni 'dig kyar 'byung te/ 'dis gas pa la gnas ning chos kun gyi nas
251a3(1): tshig gi sa ma la gnas kyang / chos thams cad ni tshig gi lam/  nye la myi gnas pa'o zhes te/ de ni lung chos thams cad 'ag pa yang rab tu shes so// 'jig rten thams cad dben pasang
251a4(1): rab tu 'jug go de de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma bskyed pa yapa rab tu 'jug go// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang 'jig rte/ kyi chos su rab tu 'jug go// 'jig nyes gi chos srengs sa rgyad byar tha
251a5(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / 'jig rten gyi chos 'dres par myi byed do// 'jig rten gi chos dang sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dang par yang kyi byed do// 'di ltar dus gsum la gnas pa 'i chos kyi dbyings tha dpa pa myed
251a6(1): ga la 'ang rab tu 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i sems chen po las kyang nyams par myi byed/ sems cad thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba las kyang myi ldog so// sems can thams cad
251a7(1): bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po yang phyir yang rab tu 'dzind par byed do// sems can gyi khams bdag gis sbyin par ma byas pa ni su zhig sbyin par byed/ sems can gyi khams bdag gis dul bar ma byas kha zhi su
251a8(1): zhig dul bar byed/ sems can gi khams bdag gis zhi bar ma byas pa ni su zhig zhi bar byed do/ sems can gi khams bdag gis shes par ma byas pa ni su zhig shes par byed semangs can gi khams
251b1(1): bdag gis dag par ma byas pa'i su zhig dag par byed de/ de ltar bdag gis de lta bu zab pa'i chos yang dag par mthong lacig pu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par glos par bya ba 'di
251b2(1): ni bdag tshul dang myi 'dra ba ste/ sems can gyi khams 'di yang mya ngan chen po'i lam du zhugs pa nyon mongs pas kun nas khazung bas mdongs par gyur da la/ tshor ba nyams su bab pa kyi zad pas nad par
251b3(1): rgya rang pa/ sred pas zhon pa'i btson rang zhugs pa'i sems can dmyal ba dang / byol long gi skye gnas dpag shin rje'i 'jig rten nas la g.yos pa/ sdug bsngal gi phung po sa spyob/ sdom pa gsum gis
251b4(1): gcugs su ma rung la/ mun nag gi nang du rab tu zhugs pa/ ma rig pa'i mngal tu skye ba/ mchi pas gan dang pa 'byung ba ma mthong ba/ myi khom par gyur da pa myi khos pa brgyan thob pa sems can gyi rab rib
251b5(1): kyis dri a can du gyur pa pa/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyi yan lag gis btab pa/ mya ngan chen por mkhyams pa/ lta ba'i mya ngan gis la sord pa'o// zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpas
251b6(1): sems can gyi khams la rtogs pa'i tshe/ sems 'di lta ba skyes te// de lam padag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu pa/ tu zhugs te/ ye shes kyi snang ba bA na myed pa la zhugs nas
251b7(1): sems can 'di dag yongs su la sbyin cing rnam par ma rul par bod te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshar ba rgya ba ni dus ma yin gyis// bdag gis ni bas lan
251b8(1): pa 'arjod tu myed pa'i yarang brjon tu byed pas sems can nams byang chub sems dpas gyon pa sa yongs su skye par bya ga cub de sa bus sems cas kyang rgyab tu 'ongs sus skye ba rnams 'ongs su phyin par bya'o// zu 'i
251b9(1): maman las gdus par bya'o snyam mo/  kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byams pa sems dpas sems dpa' chen yo rnams kyi byab chus sems dpa'i spyod pa drug pa lta ba mazang po zhes nye/ byang chub sems dpa' nams
251b10(1): gyod pa saganas sa lha dang bdud dang/ tshangs par zabs pa'i dig rten dang dges sbyong dang bres ge'i skye dbu bangs pa dang skad pa dri ma dang gyi pa rnam yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis snyan mdzes shi
252a1(1): nga rgyam tsham na song bas byam sems na pa sa rnas
252a2(1): ba'i khyeng chub tu dan yod par 'gyur ro// myigs pa sa bkris kya bachub te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dang 'ardzogs pa thams pad thag byed pa yang pa dzinas pa'i rgyang chub tun da pa rdzun / 
252a3(1): bas mo nyi shu bdun pa'o// / kye stsal ba'i sras dag 'phel byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheg po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa btum pa gnas
252a4(1): byed pa zhes bya ba la bzhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chus sems dpal gnas byed pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed pa la 'jug pa yin/ sems bskyed pa re nges zhing grangs byed pas yongs
252a5(1): su spyong ste zhing la gnas kyi skyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom/ ldan 'das grangs myed pa blta ba'i phyir 'gro zhing me tog grangs khyedapa spos grangs byed pa dang / 'greng ba grangs byed pa/ byug pa
252a6(1): grangs byed pa dang / bye ma grangs myed pa dang /  bzhas grangs rkyen pa dang / rim po ma grangs myed pa dang / rgyal mtshag grangs byed pad ba dan grangs byed pa dang/ rgyan grangs skyed pa dang / mngon par rba
252a7(1): bya ba grangs myed pas mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i mthar da phyin pa dang / grangs myed pa'i bsam khas bsam du myed pa'i chos la gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed pa la lta ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang / 
252a8(1): 'chod pa dang bsnyen bsgrur pa'i don tu 'gro zhing / sems bskyed pa re re la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed pa mthong yang/ sangs rgyas de dag la gnas myi skyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams la gnas kyi skyed
252a9(1): bsim pa mtshan rnams la gnas kyi skyed pa yin/ dpel byed bzang po rnams la gnas kyi skyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od la gnas kyi skye pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa la gnas kyi skyed pa yin// phyogs
252a10(1): la gnas kyi skyed la yin te/ phyogs mtshams la gnas myi skyed pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas myi skyed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i dgel bdun 'dus pa la gnas kyi skyed pa yis// 
252b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan cing dga' ba skyed do// bsam pa yangs par byed la byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'dzin cing byang chub sems 'dapa'i spyod bya la shin tu gnas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas kyi skyed pa
252b2(1): pa yin de bzhin gshegs pa re re bsnyen bkur ba la yang bskal pa brjod du myed par zad par byed cing sangs rgyas brjod du myed pa mthong bas pa skal ba grangs par gnas kyang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / de bzhin
252b3(1): gshegs pa mngon tu bya ba dang / chos mnyan pas ngoms myi shes te/ sangs rgyas blta ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyan pa la gnas myi skyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang / 'khor kyi dkyil 'byor dang
252b4(1): de bzhin gshegs la khong du chur bar byed kyang gnas kyi skyed de/ chags pa'i sems myi skyed do// 'jig rten gi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa la zhugs kyang khong khro ba myi skyed/ mos pa myed pa'i sems kyi skyed do// 
252b5(1): de sa'i khyim zhe na ga 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu khong du chud de/ de la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'du myed rnam par byang ba 'ang myed/ mun pa'ang myed snang ba 'du byed
252b6(1): de byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi dbyings la zhugs ba ni sems can gyi khams la'ang 'jug ste/ de dag kyang yongs su skyeskye par byed ci rnam par 'dul la sems can la
252b7(1): gnas skyed pa 'ang myed do// chos rnams kun nas thob par byed par kyang chos la gnas myi skyed do// / byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa'i yid kyis 'tshang rgya ba la'ang rnam par spyod de 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de la gnas
252b8(1): kyi skyed de tshig gi lam la gnas khar yang myi byed do/ sems can gi rgyud la'ang 'jug ste/ sems can gyi rgyud la gnas par yang myi byed do ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu shes shing de dag pa yang ma
252b9(1): nyams par gshog te ga ting nge 'jigad de la gnas kyi sems kyang kyi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed par 'gro zhing 'jug la de dag tu phyin te/ mthong zhing gnas kyang gnas kyi sems kyi skyed do// de dag nas 'gro la
253a1(1): klu sa gasri pa'i sems kyi skye de/ deg la sems 'dig bskyed / kyi sangs rgyas bya'os de sam bgrangs byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byed thal de snyas pa skyems pabyed cam dang dus ba'i
253a2(1): legs par bstan/ sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa de ltar legs par gnas/ byang chupa sems dpa'i dpyod pa de ltar legs par 'jug/ byang chub kyi sems de ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
253a3(1): par thar pa pa de ltar shi nad tu rtogs byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin de ltar chags pa khyed ka byang chub sems/ dpa'i tshul de ltar gnas myed/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam de ltar shin sbyangs byang chub sems dpa
253a4(1): yung lasan la de lta ba byin kyis rlabs kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag ni shes pa myed/ mthor ba myed pa tha dad pa myed pa/ mos pa myed pa myi mkhas pa gnas la pyod pa rmugs kha 'khor pa'i rgyud shin tu 'byung ba
253a5(1): sa gzhol pa sangs rgyas lta ga la log par zhugs pa 'dren pa'is las nyams pa sam shes pa'i drung nas kar la kha lo spyar/ de pa kyi tshol ba stobs bcu la rim 'gro myed pa/ byang chub sems
253a6(1): bsam pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ba sa ma kha las ring du gyu rad la/ srid pa la mngos par chags pag gas go zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams la 'jug cing snyi rje chen po de las
253a7(1): kyang cher bskyed nas snying rje chen po rgya cher byas te gnas myed pa'i dge ba'i mapas dge ba'i rnam pa yang dag par labacags nas pa 'di snyam tu sems skyed do// gal te sems can re re'i phyir yul re re dang
253a8(1): phyogs ni ni ma lanas brjod cu spyon lam sems can rom// rgyal ba'i kyi 'dugs/ sems can gA sa 'i pa de bzhin du sems can gyi khams khams cad kyi don tu 'jus kyang/ dag gis la phyir
253a9(1): gyi spyod de/ sul de napa phyogs de nas kha dag gung tu ka sol ba myi bya'o// gud tu 'gro khar gyi bya'o// sgra'i rtse mo thams chos kyi dbyings khams gad 'dus par byas te/ rtswa'i rtse po'i tshul de lta bus lnga'i
253b1(1): 'gyur ba re re ba yang sems can gyi yongs su skyes par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i phyir bskal ba brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed par gnas par bya'o// sgra'i rtse mo gcig la jig pa de bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dab
253b2(1): dpung byed pa thams cad la yang de yar de se gol gtogs pa tsam tu yang gnas kyi 'du shes myi skyed do// gnas par gyi bya'o// gnas kyi sems kyi skyed do// spa'i rtse mo ches re le la yang sus gnas byed pa dang / 
253b3(1): gnas byed pa dang / drag lam gnas myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gnas byed pa dang / rtog pa gnas myed pa dang / dpyod yul gnas skyed pa dang / sems can gi khams 'dul ba gnas myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyis
253b4(1): la 'jug pa gnas byed pas phyir phyi ma'i bskal da pa'i mur zug pa'i skald par byang chub sems dpa'i pyod par pyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag gis chos kyi
253b5(1): zung shes par byas/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos ba stan 'a khrag sa gsu shes par bya'o// bdag gis pas kyi na la bar shes pa'i 'bul las byam pas 'das rte
253b6(1): mas pas smras pa sa bu gas par bya'o// bdag gi spod tha' las byung bas sus ni nyid kyi rgyalas byur ba shes bya'o//  mchogs das zhes pa'i kyis cho ba
253b7(1): ni nga shes kyang bya'o// rnam pa gyur pa skyed pas bdams tsam mams cad kyi yang dag pa'i ma 'dud sanas tham pasan par bya'o// 'das gos phyogs pa rgya sems thas ma
253b8(1): ci gis thos garnams pa'i sems bcugs bya rgya ga sam sagags pa sa bya'o// dag gis ma zhum pa stsam sa byed pas thas sa
253b9(1): chu ridas khas bla ga nga sems kyi gan cig gcis gis thob par bya'o zhes de sa ni byang srab sems dpa' de dag dbu sangs rgyas pa bdag byed pa'i tshul gyis yang dag las sa zhing sems
254a1(1): mal sa 'dus so na byed da sa nga ga sa spyo dag du ga ga
254a2(1): thams cad yongs su la skyab pa'i don du kha dag gis skyo ba'i sems myi bskyed do// sems can gyi khams yongs su a smin cing ma 'dul gi khar du skyo ba'i smon lam myi skyed do/ bdag gis 'jig
254a3(1): gyi khams sems can las rnam par 'das par/ 'jig rten gyi kham sa sa cad du rgya bar byas te/ smon lam gang la sems tsan gyi sgra/ yod pa dang sems lag kyi las dang nga / sems can nye bar lend pa
254a4(1): dang sems can rnam par gzhag pa dang / sems can kyi 'du shes dang ldan pa dpa/ sems can gri glong dang / sems cag kyi 'du byed dang / sems can gyi yul rang/ sems lan gyi 'jug pa / 
254a5(1): sems can gyi ldog pa yod pa de la bdag gis gnas par bya'o// sems can/ thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang du smon lam/ de las g.yol bar swa khyi bya ste/ sems la skyed pa gcig gis kyang
254a6(1): gnas kyi 'du shes bskyed par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na bdag/ gis gnas myed pa dang / myi gnas par bya ste/ bdagagi don yongs su sbyang par bya'o// yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 
254a7(1): zhes bya ba'i don ni kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bdun pa ste gnas skyed pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
254a8(1): dag bya ba ru ga sems dpa la semasadapa' chen po rnams kyi byang chus sems dpa'i spyod pa zhub par dkal ba zhes bya brgyad pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal b.li sra sa dag 'di la byang chub sem sa dpal sems
254a9(1): dpa' chen po dge ba'i ma ba thug par dka' ba/ 'dul bar dkal pa rab tu 'dul bar dka' ba// byed par dkal ba zi la da kyis ma non+da pA/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa kun tu mtha' la yas pa kyi 'phrogs
254a10(1): bdag nyid chem pa/ rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu rgyur las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zham ring na/ byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la shin tu dad pa yin
254a11(1): yangs par dad pa yin de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba chu ba la shin tu mos pa yin/ byad chu ba sem sa dpa'i smon lam gyis rgyun myi 'cha pa yin/ bskal da pa thams cad du myi skoba'i sems dpa
254b1(1): ldan pa yinasdu pa bsngal thams cad kyis sgyid lug par gyur pa myed pa yin/ bdud thams cad kyis shin tu byin kyis brlabs pa yin / byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub thams cad kyis rnam par
254b2(1): spang ba pa yin byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs kyis char myi shes pa yin/ theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir myi ldog pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la bsgrub par dka' la la
254b3(1): gnas te sems kha skyed pa gcig gis kha skal pa grangs myed par 'khor phyir myi ldog pa yin te/ byang rta ba sems dpa'i smonakhom chen po yang rgyan myi gcod do// de bzor ba tsam gyis kyang
254b4(1): sems can rnams bla na myed ya yang dag par rdzogs kha'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par byed do// zos pa dang bsnyen bkur bas kyang sem smra rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
254b5(1): phyir gyi ldog par byed do// sems can thams cad sems can byed par yang shes te/ sems can gyi khams yongs su gtong ba ma yin no/ 'di lta sa dper na mnyan pa ni pha rol tu 'gro ba 'ang ma yin/ 
254b6(1): rnams cu 'angs yin/ rba klung gi gzung sa gnas 'a dzin/ rlos dang shing btsun ma dang rna bapa na tu mas rnanas kyang rnas/ #
254b7(1): lo/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor bar 'gro g.yang ma yin/ mya ngam las 'dal bar 'gro ba yin/ 'khor ba'i rgyud la gnas pa yang ma yin te/ tshu rolan gyi mu nas
254b8(1): sems can rnams paspyod de/ pha rol gi ngogs bdel pa 'jigs pa myed pa/ 'tshe ba myed pa 'khrug pa myed par rab tu bzhag kyang / sems can gi khams pagrang ba'i tshul gis mngon par chags pa
254b9(1): myed do// sems can gcig la sa la spyod nas mang po la mngon par chags par yang myi byed/ mang lo las spyod nas sems can gcig gi khams 'phel bar yang myi byed 'bri khar yang myi byed/ semasna
254b10(1): gyi khams skye bar yang myi byed/ 'gog par yang myi khyed zad par yang myi byed sosogs par yang kyi byed// nas par rtog par yang myi byed/ rnam panyis su yang gyi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhes/ 'di
255a1(1): ltar byang chub semasad pal ni sems can ki kha ma sa la zhugs shing khong du chud pa 'a/ chos kyi dbyings ji lta bang sems lag gi khams kyang de bzhin te/ sems can gyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings de la gnyis
255a2(1): su byed de gnyis su byed pa'i chos bzhi'abri ba 'ga' phel pa lab/  'gag pa yang byed do// chos kyi rang bzhin mi rang bzhin gis byed par 'gyur ba zhas leg pa sas gnas pa ma mngon par chags pa'as/ 
255a3(1): gnyis su 'gyur pa byed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la stand pa'i tshul tu gnyis su myed pa'i phyir ro// de ltar na byang chub sems dpal chos kyi dbyings rab tu dbye ba'i sa khas pa khong tu
255a4(1): chud pa yin te/ mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i lus dang / dngos po myed pa yongs su shes pa dang chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / rapa bzhin yongs su rtogs pas mtshas nyid myed pa la gnas pa yis de ni sems can rnam la
255a5(1): sna tshogs kyang zhes sems can gi grangs kyang shes te/ 'jigarten gi khams la'ang mngon papa 'chags pa myed do// sa medas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang spang po/ sangs rgyas rnams la/ 
255a6(1): 'ang 'dug med khong cu chum par byed de/ sas lanas khang rtog par myi byed no// dog kyang shin tu rtogs pa yin na/  don gyi ye ke sa pa yongs su marjod do/ mos 'dod chags dang bral bu'i rba
255a7(1): mthar phyin pa thams cad kyang shes so// rab tu shes so khong du chud do/  byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang yang kyi 'bral te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'apyod pa las kyang phyir myi ldog go/ chos kyi dbyings su
255a8(1): su gzud pa la dbang bsgyur bar zhugs pas zad myi shes pa'i spyod pa dang yang ldan pa yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ gtsub mas las byung kha'i me'i rgyu tshad myed pas me'i dgos pa las ma 'gos pa las a 'gags/ 
255a9(1): lha yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten thams cad na sems cad gi don las ma 'gags pa myed par zhugs pa yin te kun kyis tha dang byas pa yang ma yin/ kun gyi mapa'i phyed
255a10(1): pas byas pa yang ma yin no//  nye gar len pa dang lams pa yang ma yin nye bar lend pa khyes la yin no/ gnas gakangs yin myi gnas la zhang la yin no// 'jig rten gi chos kyi rjes su song
255b1(1): pa sangs rgyas byams pa gagos pa 'ang ma yin no// ni sa'i skye po yang la yin ni/ 'bras bu sa gnas pa'ang ma yin na/  gar byang chub sems dpa grub pa naga'i mi'i semams
255b2(1): skyed pa 'al 'apyod de de ni nyan thos kyi reg pa myi ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa myi gnod to// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang sonod pa myed do// 'jig rten gyi chos nye bapa le nad pa byed do// sems can dang sems
255b3(1): 'jig pa nye bar leg pa skyed do// nyan mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba nye bar len pa skyed du/ de ci'i gling zhe na/ chos khams par kun na don thos bye/ byang chub sems rapa pashes tho rlom khams na nye
255b4(1): blangs pa byed par byang chub sems dpa' sa 'ongs su shes so// chos khams ga zugs pa byed pa byang chub sems dpas yongs su gas seMs lams cad log bskyed par byang chub sems dpas yos
255b5(1): shes so// de de ltar zhi zhing phra ba dang zab pa dang / bzang po lang chos la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// pyad do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// khyad par bya'o zhes bya bar
255b6(1): mas kyi su dang skye myed kyi smras dang / kye nang gi sgrub pa dang phyir ba gi 'ang ba dang phyin naso/ sas da / sa
255b7(1): dang / chos thams cad du'ang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad la ni gang nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa
255b8(1): 'amaka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i khams la zhugs pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khas
255b9(1): la zhu gas pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'i khams la zhugs pa 'am/ 'khor ba'i khams la zhugs pa 'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams la zhugs pa'i chos gang yang skyed do// de bang ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di sa
255b10(1): chog ga nyis shes par bya ba ga pa yang myed de/ myi gnyis pa 'ang myed do// 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni phyogs bcur ma snyed myi snyed rnyed par myi 'gyur yang nam mkhar 'grang ba'i tshul yod do/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
256a1(1): byed parang nan thon lams dbyig gang dag sems can gyi lams yongs su sbyi pa dang 'dus pasang byed do// chom kyi sems sang bzod / chun pa khris bu sa 'i da don chos nyi
256a2(1): 'gal par byed do/ 'das pa' drabs 'ongs kyad pad slar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thamam ldan 'das rnams dang yang mnyam par 'gyur pa yin te // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyang rgyan ca bar kyi bye
256a3(1): rgyal dang yang 'amal kham yang kyi byedachos kyi tshun kyang rab tu shesar po / chos kyi stobs pa 'ang 'jigs par gyi byedachos bos pas lung rlom sems byed do// chos kyi 'byung nas kyang rab tu
256a4(1): chos brjod pa 'ang rab tu byed bye 'jigs pa 'ang rab tu gnas sangs rgyas kyi khyod pasas kyi gtong ngo / 'jig rten gyi tshul yab 'gog par gyi byed/ 'jig rten mnyal ba nyid kyang rab tu
256a5(1): bskyon se ba 'jig rten gyi gyod gnasas la yang gnas pa byed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brub pa dka' pa'i sems dang dran pa'i byangachupa sems dpa'i spyad pal khyod de ga sems
256a6(1): can gi khams kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas gyeg tu bskyed deng / de dag bskyod nas kyang yongs su sbyin par byed do// 'dul bar byed do// rab tu gzhog par
256a7(1): byed do// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam gyi rgyud las kyang myi g.yol 'o// 'jig rten gnas pa yang drin du myi bzo bas yongs su gang ba dang / dgras yongs
256a8(1): sug pas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pas/ yongs su ka pa pa dang / myi thun pas yongs su gang ba dang/ srid gzhag tu myi rung bas yongs su gang ba dang / byis pas yongs su gang ba dang / ma pyod pas yongs su
256a9(1): yongs su gang ba dpa gzhan gyi dring la rgyag pas yongs su gapa pa dang / shes rab ngan pas shin tu thur ba dang/ 'jig rten gnas pa'i sred pa'i bsam kha dang / rdzas rig pas kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pan
256b1(1): ban byas pa segs papa ni phyin pa sa ngan/ shes 'i nas pa na mams yongs sa gang bdag 'a zab 'das sag padang sa mams
256b2(1): gang bar byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa spyad las ngo mtshar tshwa yang gyi che he/ de ni lta zhe na bdag ni sems can mdza ba 'am/ myi mang lag pa las kyang chung ngu na sgra'i rtse mo gcig sa ma 'am/ chung chun dge bang byabs ma sa
256b3(1): 'dod byi rol te/ phyi ma'i la ba'i mur zhug pa'i bas par byang chub sems na pa'i dbyed pa pyod kyang gzhan tu sa sems can de dag yongs su 'grol ba dang /  sems can de dag yongs su dad par 'gyur ba dang /  semam can de dag 'du
256b4(1): bar 'gyur ba sa gtogs par de dag las sems sman cig tsam du bde'u bar 'gyur ba yang myi chol mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na bdag ni sems la zhend pa myed cing thams cad la 'od pa ba byed pas// sems kyi gso bor 'gyur ba byed
256b5(1): pa ten 'di skar bdag gis ni i nas kyang sems cad de dag bla na myed pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mthas gtugs te shin tu bde ba'i pha ro lad tu phyin par 'gyur bar nan tan bu bya'o snyam mo// ga kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
256b6(1): 'di la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub/  sems dpa'i dpyod pa brgyad la ste thug par dka' ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
256b7(1): rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i khyod pa dgu pa chos bzang po zhes byab gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byeng chub sems dpa' lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa bdud du bcas la/ tsharas par bcas
256b8(1): pa dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i dbye dgu dang / lhad pa dri zad pa myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa na/ chos kyi mu stegs bzang por 'gyur pa yin te/ de sangs rgyas kyi rigs myi gcad pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
256b9(1): par byed pa yin/ gzungs kyi snang ba rnam par dag pa thob pas gtam bya ba dang lung ba stan las spobs pa yin/ chos dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pas don la spongs pa yin/ chos mi sbyar ba bzhin gi gzungs chos yang dag
256b10(1): bar skul ba thob pas chos la spobs pa yin/ tshig dang sgra thams cad kyi gzungs rab tu thob pas nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa yinatshig dang yi ge'i don kun tu mtha' yas shing zad myi gas pa la thogs pa'i sgor gzungs
257a1(1): thog pas spobs pa thogs pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas dbang kha sbyar ba'i gzungs kyi dbang bsku das pas mngon par dka' bar byed pa'i spobs kha dang ldan pa yin/ gzhan gyi drin la myi 'azhog pa'i gzungs kyi sgo
257a2(1): thob pas sbab pa thob pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin// spobs pa thun yod pa'i tshul la zhugs pas thun mong gi so sla ba dang ldan pa yin te/ don mang po dang tshig mang po yi ge mang po de dang de dag la nges pa'i tshig gi gzungs
257a3(1): kyi sgor chud pas nges pa'i spros pa dang ldan pa yin rgyud mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob pas mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin te/ des ni 'ator gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi don tu bdag gi lus
257a4(1): gsor zhe ser gi mdog du mngon par skul nas chos 'byam klas pa thams cad dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad du chun pas/ sems can de dang de dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bsam la ci lta ba bzhin du brjod pa dang / dbang
257a5(1): bog byam klas pa ma thal yas la rnams la lce yangs pa'i byin kyi rlabs da kyis dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang dus dpa 'byoras kyi ge ba'i chos pa gnad pa dang / snying rje chen po 'gal ba myed pas shin tu
257a6(1): ba tand pa dang / tshig gcig gi sgra brjod pas 'dul ba ci lhag bzhin du chis par 'gyur zhing mtha' yas par spang bar bton da khas zhasangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'byod do// de ni gal te sems can re re
257a7(1): zhirda tshig rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshig gi mcho ga las sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'du byas pa rnam par smin pa brjod kyis myi lang zhing 'byam klas pas nye bar gnas par bye ba khrag khrig largya god kha sam gyis myi khyab la grangs myed pa rnam
257a8(1): bye ba 'o gas pa tha dad pa brjod du byed pa dang ldan pa de lta bu'i sems canag bdag byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du 'gyur lag 'khor gyi kyis lakho yang 'jig rten gi khams brjod du byed pa cas du langs pa shig yin te/ 
257a9(1): 'dus pa larjod du myed pa zhig tu 'dus nas/ sems can re re la yang kha'i sgo bye ba khrag khrig pargya gong grangs myed pa brjod du myed pa yod par 'gyur te/ sems can gcig ci lta bar sems can de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin de de snyed gyi/ 
257a10(1): Sha'i sgo dang ldan la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thams can la ba san du brjod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya song grangs myed pa na ma par btags pas tus gcig tu dbyangs gcig tu byas te yongs su/ 
257b1(1): dril byas kyang byang chub sems dpal ni de lta bu'i sems can gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / de lta bu'i sad kyi gnas gcig tu rgyun pa dang deg bu brjod pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su 'dris pa la 'ang chos bzung ba la thogs
257b2(1): pa byed pa yin/ brjod pa shes par bya ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa myed pa yin te/ 'dri bas the tsom yongs su 'dri ba la thogs pa myed do/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu ci lta ba de bzhin du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du myed
257b3(1): pa de tsab thams cad du yang de bzhin te/ de ya byang chub sems dpa' 'di btam du sems so// gal te sA'i rtse mo 'i re la sems bskyed pa re re zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khorang brjod du byed pa zhig 'byung la/ sems skan cig re le la
257b4(1): rgyag pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis na gzhan dang gzhan du brjod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad gang bar byed cing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa de lta bug zhag cig sgra'i tshe mo thams cad la 'byung ste/ de ltar 'byung bas phyi ma'i mtha'i
257b5(1): bskal pa'i mur thug pa byung yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag byung bas kyi ma'i mtha'i bas lad pa'i mur thug pa zad par 'gyur te 'khor de rnam sra ni myi shes par 'gyur yang skye ba'i rgyud myi zad pa shig yod du zin na
257b6(1): yang ba gnang par bya ba'i ba de sa byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi dpal gan cig 'gal tsas tu yang zhum par gyi spo / som pa na gyi myong/ sbyi sug pa dab/ la grom pa gyi myong / the cos
257b7(1): mid gnyis kyi skye'o// bgangs ba dang / 'jigs pa myi skye'o// mongs pa rab 'khrul la kyi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzang bo la gnas pa de ni ga de snyam tu sems te/ bdag gis sems can
257b8(1): 'di dag dang sems can gzhan rnams dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang tshig gi lam gyis yongs su mgu bar byas te/ chos bshad pa'i mthar phug par bya/ chos la rnam par rdzogs par gyi bya'o zhes nas/ des brjon
257b9(1): ba zham sa cad kyang rab tu ges to/ sems can de dag la brtag myi dgos mar 'byung ba'i bcig tshig gi go mnas pa pha dang pa'i brtag myi dgos par 'byung ba dang / tshig gis rnam par gdakas pa brjod du myed pa'i yang
257b10(1): brjod du byed par 'byung ba bas chos kha stond par byed do// de brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'dzin da la/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis kyang / tshig thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid du dbang bskur ba chags pa byed pa'i snying po can
258a1(1): a.AN chos thams cad kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa thams cad/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gzhol pa gcig gis/ sems can thams cad kyang go bar byed do// de lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub
258a2(1): sems dpa'i 'gyod pa chos bzang po la gnas pa ni mngon par chags par myed pa'i tshul gyis bdag rnam par dag la/ yang rab tu thob po/ sems can myed par 'byung ba'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi don kyang yongs su rdzogs
258a3(1): par byed do/ de ni dus gcig tu gtong gsum pa bcu nas gsod gsum pa brjod gapas kyi la pa'i don tu byin gyis rlabs shing // bdag gi lus gser gyi kha dog tu mngon par 'phrul pa te/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
258a4(1): shes pa'i spor chud pa'i chos thams cad du khyab pas mtha' dang dpung myed pa'i chos kyi sgor 'jug cing / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bsgrub ste/ 'jig rten thams cad du rgyu ba 'gags khas 'gro ba myed pa
258a5(1): lus rnams dnga'agro ba thams cad du 'byung bas mtha' yas/ par 'gro ba'i lus rnams/ dang myi skye ba dang mnyam pa'i chos la/ 9/ brtson lus a skyes pa'i lus rnams dang / 'gog bar brjod par
258a6(1): thams cad nga myigs pa myed pas 'gags pa'i lus rnams dang / mi lta ba bzhin du dmyigs pas bden pa myed pa'i lus rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi bden le bzhin du rnam par dmyigs pas myi slu la'i lus
258a7(1): rnams dang 'chi pho ba dang / skye ba las 'das pas myi 'pho ba'i lus rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings rapa bzhin 'jig par myi byed pas myi 'jig pa'i lus rnams dang / dus gsum gyi tshig gi las la brtson pas skad
258a8(1): cig gcig lus rnams dang nga / chos kyi mtshan nyid shinan tu rtogs pa'i mthar thug pas mtshan nyid myed pa'i lus rnams dang / lus rnam par phye ba 'byam klas pa bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpal ni dge
258a9(1): ba'i la thams cad bskyed pa la sems cas thams cad kyi gnas yin no// dbugs chen po phyind par bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi dpung nyen yin no// gnas chen po thob par bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi
258a10(1): spyam yin no// bla na myed pa 'byung ba ma 'ong bar bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi rten yin no/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba la sems can thams cad kyi 'dren pa/ yin no/ las kyi rnam par sbyin pa rnas par
258b1(1): dkyis sa yang bya la sems can thams can kyi mem yin no// chos tham mo rab tu thob par bya ba la 'dege na thams can gyi skapa yin no/  thams cad this pa bzhin du mongs pa byed par 'a na can pa rkye
258b2(1): pas mchis pa sus lams da kyi sa yinan// sgru pas rab tu thob par thub a 'i rten las sbyin gyi snang bayinan/ sas rgyabazinas par thas pa ya dag pa ma
258b3(1): rab tu dga' bayin no// thergyal ba'i thas sa na ga byang chub sems dpa cem ma tshan pos kyi byang chub se na pa thod pa tham mas pang lozhes bya ba de/ ga
258b4(1): dal sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sangs rgyas rgya chos tham se cas tu 'jug par bya ba la 'gro ba thams cad kyis gegs yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
258b5(1): chub sems dpa'i bcu pa bden pa na bldan pa yin she sa/ kye rgyamya pa'i sras/ dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bton pa'i tshig dam pa dang ldan pas bden pa'i tshig can yin te/ de ni gang smras pade byed
258b6(1): gang byed pa de smra'o// de 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pa'i gsung la'ang slob bo// mabyon pa yi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'anas rnams kyi gsungal thang khrob #
258b7(1): de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bden pa'i gsung la'ang slob bo// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasarnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs la'ang 'jug go// mtshan pa
258b8(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs la 'ang 'jug go// da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs la'ang 'jug go/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i cha pa la
258b9(1): bslob po// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ang thob lo// da ltar 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang zo ba khong/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
258b10(1): dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i cha ba snyen cig tu gyur da ba he/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas gnyis su byed par sma g.yin no// de sems
259a1(1): khon rnams kyi gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i shes pa la gang rab tu tun so// sems pan rnams kyi 'das pa dang sa songs pa dang dbung byung ba'i las rnam par phyid bshes pas 'ang ra tu so
259a2(1): gdang pasus rnam pa pa dang brdzogs pa dang mardzogs pa ba/ rab dpa pa ma shes pa rab tu 'du go// khams pa dang 'dug lams rnas sa sang dag tu 'atun do/  pa med ma
259a3(1): sa pa la mas kyi shes pas grula.A bzhi dang []
259a4(1): mas na la sems can na mas kyin sa dang bum ma yin par gyu pa 'am ras tu shes so// 'jig rten gyi rnams rgyas thag pa mas can tu rtsor gyigasas shes sa dan shes pa an rab tu chu / 
259a5(1): chags pa skyed pa yang mngon par sgrub po lag pa zad par shes na pa'ang rab tu shes so/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyi par gzung ba'ang rgyun gyi gcor ro// de ci'i phyir shes byang chub
259a6(1): sems dpa' ni 'gro ba thams cad rnam khar dag par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i phyir gzhag pa yin te/ de'i phyir zhing sems 'di snyam du skye lo// 'di ltam 'jig rten gnas pa yongs su ma grol bar bdag
259a7(1): par thob pa'i tshul rab shes 'ar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad ras sum thas mi ldan rjes su 'grangs par thun byed pa nga dag pa rdzogs pa'i rgya na da na
259a8(1): ba~M bdag la gyi chas// de las na minas kyang sems can 'di dag blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis zas gtugs par 'gyur ba dang / gang 'di phum po'i lpas las lug pa'i mya ngan las 'das dbyings kyimapar grug pa
259a9(1): gzhol par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// / de ci'i phyir zhen bdag cag zhi sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba a btab pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen te/ sems can thams cad kyis ma la skul khar yang dag par zhugs pa/ sems can thos
259a10(1): nad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la thog mar 'gro ba'o// bdag cagazhi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir/ a yo bsgyur ba ste/ bdag cag ni 'gro ba kun kyis/ gos pa myed pa'i phyir mchog tu gyur da kha'o// bdag cag gis zhi bA na s+ye/ 
259b1(1): kyis shig tu sprul pa'o// bdag cag gi sangs rgyas 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang/ ra Ar byung gi thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'o zhes te/ de sngon gi smon lam yang 'jig par gyi byed do// brag byed pa'i seshes kyi rgyan pa
259b2(1): 'ang rab tu 'jug nog sems can lams can kyi don lapa yongs su rdzogs par byed da / sngon gi smon las 'i gar btag pa yang log sa dang par dang la sa'i tshul gis yongs su rdzogs pang byas gas pagro ba lams shanas yang
259b3(1): par byal ba'i phyir mo sa lams cad shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'ang rab tu thob par byed do/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang phyogs bas rgyas par 'gro ste/ sems bskyed pa cig gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi shing 'dod tu
259b4(1): byed papa brgyas so sems babyen pa'i res kyang dang sa pa thonyas 'a sa rgya sa byed pa med bdon pa myong ba thong kyi/ ke kre sra la langangs pa mjog pa panyis ca
259b5(1): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su dag pa la'ang rab tu 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul la'ang yongs su 'aston to// chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mazas gtugs
259b6(1): par lus byin gyis brlabs pa 'gro ba thams cad du khyab pa tshan myed ba myi gnas pa 'ang rab tu shes te/ bdag gi lus de dag la 'bazhing thams cad yongs su 'dus par kun tu 'aton cing
259b7(1): dus gsum gi sems can thams cad dar chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rab tu ston pa to// sems can de dag gi 'du shes kyi rgyud dang mthul la'ang rab tu 'jug go// sems can de dag gi las / 
259b8(1): ba dang mos pa dang las dang rnam par smin de pa rnam par dag pa ci tsam pa de tsam ru sems can 'dul ba'i don tu lus byin kyis rlob ste/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad kyis shin tu
259b9(1): tu swA kha la ste/ myig g.yor lta bu li sangs rgyas skye bar bya ba la pha rol tu phyind la'o/ 'gro ba thams cad skyi lam lta bur rtogs pa'i yid dang ldan pa'o// don dang yi ge'i cho gas la myi zad pa'i mdzod do// drag pas dpa
260a1(1): sruril sa chos thams cad le nges par rtogs pa thob po// shes rab che ba'i ting nge 'dzind thams cad la thang rab tu zhugs pa'o// gnyis su myed pa'i sa largyan gyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'o// sems can
260a2(1): gi khams gnyis gnas pa la nyid je chen por gnas pa zhe/ chos de sa bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni stobs bcu'i mthar dben par 'gyur ba ste/ chos kyi dbyings myig 'phrul sa bu la rab tu 'jug ri
260a3(1): gnas pa'o// chags pa myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par tha ra pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// khyu mchog gi mthu byung bas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'o// myi 'jigs pa rab tu 'thob po// phrogs pa myed pa'i chos kyi
260a4(1): 'khor lo ba spor nga kha'o// phyir myi ldog khar 'jig rten gyi khams rnams cad du rjes su dpyod pa'i ye shes dang / rnam par 'thar da pa dang ldan pa ye gres brgya mtshoms rab tu zhugs pa'o// sems can phrams cad kyi 'khor
260a5(1): so la rdzog pa 'i khyer rab tu zhugs payo ba'adas pa dang ma byon pa// dpar ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo/ na 'i byin kyi rlabs dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bya
260a6(1): mtsho'i tshul gyis rjes su zhugs shing gting rnyed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems stong pa'i spyod yul bsdu ba ste/ bden pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// des
260a7(1): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams bden pas lgad pa bdud dang / tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zed bcas pa'i skye dkul dang / lda dang dri za dang myi dang lha ma yin
260a8(1): bu bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang phrad par 'dong ngo // shes par byed do/ chem par khyed do yid yongs su dgal bar byed do// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdub
260a9(1): shin tu phra ba rnyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur da te/ g.yos so rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go rab tu ldog go// kun tu ldeg go/ che ma che sa rab tu ches
260a10(1): ches/ kun tu che ma chem mo 'ur 'u rab tu thur 'ur kun tu 'ur bur ro// shig shig rab tu shig shi ka/ kun tu shig shig go// sangs rgyas kyi mthus lnga rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gi char yang mngon par 'bab po/ 
260b1(1): rnams kyi rin lo che'i srin mi char yang mngon par 'bab po rnardzas kyi rgyan gi srin gi mar yang mngon par 'ab po srams kyi rnam ma'i sgra yang mngon par 'byung ngo // sardzas kyi rna bsang ra tu byung // rnams
260b2(1): kyi sA yang rab tu 'byung ngo ro// gling bzhi pa 'di ni lha'i dab po rab tshe sa'i gnas na ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyang rgyas par byas te / thams cad ma'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos nyid 'di nyid la gnang ba
260b3(1): snang ba'o//  phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya stor gyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mya stong gi rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed 'ongs te / phyogs
260b4(1): brgya byas par byas nas 'di skad ces sAs so// kye rgyal la'i sra sa de ltar khyod bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgyod pa'i chos nyid 'di la skon bu legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras la dag lag kun kyang phyid
260b5(1): tethams cad na'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'di 'dra ba dag na tshig 'di dag dang yi ge 'di dag dang / bas nad pa 'di dag dang ngo bo nyid brjod pas/ lhag chad myed par chos la stond pa 'di
260b6(1): ba ston pa to/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar bdag cag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'di phyin te/ ci ltar 'khor 'dor bdag gcag phyind pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
260b7(1): thams cad kyi gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa thams cad kyi rab tshe ma'i gnas/ lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe ma'i khab pa nor bu sna tshogs shes bya ba kun/ ad / byang chug sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong kyi
260b8(1): rdu la shin tu phra ba snyed byin par 'gyur ro// / bas po nyi shu brgyan pa// de zhes byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor
261a1(1): sod la la ma ti cad la rnam par masmras nas chos kyi dbyings la nas par lta zhing ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su yang dag par bzung ba dang / byeng chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su spyang pa dang / rlon 'am
261a2(1): shes byed bya dag par bya ba dang / kun pa'i sa rgyan rgyabams padang / cas gsus gi dun pas par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang matsud pa dang dgang byung ba'i sangs rgyam pa da
261a3(1): dge la'i cha bzhi lha pa skyed pa'i tshun brjod pa dang / dus dang e ltar 'byor pa'i yas lag dang / dbang po dang bsam pa dang los khe dadu/ ba gsags dang / sems dang / dpyod pa dang rnam par g.yos pa'i rgyud lams lan
261a4(1): yongs su brtag pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs thams cad/ snang bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su gcad de spras pa/ nam mkha'i lam gyi rgyud gshegs shing / 
261a5(1): bsgribs pa myed par gzigs pa rtul rnams sbyangs gyur pa/ kun tu / mtha' yas pyod yul can/ stobs bcu mnga' ba de la phyagang / 'tshal lo/ gang yang de'i bla s+yai sgra chog/ chags pa myi
261a6(1): mnga' yon tan tshan myed mnga' ba ste/ 'das tus mnyas pa sa anyam gyur la rtul kha saHlad de dag dpyod pa 'di yin no// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams dag na/ don kyi dam pa gzigs la brtan/ d+yats+tsha
261a7(1): ba bzhugs pa'i rnams mthal yas nyes pa kun sal da pa/ gnas myed de dag 'aspyod pa 'di yin no// chos dbyings bsam gyis myi khyab par/ skyes bu seng ge gang rnams byon par la 'gyur ba thugs rje che bskyed
261a8(1): rnas gyod pa/ 'phan mdzad de dag 'byod pa 'di yin no// rus gsum gzhal byed pa'i rab 'byung gti mug rnam par bsartsal da /  snyed pa/  thams cad chos mnyas pa ste/ tobs mnga' de dag 'apyod pa 'di yin na
261a9(1): ka rnams mtha' dpung byed pa'i/ 'jig rten khams kyi srid pa'i rgyud rnams rapa ga zigs shing / gzigs nas rtog pa kyi mngal ba gyi g.yos de dag 'gyod pa 'di yin no// ga rnams sngos kyi dbyings mkhyen cing
261a10(1): rnam par don gyi dam pa gzigs pa brtan pa rnams/ ga ti suka za ba nga rgyal sel/ mdzad pa// legs mnga' de dag pyod pa 'di yin no/  gang rnams sems can kun mkhas shing / chos kyi dbyings la ngo bo nyid kyis zhugs
261b1(1): kyaras pa ma de gshesas gsas dren gyi 'jog paT sa la las cas de dag khyod pa'adi yin no// 'jig rten kun tu ma pa nas sa so// rnam sapa' thas pa yang dgas gas sa cad chus te/ na kyis byinan ma / 
261b2(1): pa thub ma sog de dag 'apyod pa 'di yin no// ldog pa myed pa de dag rnams / myi dam pa'i chos dang ldan pa thub par dgal ba dag pasmon lam khobs kyi mthar phyind pa/ gyod pa legs pa yang la khyod pa 'di
261b3(1): mnyam lar gyis ga mapal par byung gi myed pa'i sar rjes su thugs ga lams gabigs par 'thug pa'i nasas khyo sus sa bu mos pa pa'i/ lnga ba'i ming ge'i thor pa di yin no / rab tu bye
261b4(1): cig chus pas/ rjes su zhugs shing mos pa 'phrul bar mdzan pa'i/ chos rnams rtogs pa mnga' ba'i na sus/ thub chen spyod pa di yin no// 'jig rten bde ba skyed mdzad cing / sems pan nyes byed thugs
261b5(1): dang ldan pa'i rnams 'o thun pa byed pa'i son tu 'ad byed de dag ston ste 'jigs bskyed pa thongs mgan dra sems can sems so rab tu thos pa man pa'i la pa/ dang se
261b6(1): rnyog pa myed pa'i dpe' myed de dag 'apyod pa de yin no / dge' ba'ithugs dang ldan pa'i rnams/ bsam pa rnam par dag cing / sros pa myed pa'i dpal gyi gzi'i brjid spungs rgyas la
261b7(1): dpal mchog ldan pa de dag 'byod 'di'o// don gyi pha rol tu phyinapa rnas so// yon tan 'byung gnas rnam par dag kha'i thugs ma'e bge shind tu sems dpa' blo ldan rnams srid nas 'phags
261b8(1): de dag 'byod 'di'o// bdag myed nyams pa myed pa'i rnams/ rnga'i dbyings rab mngal ba zhing du gzhol ba dag/ gongs kyi tshul la gnas pa'i rnams tshig pa nyams myed de dag 'gyod 'di 'o// sbyin pas zhi nad tu/ 
261b9(1): 'phags kha'i rnams/ bsod nams mtshan rab brgyas kyang rab tu rgyan pa dga'agro la phan pa mdzad pa'i rnam sa/ blor ba de dag 'apyod yul 'di yin no// ye shes shi nad tu zab pa'i sar rjes su zhugs
261b10(1): shing blo gros shind tu brtan pa'i rnams/ myi g.yo'i brtan zhing gnas pa dag/ brtul zhugs brtan pa de dag spyon 'di'o/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i sa/ rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol du phyin dgyur pa la dge
262a1(1): rnam par 'phrul la bathon pa'i rnams/ chos kyi nyi la de dag 'gyod 'di'o/ kyi mnyam anyam pa'i blo sa nga' rnams/ myi gnyis yongs su bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'jig ldan pa/ tha sa ma la shin tu rto
262a2(1): pa dgra/ thams cad gzigs pa de dag 'gyod 'di'o/ 'jig rten khams la rab 'jug pa/ phra dang yangs pa rgya che ba'i rnam pa thams cad du/ pyod yul thob par 'gyur ba'i rnams ga ye zhes ri bo de dag
262a3(1): khyod 'di'o// yongs su dag pa'i sems ldan pa/ khams rnams gsum po kug tu chags pa myed pa dag/ tshul khrims brtul zhugs mthar phyind pa// rnam dag sems ldan de dag 'khyod 'di'o// nam ma kha'i
262a4(1): dbyings kyi mazas gtugs pa'i// ye shes 'byam klas mngon par brjod du myed pa la zhugs te bslabs pa'i blo/ ldan pa / ye shes sobs can de dag 'byod 'dil/ ye shes gsal ba'i phur lo yis dus gsuM
262a5(1): chos kyi dbyings rnams bkang ste ba smra ba byed kyang / spyad lug na yid du myi gyur par sangs rgyas yul zhugs de dag spyodad yul lo// kun tu 'gro bar song 'gyur zhing stobs bcu mnga'
262a6(1): ba'i chos rnams kun kyang shes pa'i rnams lus kyi chos kyang chags myed pa yon tastod dpal chen de/ dag spyod 'di'isems can mtha' dang dpur myed pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
262a7(1): rten dag na rgyu bar 'gyur ba'i rnams sems can kun kyi bdag ni bskyabs yin pa 'jigs myed de/ dge myed pa 'di yin no/  rtag par la chon 'grus gnas 'tsha' zhing dang / nam yang sangs rgyas chos la zhus
262a8(1): ba myed pa'i rnams de ni 'jig rten spyang phyir te/ klu chen de dag 'apyod pa 'di yin no/ dab po dag gis rgyus shes pa/ mos pa'i tshul gyi pha rol phyin par 'gyur ba'i rnams/ sna logs khaMs kyang rtogs
262a9(1): 'gyur ba/ mnyam byed rtogs 'gyur de dag gyod 'di'o/ phyogs rnams bcu por tshad myed ma'i / mtha' dang dbung myed rin cen mang pos 'gengs byed kyang / nas yang spyo ba'i yid byed pa/ dad par byed
262a10(1): ba'i de dag 'gyod 'di'o/ 'od zer dra ba mtha' yas pa kun tu 'gyed cing 'jig rten snar byed pa'i rnams// snang ba'i chos rnams rtogs 'gyur bag blo gros bsgoms pa de dag 'gyod 'di'o/ gang zhig phyogs
262b1(1): babu'i zhing gi rnams pa lag khrig lasas kyis kyi khyam thams cad slob byed kyang / 'jigs lngar 'gyur bar myi byed de 'jig rten pan bskyed la rtag tu brtson pa tshig gi yul la mkhas pa rnams brjod pa nas
262b2(1): bar dbye ba'i pha ro lar byinan 'gyur ba shes pa rmongs myed mkhas pa dag spyi sprul sems ldan de dag 'gyod 'di'o kyis lugs rgya la mkhas pa dag shing rnams rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol da phyi nad pa'i rnams/ 
262b3(1): 'das yi zhugs pa dag phan myed blo gros de dag 'gyod 'dil yos tan khrag khri ga tshatshad myed pa byang chu bar pa la gzhol zhing 'apyad pa 'gyod pa dag/ yon tan thams cad wa rang byind pa/ legs pa kyi zad de

262b5(1): chos kyi dam ga ga la dbang laskar zhing chos kyi tshul gyi rje su song bu rnams yid yang sa ldan pa de dag spyod 'di'i 'gro ba'i srid nga rdza ba kun srung zhi ba sems can thams cad rnam par sgoms pa'i

262b8(1): bzhin myed pa bzod de dag 'byor 'di'o/ chos rgya mtshor gnas 'cha' zhing / chos rnams thams cad rgya yis rab tu 'bebs byed pa/ mtshan nyid byed pa'i tshul ldan rnams dpal gyis tshul can de dag
262b9(1): bde par gshegs pa'i zhing gcig tu/ bsam kyis myi khyas pa'i tshul rnams can byed pa / bzlas pa grangs byed 'dud byed pa/  khyen mtsham pa rnyed khyod 'khor/ ma dang mtshan gyi'i sa
262b10(1): gyi rol ma rgyas brjod pas pa/ gang gis de dag mthong 'gyur rnams/ byed pa 'gadu gan de dag skyon 'di'i yang gi sgra'i rnam pa mdodan pa byed pa'i rjen pa rnams ni lalong 'gyur cing / 
263a1(1): de bzhin chos kyi dbyings thams cad de rgyal sras de dag 'apyod pa 'di yin no de bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i rnams/ sems kha skyed cig gis rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i rnams rab dang zung bar nges
263a2(1): myed pa/ rnam par 'byon pa de dge spyod 'di'i/ blta zhing don myed myi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas 'byod pa dag la don yod las ldan rnams chags pa myed pa'i yid can dag rgyal ba'i dam pa dag gyod pa'i yin/ gang gis
263a3(1): sangs rgyas mthob pa'i tshe/ bskal da pa khrag khrig nam du'ang ngoms par myi 'gyur bar/ dka' ba shin tu pyod pa'i rnams/ lta na don yod de dag 'gyod 'di'o/ sems can khams ni mthal yas pa// sems shing bskal/ 
263a4(1): pa mang por zad par byed pa'i rnams// sems can byed par shes par dag/ sems can gtsol de dag 'byod 'di'i / bsod nas sa mang po bas klas pa'i rnams/ ye shes skyob pa bsod nams chen po'i snying po can
263a5(1): babod rnams su theg pa'i ro la'i sems pani das pa'i gyod zhing/ chos dbyings sas rgyal pa layas / mas na na ma shes ban ca byed pa gsangs sas pazhe
263a6(1): po'i sku rdzogs de dag byed zhing/ ga zhis tid lani gnyiwas ting 'di gi 'us zhes bdog ca rkye duso makyigasasu ba shugs pan la/ thaba'i na ba dre dag gyo da

263b6(1): bang kun/ rnas par byal ba byed pa'i rnams gnyis su byed ge spyong de das byon zhil/ chos kyi phrin ni mtha' las pa'i ranarab tu 'thebs ga zhing rnams yangs par gyu dag sa

263b8(1): nyam par gyis/ 'gro ba 'di dag ci snyed pa/ mgus thams cad sems bskyed gcig tu chud byas te/ sems kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i rnams/ rang bzhin myed pa'i de dag 'byod 'di yin/ zhing rnams bsam gyis kyi khyab

264a1(1): ldang na shi nad tu spangaspyod pa za ba dang ldan byas nas/ smos pa byed pa'i spyod pa dag lu bu myor dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i rnams sems can kun la dga' bar byed pa yin/ dbang po tha dad

264a7(1): byed pag myig cas de dag tshul ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas ye shes 'apyod pa dang / tshad myed yon tan thob par 'gyur ba rnams/ myi jigs pa ni rnyed 'gyur ba shes can de dag tshul ni 'di yin no// 'jug pa kus la

264b1(1): pa byed pa'i tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas nam thar tshul la shind tu bslabs pa'i rnams 'jigs pa myed par 'gyur ba dgatshad byed de dag tshul gi 'di yin no// de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho dpa/ zhing rnams
264b2(1): rgya mtshom ma la' ma dag dang dpung byed par/ ges pa rgya mtshom ldan pa'i/ chos rnams rgya chos 'jig rten tshi mkhar byed/ gang rnams gshegs shing skyes 'gyur dang // byang chub rnam khar 'tshang rgya 'gro ba kun dag
264b3(1): tusu zhi ga mngon khar snang 'gyur ba mtha' dpung myed pa de dag 'apyod 'di yin/ mya ngan 'da' ba du ma yang / zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig dag ga mngon par skang / 'on kyang spra ba seng ge'i rnams/ mya ngan gyi
264b4(1): mnga' smon las khyir gyi ldog chos rnams lkug gi gcig 'gyur cing / sems can kun dang lus kyang / gcig tu 'gyur ba'i rnams/ rgyal ba dag la rtog myed pas/ lus gcig 'gyur ba 'khyod 'di yin/ tshig dang
264b5(1): don nams pa dang pas/ 'dis rten kham pa rdzi pa' dang dbyung yod ma yin pa/ rab bzhig gcig sa mos pa dak+ta/ nus gsum gshegs pa 'di dag byed pa 'di yin/ sems can dag dang rgyal pa dang / ca6

264b8(1): 'di dag myod 'di yin/ shin tu mnyam bzhag sems ldan zhing / ye shes mtha' yas shes rab shin tu ches pa'i rnams/ kun tu khyod yul ldan pa dag/ thams cad gzigs pa de dag spyod pa yin/ yon can sun gyi
264b9(1): ma thar gyin pa/ sems can yangs gcig nas gcig rgyud bsgrol pa'i rnams/ yid ni yongs su nyams myed pa/ rtag tu mchog pa de dag myong 'di'i yin/ kun lakhyen thams cad gzi shes pa dag/ sangs
264b10(1): ma na ca gasta gshes min / rig pa bathun sa skyes pa'i nisas ma sa 'de dang byed pad yinan rjes su ba nadu la mtho dpa pa dpa

265a2(1): khyed/ khams khar spang bar byed pa'i rnams la srem pa gsel pa'i spyod pa 'di yin no//  gang chu rgyal pas mngon thos pa/ don sems las khrag khrig shin tu 'argyal byed cing / sangs rgyas 'gyu pa sangs rgyas ni
265a3(1): sangs rgyas rkyen can khrag khrig spang bar byed 'apyod pa 'di dag mtha' yas ya su gnas brtan pa de dag gis par ci ltar rung / 'apyod pa thams cad shin tu shog/ 'gro bar 'apyod pa thams cad ma thar thug khyed
265a4(1): chos kyo dbyi sa dang mnyam pa'i padag gi lus ni brjod du skyed par 'gyur ngapa yin/ de dag legs khar brjod byas kya ngang / pu skal kha khragakhrig dag gis myi zad 'o// yon tan kun tu mapa' yas shing
265a5(1): yon tan mchog rnams thams cad mtha' yas pa'i yonako tan kun ni brjod as te/ thug pas bska khad par gsungs/ kyang zar gyi 'gyur/ rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos la/ gzhol/ 
265a6(1): ma 'gyur pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyis/ bsalas pa brjod byas brjod byas kyang / ldan par gyi nus de 'i tshul kyi dgosashin sargyamapa chen po'i mdong / sangs rgyas mas
265a7(1): zhes bya ba las/ yon tan gyi me tog shin tu bsngags pa zhes bya la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u se / nyi shu ma drug kho'o/ 
265a8(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas yang 2/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems

265b5(1): bya bas zhum par myi 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis kyi khyal zo zhes bya bas zhum khar myi 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i dbyings bsal gyis kyi khyab pa zhes bya bas sum khar gyi 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das lan
265b6(1): dbyings khas ma gyis kyi khyab po zhes bya bas zhus par gyi 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus la sam gyis kyi khyab po zhes bya ba sa zhum par gyi 'gyur ro// sa 'ongs pa'i dus khasas gyis kyi khyab po zhes bya bas zhum lar

269b7(1): ldan pa yin shin tu gtong ba dang ldan pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang ldan pa gang zhe no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin
269b8(1): gyis 'go pa sha byed pa'i ngang tshul can yin te/ de rtag tu bgo sha byas shing bdag kyang shas kyis pyod pa yin te/ bdag bde bar bya ba dang bdag yongs su spyang pa dang / bdag rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir yo byad
269b9(1): ci snyed du bsarnags pa de dag thams cad kyang bgo sha byas shing spyod ma gos pa ma yin no// de dag 'gyod pa'i tshe yang sem sa 'di snyam du skyed de/ yus 'di la srin bu'i rigs rnam pa sna tshogs brgyad pa
269b10(1): gnas te/ de dag kyang bdag gi lus 'di bde las ni bde bar 'gyur/ bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes de gang ci la 'gyod pa de dag thams cad kyang myong ba myed pa'i sems kyis/ de dag phyi
270a1(1): khyi 'am pa dang de dag bde bar bya ba ni phyir ga tong ngo / gzhan yang 'di snyam du sems te/ yun ring po nas las dang yus bde ba la chags par 'gyur gyis nga ni bdag gi lus la chags pa khas nas
270a2(1): par mda' bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gtong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gtong ba gang zhe na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zas sam skom 'am bza' ba 'am bca lag 'am/ pa ldag pa 'am btu pa 'am/ 
270a3(1): bzhis pa ma myang ba 'am/ gos sam 'phreng ba 'am khyug pa'am/ rgyan tan ci yang rung ba ste kang s+yad ni 'tsho ba'i ma s+yad na ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba zhig nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe slong ba zhig 'ongs te/ 
270a4(1): de la mi nas kyang zad par 'gyur ba dang lhag ma byed par bslangs kyang de la byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gi mtha' de dag tu bdag pa skyes pas shi bar 'gyur ba yang dmyigs pas kyi slebs/ 
270a5(1): tesu la yang pham par sa gyurd to// da 'di ltar rim pasna da sngon chan myong pa'i chos can dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis dus bya/ da par 'gyur la sems can de dag kyang bde yar 'gyur na bdag
270a6(1): par bya legs par yo kyi/ bdag pa 'di ba gang sa pa'i mapar yang chug kyang rlung sems panarnams 'tsha bar bya'o zhes badzin pa #
270a7(1): su gtong ba 'o/  byang chub sems dpa' nang gi gtor ba kang zhe sa 'di la byang chub sems dpal dar cing bzang por gnas pa gzugs mdzes pa/ bltan sug pa mnog rgyas pa/ 
270a8(1): nom pa dang ldan pa khrus dang byug pa legs la byas pa/ 'phreng ba dang rgyan legs par yatags pa gos sar pa mkhas kha mgos pa// gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal por dbang bsrur pa
270a9(1): rin po che bcun dang ldan pa de lta bu 'i drub du spong ba dag cig 'ongs te 'di skad su bdag lag ni nas gzer to/ gas so 'tshogs so/ sug pa sdus kyis sanag to// nan tsam che 'onan g.yog byed du
270a10(1): khrims yu 'o// gal te khyod kyi lus las lag pa 'am/ rka pa 'am ga 'am khrag gas/ mgo 'as klang pa 'am nus pa 'as rka pangs sul mi dgos pa de dag phyed cig ces rgyal po la thags logs
270a11(1): myed par ra gyi lus bdag cag byin na/ sus 'dis bdag cag nag 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ka ni ga byang chug sems dpa' 'di snyal du sems te/ lus 'di lta zhig chos kyis/ 
270b1(1): nan pa gyi sa tong ba zhes bya'o// des byang chum sems dpa'i phyi ros kyi gtong ba gang zhen/ 'di la bya chum sems dpa' gsung de bzhin su bya ma dbang 'bru ba dang / na 'o ltur pa'i dri gas
270b2(1): gling bzhi la dbang rin po che bdun dang/ bdel ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa thog ma mngon par dbang maskur ba de lta bu'i drung du spong ba dag cig lhag sa te/ 'di skad du bdag cag ni bkren no dbul
270b3(1): lo gnad tu sdug bsngal lo /  nor dang spyi ldan zho/ khyod ni pUSh+Ti yo byad thams cad dang ldan na 'dzas bu gI pa bzhi la 'khor lo sa la sprus pa'i srid pa dag sas byin te/ phyis 'di la dbang sbyar bar byas na des
270b4(1): ni bdag lag bde' bar 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ de la byang chu sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni zad pa'i mthar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe na su'i
270b5(1): bsam pa yang yongs su mgu bar bya ba gyi nus kyis bdag gis te da'i phul tu sems cas 'di dag gi khams la yongs su chis nye bar bya'o zhes nas/ de'i rgyus sem pa sred pa ma
270b6(1): 'gyod par 'gyur ba myed par gtong ba 'di ni phyi rol kyi gtong ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i phyi nang gi gtong ba gang zhen 'di la byang chub sems dpal 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal srid la
270b7(1): de lta ra dbang bskur ba bde' ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa sartags par byas pa rnam par bsags pa de lta bu'i drung du slong ba dag cig 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du khyod kyis ni 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po sngan
270b8(1): kyang khyod bdag cag ni dge ba la myong ba yin na byas bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid par gcag la byin la khyod kyis bdag cag rim 'gror bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bar gyis shig ces zer na de la byang chub sems/ 
270b9(1): dgal 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus kyi chos nyid dang srid kyi chos nyid de dag thams cad kyang za sngar myed par 'gyur ba se lus kyang rjes su 'brang par gnas la srid kyang che zhing srid pa rnams kyang
271a1(1): mngog tu'i gyur pa/ 'di'i tshe te snying po phyin pa sas snying po blam bar bya'o zhes nas de'i chus sems bsred pa 'ga' tshas yang 'gyod par 'byam pa byed par 'is 'grong byed cing gtong pa di ni byang chub mer
271a2(1): dpa'i thams cad ga tong ba ke gzhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal 'khor los sgyu pa 'i rgyal srid la de la dbang bskur zhing kha de gathams cad dang ldan pa// de lta bu'i drung du spong gang dag zhig lpags zhes ka'adi skad tu bdag cag
271a3(1): ni khyod kyi leg sa dang yon tan snyan pa zos nas/ grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas du ma nas khyod ni gdon myi la ber bdag cag gi bsam pa yongs su chil par 'gyur ba snyam le/ 'dir phyin
271a4(1): na byas bu khyod kyis bdag cag gi bsal ba yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ce sa na sa/ la la zhi bdag cag la rin po che bdun dgos so zhes zer/ la la zhi gling bzhi dgos so zhes zer la la zhi bdag cag la rgyal po'i bu dgos so zhes
271a5(1): zer/ la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i myig gnyis dgos so zhes zeral la zhi bdag cag la rgyal po'i lag gnyis dgos so zhes zer/ kA la la ni bdag cag la rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis dgos so zhes zer
271a6(1): sa ni bdag sag la rgyal po'i gdags so zhe sa 'im/ ma 'azhi pagacags rgyal po'i zhaganags so zhes zer/ lal ni 'ad sa rgyal po'i mgodanas ma shes zes/ mas ni bdag gas na
271a7(1): 'i snying dgos so zhes zer ma de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam tu sems te/ sdug pa dang pa yid du 'ong ba zhes cad dang bral zhing bye bar yang 'gyur te/ sems can gang gi khasam pa yang yongs su 'chim khar ma gyuras kyis/ dazhi bdag
271a8(1): ki sa lu sa pa bral bar 'gyur ba'i chos can 'dis sems can de dag gi chags sems che zhil bar bya ba 'i phyir bas ma pa yongs su 'tsham khar bya'o// btsal ba dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gnas su ni sems la skyed par myi bya'o zhes nas

271b4(1): sems gzhanalas bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang yongs su smyind par bya ba 'i phyir brjod do// chad no brtonas to// 'das pa'i chos nyid la rtags nagarang phyogs su rjes su kyi gagom dza// phyogs dang bya phyogs su zhes su

271b7(1): kha bya chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma khyen pa rnams kyi 'byod panyan na mtshan ma'i tshul dang / dngos por 'dzin pas kyi 'dzin te ga 'jig rten gi khams gzhan la bcos par gyi byed pa yin chos

271b9(1): bar gyi byed de 'apyod pa yang rgyun gcod par myi byed do// 'on kyang dmyigs pa des sangs rgyas kyi chos su lug par bya ba 'i phyir te// sems can rnams kyi la sem pa dang / da tshogs sud pa byed cing chos nyid kyang rab tu
271b10(1): sUd do/ chos de ni sul ga'ang myi gnas phyogs na'ang myi gnas/ nang sha yang a yin phyi rol na yang a yin/ rgyang rir po na yang a yig drung na yu pa ma yin no// zhes 'di snyam+b+ha du sems te ga tu yang zham yang
271b11(1): byad pa myed par bya'o// snyam pa 'di ni ma 'ongs pa gtong ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang su ga sems dpa'i da ltar 'byung ba gtong ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpal rgyal po chen po bzhi 'i ris kyi lha
272a1(1): nadams dang / gsum bcu cha gsum la dang / mche ya dpa/ dka la ldag dang / 'phrul dgal dang / gzhas 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs pa dang / tsharas ris dang / tshangs lha nye lan dang / tshangs kun 'khor dang

272a3(1): shig tu mthong ba dang gya nos snang ga dnga' 'ag sbyin dang 'og myin gi lha rnams nas/ nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / rab sangs rgyas kyi phun gsum tshogs pa dag kyang nyan te/ des de dag zos nas kyang rmongs par myi 'gyurakashin tu
272a4(1): rmongs par gyi 'gyur/ rab tu rmongs par gyi 'gyur/ zhum par myi 'gyur ba/ kun nas zhu mkhar myi 'gyur/ rnam par zhug par myi 'gyur // shig tu zhum blar gyi 'gyur ro dman par myi 'gyur/ 'di ltar de ni shes pas 'du byed du nonas
272a5(1): ba thams cad rmi lal ga khum mngon par byed do// de 'di yul tu gang /  skyes par bya ba'i 'di ga su'i yang ma yin no snyam she ngan song gi san / nye bar gnas pa bzlog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pas/ 
272a6(1): bsgrub pa'i phyir chos sond kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam mngon tu 'gyur ba'i phyir de la sems rtsu ba byed de ga 'di sa de par 'gyur ba gtong ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i gan tu gtong
272a7(1): la gang ge nag 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sems can myig dang gyi ldan pa dang ga na kha dang khyi ldan pa dang / swa dang myi ldan 'dang / sbed dpa gyi ldan pa dang / lus dang kyi ldan pa grangs myed pa zhig gis 'di skad du bdag cag la ci yang skye/

272a10(1): smin pa dang / dbang po grub pa ji lta bu yin pa dang kha skyes pa cis bu yin pa dang / zhag ci lta bu yin pa dang / na bci lta bu yin pa dang / shi ga ci lta bu srin pa dang / lus kyi rang bzhin phogs dang bar dang tha ma ji lta bu bzhin du yang
272b1(1): dag pa pa ga su shes te/ ros tu kyi rung la rjom skye ba 'phags pa pa yin pa dri kyi gis mdzin pa'i mi dran ron 'thum pa/ dus pa yogs pag dang /  ga~M gis gsogs gas mdagu nas rtag tug ga po zhes don sems bskyed ba

272b3(1): bdag gis lus 'di snying po myed par mthong bzhin du lus la chags pa se ltar khyas/ sems can 'di dag gi bsam kha de bzhin du yongs su 'tsham par bya'o// lus snying po myed pa'i 'dis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su
272b4(1): rdzogs par bya'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang shes par bya'o// ye shes kyi tsho gas gang yang rung ba la yang myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis bzhag par bya'o zhes nas ka lus kyi 'du shes kyang myed sems kyi 'du shes kyang byed de/ kye rgyal

272b6(1): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam pang shes pa yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byur ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam khar shes pa 'gag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
272b7(1): rku shes so// rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i bar ma yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma rig pa rab tu shes so// ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so// sa rig pa'i 'gog pa yang dag pa yang dag pa yas
272b8(1): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma rig pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yang dag pa mi lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa rab tu shes so// sred pa kun 'gyur la rab tu shes so// sred pa 'gog par rab tu shes/ 
272b9(1): sred la 'gag par 'gro ba'i las yang dag pa mi lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyan thos rab tu shes so// nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so/ nyan thos kyi kun byung ba rab tu shes so// nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das
273a1(1): pa ya dag pa me pa bzhin pa rag tu shes sog rang sangs rgyas rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas bya chos rab tu shes mog rang sangs rgyas kyi yos su rgyag sa nas gsang dag kyinapa bzhin ca man/ 
273a2(1): degasog byang rgyab sems dang 'anab tu shes mo/ byang chub sems dpa'i kug tu 'brung bar gtu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya dag las 'da' pa yang dag la min pa bzhin nanas tu sa gas na
273a3(1): kyi rnam par skyed pa dang / bya ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gsob dang gsog dang // snying po myed pa dang / bdag myed par rab tu shes te gachos gang yang snying po can du shes so// chos gang la'ang rang bzhin du 'dogs pa byed de/ 
273a4(1): ngo bo nyid kyis a ba sa gtugs par thams cad rab tu shes so// sems can rnams la'ang de bzhin nyid kyi don tu chos la ston da te/ de ci bton de ce na 'jig pa skyed pa'i phyir bton da te/ gab 'jig pa myed pa'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs

273a6(1): ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang khyab chub sems dpa'i chos 'jig pa myed pa'i phyir chos ston da rtogade ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni ma skyes pa 'dus ma byas pag byed pa
273a7(1): po myed pa brtsod pa myed pa gnas byed pa a skyes pa myi 'byung ba ma blangs pa nye bar a blangs pa khyed pa myed pa ste de shes rab kyi gter de lta bu dang ldan las las gron chu dus chos thams cad la mkhas kha gzhan gyi dring myi
273a8(1): 'jog pa yang dag pa'i lba ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// shes rab kyi gted te yang myi zad pa yin te/ de yang shind tu ba brtan la bcus skye zad pa yin no/ bcu gang zhe na thos pa la mkhas la gyi zad do// dges pa'i lashes gte
273a9(1): kha bsnyen pas kyi zad do// tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas khas myi zad pa'o// chos kyi dbyings la// 'jug pa la mngonas par sgrub pas myi zad do// rgyan cig pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pas myi zad do/ bsod zhams/ 
273a10(1): thams can shi na da du gas pas myi zad do// skyo ba myed par mngon par kha smra bas/ myi zad do/ gzungs thams cad kyi sgor zhugs pas myi zad do// sems can thams cad kyi skad dang sgra dang brjod pa sna tshogs kyi
273b1(1): byir phyi zad do/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid gnyis dang zhes nur dang / the co ga yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir myi zad do// / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su brtan khas
273b2(1): sems can thams cas nye bar 'cho ba dang yongs su skyen par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i 'khyod pa gnad tu rtogs pa'i phyid gyi yod de/ byi ba ba shin tu bstan la lacu po de dag gis shes cang kyi gter te gyi bad pa yin no
273b3(1): kye rgyal kha'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi gter yin te/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rag dang ye shes bla ga myed pa rnam papa 'tshar rgya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag re

273b8(1): hong grangs byed/ bsal gyis kyi khyab pa// mtshungs pa myed pa/ kun tu mapa' yas la su skyed pas mtshams myed pa/ gzhal du byed pa// brjod du myed pa gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi dang/ lnga dang / gsung de bzhin/

273b10(1): myed pa'i brjod du myed pa dang nga / sangs rgyas skye ba gcig khas nad te de dang mtshams la spyod pa'i lung sa nad pa dang gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas// sangs rgyas kyi skye ba shind tu lastand te/ 
274a1(1): de dang 'tshalas sbyor pa lung ba gan pa brjon du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa dang / mde'i khri'ig dang /  gnyis dag gsum nang bzhinang ldanas mngon du myed pa'i mang brjod na byed pa'i dag dbyas kyis ston pa'i/ 
274a2(1): sbe pa/ tshigs su bcan pa'i sde dpa/ sred pa zhi'i sde dpa / ma med su brjod pa'i sre du/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i mi dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dag shig tu rgyas pa'i sde dang/ sos nam ma 'thu pastan pa'i de
274a3(1): banyand pa'i sdig cig dang gnyis dang / gsum dpa bzhi dang ldanas brjod du skyed pa'i yang brjodan du myed pa'i bar dang / dbang po nas sa pa dang pa gang tshogs gnyiganas dbang po rnam pa pa dad pa sa tshogs pa rjod pa byed
274a4(1): yang brjod du byed pa li bar dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs cig nas nyon mongs pa brjod du byed pa'i brjod du myed pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin da sna tshogs ci kA nas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i
274a5(1): bar dag kyang dran pa dang / brtog pa myed pa rnam par gsal rdul myed pa/  rdul dang bral dri ma myed pa 'od gsal pa gsapa sang po ba sgribs la myed pa rjes su dran no// byang chub sems dba'i dran pa de ni 'jig rten
274a6(1): gyi khrug pas myi 'phrogs pa yin/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa myi zhus pa yin/ sngon gyi dge ba'i cha bas shig de tu sbyangs pa yin pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin
274a7(1): bdud dang u btegs can dmyigs pa la gnas pa gzhan gyis byi mchod pa yin/ tshe ra bas kun tu 'pho ba'i las shi nad tu ba nad pa thams cad kyis brjod par sbyi nus pa yin/ sngon gyi mthal dang phyi ma'i a tha 'a dang da ltar 'byung lo'i
274a8(1): mthal rnam par myis chod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba dang / gnas thams cad kyis skyon du ma 'gyur pa yin sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i 'khor dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa shin tu ba nad pa thams cad kyis thogs pa myed pa yin/ 
274a9(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems/ dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i gter te brgyad la'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter shen
274a10(1): ge sas kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpal rtog pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de yang yi ge de bzhin gzhan la/ yin ma de'i tshul gyis chos pa bton to// de'i mo'i rgyud gcig pa yang yongs su 'donod to/ tshe'i rgyud brjod du byen
274b1(1): ba'i yang brjod du byed pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin te/ sangs rgyas mtshan gcig kyang yongs su 'azhin to// sangs rgyas kyi mkhan mdon tu khyes pa'i bar brjod tu byed pa'i bar yang yongs su 'dizhin rta/ bsakha pa grangs byed pa la snyan pa ga / 
274b2(1): srung ba gnan lam badzod pa brjod du byed pa'i yang brjon du byed pa'i bar tuya yongs su 'ashin to/ mad pa'i kyang yongs su 'dzidzin to/ mdo pa rjog tu srid pa'i yang gdod du byed pa'i ba tu yang yongs su ban to/ 'a cis pa
274b3(1): sangs su 'dzigan to// 'bras pa sajog tu byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i bar byal yongs su 'dzigan te/ chos kyi sangs sa sun pa gcig kyang yongs su 'did rtan chos kyi mamams sbya pa rjo du byed pa'i yang bdod
274b4(1): byed pa 'i bar tu yang yongs su 'dzin tog dbang po zhes pa tha dad pa sna tshogs cig kyang yongs su 'dzin da rto/ dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sa tshogs brjod du myed pa 'i sapa brjod du myed pa'i bar du yang yongs su
274b5(1): 'dzin to// nyon mongs pa gachogs yongs su 'din to/ nyon mongs pa' tshogs brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i bar du sang yongs / su 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin gatshogs cig kyang songs su ya ni/ than tsa
274b6(1): to/  ting nge 'dzin sA sogs brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzind to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpal sos dpa' chen po rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gte gyi bdapa
274b7(1): kun tu ma tha' yas kha dag dka' ba gting rnyed pam dka' ba sgrub par dka' ba myi 'phrogs pa thub pa myed pa bdag nyid nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul kyi rjes su song ba he de ni ka ter dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems
274b8(1): dpal rnams kyi blo gros kyi gter gang zhen kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpal ya dag par rtogs par byed pa'i rtog su dang ldan zhing blo gros dang ldan pa yin te/ mdo sde bams 'ad dang myi 'gal bas de chos bsodan/ 
274b9(1): pa'i tshe ka dngos po yongs su ldog pa cig kyang khartsams te chos la son da pa nas dngos po yongs su ldog pa brjod du skyed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i bar du yang chos la stond to// sangs rgyas kyi tshu cig tshul de bzhin du myed pa'i

275a2(1): rnam pa dad pa sna tshogs cig dag nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig dab / ting nge 'jidzig sna sogs kyang brtsams te/ chos pas nang lanas ting nge 'dzin dang sogs brjod du khye pa yang bdod tu byed pa'i mamam bcam pa nyam
275a3(1): btond to/ nyi ma cig kyang bzad par byed cing chos bstond pa nas zla ba phyed dang / zla ba cig dang / lo cig dang lo brgyad pa lo stong dang / bsgokha dang bas la pa brgya dang bskal da pa dpa/ ba ha yad pa kha rgya khrag stong dang ba slalas/

275a10(1): do spyo ba myi 'gyur ro// de 'i'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpal nam lag pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings dang sa pa la dpa bu pa skyed pa rgyas par byed pa'i lus rab tu thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di sa byang chub sems
275b1(1): sA ge smon lam legs par yongs su bsngos pa dang / bskal da la thams cad kyi grangs gcad du myed pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du mu bya ba'i phyir sems can chad myed pa dang / 'dus byas kyis ma gos pa'i phyi

275b4(1): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tham sa cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og
275b5(1): dang keng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang glo de bzhi pa 'di la stsogs la gling re re na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par snang ngo // byang chub sems dpal de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byind kyis rlabs kyis chos/ 
275b6(1): bton da to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zha ba sa drung yang 'khod par shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa de'i phyir ma kha rtu la// byang chub kyi zhing rlung yang phyir ma tul ti rab kyi che mo sa pa phyir ma rtul bar rab che ma'i
275b7(1): gnas nas dgal ldan gyi gnas kyi rgyal po rab dgal ldan gyi khang pa rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba der gshegs par snang // tsi lA pa gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams zham
276a1(1): cad kyi gleng bzhi pa'i dag na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par spang se byind kyi rlabs snga ma de dag kyang ma 'khrugs par snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po reb dga' ldan gyis rgyang ma nas bcom ldan 'das 'ang ga
276a2(1): rin po che thams/ cad kyis brgyan par gshegs pa Sha/ mthong nas rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyand pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i ba dan nor bu rin po nyes las byas pa lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyu las bsgrus/ 
276a3(1): ba/ dge ba'i cha pa thams cad kyi rgyu las grub de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyis 'byung ba dge ba'i ma pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed pa mang pos byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byung ba'i chos dkar po las khyud
