276a6(1): rnam pan 'phreng ba'i thar bye ba brgya mong khras mun nas tho kyi ma byes pam song zug bcus sos kun tu tul bar sbya ba/  ma me'i tha bye ba pa rgya stong zag bcu nye nas bas sa pas mags
276a7(1): gtugs bye ba rgya stong khrag bcu kun nas sbeng ba/ rin po che'i gdugs bye ba brgya stong khrag bcus kun nas bkab pa/ gdan bye ba khrig khrig rgya gong phrag bcu mngon par gting ba/ rin po che'i bu shu bye ba rgya gos khrag 'acu rgyan tu sbubs la
276a8(1): nam bu'i sral bye ba brgya song khrag bcu gnin munam par phye bas g.yog par byas pa/ rin ze nye nyi dra pa brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor kun g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i dra ba na tshogs bcu shinan tu sbyangs pas lags pa/ 
276a9(1): stag sbub kyi dra ba bye ba brgya tong phrag bcu sa gnad tu klubs shing brgyan pa/ gtugs kyi dra la bye ba brgya tong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par bkab la ga gos sna tshogs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya dong phrag bcus sna tshogs su g.yogs
276a10(1): ba / rin po che bang pa'i dra ba bye ba brgya tong phrag bcu rgyas par bkram pa// spos rin po che 'i dra ba bye ba brgya so ba phrag bcus 'khrul zhing yid du 'ong ba dri gim la rin po che'i bla re chen po'i dra la bye ba largya tob phrag bcu'i rgyan chen/ 
276b1(1): brgyas par 'bres pa/ na la ci'i dris bu rgyas pA re bye ba brgya ma pa phrag bcus yid tu 'ong ba'i sgra byung ba na dan na ma pa'i mdonas bu'i bar bye ba brgya stong phrag la cu yi du thong pa bkun pa 'anatha ma'i ba ton natshas
276b2(1): kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag ba cu me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ gos kha 'og sa thal yas pa'i grware bye ba brgya gos zag 'acus ma tshogs spang bam bkas pa/ byang chug sems dpa'i na re bye lab rgya long bras pazus cho
276b3(1): su kun nas bka ba pa gdugs kyi bla re kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya tod phrag bcus kun tu g.yogs shing rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba/ gser gyi mA re byo ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid su 'od khar bka ba pher rnam

276b5(1): pa/ rin po che mas cad kyi za re bye ba la rgya stong phrag bcu 'i nor su rin po sa bzang pos shig tu mdzes shi khebs pa laka ba pa rin po me'i rgyan bye ba rgya stong phrag lacus phyogs thams cad bkang ba / rin mo/

276b7(1): ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sa a norbad/ gal tshus dpa 'thun pa'i spos kyi dri zhim par byas pa/ lha la mchog tu bya ba'i spos dang gdugs spos bye ba khra ga khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sa kha dog mtha' yas pa
276b8(1): dang / dri zhim khor gartul pa'i mchod pa can lha la mchog tu bya ba'i lha ba lhub kyi rgyud bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par klubs shing dag par byas pa/ rin po che me tog gyi 'phreng ba bye ba stong phrag bcus rin po che thams cad kyi
276b9(1): rgyud du mdzes par byas pa/ dpas gi snying po'i phreng ba bye ba largya stong phrag bcus rin po sa sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po chen sna tshogs su brgyand pa// nor bu nin po che sna tshogs kyi 'breng ba bye ba largya song khrag bcus
276b10(1): rin po tha yangs cad kyis rgyag tu rnam par dag phya/ nor bu rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyis 'greng ba brgya stong phrag bcus bdan gi snying po sha nan tu rgyan kha dbang po'i rdo rje bye ba phrag bcu sa shi nad tu sbas pa rin po che'i skam
277a1(1): chung shing dag par bya na bu na ma man nga pa/ sa khyen pas dang par byas pa/ ma san so ma gang pa / ba tu byed pa
277a2(1): po che'i 'od zer bye ba brgya tong phrag bcus 'od zer skang khar byas kha/ nor bu ris po che lha mchog tu bye ba bah+ya hong phrag bcus san khung gi shar bu mdzes khar khres khaH/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag par
277a3(1): byed pa brgya hong phrag bcu sum kha dog/ gsal par gyur da pa/ dngul/ na gyi rta khabs bye ba rgya hong phrag bcus bres pa/ snying po dkar po rab tu rnam khang bye ba 'gro ba mtsho'i tha gas phye ba lah+ya hod khrag bcul
277a4(1): sbubs gnad tu bsgrubs pa/ nom bu rin po me dri ma byed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstan mdzes par bzhizhin tu brgyan pa nam bu rin po che sems kyi rgyas po byis brgya song phrag bcus mdapa sa/ caca
277a5(1): yid du 'ong bzhing dag la bar kun tu rgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong bye ba rgya stong phrag bcus shind tu nas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po chen 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus e zhus kaza' brtan
277a6(1): ba nor bu rin po che snying po dag par byed pa brgya stong khrag bcus rnam par snang zhing mdzes par byed pa// nom bu rin po che dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus skab pa'i gdugs su bres pa/ nor bu rin po che ma dul
277a7(1): gi snying po bye ba brgya stong phra ka khacu sa na pa rnamam pa sna tshogs su bkram pa nor bu rin po che mI rab kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sa// snying po shi ned tu h+yand pa/ su tig gi 'phreng ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mdzes
277a8(1): bar khros pa bye tu t+ya'i 'phreng ba brgya tong phrag bcu sa dra bar 'bres pa mu tig dmar lo'i 'phreng ba brgya hong phrag bcu sa nam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa/ 5/ rin po che shin tu sna pa'i 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shi nad
277b1(1): brgya song bras 'byas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ams ca rjes su song bar skye ba brgya stong zag 'bras sas tu rgyas bgags kyis 'amam bskyen pa'i sos bye ba brgya bong dkus 'i drikun

277b3(1): bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tu phyir gyi ldog par zhis pa bcug sa bye sa brgya song zas 'as pa sa tu byugs pa sa den rnam sa dang pa'i chos bye bas bya gong drug pacumachon du bcus
277b4(1): shing mdze sa la spos rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sa dri zhim khor shin tu bsgos pa/ a ga ru gnag po pad ma'i snying po khye ba la n+yai spyo phrag bcu'i srin gyis snying por byas la/ bdun
277b5(1): spos khye ba brgya stob phrag bcus shi nad tu bdugs shing yog pa bdug spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dbang po zhi bar zhim pa spos kun tu rgyub pa brgya stong phrag bcu yid du 'ong bar
277b6(1): yang bya tu rtos cwa ga 'bres nas bya cad mas kyis dang 'a mas yim cigapas sa rgya ngas rakatsha cas kyas cas bras sngang rtsa

278a2(1): 'khrugs khang spos thams can mchod par byas pa/ spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du byed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su shi na tu brgyand pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog kyi sprin
278a3(1): gyi cher khye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ galha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu langon par
278a4(1): 'bab pa lha rdzas kyi bad pa'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag brtswa mngon par 'bab pa/ lga rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog gi sprin ki char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa//

278a6(1): rdzas kyi me tog pun dA ri ka'i 'phrin ki mar bye ba ba rgya hos phrag par cus shinan tu 'bag pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi las rnam ba'i sprin gi ra bye ba brgya hos khrag la bu'i tshogs chen po ba
278a7(1): tu 'bab la/ lnga rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi cher bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas 'bab pa/ na pa pa'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus par skang kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur bya / nom bu rin
278a8(1): bo che'i srin gyi char bye ba khargya ho pa phrag bcu pa kun tu snang bar 'bab pa/ gdugs kyi sprin char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas yog par 'bab la/ ba dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag lasu
278a9(1): kha dog yA ru mar 'bab pa/ lA rdzas kyi bcon pan gyi sprin gi 'char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sna tshogs su 'bab pa/ wA ba srub kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu klubs khar 'bab
278b1(1): rnardzas kyi rin mo che'i phrin gyi mar bye ba pa rgya song zag bcu la nog 'ang tshogs su 'bab pa rnardzas kyi na mama'i ma mo de'i phrin gyi bye ba pa rgya gong zag sa rgya rgyan chen por 'bab pa// rnams kyi
278b2(1): dan gyi sprin gyi par bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tsan dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog du ma 'bab pa skardzas kyi a ka rud pa/ tsan dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya hos khrag bcu shin tu log par 'phrul zhing 'bab
278b3(1): rin po che li rgya la mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu kha sbeng pa rin po che'i sil snyan bye ba brgya ho pe phrag bcu shind tu sbyangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i lnga ldi khye la largya ho ba phrag bcu shin tu 'dres pa/ 
278b4(1): spos kyi snod bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nas shin tu 'phul ba/ rin po che 'i 'breng ba'i chun po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu spyangs kha/ rin po cheche'irigasil snyes bye ba kha pya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'khol zhing
278b5(1): 'dzind pawA rdzas kyi rdul ya ba bye ba brgya stong khrag bcu rnam par rlob cing // 'dzind pa/ rin po che'i dril bu/  li dra ba khye ba la pya stong phrag bcu shin da tu 'khol ba/ dra d+yaSh+Ta
278b6(1): rin po che'i btegs bu bye ba brgya stob/ phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba// rin po che'i shing rta 'i 'greng pa bye ba rgya stong phrag bcu kun 'grib pa/

283b7(1): sA ba brgyan par byas so/ sangs rgyas kyi las thos par mos pa'i sems kyis gser gi dra ba grangs myed pa las dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'khrol zhing sgra 'byin pas g.yog par bya ste/ bar snang brgyan par byas so// re
283b8(1): bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan gyi gnas dam pa yin par 'dzind pa'i sems kyis bla re grangs skyed pa las rin po chethams cad kyis ma de'i 'phrin lding zhib 'brul pa'i brgyas kyis bor snang brgyas par byas / sangs rgyas pa
283b9(1): dge par 'dun pa'i sems kyis spa rdzas kyi gzhal myed khang grangs myed par lba rdzas kyi rol mo gdung ba dang dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung bas bar snang brgyas par byas so// sangs rgyas la skye ba zhin su dadon/ 
284a1(1): las pa sa byung pa sakyis pa pa sa sa da []/  stsa byang la mab
284a2(1): khadas sna tshogs mangs sred pa lag na rogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kha yul pa rgyan chen po sprul pa'i sems kyis rnams kyi cag dan gi bye ma kha dog gatshogs grangs byed pa lag sogs pa
284a3(1): gro sangs rgyas 'thal yas pa la mos pa'i sems rnam kha' 'phel bas gos rin po che kha dog lnga tshogs grangs myed pa sag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i sa ma gos kyis log par byas so/ 
284a4(1): de bzhin gshegs pa ri me 'gro bya bas mos pa'i sems kyis gardzas kyi byan ma tshan rin po che sna sogs kyi kha dog yan lag ga yogs shing / bcos na 'das kyi zham ring du 'dong sangs rgyas pa dga' ra mtha' yas pa rnam par
284a5(1): 'phel ba'i sems kyi sa lha rdzas kyi ltab lhub dang 'phyang 'phrul kha dog sna tshogs grangs myed pa'i yang grangs myed pa la ga na thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'phrul so// dad pa myi phrog pa'i sems kyis sgra rdzas kyi 'breng pa grangs myed pa
284a6(1): lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ga stsol to// mtshungs pa myed pa'i dga' ba rnam par 'phel bas lga rdzas kyi khaM dan rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs myed pa'i yang grangs skyed pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chub
284b1(1): pa'i sgra dbyangs phyung nas bcom ldan 'das bkyes par byed do// byang chub sems dpal bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du skyed pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'ongs pa rnams kyang lba rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pa khams gsum las na par
284b2(1): 'das pa dmyigs pa'i chos las pa byung ba/ rjen pa'i dri myed pa chags pa myed pa'i sems tshim par byed pa/ chos kyi/ tshul zab mos mngon par grub pa blo tshad myed pa yangs pa las byung ba dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan pas rnam par spes pa/ dge
284b3(1): ba'i rtsa ba bsam kyis myi khyab pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'phrul pa grangs myed pas mngon par bsgrubs pa / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba mngon par du bya ba myed pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyas btab pas chos
284b4(1): kyi dbying sa thams ca cashags pas ya byas ba/ dag yas/ pe sa byed papas byung ngabab a bye des gas kyis kyi kyis klanas sa sa
284b5(1): bas rnam pang dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rgyas pa 'ashings pa te'i na bapa' rnatshogs mngon par dga' bas mos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so / chags bskyed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin do de sa yang dan
284b6(1): ba cugs pa'i ses pa kyis rnas pas 'das pa kyi skye ba'i chos pas phreng ba'i dris bu som thar bad pa'i drabs chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas yi chos mas cad smras su thogs pa'i sems kyis 'jam pas
284b7(1): pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gis bdug pa'i brgyad kyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bya bami sems kyis lpardzas las 'das pa'i rin po se thams cad kyi sa/ 
284b8(1): ngas rgyas kyi gdang du 'ding ba'i brgyad kyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa byas bag/ langs rgyas kyi mchod pa dang bzhin pagag pa skyed pa'i sems kyis 'angam sas sadas pa'i dzin pa len chos kyi rgyal mngan pa dag par 'arnyes pa/ 
284b9(1): ma kyi skyes pan 'jus/ lam su sa dpa pam pas dang mams ma ma kyi pa ma nga kyis kyi skyes
285a1(1): pa'i dge ba'i ga grang ba byed la las byung bas gangs mas 'anas pa'i dan chogs kyi bad mas kun nas log pa'i rkyen gyis chos kyi byings brgyan pagyis so// dngas las ma 'i thams pa dkyi tshan
285a2(1): gi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / me tog kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs rnam pal dad pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / can dan gyi dri zhim po mtha' sas / 
285a3(1): 'gro ba thams cad kyi sprin dang ka lga rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos dang bdus pa sna tshogs kyi ngan kun tu ldang ba'i spris dang 'phreng ba yid du 'ong ba las cad kyi sprin dang
285a4(1): rdzas las 'das pa'i lba ba lbu ba rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / byang chub ses dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod tu myed pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa las 'das pas bstod cing bsngags
285a5(1): 'gro ba thams cad bde ba'i lam bstand pa dang / tshig rnam par 'byed pa brjod tu myed pa smos pas chos tshad myed pa sa gzhol pa'i gzungs kyi rgyud pas cad las 'byung ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa myi zad pa dang
285a6(1): gyi 'jigs pas yid dga' bar bsta rang pa'i rim 'gro ngoms kyi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod par// tshig rnam par 'bye zhing brjod pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi lus na la'i khams rgyas par byed pa byin/ 
285a7(1): kyi ba rlabs ste/ sangs rgyas 'das pa dang la 'ongs pa dang da ltar 'byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid kyi dbang pos mngon par bstod do// hA gA'i ris gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i TI latshan de dag tsham can dang sang sa rgyas kyi
285a8(1): zhang brjod du byed pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khod nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khru mchog gi mnu 'a byung ba las kyis kyi khya pa yongs su ston pang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thu yang dang / 
285a9(1): par 'chung ba dang gabs kyis myi khyab pa'i bya 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang // sems can grangs byed pa'i chud tshis par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyag na par bye bas na ma kha'i khas sems cad dang mos kyi dbyings las can rgyas par mdzan pa bzor/ 
285b1(1): mtha byin pa 'di sa pa sa bras kyi bas 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi ma sus ga sa byed pa lasazang bcig gisas sa 'analas ya da pa na ga kya nas sems dang yinapa da sa kyis man mams
285b2(1): can thus pa'i ska pa shin ci ma par bya 'i phyin pangs rgyas kyi chu 'ongs pa rjes pa kya par byed pa /  dge ba'i ma 'dod pa las nanas pa dad pas sangs rgyas kyi yo na ca byed pa dag par thod so na shi sa sa kun bye dab
285b3(1): 'i sangs rgyas kyang pa min papa zung pa/ 'tho bams das thas mi sus kyi nges su sa pa gyi kyi rdzas sa sa las byed pa'i myed pa sa mas pa yong na kyi kyi sa su gyi na
285b4(1): kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dpung byed pa 'byung ba brtseg pa 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da sngar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su byung ba / khams dang mos pa bgrang du byed pa thams cad spyod par mdzad pa// byang chub sems dpa' 'ams can pa
285b5(1): shes mngon par bsgrub pa pa 'dug par mdzad pa / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dgal bar mdzad pa / chos kyi sprin nam mkha'i khamasang thams cad du yog par mdzad pa/ chos kyi dbyings pams cad malus pa
285b6(1): dbazhi shegs pa chub kyi kyi rnabs kyis ro pa bsan mas can phyinag pa bams pa'i sa pa'i du sa sas rgyas sas gagyis malags kyis kyi gras ma
285b7(1): las 'bags pa ye shes kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyes pa sangasargyas kyi byin gyi rla ras snang ba gzigs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dag par gzigs la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye ba

285b9(1): sku'i rgyud brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod pa yang dag par stond pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu 'khrul pa myi mngal bar byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi rnam pas yon tan gyi zad pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas
285b10(1): chos kyi dbying sa thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dpung myed par khyab par mdzad pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa'i seMs can la rim 'gro mdzad pa ji ltar brnyes pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa sems
286a1(1): khan gyig rgyal pa zhin su yul la matad ya ma' 'a dang pa'as 'dzig pa bzhin dunam pa nag 'a ma na / gzugs kyi las kyis kyi rgya pa byed kya rdzogs
286a2(1): mapar zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su bzhud pa/ pyod pa ma dad pa las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa sgribs pa myed mngon par sangs rgyas la khrugs la chags pa myi mnga' bas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag cing ba 'dres pa
286a3(1): ye shes thams cad la rnam par dpyod pa don dang tshi ba dang yi ge tha dad pa yang dag par stond pa zhe ye shes rgya mtsho sa dang / dpung myed pa la zhugs pa/ yon tan gyi mchog ye shes kyi snying pos byung ba / chos kyi dbyings mas du
286a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma shar pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du sngon gyi smon lam za ba pra myi mnga' bar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dpyod pa ma nyams pa rnyes pa bdag gi dang yongs su kha zub pa myed pas bam
286a5(1): pa phyi mnga' ba/ 'jig rten yas 'das pa'i chos thams cad 'byung zhing 'jig te/ rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi myi shes pa/ ge'i rgyal mtshan yang dag par bcad pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi khyi shes pa chen
286a6(1): po yongs su pa pal ba'i gnas su gyur par 'gro ba thams cad sdang bar mngon pa ra 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi zhes khyad par du 'phags pa la bar du gzhog la/ 'gro ba thams cad nye 'ang 'tsho ba'i bsod nam

286a8(1): byed pa / sangs rgyas kyi sku brjod du byed pa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs pasam gyis kyi khyab pa'i gsung dang / dbyangs kyi char 'bebs pa sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta pa bzhin du yang dag par rim par mjed pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang /

286b6(1): pa myed par khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i rgyu theg pa chen pos zhal yongs su rgyas pa chos thams cad kyi don grub par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i tsha bas rnam par phye ba nyams pa myed pa'i phrin las rnam par sbyind pas rnam par dag pas ye shes kyi/ 
286b7(1): 'byung zhe nas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa yongs su myi rtog pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad su 'od zer gyi drabs gsal bar 'gyur ba/ phyogs bcu'i byam klas
286b8(1): pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyas sdang bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa blta bas myi ngoms shing gtor myi phra ba yon tan chen po dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

287a3(1): 'bar ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i klung ma dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su 'jig rten 'ams cad las mngon par stod pa/ sgrib ba'i tshe ma thams cad du ma srung ba chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi don gyis dag pa/ yon tan gyi chos thams can pa
287a4(1): mnga' bab mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor can yon tan gyi 'od 'ang mnga' ba'i nyi ma ma gyungs pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gang ba gzi'i 'dzide 'bas cad kyi dra bas mngon par skyes pa 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyab kyi grub pa sang
287a5(1): dag par 'dzin pa 'jig rten thams cad 'phrul par thugs su chud pa'i ye ge sa snang ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang chags pa myed/  pa mnga' ba phyi ma'i mtha'i yon tan 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par
287a6(1): shes pa 'gro ba thams cad dang mthun par rtond pa'i ye shes kyi phyagamara' ban de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sman pa/ sems can tha thams cad bde bar mdzad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnaM bar
287a7(1): dag pas rjes su 'brang ba 'gro gdang zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du phyir myi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi spyan phu bas rab rib myed cing rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas kyi lo legs pa yang dag par sond pa/ 'du ba'i sems

287b1(1): rang pa'i shugs sa ya las las 'byung ba/  sems can thams cad kyi rang gi dge ba'i ma pa'i phying gyi ldog pas dang pa/ sems nyi kyil ma 'i gal ba nyid bye rjes su 'brang bar ya cu/ 'gro ba gnyid byes log pa 'ams cad pa dab cang dang/ pa rgya

287b3(1): tshul gyi pyod yul thugs su chud pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gzigs pa'i zi lad kyis ma non pa'i rgyan kyis brgya nad pa/ chos kyi rgyud thugs su chud pa'i ri bo rnam par dag pa ni sangs rgyas byam klas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan
287b4(1): mu ho napa'akha na ma tho ba myed pa'i sa la sems can rab tu 'god pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan grangs myed pas rnam par bris pa las kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i 'jig rten du / de bzhin gshegs pa sna chog sa yang dag par nyon dag/ 
287b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'byung gnas rnam par spyod pa ye shes thams cad yongs su dathob par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi smon yam rjes su bsrung ba myi shigs pa 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bgis gnyen ston pa/ 
287b6(1): snang ba dri ba myed cing mchog tu dga' bar ma dza da pa/ 'gro 'am lus lathams cad kyis ji tsam du mngon du mthong ba de tsam du brjod du myed pa le mas can thams cad kyis 'gro ba'i rjes bu song ba'i byind kyi drugam mangs
287b7(1): ba/ grogs bsngon tu 'gro ba'i dge ba'i thakhas sems can rnam par dge par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi smon lam phyi rjes su nga song ba nyams pa skyed pa sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i 'jal yongasu
287b8(1): srung bas dag par mdzad 'a las bsams pa'i drung gyis yongs du 'byung ba na kyi dkru'as ma mams cad nam par 'jo' bar 'byung ba/ chags pa byed pa'i la la stobs kyi 'byu 'grol 'ams cad kyis byas na/ 
287b9(1): don nang byung pa spang ba yeshes kyi myos bskyed pa'i nya ma nyis seras pa gang yang byas kyi kyi la bya sa zung dur byed pa'i na
287b10(1): kyi sa pa snye 'gro ba thams cad la ldang po gyud pa lalam 'a dang yang dag pa nyid pa bams cad yong su rdzogs pa'i byed rgol bganing tu bcom pa yod kyi gdas dag pa co gyung pa 'grwab 'das pa kyinyi / 
288a1(1): pa zad bye dge pa'i wab sem la rag sa pa yid chem ma chad byed pa'i yod na las dang / yang dag par mdzad pa legs kyi tshul gyis dang song gsum gyi 'gro ba songs du myod ba'o// sanas pade gang du na bzhir dgeg
288a2(1): la mos brnyan pa de lta bur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal la yang dag par lta ba/ nam 'di lta bu leshes mu stegs las 'bab pa rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tas rgya mcho ga tshad mtho thams cad la 'jug pa/ rnas pa de la/ bu'i ye gen
288a3(1): kyi nam mkha'i rjes su phyi nad par su 'gro ba/ rnam pa de lta bu ra'i gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du yang dag pa ji lta bar shes pa rnam pa de lta bur bde bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa'i sgob lta ba rnam pa de lta
288a4(1): bur dge ba'i 'phrin las rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phun gsum// tshogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa rnam pa de lta bule yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po 'jig rten gyi

288a8(1): grangs myed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyod yul thob par byed pa/ mang po mthong bar gyur da to// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya tong brgya tong bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ska las rnam par
288a9(1): 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrul zhing byung ba/ kha dog pas ma gyis myi khyab pa/ mdog bsam gyis myi khyab / 'od bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung myed pa thams cad rgyab par byed pa// sangs rgyas kyi byin / 
288b1(1): byams dang sems cag sar ba dag par drinas yongs tu 'byu ba/ tshigs du bcad pa bye khrug khrig dargya myong ngams kyis myi rgyal ba yongs su 'dzin pa lag rten thams cadas la nas 'angs ma sa rten sa/ 
288b2(1): 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su 'byung ba rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis kyi khyab dgayang dag par nyon dang/ bska la da 'bye ba khrag khrig bsas kyis kyi khyab pam yon tan zad rtsi shes pa
288b3(1): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zad myi zhes pa las 'byung ba sangs rgyas bskye ba brjod tu myed pa/ yang dag par stond / ye shes kyi sgo las rab tu gzhog pa don yangs pa shind tu stond pa/ sangs rgyas kyi srub dpa
288b4(1): du myed pa'i tshul yang dag par banyond pa na sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dab dpung myed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi pa warang thug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyim pa cad du byin kyi rlabs kyis byung ba la 'gro ba thams cad
288b5(1): rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ thams cad mkhyend pa chags nga pa myed pa ma'a' dang dpung myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myo pa las 'byung ba de ha bzhin gshegs pa 'asam gyis myi khyab pas ste nang pa'i dpal 'bod pa'i dpal yod/ 
288b6(1): nga'athenyes par bya ba'i gyod pas rnam par dag pa dang blom gyi ba g.yod pa las yang dge par 'byung ba 'das cad mkhyen pa'i sems chags pa byed pa'i sgo dang sangs rgyas ba pazhin gshegs pa 'byam sbal par bya ba'i spyod pa sa rnam par dad pa dang / sdoms
288b7(1): mnan gsheg sa pa 'thong ba la se mas ca cad byed pa rab tu 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i ma 'dzes pa'i sgo dang 'angs rgyas kyi mo 'brub yid dkyis nod pa byed pa la rgyam mo'i ma'as gdugs pa'i sems cad ga rlung bar bya ba dang ga byang chub se las sa
288b8(1): bka la bzhi dbyed pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas 'dus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor du 'jig rten
288b9(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du myed pa dag na sems ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang / sems dad pa rnam sa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems rnam par 'phel ba'i rnams
289a1(1): bab dang dgrub byed par khong du chun par byab dab/ sems cad rkyen pa'i na las kyim bar bya ba dang / bams can gakhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa las byi gyi zhog par bya na / com nyid dang gyi gas lar bya ba dang / 
289a2(1): yang dag pa'i khapas kyi lpag par bya ba dang / de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyinan pa'i rnams kyang rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'jig brten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i za ba rnam
289a3(1): sbya bar bya ba dang / dmyigs pa thams cad la kha mos pa'i sangasang rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul la yang kun tu babang po'i tshul du yos par bya ba dang / bdud kyi yul las rnam pa ma ldog par bya ba dang / 
289a4(1): sangs rgyas yul 'thob par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'ichos nyid shes par bya ba dang / ye shes pa sem gyis myi khyab pa skye bar bya ba dang/ theg pa chen po'i smon la g.yas phyir myi ldog
289a5(1): bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba las myi 'phang par khyab dang / ye shes khong du chud par bya ba tshad myed pa rtogs par bya ba dang / sa 'tshams myed pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs yang dag par yongs su sbubs par bya
289a6(1): ba dang / shin tu dka' ba'i sems la skyed par bya gdapa/ the tsom myed pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba dang / kha na la phro ba byed cing yongs su dka g.yob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid la rten pa so sor 'thob par
289a7(1): byab dang / rdol mthong bar bya bsas khyi gyi log par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dgal thams cad gyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba napa/ dus gsum gi sangs rgyas bams can kyi rigs drug par bya ba de la de ma
289a8(1): nan das shes sags na man mo kug tu sgrub pa dang / sems pad mabyenas pa'i yeshes kyi du tsacan chos byin semams kyi can rnams padas las kyil bdag pas nyan to// degam ca ma gas 'das kyi ma
289a9(1): can thams cad 'acug pa 'i dbang tu sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pa'i phyir chags b+ha/ spyod pa'i ye shes kyi snying po rab tu sna bas/ sangs rgyas kyid pa la ma tha layas parab tu 'bar la/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul
289b1(1): sa kyis kyi thab pas rnam par zhapas sa 'thun pa ni bzhin gshegs pa'i sras nasathas bathas sacas 'dang dbung byed pa ma shi nasan ga/ nas mas su nashAn bya// 
289b2(1): sa thub pa'i seshes kyin ma yang nan las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i babs sun sum tshogs pa/ mas kyi dab sdug brnyes pas chos bsas can sa yang la sa dpa ldan pa mams ca mkhyen/ pa nyid kyi sogs byung ba de banan / 
289b3(1): gshegs pa'i sunas par dag pas shin tu yungs pa yang la ba/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dpad Ar 'grub pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mags pa nyid 'gyur ba/  dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gyis rje lo shin tu sbyangs pa/ 'al
289b4(1): thams cad kyi dpes dper myi 'gyur ba'i sku gzugs angal ba/ mtshan thams cad kyi lo ma shi nad tu 'phags pa'i sku/ can stobs bcu'i rgyal mtshan gi/ stobs chen po na pa ldan lang / skal ba kyi khang pa thams cad du lta bas kyi mas
289b5(1): pa larjon ni dge pa ma brtsod pa'i byangs kyis shes kying 'os su da/ nga ma sem sa dpa' bas sa kyi dkyis ma kyi na gi kyis mang nanan /  tu / 
289b6(1): cad kyi rgyal po chos thams cas kyi srid la mngal ba'i phyir/ dus gsum spang bar byed pa'i gsung mngal bas byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan sngon zhi dge pa'i 'am pa'i chog pa las yang dag par 'gyur bya'i kyis rlabs so/ 
289b7(1): de nas lha'i rgyal po ba dag la ldan gyis tshul 'di lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan pa dang / ris 'gro dang rgyan sun tu ga ya sa byas te/ dga' ldas ris kyis bye ba brgya no ba grangs pa byed pa dang ldan cig tu zhis can rim 'gro dang
289b8(1): pa kyis man 'dasagangan pa ni ma la po sbyar te phyag 'ams nas/ bcos ldan 'das la 'di gan ces gson to/ com ldan 'das gshegs kyu gsos bde'ab ma gshegs pa gshegs su gzo na
289b9(1): gshegs pa dbral mthos pas dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde' par gshegs pasam de nas macos ldan 'das pa'i rgya 'tho bdag sadan gyis kya drungs na pad/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan pa sa su ladas rgyas kyi 'das kyi
289b10(1): nga bam sems dpa nas ca mam pa ga nas kyi 'a ma cad yin pa da po gsan kyis kya dga' yo napa/

290a2(1): gas lnga/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal bas bad pa/ mchod pas skyo bar kyi 'gyur ba lhag pa'i bsam la dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par khasus la/ thams cad pa khyen da pa 'i dge ba'i za ba dang / don la ya dang sems
290a3(1): bskyed pa las byur las// khab pa'i rin po ches thams cad kyis brgyan par shes so// ji lur bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi klong bzhi pa dang dka' ldan gyi gnas
290a4(1): dag tu sang shes 'aru skang po // bcom ldan 'das rin po chen thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'i khang par gshegs a zag tu/ de'i tshe rim po che tha mams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khab pa/ rin po che'i rgyan las shin tu 'das khar gnas so// 
290a5(1): lhardzas las 'das pa'i rig po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog khar/ d+ha ka nas so// lha rdza sa las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi smanakyi char mngon par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das kha'i rin po che
290a6(1): thalas can kyi rgyan gyi 'grin gyis rgyan par gnas so// lA rdzas las 'dasapa'i gos thams cad kyi smang+ge rab tu gtong bar gnas so// A rdzasalas 'das pa'i can rnams can gyi srin chen po rab tu gtong bar gan mo// 
290a7(1): lha rdzas sa ma 'das pa'i dri thams cad kyi mchog dang 'dug pa/ 'thul ba'i 'phrin gyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so// g+ha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po chen sna tshogs thams cad kyi srin rnam pa za dad pa'i char rab tu 'bab par gnas lo/ lha rdzas
290a8(1): las 'das pa'i me tog mang po'i srin gi tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so// swa/ rdza sa las 'das pa'i sil snyan dang brdung ba bye ba largya stong bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i sgra rab tu 'byin par gnas so/  thams cad mkhyen pa pa'i
290a9(1): chos kyi dbyings su grag pa'i rol mo'i sgra pa/ klu'i dbyangs kyang rab tu 'gyed par gnas so/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin tu 'jig rten gyi khams lams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi gnas
290a10(1): dag tu yang rin po che lams cad kyis brgyan pa'i kha pa pa gshegs par snang po/ de nas lha'i rgyal khor bad gas ldan gyis A'i gnas khams cag tu zhwa'i rgyal po rab 'dag la ldan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba tag po zhes
290b1(1): brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi sa zhus ng+ge'i rgyal po rab dgal ldags par cad du myi 'gyur ba dang ga N+DI sngon gyi dge ba'i tshogs dang pa/ tshad myed pa'i dge ba'i tha pas brtan pa dang / mtha' yas khar sems laskyed pa'i dad pa
290b2(1): rnam par 'phel pa dang / shugs chen po yang dag par bskyed pa dang / dga' ba chen po shin tu bskyed pa dang / gang dgel ba'i las sa rnam par sbyang ba dang / thams can la khyes pa nyid du sems ba skyed pas dga' bar bya ba dpag
290b3(1): chos la khar chad myed pa'i yid du 'gyur bar bya ba dang / rkos rnams kyi nyams par bya ba'i phyir dga' ldan gi gnas kyi glu dang rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra thun gyi sa par gyur da to// de nas lha'i rgyal por ba dka'
290b4(1): ldan gis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam sa la dge ba'i rtsam bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ 
290b5(1): chags pa myed pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa// 'pho/ brang mchog tur ba gshegs la// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs/ nga gyur da cig/ bkra shis dam pa ga bzhig gis// ye shes mtha'
290b6(1): zhes bya bar man btags pa/ pad ma'i che mo rab gshegs sa/ des ni 'dir bklags legs bu da cig/ bkra shis na las zhig gis/ san sa gnan pa che zhes bya bar 'tshan
290b7(1): btags pa/ rin cen mdan nur bshegs pa/ des ni 'dir yang sachashes legs par gyi/ khan gis das bgang nis / rabs rapa rnam pa'i lhag ces bya bar mtshan pa u ga dab
290b8(1): ba ra ba gshegs pag des ni 'dir yang bkra shi sa legs gyurd cig/ bkra shis dam pa gangapa zhig gis// yon tan thams cad la ston pa'i nyi mar mtshan btags pa// me tog snying khor rag gsheg
291a1(1): 88/ ltar yaMd bkra shis legs 'gyur da cig/ 4kra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ mgon po the tsom 'jos pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan te// rin cen kha par rab gshegs khwa desaM/ des zhi 'di ltar bkra shis segs gyur da cig
291a2(1): dkra shis rnam pa gang zhig zhis mye'i seng ge ye shes smog ya sa pha' yas kha// spos kyi sem mo rag gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur gcig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ ga sangs rgyas yon tan kun
291a3(1): kye 'thung nas 'od mda' ba/ nor bus brgyas par rab gshe ges pa// des zhi 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur da cig/ ji ltar lha'i rgyal lo bdag la ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyis zhus/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
291a4(1): rnams kyi yon tan brjod de/ sku'i dbyangs su tshigs su bcad pasargyal ba gshegs pa mngon par btod pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gi kham s+ya thams cad na yang / lha'i rgyal po rab dka' ldan rnams sangs rgyas
291a5(1): byi kyi rnams kyis bu'i dbyangs su rigs su pa cad zhing sngon gyiyang nyenag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yo tan brjod pa byed te ba rgyas pa gshegs pa la'ang man pa gagong par gyur lo
291a6(1): ninas com ldan 'das chos kyi bu shig tugs par dag pa'i su du/ 'das la dang sa byon pa dang da kar byung ba'i sang dag par rdzogs sangs sa na dpa sa su du las rnas marba/ 6
291a7(1): pa dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur da pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su thugs su chud pa'i khams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / chos thams cad la ba sgrib pa myed par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha'
291a8(1): dbung myed pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rgyun myi 'chad pa dang / ses sa can 'dul ba'i ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skubasgribs pa byed pa'i rgyan
291a9(1): kyis yang dag par rgyad pa dang / rus bzhin du 'byung ba'i chos pas nad pa dang / byang chug/ sems dpal brjod du myed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas/ lpags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag la dang / de bzhin
291a10(1): gshegs kha'i sku sa yang dag par 'apyod pa/ gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi mthu la phyung bas/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang khar gshegs nas/ gdon btib pa la skyil lo 'khrung
291b1(1): bcas te bzhugs so// ji ltar bcos ldan 'das bzhugs pa zhe bzhin tu 'jig rten gyi khams khams gan du'ang bzhugs par gyur to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rin mo thams lan gyi brgyan pa'i khang pam gshegs pa dang khyo
291b2(1): pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rim 'gro dang mchod pa byas shing rgyan kyis brgyan pa de dag zhams cad las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ba dan de la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ grangs myed pa'i 'gyur dang / grangs byed pa'i rnam khar lta rdzas las 'das la/ 
291b3(1): me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang byug pa dang spos dang / phye sa dpas bsal dang gdugs dang / rgya la mtshan dpa pa zhan dang rin po rje dang / rol mo btu pa dang / dkrol ba dang klu dang bstod pa dang rjes su dang / rim 'gro dang dang pa dang dka'
291b4(1): pa dang /  zal mo s+ya da la dang lha rdza sa las 'das pa rnam pa grangs myed pa'i rgyan da dang / lha rdza sa las 'das pa rnams grangs myed pa'i tod pa dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rnam pa grangs myed kha'i 'phrin kyi char 'bag pa dang

291b6(1): grangs myed lase spyad pa lha rdzas las 'das pa'i yo byad kyi tshul dang bsam kha rgya chen po rnam par khrel bas sangs rgyas mnyes parabya ba dang / mdzes pa'i rgyan rnam par dag ya dag pa thams ca
291b7(1): kyi na po che'i dri thams cad dang phyogs brgyan pa sa spos kyi sprin re ni dang ris 'gro'i rnam pa sna tshogs rgyache zhing yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas ma mchon pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams can rim 'gros brtson pan

291b9(1): shind tu byas pa ga po'i mdol sangs rgyas lal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa bgud pa dang gshegs pa dang bzhugs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i le'u nye/ nyi su brgyan pa'o// zas po sus bsdu ma gcig sa
291b10(1): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas bya ba chub sems dpal bcu mngon par lhags te/ byang chug sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod phrag
292a1(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu 'dra ba snyed kyi pha rol de nas 'ongs par 'gyur ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing hong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chug sems dpal dag

292a3(1): ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dpa/ rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / dri ma byed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems
292a4(1): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig brten gyi khams 'di zhes bya ba dag na sra 'ongs par gyur da pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rin po che'i snying po dang / yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang / dngul gyi snying po dang / gser gyi snying po dang gnor bu'i snying

292a6(1): bzhin gshegs pa 'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ga dag gi zham ring na 'tshangs bar 'gyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar shi nad tu'aphags pa 'i dpal dpag so la ba myed pa li dpal dang/ bcings pa phyed la me pal dang ga dbyen draSh+Ta
292a7(1): pa'i dpal dang / 'od zer gi dpal dang / mthal las rgal ba'i dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / dbang phyug gi dpal dang/ tshangs pa'i dpal dang / shin tu bsags la 'i dpal zhes bya ba dag na'on de nas byang chub sos
292a8(1): dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyas ste/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brtan zhes/ tre/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i snying po can nor bu sna tshogs dang ldan dag mngon par srul te/ gser
292a9(1): gi dra las g.yogs pa'i lus dang 'od zer bye bas khrag khrig brgya to ba grangs skyed pa gtong ba dang / dri ma myed pa'i 'od gtong ba dang // tshangs pa'i 'od rab tu bskyed pa dang / masal ba nas par dag pa 'i rin po se yang dag khapa 'a 'did/ 
292a10(1): pa'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam la/ kha na ma pho ba myed pa las byung ba'i smon lam dang / 'a gro bya thams cad kyis bltan yid du 'ong ba dang / bltan don yod khang sems can 'dul ba dang ni kham dag pa'i chos kyis sangs
292b1(1): kyirnam 'a 'phrul pa yongs du ci gad pa dang /  kri sal blas can yongs su thus pa byang chub sems napa'i ga tu rmo lam btab pas kyis mo 'grang babs te 'khod do// byangs pa sems napa' de dag la mas pan gyi /

292b4(1): ba'i spang ba sa pa la yas pa dang / 'di lta ste phye ma'i sa kha'i bsal par gyi zad pa'i so so de yang dag par rig pa'i tshul lagad pa dang / 'di lta ste gzungs thams cad kyi ska par byas pa'i se shes kyi phung po rab tu rgyas pa
292b5(1): mtsham sa byed cing a pa la yas pal sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'byor/ pa dang ldan pa rab tu thob par gyur da kha dag go/ ji ltar gling / bzhi pa 'di dag la ldan gi gnas subyang chub sems dpa' 'dus
292b6(1): par 'gyur nga pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi snying bzhi pa dang dgal ldan gi gnas dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' mying de skad ces bya ba dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de sa/ 
292b7(1): ces bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de skan ces bya ba dag gi zhas ring na tshangs par 'gyod pa sha btag/ 'ongs par 'gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pus mo'i lha pa gnyis nas ka 'od zer/ 
292b8(1): bye ba khwa ga khrig brgya stong byung te/ phyogs brgya thams cad spang bar byas nas/ 'jig rkyen gi khams khams cad bstan to// de zhes byang chub sems dpas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi gling bzhi
292b9(1): tha mas cad dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad na de bzhin gshegs kha'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod par mthong bar 'gyur ba to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji snyed kyis phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings kyis/ 
293a1(1): @kris pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyis thar zhug pa dag sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa maphong par gyur / pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sul du bya ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byas
293a2(1): kA sa la thams cad la lha kha'i phyir kun nas 'dus par gyur na to// de nas byang chu ba sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam khar kha ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su kha cad
293a3(1): pa 'di dag smras so// yang dag sangs rgyas skye ba myed/ rgyal ba mya ngan myi 'da' ste/ rgyu 'thun pa'i smon lam gyis/ des ni rnam par 'phrul par spang/ 'di dag chos ni bsam gyi khyab/ 'di dag sems kyi dpyod yul
293a4(1): myin/ gang ki sa ye shes la rol du phyin da// des ni sangs rgyas 'byod yul/ mthor// lus 'di yang dag/ sangs rgyas sbyin// sma yang de bzhin gshegs kha byin/ lus dang sba las gzhan na yang / sangs rgyas na
293a5(1): bar 'phrul myi mthong / sngon gyi las rnams ma gtogs par ra byu bachos kyi spyod yul gyi/ mchog gi tshul rnams shes/ ka pa dpa/ blo zhan rnams kyis myi nus so// yang dag sangs rgyas
293a6(1): la ka nas pa ga ngapa yang myed/ zhing rnams bye ba kun na swa mkhyen pas mtha' dang dbu pa myed de/ chos kyi dbyings la rab zhugs zhus/ rnam par 'phrul la bson la mdzad/ chos rnams kun la chags la
293a7(1): myed/ 'gro la de ni kha sgribs myi mnga'/ tshad skyed pa'i yon tan gyis/ zhing rnams kun na rab tu swa pa/ gang zhig ye shes 'di dka dang / ye shes thams cad rtogs 'dod las/ bas ma gnam khar spya bya
293a8(1): ste/ byang chub 'byod pa spyad par bya/ drang srong chen po'i byin kyis rlabs la 'di 'dra gang gis mthong 'gyur cing / de ni the tsom myi byed na/ dge ba shes mchog ya la sen pa yin/ de nas byang chub sems dpal dam/ 
293a9(1): ba'i rgya la mtshan gyis du/ sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// shind tu zab ste brjod du mye da/ brjod du yod kyang 'da' khar dag
293b1(1): sa/ de bzhi gas rnas kyang/ bya sa ge yong bar 'gyur/ ngadags sa sa so/  na la ga yanas lce/

293b3(1): gshegs pa gra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa la dge ba'i za ba'i grogs su gyur pa dag ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi rnam khamathar/ 
293b4(1): pa za ba mos na mkhar 'phrul pa la mos pa she brtag go// chos kyi dbyings kyi lus tha dad pa myed pa'i rjes su song kha she stag go/ gnas myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i rjes su song khas rab tu zhugs pazhe 'atag

293b6(1): yang dge bar spyod pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu phyind pa ge hag go/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dran pa rnam par dag pa la gnas bshe stag go// blo dang sems/ skad cig thams cad kyis

293b9(1): grug pa le lus dpa/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba'i spyod yus thams cad du 'gro ba dpa/ ye shes chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo rnam par 'phyi ba dang / ye shes kyi stobs rdo rje'i bya la mtshan gyi mthu'i mchog thob la dang ka rdo rje/

297b8(1): hA/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de gar byang ub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so/ 'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs laphya gas de bzhin gshegs pa nas
297b9(1): rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shi nad tu wa ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan thun pa she brtag gis 'di lar/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin kyi rlabs dang / khyod kyis
297b10(1): ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i thakhas brtan pa'i phyir 'di la/ ste byang chub sems dpa'i myi 'jigs pa rnam par dag par bya ba das spobs pa chags par myed par/ 
298a1(1): ba dang / ye ges kyis la slebs pa byed pa'i sar 'jug par bya ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i/ ye shes yangs pa/ la rab tu 'jug par bya baM dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba myi zad pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba dang / 
298a2(1): spa bas pa skyed pa'i chos dkar lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la sgo/ kun nas/ 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mo 'phrul pa stan par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i ye shes dang / 
298a3(1): dran pa rgyan gyi gcod par rnam par dag par bya ba dang / dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin tu rlabs par bya ga/ chos kyi sgo mtha' yas par bya ba dang / shes pa kun gzung bar bya ba dang / 'di lta ste
298a4(1): yongs su bsngo ba bcu yongs su rdzogs par bdonond pa dang / byang chub sems/ dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzung bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho gas rnams rab tu nyan par bya ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa
298a5(1): ye shes kyi mchod par bya ba dang / smon yum chen po'i skabs dbye b.rabya ba dang / don shin tu bsten pa la 'jug par khya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par bya ba dang /  byang chu ba sems dpal
298a6(1): thams cad kyi sa der btu dga' bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sreg pa gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thun pa'i sa bsnyend par bya ba da / de bzhin gshegs pa thams can kyi rigs yang dag pa gzum sa/ caHrtsa
298a7(1): bya ba'i phyir byin kyis kharla ba mdzad kyis / kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lem phul dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis brtan pa dang / gzungs kyi
298a8(1): snang bzhugs gdab/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgribs pa myed pa la zhugs pa dag chos kyi dbyings snyan pa'i chos nyid du bya ba dang / khanam po ba skyed pa'i chos kar po yang dag par bsgrubs par bya ba dang / rdza ye shes kyi
298a9(1): khyod yul yangs la la gnas pa dang / bsgribs pa byed pa'i chos 'ad pa la gnas pas chos la gnad pa 'di brjod pa dang /  la nyan pa'i phyir baspobs par gyis shig/ de nas sangs rgyas macom ldan 'das de dag gis
298a10(1): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyas can gyis shes tshad byed pa nye bar bsrub rdzag matsun do// soms pags pabyed pa dang / mig rab tu dbye ba la ma kham pa rtse 'ang bsgrub pa mdzad do// sa pabyed pa chos kyi da sa
298b1(1): nye bar bsdul pa lan na/ de lazhig gshegs pa rnams kyi su dang gci pa nye bar 'grus pa mdzad do//  byin pa'i byings kyi kyis 'thor rnam par dag pa nye bar bsgrub pa pad/ byang chub poms dpa'i nyi bzhi
298b2(1): byis kyi khyag pa rnam par dbye ba la yakhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// dge ma'i cha ba thams cad nyams pa byed par yongs su bsngos pa'i ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tshe phul ma sa lan gyi lhag 'thong mngon par babyen
298b3(1): de zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phyag g.yas pas// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi daphyi mo la byug pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje byab man
298b4(1): la reg ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin de las rnam par langs te/ langs nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smos// kye rgyal ba'i da sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngo/ lam 'dis ste/ 'gro ba hra6
298b5(1): thams cad khyad par byed pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyo ba pa 'di ni bsam gyis kyi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de laganas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
298b6(1): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su slob pa la slob po/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob par 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi la cwo/ 
298b7(1): ba la slob po// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gapal bsams te/ de skad du smras pa de dag zhig pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag yongs su bsngo ba'i grangs ni du she
298b8(1): na// kye rgyal sras dag bsngo ba bcu po 'di dag ni 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / dkar byub ba'i sangs rgyas macom ldan 'dus rnams kyis gsungs sopa gsung ro gsung bar 'gyur ro// sacu gang zhes 'di ste/  sems
298b9(1): can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog rting 'gro ba ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpal rnams kyis yongs su bsngo ba dang po dang / myi byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ra bya mu ga sems dpas rnams
299a1(1): she bya ma sems dganapas kyi yongs su brjobartsa pa dang / ba ma panyid cings su yang bzhes bya/ nga chub ban bya mas na ni
299a2(1): gshegs pa'im tshan nyid kyi dab bzhin shes kyang/ kyang rgyab sems dang drang yongs su pasngo ba brgyan pa dang / gas pabyed pashis pa dang cos pa byed ces bya ba/ byang chul sems dpa' rnam rtsoms pa paspyo pad / 
299a3(1): cho kyi byings chad byed pa'i rje su song ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba bcu ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag da byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi song su bsngob bcwa po de dag ni
299a4(1): ba dang / ma byon pa dang / daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba hra
299a5(1): dang po sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin phra rold tu phyind pa la rab tu spyod pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol/ 
299a6(1): tu phyind pa rno bar spyod pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sems pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bcom pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la rnam khar dpyod pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha
299a7(1): ro lad tu phyind pa la 'jug pa 'am/ byams pa bsgoms pa yang dag par bskyed pa 'phag snying rjes snying brtse bar byed pa 'am/ dka' ba la rab tu dgal bar byed pa 'am/ btang snyoms la shin tu gnas pa byed kyang rung ste
299a8(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la shin tu bsams nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la rab tu sbyor zhing / dge ba'i cha ba tshad myed par phye nas/ 'di ltar dge ba'i tsha ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song rgyun
299b1(1): 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / byol song kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'gro ba thams cad la rnam par dag pa'i 'tha ra byind par byan 'dogs
299b2(1): ba ka yin zhes sems bskyed do// de de ltar dge ba'i cha ba de de dag yang dag par bskyed pa na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sdugasasngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ bdag
299b3(1): sems can thams can gyi gnas su gyu da cig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dkrol pa'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur dka 'jigs pa kun las bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag sem
299b4(1): can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyurapa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi lam bur gyur cig/ ga gi nang tu bde ba dang ldan pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can zas
299b5(1): gyin dutsun ci/ raba'i babyed pa'i se shes spang ba yang dag par da babaspyad pa'i phyi/ bdag sems can bams cad kyi sang bar rtswasmra mi/  mamin pa'i rgyun ldanam ngam pa ldan pa'i byed lad byo/ 
299b6(1): na pa /  da pa'i mi mang pa yirnapas kyi bdag sems can rnams pad kyi yongs su zhes pa gyur ci 'du sum mo mams na tumasas na ma byed pa'i gyi
299b7(1): na kyi ma 'i pa dag ba'i tsha ba de dag sangs s+ho ste/ de kun ba bsrung ba'i byi yongs su bsngos depar gyimang la zung ba'i byi yang songs su brdzi pa'i/ 'i byi she na bya sa sems dpa' sems des chen po nas
299b8(1): rgya ba ma pa ni pa na sa ma sa mas ma nga / pa gyu // de zhes rgya ma sa sa khyi na / 
299b9(1): bdadag pas ni bdag gi chun pa gang dgon pa med no zhes te/ dedag ni sems pan mams cad sa ne spang babyed pa'i myigagis pana'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen badzin pa ni grob ma / 
300a1(1): byang chum sems dpa yang drin gyig thos pa dang /  pa dang / sems sazlug pa dang / tshogs pa dang / kun par gyud pa dang / rang gi smon pa dang / rlom sem pa dang ldan pa dang / snru rnamapa padang/ 
300a2(1): long la bur byu pa'i sems can byis pa thams cad kyis skyon can du phyi nus so// 'di 'u byer per na/ kwa'i bu nyim 'thar pa deni dbus so kyi nyon gyis ra ba las rogs paskyed par gyi gyur ro// dI ba'i blong byen gyi rlod kyi
300a3(1): logs par myi 'gyur ro// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa'i rdul gyi skyon gyis thogs par gyi 'gyur ro// sna ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi skyon gyis logs par myi 'gyur ro// du ba la thigs pa'i skyon gyis sogs par gyi
300a4(1): 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu'i gling gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i spyod kyis thogasapar myi 'gyur ro// grib ma sna tshogs kyi skyon gyis logs par rten myi 'gyur ro// dug ri'i skyon gyis thogs par myi 'gyur ro// khams
300a5(1): shes pa dang ldan pa sems kyi bdag nyid chen pa nyid shi nad tu zab cing yangs yangs pa yid la yang dag par rtog pa'i myi zhan pa yon tan spyad pas ye shes kyi mthar gyur pa/ chos la shin tu dad pa'i sems mngon par skyes la chos
300a6(1): kyi snab ba li 'od kyis rab tu snang ba don thams cad mthong ba/ chos mngon par shes pa ye shes rig pa brjod pa myed pa lhur byed pa// sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos 'gyed pa la rab tu spyod pa/ sems can thams cad
300a7(1): kyis nyes par sems bskyed pa la khru lad pa myed pa de yang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo ba na/ gnod par byed pa thams cad kyi skyon gyis thogs par myi 'gyur ro// sems can myi snyan pa'i tshul gyis ldog par myi 'gyus
300a8(1): ro/ sems can gyi lta ba'i rnyog pas dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sde pa dpa' bral bar myi 'gyur ro// sems can gyi sems 'brugs pas ldog par myi 'gyur ro// sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud stond pas/ byang chub sems/
